Summary: Brandy the supervisor was very pleasant, thoughtful and accommodating. She helped us to understand charges that we weren’t expecting, and improved the experience of our stay overall. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent for the price.  Perfect for solo/business travelers.  Highly recommend!
Summary: Recently needed to book last minute remote work hotel stay for Irvine CA area.  So glad I picked Sonesta Hotel Irvine from the many possible choices!  This was exactly what I was looking for, at a very inexpensive rate found on Agoda on same day as booking.  Room was quiet, clean and nice view.  Perfect overall room design for single room: work desk, eating space, mini frig, comfy reading/lounge chair, and the bed was very cozy.  All the staff from front desk to restaurant were consistently very friendly helpful and efficient throughout my stay.  The breakfast was amazing!  I ordered a simple two egg platter but it was freshly prepared and pleasantly presented.  The service was excellent and attentive.  Excellent location central to Irvine Corporate Park and OC John Wayne
Manager Response: none

Summary: First of all the hotel is just as beautiful and nicely decorated as any high and Hilton or Hyatt. The room is very clean and ultramodern with  comforts of home. Brandy at the front desk was knowledgeable, efficient, and very personable. She greeted me with a smile, and gave me all the necessary information for our stay as well as reminding me about the credit that you receive when you stay, which I had forgotten about before. I would definitely choose this hotel over and over for a staycation for anyone that is coming in from out of town!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brandy was the superviser that helped us get checked in and she went absolutely above and beyond to make us feel welcome. This is our first time staying at this hotel, and because of Brandy and her friendliness, we will be back again! If you stay here and are lucky enough to get Brandy welcoming you…you’ll be back as well!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently checked into this hotel, and one of the front hotel associates named Brandy has excellent customer service and was so kind and thoughtful in helping me navigate an error I made  in my hotel reservation. The atmosphere of the place is very nice and it is pet friendly as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Severely disappointed experience especially during the holidays.
Summary: 1/5 stars  We booked 2 rooms directly through Sonesta website. Upon checking in, the front desk did not have my reservation. When I provided the confirmation, they said it was booked through booking.com and that is why it was showing up when I have the direct confirmation in my email stating that I booked directly through their website.   I am a Sonesta elite member and that DID NOT show up in their system. When I asked about the elite benefit, the front desk said, you do not have elite status. I had to show proof of my elite status 2 different ways before they finally agreed to change their mind.   I showed my email which showed my elite status, but that was not accepted. I showed my account number and that was not accepted. Finally I opened up the Sonesta app which shows my
Room tip: Would avoid visiting this hotel if possible. It would be a small price to pay to have better...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The outstanding worker “Scott b” made my stay
Summary: The hotel was nice and clean, not an outstanding though. However, there is a guy in the lobby his name is Scott B, literally made my stay with his great attitude. He helped me with unloading my heavy bags and he didn’t want me to even help. Everyday Scott come and say hi and give me a free water. What was very impressing for me is that he was doing his job happily with no complain. He’s such a unique worker that I will never forget.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff. We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.  Regards Bill A.

Summary: Really rude and unprofessional staff. When I came in, they didn’t see my name under the reservation and told me it probably got cancelled. I had an email confirmation and have been getting text messages from the hotel and never received a cancellation email. The staff is very stupid and incompetent. They kicked me out of the hotel using their security guard because I checked in too early - without telling me that I have to pay an extra day. WORST SERVICE AND WILL NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing feedback about your recent stay with us and your attendance at the conference. I am very interested in speaking with you to get a few more details and I’d like to arrange to have a five minute  conversation at your convenience. If this is something you can squeeze in, please reply back to let me know a good date and time that we might chat.  If you would like me to contact you, please provide the phone number. My name is Bill A,  Thank you

Summary: Extremely friendly staff, and I have to give a special shout out to Scott. I arrived early to set up for an event. Scott helped get me in to set up, brought me a water and scheduled plans to shuttle me to the airport the next morning.  Early the next day, I realized I had left gear in the - now locked - conference room. I was panicking as I had to leave for my flight soon. I saw Scott, who just happened to come to work early, he remembered my name, got me back into the room, helped me find my gear and got me to the airport on time. Not only friendly, but went above and beyond! Other than that, nice rooms too. A very pleasant experience!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff. We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.   Regards Bill

Summary Heading: No maid service, no TV on cardio equipment
Summary: Upon check in, I was told that there would be “light” service. I stayed four nights, but I don’t think anyone ever came into my room to take out trash, give me new towels, etc. I didn’t bother to request either, but I thought it was odd, didn’t match what I was told. Fitness center has one TV but you can’t view it if you are on the bike, treadmill, etc. Bikes and treadmill do not have their own TV service. I was going to sit on a bike and watch Monday night football, but that was not possible. Room was fine, I appreciated having a tub since many hotels have converted to shower only.
Manager Response: We are very sorry to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay at our hotel. We aim to provide a clean, comfortable and pleasant place to stay, and we sincerely apologize that our hospitality and attention to detail left something to be desired on this occasion.  . If you would like to share more information about your stay we would like to know how you think we could improve upon our service and accommodations for our guests. Thank you so much for your stay with us.  Thank you Bill A.

Summary: I always enjoy coming to this sonesta, it’s one of my favorites. The rooms are nicely appointed, clean and roomy. I personally love the corner suites, they offer a very spacious living room, sectional and large tv. Great for having cocktails with friends before our concert. The staff is hands down some of the best, Kayla made my yummy lattes in the morning and was always smiling. Dave the manager of the restaurant is such a great guy, super friendly and great conversationalist. Jairo was my main man on my first night, we spent Halloween together lol just the two of us, he recommended the sea bass and it was so yummy, very kind guy. Tristen at the front desk was super kind, got me the room I love and made sure I was taken care of after I accidentally booked the other sonesta. The
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had a great stay with us. If you have any additional comments to help us improve, please do not hesitate to contact us. Looking forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Bill A.

Summary: This place is wonderful. Above and beyond customer service. Absolutely loved our stay and felt super at home. Sophia at the front desk is the type of person who really cares about people and wants to make sure you have a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff !   We value your opinion, and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.  Regards Bill A.

Summary: Very clean, super polite and friendly staff. Our second time staying here, and there will definitely be a third.  They have been very accommodating, and the best part is it is also affordable. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and your loyalty to our hotel! We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards Bill

Summary: My home flooded and I needed somewhere to stay as they replace my floors.  I thought I only had to be here a couple nights, but it turned into a week. The staff has been very accommodating, extending my stay.  Andrew and staff have already made me feel at home.  Accommodations are clean and nice and they are pet friendly! So far so good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay!   We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.  Regards Bill A.

Summary Heading: AMAZING staff. Very new hotel and furnishings.
Summary: Lovely hotel and incredibly kind staff. We flew in from PA for a conference and arrived at 10pm (2am EST) to the hotel. Only when we arrived did we realize that we had booked the wrong hotel and were 30 minutes away from our medical conference. The manager very, very kindly checked us out the next morning with no cancellation fee although we were within the 24 cancellation window. The room was very clean, everything in the hotel is very new and the breakfast was great. Incredibly kind hotel staff. Great service and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our hotel! We hope to welcome you back soon. I', glad we were able to help you We hope to have you stay with us again soon.  Regards, Bill A.

Summary Heading: My stay so far at Sonesta.
Summary: Staff is very personable especially at the bar and restaurant.  Excellent house keeping.  House cleaning is every three days.  Very environment conscious.  I love this. Kayla is one of the workers in the restaurant who gave excellent customer service.  The manager was also very attentive.  This is my second day eating here.  Awesome Sauce!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff. We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.   Regards Bill A.

Summary Heading: Extraordinary Service and Support on Events
Summary: Besides the renewed facilities which are very pleasent and relaxing. The banquet team was exceptional. Always available to solve any issue and going beyond. Isabel and Marilu, it was a pleasure working with you. Congratulations! Great Team!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!!  I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  Additionally that your, event was successful.  We are proud of our team here and our newly renovated hotel.   We hope to have you back again soon.   Regards Bill A.

Summary: I stayed there with my husband over this past weekend. I am on crutches because I fractured my ankle and I arrived there before my husband because we were on different flights. The manager, Martha, was not accommodating at all and was frankly very rude. Because of my ankle, I asked if I can go up to the room and rest and I told her my husband will arrive with the physical card in 2 hours. The card was already given over the phone and he called in to make sure I’ll be able to go to the room. Martha was extremely rude and had absolutely no common courtesy. She told me I can wait in the waiting room knowing I was on crutches. One of the employees there mentioned to me that she’s always that rude. Very unpleasant stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms are clean and nice and comfy. The girls at the restaurant are wonderful especially Kayla and Maribel . They knew I had a 0900 meeting every day and always made sure my breakfast was ready quickly. I chose to drive a extra 15 minutes just to stay at this hotel . The staff has been very responsive to my needs and always respectful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service was top notch, professional and friendly.  Rooms are spacious and comfortable.  I loved the brand new gym that had great spin bikes, treadmills, and weights.  I only had breakfast at the restaurant, but found the food to be very fresh.  Lucy at the front desk was very friendly, helpful, and professional. Easy parking, 5min to the SNA airport, easy to get on the 405, 55, 22 fwys. There are some very close by sit down restaurants as well as gourmet casual dining very near by. If you want to shop at on of the high end malls, South Coast Shopping mall is mins away.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed a wonderful Friday evening dinner at the Sonesta hotel restaurant with a group of 14 visiting VIPs who were guests at the hotel as well as local community and civic leaders.  The manager did an excellent job of arranging all of the details, the service was attentive and the food good.  Thank you, Dan, for an excellent evening of conversation and cuisine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not only was the food delicious but Kayla’s service was top tier and she was super friendly! Thanks for the little chat!   Will definitely be staying back at Sonesta next time I’m in town as all the staff have been so lovely and accommodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Kayla was super helpful with my order and she even brought out the chef to clear things up.  The chef made sure that my order was adjusted to exactly how I wanted.  Kayla made sure to offer me anything that I needed, her service was amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  It is our first priority to ensure your stay is an enjoyable one.   We hope to see you back again soon.   Regards Bill A.

Summary: We hosted a dinner for a large party this last Friday night.   Many guests ordered the salmon entree and commented on the taste, freshness and tenderness.  Huge kudos to Chef John for an overall excellent dinner and especially the salmon entree. Meg/Treasurer
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay. If you would like to share more information about your stay we would like to know how you think we could improve upon our service and accommodations for our guests. Our goal is to have a score in every area.  Thank you so much for your stay with us.  Regards Bill

Summary: Nice facility, even nicer staff. They treated us as part of the family especially our service dog. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone traveling through the area. Within walking distance of a Starbucks. A nice bar and restaurant inside the hotel. Swimming pool and hot tub were refreshing at days end.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.   Regards Bill A.

Summary: Andrew made us feel so welcomed yesterday! He was so accommodating to myself and my customers making us feel so at home. If you could please let him know he makes people feel so welcome and at home and we would come back just because of him and his welcoming kindness! Please let him know he does such a great job with taking care of guests! He is a great face to your hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  I will share this review with him and the team.  Thank you again.  Bill A.

Summary: Kayla was my server and gave me great service. Thank you very much, she’ll be a reason I come back!   I ordered a coffee, 2 eggs, turkey bacon, hash browns and toast. Quite a big meal and she served it to perfection.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A writer's Conference for two  nights
Summary: Mia C when I checked in was very, very helpful when there seemed to be confusion about my room. Also, Bill (believe it was Bill) when I checked out this Sunday morning at 2 am, was equally helpful.  Overall a good two days and nights.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My mom and I stayed at Sonesta Irvine during the last week of August as I was attending orientation and UCI! The staff and hotel was wonderful, we will stay here next time for sure! Thank you to Lucy in the front desk for being so welcoming and giving us complimentary parking when our voucher from UCI didn’t go through, she was a sweetheart! Definitely recommend everyone to stay here :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  We hope you will stay with us again soon.  Regards Bill A.

Summary: The staff here were lovely and helpful. I appreciated their kindness while in town for a family emergency. In particular Kayla and Noemi in the restaurant and Juana at the front desk. Everyone I interacted with was very helpful and it made a difficult week a bit easier.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I came for a labor weekend, with my family, and my dogs, the hotel is on a great location, close to Newport Beach, rooms renovated, an amazing view, food on the restaurant was delicious, i had an steak that was amazing. But i want to highlight some people. Jairo, at the restaurant, the service that he does is amazing, above and beyond, the first night we was unable to find a high chair for my son, he help us to put my son, on a chair with pillows, amazing, the breakfast server also a lady, extremely helpful and sweet, the service at the front desk was amazing from everyone. This is a “must come back” on my list
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love to come here on the weekends. Lucy is professional, really helpful and friendly. She is also fluent in English, Chinese and Vietnamese. Always gives us the best room and high floor. Love this clean hotel and customer service here everytime.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay!   We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel. Regards, Bill

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service from my server Kayla
Summary: I recently stayed  at the hotel with my disabled mother and a couple other family members. We were all a little stressed from traveling so we decided to eat breakfast at the restaurant. We were greeted and waited on by one of the nicest young lady I’ve ever encountered during a hotel visit and I’ve travel around the world so that says a lot. Her name was Kayla. She was So attentive to my mother and my family. She made sure our food came out on time and even suggested items off the menu that were extremely yummy. Thank you so much for your amazing customer service Ms.Kayla we can’t wait to return back to this hotel and restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Worst customer service and the dirty hotel in the world, DON'T stay there to save your money and headache
Summary: If I could give zero star rating, I would do so.  The hotel was one of the worst hotel (in term of customer service and cleanliness) that I ever stayed for my life.   I checked in the hotel in the afternoon and noticed the bath tub wasn't clean at all. It has the residue from the shampoo or the bath lotion that leaked from the bottles from the wall. I requested the housekeeping to clean it up. They refused to do so because of the COVID protocol. They will only do housekeeping service every 3 days.  On the top of that, there was a panel that suppose to cover part of the wall but it was only half hanging from the wall.  It was very dusty and dirty behind the panel. The customer service or house keeping refused to fix it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit a review of your stay.  am sorry to hear that you found the shampoo dispenser was leaking.  I assure you that each room is cleaned and inspected before allowed to be rented.  I do hope you let us know so that we were able to address the issue for you.  If not, in the future please always reach o that we may assist you right away as we want to ensure your complete satisfaction. If you return to the hotel please reach out to me so that I may assist you with your reservation in any way I can. Thank you Bill.

Summary Heading: Fantastic and friendly service in a beautiful business park with great amenities both on & off site.
Summary: We have to stay in the Irvine business area often and are "regulars" at the Sonesta Irvine.  We always get welcome smiles and greetings on our returns.  Lucy Hoang has always been a great help with her upbeat attitude.  She always asks how everything is and if they can help in any way.  We have to say that the entire staff is very friendly & professional in meeting all our needs.  The new restaurant / bar is beautiful and the food is great.  Best steak burger and fries around and everything else we've tried is amazing as well. We will continue to consider Sonesta Irvine as our home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  We pleased to here that your stay experience was an enjoyable one.  Our new restaurant and it menu offering has been very well received.  We hope you will come back and stay with us again soon.  Regards, Bill A.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, convenient location, amazing staff!
Summary: Came here with my puppy to work for the day due to all day fire inspection at my Condo.   This hotel is less than a mile from my home and I always stay here during the yearly fire inspection.   Lucy went above and beyond when helping me out and understand my situation.  She’s a true hospitality expert.    Lucy made my last minute booking so easy and stress free.  Can’t wait to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel front desk staff is incredibly professional, accommodating and kind, especially LUCY!   I extended my stay for a few days it was very easy.  The food at the restaurant menu selection and restaurant staff is friendly and the food is amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff.  We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel. We hope to see you back soon.  Regards Bill A.

Summary: I visited this Hotel 6 months ago, when it was under construction, that experience didn’t went so well   But, I tried again tonight and the experience was completely mind blowing   Mrs. Ashante who was at the front desk, made my check in so fast and charming, that It made me feel like a VIP client  Her service was just amazing + the hotel was completely renewed very well decorated and cozy at the same time that made me think about booking with Marriot or Renaissance again  I’m so happy for this new experience….
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff. Our renovation was difficult at times for everyone.  I am glad to read your return experience was  exceptional.   We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel.  Thank you Bill A.

Summary: Stayed here for a business trip, with breakfast and reservations taken care of by company.  Was not sure about the breakfast coverage, so paid on a Friday morning.  Breakfast service was inefficient, and inept.  Breakfast vouchers arrived at about 930pm on night two under the door (leaving early next morning).  Wife went to front desk at night and told that the charges on my room would be taken care of.  Next morning, front desk person was "on break" on 2nd floor and according to maintenance person, and could not be troubled to come down to print out bill to check.  Left email address.  No communication. Called.  Got email.  Breakfast still on bill. Called.  I was told manager would call me next week.  This place is really not good right now, except proximity to airport and the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had trouble checking in at another hotel and decide to stay at the Sonesta. I was greeted by Ashante Crawford, she was extremely helpful and managed to get me a room. I would highly recommend staying here, the staff are lovely and the Hotel is clean and very well maintained. They have also just refurbished the dinning area. 5 stars from me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. The hotel is close to John Wayne Airport, but could not hear airport noise. Several conveniences are walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Juana was absolutely incredible! Her care for those staying at the hotel and attention detail is immaculate. 10/10 customer service from Juana!!! I will always stay there because Juana was so amazing, thanks again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel to enjoy LA RAMS training camp @ UCI
Summary: Stayed at Sonesta Irvine last weekend of July 2022 and really enjoyed this newly renovated hotel. Check/in was seamless, great customer service. Room was a king on 12th floor. Smelled brand new. So sleek & stylish. The bed was SO comfortable I wish I had a bed like that at home. Great nights sleep. We enjoyed the pool & spa on 3rd floor as well. I highly recommend this hotel. We will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay!   We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel. Can you share why you only rated us a 4 of 5?   We would like to know how you think we could improve upon our service and accommodations for our guests. Thank you so much for your stay with us.   Bill A.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Sonesta Irvine from May 4th to May 7th. We came into town to celebrate my daughter's college graduation. We booked over the phone and received a discounted rate (which we are grateful for) and were told because we had at a graduate we would receive free parking (which didn't happen), but I digress. Upon arrival, they said there would be no room service for COVID-19 reasons; however, there was no mask mandate/COVID -19 protocol, so it seems like they were trying to do less work.   I know that many hotels do this, but I expected room service because it's a higher-scale hotel. My first grievance is that our room did not have a functional AC. Multiple repairers/HVAC techs came by our room and did not solve the problem. We were not offered another room,
Manager Response: Greetings Shirley,  Thank you for taking the time to share your very candid feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn the most from and genuinely use to improve.   We sincerly apologize for the challenges encountered during your stay.  However, we are most regretful about the lack of response from our staff both in regards to the elevator entrapment & post stay.   As we enter the final weeks of our renovation, there are a few remaining challenges and it appears you were impacted by most of them; the restaurant opening in early June, air conditioning system & elevator upgrades taking place.     We work very hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, however it is apparent in this case that we fell short.   If you give us a chance to earn back your trust post renovation, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: it is a little bit old but they were doing some renovation on restaurant thats why we couldnt have breakfast. lobby should be larger imo as it is a big hotel. renovation on rooms were completed so our room was big, clean and we had everything we need, bathroom was very nice decorated and luxury as well. the staff was very welcoming, i would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Greetings !  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay.    We agree, our lobby should be more open.   Which is why we are so excited to say that post renovation our lobby will be open & expansive with massive windows to let in the light, plenty of communal seating and an outdoor patio.  Hope to see you again soon !

Summary: Room updates great! Very sheek, modern. Stayed 8th floor, King, rm 825. But be aware they're renovating lobby, so lobby is basically like motel 6 check in. Pool and hot tub are open, and outdoor patio and basketball court. Close to run down the city water resovoire. Rooms aren't the thickest walls though, could fairly easily hear hallway noise and neighbor rooms. But for the price good stay.
Manager Response: Greetings Noe,   Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay !  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall.  We hope to see you again soon when the new lobby is open, including our amazing new restaurant.   Sincerely,

Summary: Overall stay was fantastic! The spacious room located at the top floor with a very beautiful view made our stay great. I also love the furnitures, the huge tv and the comfy King size bed. My son loves the pool too! I will definitely come back and stay longer next time. :)  ♥
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times.  I experienced the newly renovated corner suite on this visit, and it did not disappoint.  The panoramic view of the city is simply outstanding!   Natalie was very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Don’t stay here!  Property is run down.  Met the GM who sounds like she hates her job.  Rooms are dirty and not well maintained.  Smelled musty.  The Marriott and Hyatt are both great alternatives in the area.  Rates are higher but worth it because you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Greetings !  We are genuinely disappointed to hear you did not enjoy your recent stay.  Following your conversation yesterday with two of our managers, we sincerely felt that we had addressed all of the challenges you detailed.     We take great pride in ensuring the cleanliness & maintenance of our rooms and look forward to showcasing our new guestrooms and public space in a few months.

Summary: This is a very nice property and the staff was awesome.  Genevieve was very accommodating.  The room was very clean and had a very comfortable feel. It very close to John Wayne airport.  Don't pass up this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay!   We value your opinion and we appreciated you taking the time to rate our hotel. Bill A.

Summary: I had booked my reservation for tonight but had been at the airport ALL NIGHT last night, because of trouble with my flight. I called at 9:00 A.M. to ask for a early check in. I was hoping maybe 12;00 or 1:00. Genevieve was so friendly and quick to say, "We will accommodate you" when I told her of my dilemma. She gave me perfect instructions where to wait for the shuttle to get to the Hotel and how many minutes it would be! 10!! As soon as i got there she found me a beautiful room on the 9Th floor overlooking gorgeous Irvine, waived the early check in fee and let me know I still had 20 minutes if I wanted to grab breakfast.  WOW All that by one girl!!! The room is beautiful and immaculate!!! And then to take this place up another notch, as i was attempting to write a review
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff, our rooms, and the shuttle service.  We hope to have you stay with us again soon.  Regards, Bill A.

Summary: Very beautiful hotel and management is very professional! Supports military which I absolutely love! Bill Acuna is very professional and he was very helpful with recommending foods spots and sights. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recently stayed the weekend here and it has by far been the best stay I've had anywhere in all of my travels! All the staff were amazing, professional, friendly and very accommodating! Genevieve checked us in and was outstanding! This place is stunning inside and out. The views from the rooms are fantastic and the parking is well worth the fee. Wasnt worried about our vehicle or belongings at all. Perfect area and location! Super convenient if flying in and out of John Wayne Airport! Pool and hot tub were open and very clean. So we're the rooms. Spotless! Overall 10/10 all day! Will definitely be making this my go to place to stay when traveling in the area! Thank you to all the amazing workers there!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff, location, and parking This has been a difficult time for everyone and I am glad we could give you peace of mind with Sonesta Irvine.     We hope to have you back again soon  Regards Bill A.

Summary Heading: Great location.  Nice.  Clean.  Horrible pillows.
Summary: We stayed here 3 nights.  At check in, front desk person told us that there would be no daily room cleaning.  Hotel location is very convenient and safe with paid gated parking.  Our room was nice, clean (only on first day).  AC worked too well as it blast cold air in the face when you sleep.  We did not sleep well at all also because the pillows were terrible and provided no support for the neck or head.   Another annoyance was that there were inconsiderate guests parking on both lanes under the port cochere leading to the parking area blocking traffic for a long time.  Hotel security or concierge should direct traffic and advise offenders to move.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review. I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the cleanliness and our location.  However, we are disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations in other areas.   We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continually improve our guest service.   Regards Bill A.

Summary: What can I say. This place is awesome. Every one of the staff there is so incredibly efficient. They have it down to a science at the front desk and the kitchen is so good. Genevieve is hands down the best she is so sweet and  accommodating. She is very thoughtful. Beds are comfy showers are hot and the pool is wet. Thank you sonesta for making a tuff patch a little smoother.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here. I please to hear Genevieve was able to make your stay more enjoyable.  We look forward to welcoming you back!   Regards Bill

Summary: Nice location with great views. Professional and friendly front desk staff. Rooms are very clean and quiet, with good air conditioning. The grounds and gardens are clean and nicely maintained as well. Feels like home!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back! Bill A.

Summary: The hotel and staff are great! I was surprised by the amount of negative reviews, but they must be for the wrong place...  the hotel staff made my wife and I feel incredibly welcomed and treated us so well! We decided to stay here to celebrate our anniversary while in Irvine and do not regret it one bit! The bed is COMFORTABLE AS HECK!!!   Thank you to the management team for the lovely gift to celebrate our anniversary! Very tasty ❤️  Lastly, Lee at the front desk went above and beyond to make our stay even better. He remembered our names and was super friendly each time we saw him... By far the best and most genuine customer service we have received.  Thank you, Sonesta
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff, especially Lee.  He is a valued employee and I pleased to hear he was able to make your stay memorable.    We hope to see you back soon.  Thank you Bill A.

Summary: Very nice hotel, offered us a suite and discounted parking. Our room was very clean. The staff was excellent we are very pleased with our stay here and we will be back again soon! Thank you Sonesta at Irvine!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back! Bill.

Summary: It started with Bill.  I made a phone call a told him I wanted to do something special for my colleague. He said it will be taken care of.  Lee checked us in and finished the rest of the amazing experience.  They had a cake and a bottle of champagne waiting.  I took it to my room and invited my colleagues over.  What a wonderful and memorable experience we had.  Thanks to the A-Mazing staff at the Sonesta it was perfect.  This hotel is very good.  I have stayed here many times and they are exceptional.  Thanks so much!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back! Bill

Summary: The hotel and amenities are nice. The staff is flat out AMAZING. I truly enjoy staying at the Sonesta Irvine. As a bonus - the food is really good and the location is perfect with easy access to the airport, the mall and other food options. I cannot recommend this place enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back! Bill A,

Summary: Sonesta is a very comfortable hotel to stay in with your family. I personally would consider staying here anytime with my family. The person to help me out with my stay was Geneviene because of her and her welcoming us here this is our family hotel to stay at. There is also so many things to do here activity wise ! You wont regret it !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled that Genevieve was able to welcome you to our hotel and make your experience at Sonesta that much more special. We hope to see you again in the future! Take care!

Summary Heading: Close to Airport, easy freeway access, great value!
Summary: The room was very nice, but it is an older hotel which has been remodeled, the rooms are nice and well kept. The value was exceptional and though we were several miles from Disneyland, we were very close to the John Wayne Airport.  Disliked · You do have to pay for parking, but it is not like SFO.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back! Bill

Summary: The price is low, maybe reflecting the age of the hotel (built probably in 1990's, with basic updating) and lack of amenities.   They have an indoor pool, but it looks dated.  The gym has treadmills, eliptical and some weight benches.   But most of the equipment seems to be missing pieces or broken.   There is one restaurant.  The Hyatt House nearby is newer, has a breakfast buffet, the rooms are large and well decorated with rooms that also have kitchenettes.
Manager Response: Dear MT,   Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We value your opinion and welcome the feedback. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.  Sincerely,  Desiree N. -Assistant Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent service at the front desk, lounge & restaurant. Drinks and meals are pricey, but after all, this is Irvine, Orange County, California and that means everything is expensive, so be prepared. Room was nice, clean & comfortable, but could have used a fridge. Really, even motel 6 have them and they're less expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property Mike! We are happy you found our service excellent at our front desk, lounge and restaurant. While not all of our rooms have refrigerators already in them, we definitely have them available upon request. We would be happy to send one up next time you're here. Thank you again for your stay and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This review is 3 weeks overdue, but this Sonesta came in clutch when my girlfriend and I were desperately looking for a room on New Years. We had called others hotels but they all said they wouldn't take us since it was already late at night. However, when we called Sonesta, Claire was more than happy to take us in despite the time and even told us she wouldn't go on her break until we got there. From the moment we walked in, despite it being around 4:00am, she treated us, as well as the other guests still up at that time, with the upmost respect and even got us a room with an amazing view of Irvine. Our room was awesome, no complaints what-so-ever and I highly anyone staying in the area to check out this hotel. Excellent service, clean rooms, comfortable beds, this experience
Manager Response: Wow! I am so happy we were able to help you out in your time of need. Hearing that Claire was able to assist you with everything you need makes us really proud of the team we have here that make our guest experiences the best they can be. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I had a conditioner bottle from the room missing, as well as a make up primer. Typically if it’s a cheap item I wouldn’t care but together this was about 100 dollars and brand new bought for the trip. I did speak to management and they took no accountability for the items just stated they would “look for it and call if it was found but that no one had seen it”. As expected. Very upsetting as you would expect that they would take some sort of accountability for missing items. Not saying anyone stole it, perhaps it was trashed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Management

Summary: I was overjoyed with my stay at with this hotel and all the amenities it came with! The staff was extremely bubbly/friendly, warm, and kind. I felt like I was right at home, especially with the Late Night crew!  Claire who works the front desk at the late hours of the evening(10pm-8am) is nothing, but a breathe of fresh air! Ready to welcome you home and even talk to you about how you are doing and how your day was. I was thousands of miles away from home and being all alone it was hard to get homesick because talking to Claire reminded me of my Mom; So she instantly felt like family! I would recommend this hotel and I will most definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sweet words! It really warms our hearts that you found Claire's attention to your needs reminded you of your mom, and that our staff was bubbly and friendly! We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we hope to welcome you back next time. Take care!

Summary: John and Naveen are the best but John Lee treats people with respect, communicates with happiness very well, he is a clean man clean hands and I think he should be more days at the Hotel at the front desk. Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words Beatriz! Its been a pleasure hosting you here and you have definitely become like family to us!

Summary: Wanted to send an honorable mention out to Mr. Frank at the front desk.  He was very helpful and hands-on when I had to figure out the computer. *  "Shakiki" forever:)- And, another note of appreciation to Mr. Pack who assisted in the bar with my food selection.  You were very informative and I appreciated your time.  Along with appreciating the story you shared about your nickname: "Pack Taco."  That's a very cute story and I'm glad you shared. And, the ladies at the front desk were gracious as well. Again, thank you for being good at what you do.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your awesome review of our hotel and of our staff members Frank and Pack! We are thrilled you were able to take away a travel story and memories I am sure you will always remember. We hope we are able to welcome you back next time.

Summary: I was here for a conference.  The room was perfect.  Very clean with comfortable king size bed and clean functioning bathroom.  I was on the 12th floor. It was very quiet even as our view was the interstate and airport. The whole facility was spotless.  Staff arranged and rearranged room with amazing speed.  Breakfast and lunch buffets were awesome.  You can't say enough good things about the coffee breaks and those amazing COOKIES!! I felt we were pretty spoiled.  Transport to and from the airport was a huge plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed our facility and our beds comfortable during your stay for your conference. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: So after having a horrible experience flying into California and getting through the airport, Claire at the front desk made my check in swift and painless, not to mention, assisted and recommended some great local attractions etc.  Her warm welcoming demeanor made me feel like royalty, and the hotel needs more employees like her, thanks Claire!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review! We couldn't agree more, without Claire helping our guests feel at home we would be lost! Thank you for your stay and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Under normal circumstances I find myself too busy to leave reviews although Sonesta Hotel has really outdid themselves with their choice of staff. One in particular, Claire, was the epitome of the ideal employee. She was quick to handle check-in, very friendly, accommodating, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay went smoothly. What was supposed to be a night’s stay, turned into a week. I felt at home. Thanks again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your awesome review! I am so thrilled Claire was able to provide you with such excellent service. We hope to welcome you back next time you're in town. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Came back after a long day to an open door
Summary: This hotel is nice enough but after a long day I came back to my hotel room and the door was propped open with the safety bar. We know it was not us since we left and the room had not been cleaned and we came back and it was. When we called the front desk they told us they needed to contact housekeeping and would call back. After waiting a short while and talking we called back to ask for a new room since we didn’t know who had been in and out of ours and the person said the were “a little negligent” and would send someone up with a key to a new room. Eventually we moved to a smaller room. This was not a good situation and was not handled properly.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. I am so sorry the situation was handled the way that it was as it appears the fault was our own. Our guest's safety and security is important to us and this should have never happened. We do hope we will have the opportunity to better serve you in the future. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Summary: I stayed here with family just before traveling out of the John Wayne Airport. Really nice property, super safe area. The only bummer is having to pay for parking but it's the location so I'm not totally surprised. Overall good stay and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: New owner/management...in need of some updates
Summary: I was here at the property for a convention in late October.  We booked as a Wyndham property and it was Sonesta by the time we got there.   The bones of the hotel are good but there are so many 'little' things that are not right yet.   They double booked our lunch room one day and had difficulties with the AV for many of the meetings.   This property deserves to be a high-end hotel...for the area that it serves.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Kevin. Sounds like you stayed with us just as we became a Sonesta property. While I am saddened to hear you experienced a few issues during your stay, I am excited to see the changes coming in the future to our property. We are always working towards our goal of complete guest satisfaction and we hope we have the opportunity to prove that to you in the future. Thank you again for your stay.

Summary: Staff was very courteous and helpful and my room was very comfortable and they provided the shuttle to the airport which was only about 20min away. Breakfast was provided and the menus was varied and tasty.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of your stay. We are thrilled you found our staff courteous and helpful but most importantly that your room was comfortable. We hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great spot but $20 parking for a night
Summary: Good spot, central, easy access to everywhere, but $20 parking for a night, which should be included in the advertised price, so customer makes an informed decision. I was not prepared for that...Consider this when booking your room, if you have a car rental
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay. Overnight parking is a rate of $20 per night and this information should appear on every website our rooms are sold on. If you did not see this on a particular booking site, please let us know so that we can get that corrected right away. Thank you again for your stay! We hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Good shuttle service which was a big plus on our stay. Did not like that we were not given choices but was just randomly placed on the top most floor that requires a key card to get up.  Breakfast for $20 buffet was pricey, did not end up eating there as there was hardly anything to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay. We love hearing feedback from our guests so that we can see how we can improve upon our services we offer. Our complimentary shuttle is a great way for our guests to get around within a 3 mile radius as there is so much to do in this area! Our top floor is our executive level and offers an amazing view of the area. We would be happy to place you on a lower level if you would prefer that as we hope to welcome you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Great stay, good food, convenient location
Summary: The room was very nice and the stay was pleasant. The attached restaurant was excellent as well, not just in food but also service. The location is also great, walking distance to John Wayne Airport. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Great place to hold a meeting
Summary: The hotel is close to airport, and close to many other support businesses such as eating areas, etc. For business it was exceptionally well run, and all staff members were attentive to my event needs and success.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property! Your complete satisfaction is our goal! We hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Excellent property. Very modern very clean and in a great location. All the staff were friendly. Very nice indoor pool and spa with a patio and a small putting green. We were there for a concert in Santa Ana at the Yost theater and this location allowed us to be conveniently located to the Theater, Newport Beach and Costa Mesa. All within 15 minutes drive so for us it was a great location. Wi-Fi could’ve been a little faster.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for taking the time to review our property and our amenities. We are happy you enjoyed out pool and spa and outside patio. I agree with you! We are so close to many awesome things to do in the area. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Thank you for your stay with us.

Summary: Basic business hotel with clean, comfortable rooms for a good price. Considering most are traveling for business at this location, we were surprised at how poor the internet service was. Parking was pretty expensive as well which is the only reason we didn’t give them a higher rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I’ve had to stay at the Wyndham Irvine for an extended period for business and though it’s a lovely place it’s not like home of course. Thank God for Claire at the front desk, she’s AMAZING!  She’s made this stay feel like home away from home, with her genuine warmth and personal touch. I look forward to her welcoming greeting and smile each day. Today she brought in her home made pumpkin bread for staff and guests and it really warmed my soul. Thank you Claire—it’s the little things and the human touch that ring BIG in our hearts. Don’t ever lose that!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I was in a pinch traveling and our previous hotel we booked seemed to have lost our confirmation. We found this hotel on a last minute trip using hotel tonight and Claire took care of us she was so amazing and nice. She helped turn the night around. Great customer service and hospitality by Claire. Great room and in a very nice location. Would recommend this place!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Worst hotel I stayed in.. too noisy you could hear everything from people walking in the hallway to your neighbors next door. the AC made so much noise. Horrible place to stay.Check in time was a big mess. They didn’t have our rooms ready
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a candid review of your stay at our property. I am quite disappointed to hear you had such a poor experience with us. We strive to provide only the best service to our guests and I apologize that you did not experience this during your stay. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back so we can show you a better experience. Please let us know if you need anything at all.

Summary: Stayed there for work and the room was old and dirty. Restroom design was horrible and inconvenient. Walls are thin and I can hear noises from other rooms and hallway all the time. Service was horrible too. I won’t be staying there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a candid review of your stay at our property. I am quite disappointed to hear you had such a poor experience with us. We strive to provide only the best service to our guests and I apologize that we fell short of that. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back so we can show you a better experience. Please let us know if you need anything at all.

Summary: Had to stay local when our house was fumigated when we were moving.  This place was affordable but luxurious, had a great indoor pool for the kiddo & a jacuzzi for us.  Easy to get to lots of food choices.  Great helpful staff all around.  Nice mini getaway!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: The maids took my personal pillow, which I travel with, never was found again and I left a belt in a room and when I went to inquire about it, hotel staff gave me the assistance and concern that I’d normally experience when asking a 2 year old to explain physics!
Manager Response: Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your lost and found items. A member of our management team has reached out to you regarding your lost personal items.

Summary: Beautiful property, close to everything important for business in Irvine. I was at a 2-day conference in another hotel. Loved my short stay here away from all the crowds. My check-in and out went smoothly and the staff were responsive and welcoming. I am sorry I wasn't able to be with my husband and enjoy all the amenities but I had two full days to attend the conference. Another time!
Manager Response: Dear Naphooney,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us! We would love to welcome you and your husband back in the future should you return to the area. We appreciate the review and thank you again for choosing Wyndham.

Summary: Another excellent stay for us at the Wyndham.  Thank you for always making our stay enjoyable yet again. jkas;hdf;lkdsahjflkhjdskfhjadslkfjlksadjflkdsjflksadjflkdsajlfkjasdkfljdsklfjsdklfjlksdajfklasdjfklsdjfklasdjfkljsdaklfj
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review Rhettg2019! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Good if you're looking for a crack den
Summary: Not every hotel is good all the time. Maybe this one was having an off-night. My experience was bad from check-in (doors locked and associates sleeping) to room assignment (they didn't have the king room I reserved so I was assigned a handicapped room that was under construction) and then it went down hill...
Manager Response: I'm sorry to read about your experience and am very troubled by some of the things you mentioned. If you would like to reach out to management directly we would love to hear about your experience in more detail. We do value your business and take your concerns seriously. Thank you for bringing this issues to light.

Summary: One of the better stays for business that I've been on in a while.  Room was quiet, the bed and pillows were off the charts comfortable.  Bumble and Bumble toiletries.  Fairly premium linens.  Quality TV channel options.  Internet was fine for all my needs which was not high in streaming video but rather email, google maps and weather.
Manager Response: Thank you RJLozJr! We really appreciate you taking the time to review your stay with us. I am so happy you found your guest room quiet and the bed comfortable. As a business traveler I am sure you've seen the best and the worst case scenarios in many hotels. We would love to welcome you back in the future should your travels ever bring you back this way. Thank you again!

Summary: When you check in with a company card on file make sure you bring your own card to pay for the room. I was told my boss would have to bring the card to the hotel if we wanted to use it. But, I work in Kansas City and the hotel was in California. So I used my card. Should have been no problem and at that point I should have been on my way to the room, but instead they wanted to stand around and talk about how they were going to handle the situation while I stood there and waited... exhausted, hungry and dripping with sweat. There is much more to the story, but in the end the hotel actually went ahead and used the company card when I checked out. I didn't ask them to and they didn't say they were going to, they just did. And that ended up causing even more problems, all over
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear about your check in experience. I can understand your frustration being tired and waiting to simply check in after a day of travelling. To avoid situations like this in the future, I would advise your employer to send in their approved credit card authorization form 24 hours prior to your arrival. Once we have that form on file, we can then set up your reservation properly and the check in process will go much more smoothly. Again I am sorry to hear you had this experience as it is not typical at our hotel. If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to reach out directly. We do value your business and thank you for your stay.

Summary: I usually don't complain but if I'm paying for a room I want to sleep comfortably. The room had no A/C and only blew out hot air. I was told maintenance would solve the issue but it took them hours to even show up and nothing was fixed. This is the most uncomfortable hotel stay I've ever experienced.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry to hear your guest room was uncomfortably hot. If you would like to reach out to me directly I can see how I can best correct this for you as I will need some details of your stay. Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention and I hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: it was a clean environment, i will lodge again for my brandman university graduation next year. thanks for your hospitality excellent staff. The only down side was the pool. it was not clean when i went to use it but it will not make me not to return or refer a friend,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to submit your review. We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for bringing the condition of the pool to our attention. I will be sure to follow up with our staff to ensure proper care of our facilities. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Great location and nice bar that has screens to watch the game.  Guests use the bar regularly and it's a great way to end the day. Plenty of parking and quick check in and check out.  Better location than across the street from the airport - no traffic and plenty of eating areas.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and found the amenities here great. We really do have a great location close by many awesome places to see and grab a bite to eat. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Right now, they're having problems with the AC.  The rooms were pretty warm. The elevators are slow too. One wasn't working at all. Besides that, the hotel is really good.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us!  We appreciate your review of the hotel and assure you we are working hard to correct any issues you may have run into during your stay. We value your business and look forward to your return.

Summary: My husband and I were on a getaway for his birthday weekend. Saul from the front desk was fantastic and made our stay a positive one. We were met with friendly yet professional service during both check-in and check-out. We really appreciated the complimentary room upgrade - the room was spacious, clean, comfortable and had a luxurious amount of natural light with the floor to ceiling windows. While this hotel is located in a more corporate area of Irvine, it is still close to great restaurants and shopping, so we found it easy to go out for dinner, drinks etc within a few minutes drive. For Orange County, we felt like we received great value for what we paid, especially during labor day weekend. Overall we had a very relaxing and enjoyable stay and will be back again.
Manager Response: We are delighted you had a relaxing and enjoyable stay with us! I am so happy Saul was able to take care of your needs while you were here celebrating. We really do have a great location being so close to Newport Beach and Costa Mesa. I'm happy you pointed out the natural lighting in the rooms from our large windows, I think both sides of the hotel offer pretty views of the city and its surroundings. We do value your business and hope you'll return to visit us again in the future. Thank you!

Summary: Hotel is literally 5 minutes away from the Airport. Shuttle will pick you up in a minute. Great customer service and welcoming!!! Roomy with big bathroom and sink.   Water bottles and coffees and tea are complementary.  Decent size of gym with good enough equipment and small size of indoor pool.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review of our hotel! We are so happy you found our team welcoming and it sounds like you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future! Thank you Tony!

Summary Heading: Nice place, but has large overnight parking fees
Summary: The staff was friendly. The room was comfortable, especially the bed and blanket. During my second night there people next door were loud and kept me up really late. I called the front desk about switching rooms, but the place was fully booked.  Overnight parking fees were $22.50 at the time of my stay. I think it is ridiculous to pay to park at a hotel you are staying at. I noticed the parking fees too late after booking.
Manager Response: Hello,  While I'm happy you found our accommodations comfortable and our staff friendly, I am sorry you had to experience noisy neighbors. I know how frustrating that can be. We do give one verbal warning before we actually ask the guests to leave if they are being disruptive to other guests. For overnight parking we do charge $20. Our rate is very competitive for this area as most hotels charge $25 and up. We do value your business and thank you for your stay with us.

Summary: The John Wayne Airport Wyndham Inn has a friendly staff and great team to interact with.  Great bar tenders with warm conversation.  The breakfast buffet has excellent food and very friendly staff  Staying with them is always a pleasure and I return frequently.  Looking forward to my next visit!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review Mr. Blomquist. We are thrilled you enjoy both our staff and our delicious breakfast buffet. We are happy to have you and look forward to your return.

Summary: Not our first time staying at this hotel - check-in, service, cleanliness, food and quality are always outstanding.  They have the best beds too!  We always enjoy our stay and we will definitely be staying at the hotel again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Wow thank you Fay! We truly value your business and thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are happy you enjoy our beds and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I love coming here either for Buisness meetings or simply just to relax and get out of the house ! I love all the floors the higher the better and the view is just spectacular! I love just turning on the AC and sip Tea and look at the view at night ! It’s so soothing and relaxing and for Buisness meetings there exterior and interior is very clean and in a very nice calm luxurious area so PERFECT ! I highly recommend it for solo Buisness and family’s
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your glowing review Kim! We really do appreciate your feedback and we are so happy to provide you with a relaxing place to stay. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I had a great stay. The rooms are nice and clean. The hotel is located near the highway which made it easy to travel from hotel to any destination. Staff was great and friendly. This only thing is that there is a 20 dollar parking charge per day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review Cristhain! We really do try to provide our guests with the best quality and service we can offer and thank you for choosing our hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Shuttle bus drivers were very courteous.  I dropped off my rental car the night before and the shuttle picked me up near the drop off. I would stay here the next time I am in town.  Great hotel if you want to be near the airport
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! I'm happy you were able to take advantage of this great amenity we offer! We hope to see you again in the future. Thank you for your stay.

Summary Heading: Noisy, dirty, poorly maintained.  Never again
Summary: The title says it all.  Spend your money more wisely and stay somewhere else.  The bathroom was dirty and the noisy guests in the next room were politely asked to be quiet all the way up to 0430 the next morning.  Security was absolutely ineffectual.  I had to check out one day early because the same group was going to be there another day.  Another 24 hours without sleep on a business trip?  No thanks!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here on a recent business trip, and my experience was great. The view out my room window was gorgeous, especially at sunset. The restaurant staff was pleasant, and the food was amazing (try the Turkey Burger or Kobe Burger...A.M.A.Z.I.N.G.!)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay! We are so happy you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Sheets had tiny hairs all over. Sofa had questionable white stains that were not cleaned. Asked if there was a free breakfast and was told 'yes' even though there wasn't. Housekeeper knocked on door even though there was a "do not disturb" sign.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this hotel for a last-minute staycation. The room was comfortable and we enjoyed the indoor pool. We didn’t eat at the restaurant because there are so many good food choices close by. We stayed during the OC power outage and fortunately this hotel was not affected or had some back up power. The power did shut off for about an hour, the morning of our checkout, but that didn’t affect us. We’ll definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Sooner I arrived inche holtel I asked to Cleanig my room because my wife was cleaning the bathroom counter and I showed the dirty rag, when we take off from the hotel, my wife slipped with a flower and got injured, under the awning on the parking lot, no body help me and nobody was swiped that on the beginning the day, was 6 am. Now she was with pain and have to go to the hospital!!! So bad for me. Was several employees there could swiped the flowers, and no one did, on the street wasn’t flower or others green stuff!!! This meam what??
Manager Response: Thank you for addressing your comments and concern during your recent stay with us. Please know this is not our best practice and we want to do everything to make sure we can further assist you. Please contact the hotel directly and ask to speak to anyone from our management team.

Summary Heading: A great choice fo business travel!
Summary: A great place for business and conference, and close to the John Wayne Airport! I stay at a lot of hotels during the year and this one ranks at the top of the list. It was easy to get in to and the grounds were well kept. Security was visible and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome 5 star review, we really appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Supportive staff Especially Scott was very helpful. Thanks for your support. see you soon.   Facility is too good and cab under three miles is free.  A a great location.  you can see entire city from your room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your awesome 5 star review, we certainly appreciate it and will be sharing your comments with Scott and the rest of our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Im currently listening to my neighbor through the wall talk about the NFL game using profanities.  Outside my door i was woken up this morning by the closing of other doors.  The prices on the breakfast buffet ($20) and room service were highly inflated.  The room was okay. Bed no better than a holiday inn.  The price of this room was outrageous.   To get to the gym you have to take stairs or elevator down from the 3rd to 2nd floor in a separate elevator at the end of the hall.  Room key didnt work for gym. Went to front desk and they gave me a separate “key” to open which didnt work.  Knocking on the window another guest let me in. The gym services 6-8 people max.    The catered conference lunches were terrible though the service was 5-star i have to admit.  The conference
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback, we are sorry t o hear of all the issues you experienced during your recent stay with us, please know this is certainly not our best practice. Please contact the hotel directly and ask to speak to anyone from our management team so that we may assist you further.

Summary: Great customer service , it was a great stay , rooms are very comfy and management, was very attentive, Our morning breakfast was a great experience , waitress and buffet staff & chefs really went out of their way to make us feel at home ,
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome 5 star review, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Hotel Staff was soooo Kind and Professional. They did so much more then they had to. Thank you!!! The Hotel is very well maintained and clean. It makes a big difference how the hotel is run, since it is Home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome 5 star review and comments, we certainly appreciate them and will be sharing your feedback with our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I checked in at 11:10 PM after a long day of travel. I was just staying for one night before continuing on. Check-in was interesting. After telling me it would be $20 to keep my rental parked for the night, I was informed that I had 2 complimentary bottles of water in my room...woo hoo!  I parked my car around the back. There is no back entrance, so I had to walk back around to the front with my bags to get into the place (Did I mention this was after a long day of travel?).   I woke up and made coffee. It’s one of those cheap coffee pad things that either makes one or two cups, depending on which way the button is turned. I set it to make one cup, however it ran water out both spouts and made a mess on the table.   I will not come here again. I like things to work and I like
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback. I am sorry to hear of the issues you experienced during your stay with us. I will be sure to follow up with each of our department heads so we can work to make sure these issues do not repeat themselves. I will also follow up regarding the parking situation. Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact the hotel directly.

Summary Heading: Nice clean, modern Hotel but not a very good experience.
Summary: This hotel appears to be newer and is well kept and clean. The check-in process was fast but not terribly friendly or informative voluntarily. They charge $20 a day for parking which I always find rather obnoxious since you're paying relatively high prices for the room. Internet works very well. Since I only stayed there one night I didn't eat at their restaurant but did have room service. 22% gratuity plus a delivery charge and really horrible lobster macaroni and cheese that tasted fishy. Didn't use the pool or exercise room and wasn't even told about these things when I checked in.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay with us. I have taken your comments to our management team to look into. Should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact the hotel directly. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I Like the place very much and I have always been staying at this place for more than 5 years. The only time I was not able to book a room was July of 2017 which I did not feel good since I was already use to the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review, we appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Very nice and comfortable. It’s in the business area of Irvine so it feels corporate. Parking is $20 or $12 if you join Wyndham Club for free. Our shower had the best pressure of anywhere we’ve ever stayed! Nice staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments and feedback, we appreciate it and are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: Property seemed clean.  Location is in a business park with nothing withing walking distance.    Restaurant was average.  Close to the airport and they have a can that will take you anywhere withing a 3 mile radius, offered because there is nothing nearby (walking distance at least,).  Beds were comfortable.  Door to the bathroom is the cheap, hollow core type.   Which was my impression of the property.  A vaneer.    The floor I started on smelled like cigarette smoke.  Room had an odd odor too...but I was too tired to ask for another room.  Nothing would make me come back.  If I had to stay again, I wouldn't be upset, but I wouldn't look forward to the stay.  .
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback regarding your recent stay with us. If you need further assistance with any of the issues you addressed, please feel free to contact the hotel directly.

Summary: The staff was great from check-in to check-out, service was off the chart, the entire property was clean and up-to-date, My room was clean and spacious, great bed and sheets i slept like a baby. This is my home base when I visit southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome 5 star review, we certainly appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The staff were super helpful and friendly during the entire visit; the room was already cool upon entering, and it was spacious with comfy beds and pillows. Accessing the wifi was straight forward. Also enjoyed the breakfast in the mornings, and although I did not partake in the restaurant/bar downstairs, I like that they have one. Furthermore, the shuttle service rocks!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and the awesome comments left about your experience with us. We truly appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Nice Weekend getaway at the Wyndam!@
Summary: My wife and I had a great escape weekend stay. Thank you Barbara on the Front Desk for being so gracious and patient with my several "high maintenance" calls that Tuesday morning prior to our Friday arrival! And Jamie in Reservations, we can't thank you enough. Our room, quiet, comfortable and well appointed with a great view, was perfect for our romantic getaway thanks to you! We really liked this hotel and the staff. I enjoyed the indoor pool/jacuzzi and laying out on the nice outdoor sundeck while my wife was at a friends Baby Shower. Should you need a reasonable but classy hotel near the airport, we'd highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review, we really appreciate it! I will be sure to share your comments with our staff. We hope to see you and your wife again in the near future!
