Summary Heading: Great room! Good Location! Perfect for what I needed.
Summary: The hotel is located 5 minutes from the airport.  Beds: comfy normal beds Room: Has a table, desk, small sofa chair.  Overall, it was a great hotel for a short business stay.  Parking: It was $20/day but if you are a member you can get it for $12/day.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and your comments, we really appreciate it and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Service was great and so was the location. Had some problems in our room. broken air conditioner and old trash from previous guests. Called and they came and fixed it right away, except had a noise that wasn't fixed.  Front desk staff was very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback, we do appreciate it and use these to ensure that our guests satisfaction is above expectation. I apologize that you experienced some issues during your stay but am glad to know that it was all taken care of right away. I will review your comments with our management team, however, should you need any further assistance please do not hesitate to reach out to the hotel directly.

Summary: This is a corporate hotel and it is configured as such. The breakfast is way over priced compared to the coffee shop about 5 blocks away. The room was well appointed for someone just being there to sleep, but did not work well for a family with children who still need to take naps. Parking is expensive - $20.00/day especially when the gate to the parking did not work with the room key. Even staff had a hard time getting the gate to work.
Manager Response: Hi Philip,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your recent stay with us. We truly value our guests feedback and use them to make each and every department within the hotel better. I will review your comments with our staff, in the meantime should you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly.  Thank you!

Summary: The hotel was in a good area and checking in was very fast. Nice staff. I was extremely tired and just wanted to rest and I ordered room service and it was perfect!! The only down fall was The room was dirty and I was so tired to even complain and when i did still to this day no one has gotten back to me about this issue. Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Hi Deborah,  Thank you for the comments and feedback, we truly do appreciate it. I am sorry to hear that your room was dirty upon check in, this certainly is not our best practice. I will be sure to review this with our Housekeeping Director so that we can assure this issue does not repeat. We do hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: A okay hotel but service is to be greatly improved
Summary: Service was adequate but not hospitable. Hotel manager and staff never replied to my request for medical assistance as they promised. Food was awful.  Breakfast ham was not eatable.  Room was clean in general except a blood stain on sheet was found Shower has strong water pressure Easy access to freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback. We are disappointed to learn of your experiences during your stay, as these are not our best practices. I would like to discuss this further with you, please contact the hotel directly. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Nice property, but not what was advertised.
Summary: This is a nice, clean property.  However, we were assigned this hotel as part of softball nationals.  Ample breakfast and parking are supposed to be provided.  The breakfast was described as a grab and go.  It should've been advertised as a joke.  It was a brown paper bag with a cutie, a granola bar, a bag of gold fish and a hot gatorade. It was also only available if you provided a punch card and was only available until 9 am.  One positive was the gentleman who passed out the bags - he was always very kind and welcoming.  The other real issues were the laundry facilities.  There were multiple teams staying at the hotel and all of the laundry facilities were out of order 4 of the 7 days that we were there.  They recommended we go to a laundromat that was in a terrible area of
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback, we truly value our guests opinions and work hard to make sure we address any issues you may have experienced during your stay. I will pass on this information to our Executive team to look into further. In the meantime, should you need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact the hotel directly.

Summary: Nice hotel in a great location - close to everything.  Room is clean but small. Mini refrigerator is available upon request. Complimentary bottled water upon check in and free ice water in lobby are nice. Parking fee is a bit expensive at $20/day
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback on your recent stay. We truly appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: The rooms are clean and spacious. The beds were only a full size but very comfortable. They provide a free shuttle service, within a three mile readiuos, that is very convenient. The parking can be a challenge if you have a full size vehicle depending on where you park, you should take that into consideration when parking your vehicle.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and review, we certainly appreciate our guests feedback. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: The Wyndham is a wonderful facility for a workshop or meeting
Summary: This Wyndham is a beautiful facility and the location is extremely convenient to downtown and John Wayne airport. The meeting rooms are beautiful and are an excellent set up for a workshop / meeting.  The projectors and screens provided were very high quality.  The bandwidth provided was enough to accommodate not only streaming presentations but also 200+ individuals using VPN.   The food was excellent and the presentation made it even more inviting.  Marilu Tovar took care of our every need within minutes and did it all with a smile.  Josie Blandino organized everything and it was a huge relief to hand off the burden of planning to her. She did an excellent job and did it all with style.  We will definitely try to use this facility for our future events.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments and review. We reviewed this just this morning in our daily meeting and congratulated our staff members on a job well done. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your guests again in the near future.

Summary: We got a room with two beds.  The beds were smaller than expected, however very comfortable.  The pool wasn't the nicest but the hot tub was pleasant.  The pool was a challenge to get to.  However everything else was great.  Front desk was very helpful.  Overall we really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Hi Matt,  Thank you so much for your comments and your review of our hotel, we appreciate it and look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: From bad to worse, living my worst nightmare!
Summary: The photos and reviews looked great, but appearances can be deceiving. I walked into my allocated room after a long day and noticed that the cleanliness of the room wasn't great. I thought it could be that the room may have been vacant for a few days, although hair in the bathroom and dust everywhere (especially for someone who suffers from dust allergies) is never good.  The cover of the air-conditioning unit is still half off the wall, the curtain is broken in the corner and the AC is quite a noisy unit. I was tired and went to bed, only to realise the room has zero soundproofing. I could here every corridor conversation, even my neighbouring rooms. I could even hear the people walking in the room above and the freeway noise.  I phoned on the first night asking to pay to
Manager Response: Hi David,  Thank you for your feedback and comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are disappointed to learn you had experienced quite a few issues as this certainly is not our best practice. Please contact the hotel to discuss further so that we may help rectify these issues with you and hope that we may have the opportunity to have you as our guest again in the future. Thank you!

Summary: The Wyndham Irvine is a large hotel in a very upscale corporate area of Irvine. The brand is famous for comfort and opulence but this hotel like so many others is a little dated and showing its flaws. The truly good news is I selected my room on a travel app that was selling the room at a discounted rate without revealing the name which worked well for me because I would not pay what they are asking for this room. It's small but the bed is incredibly comfortable furniture is standard but once again the walls are thin it's noisy and I swear to God I'm a very seasoned traveler I just want my personal comforts and quiet and I always manage to get the place where there's a wedding, or a lot of children, a conference and so on last night at 11 o'clock it smelled as if someone was
Manager Response: Hi Robin,  We are very disappointed to hear about the issues you experienced during your stay. This certainly is not a best practice for our hotel. The Executive team has reviewed your comments and we are working to ensure these issues do not repeat again. In the meantime, if there is anything we can do to further assist you, please do not hesitate to reach out to the hotel directly. We do hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Great location, nice people, and a 5 star atmosphere makes this hotel a great place to stay for either business or pleasure.  The Rooms are clean and comfortable as well as quite, allowing for a restful sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for this fantastic review. We certainly appreciate it and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This place is well run and awesome!  I will definitely stay there again!  It is so close to shopping and great restaurants. Love it that is right by the brand new LA Fitness too.  I highly recommend this hotel for business and personal stays.
Manager Response: Hi Bruce,  Thank you for your review and comments, we certainly appreciate it and are glad to know you had a great stay with us. We hope to see you again in the near future and please contact the hotel directly if we may be of any assistance.

Summary: The AC unit in the room was very noisy even when it’s turned off. We were forced to turned it off to be able to sleep. I also could not believe that there wasn't a small fridge in the room. We can find one in any hotel room nowadays. The water pressure, or lack thereof, in the shower is another issue. Lastly, there was huge desk and office chair that practically took over half the space in front of the bed and was a complete waste.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we value our guests feedback and appreciate the suggestions from our guests. I will be sure to review these with our executive staff and hope you give us another opportunity in the near future to showcase our changes. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I don't give many 5 stars , but this place is great. Jamie at check-in was terrific. She was efficient and helped us get our room a little early. Being a platinum member doesn't always feel like your special. Not here. They make you feel wonderful. Clean rooms and reasonable rates for a nice hotel is such a plus. We will definitely be back for business and pleasure. Thank you Wyndham Irvine OC airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This place has awesome beds! The rooms are updated/modern and the bed is beyond comfortable. If I didn’t have to get up I could stay in bed all day! Perfect distance from airport. Convenient free shuttle. Fast check in. Friendly staff. Didn’t have time to try the food but heard it was good. Quiet hotel/hallway, so it’s perfect for business people who need their sleep. Rooms have a mini fridge, one of the best black out curtains I’ve seen and the bathroom mirror (with the back lighting) is ideal for doing makeup ladies. 5 stars!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great place as long as you don't have a vehicle.
Summary: This was a very nice place, clean, comfortable. When you check in, you are charged $20 for parking. I find it crazy to advertise a price then add on Parking. I could have probably come out ahead money wise had I checked into a comparable property with free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Disapointed in the change of Customer Service!
Summary: I have stayed at this property several times and I am a Wyndham Rewards Member. I was pleasantly surprised during previous stays and called the hotel direct to check rates.  When I called the hotel and asked for the front desk I was transferred to an agent "Chris", who was very rude and hung up on me several times.  He did not answer the call professionally and would not give his name.  He also disconnected my call several times!  I decided to book my reservation elsewhere and will not be returning!
Manager Response: Dear HawaiiLance,   Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Irvine-Orange County Airport. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that you had a problem with one of our team members. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Tchi Willette Director of Rooms  Wyndham Irvine Hotel  twillette@wyndham.com 949-471-1269

Summary: 1)We drove for 7 hours, by the time we arrived, we were extremely hungry so we placed an room service order. We ordered nachos and a burger. We ate for about 15 minutes when I noticed a black hair in my food. 2)I booked the executive room on the 14th floor. On my confirmation form it said that my room would have Wyndham robs. I was disappointed to see that one was ripped with hair on it and the other had bleach stains on it. 3)Our coffee machine looked like it hadn't been cleaned in ages.  4)when going to the vending machine on our floor, we seen that it was out of order. So we went to the 3rd floor where you gain pool access and that soda pop machine gave us worm soda... The manager, Tom did give us our money back for our meal but by that time the damage was already done. We
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments, we sincerely apologize for the experiences you had as these are not our best practices. I have taken your comments and reviewed them with our executive team to ensure they do not repeat again and hope you do give us another opportunity to showcase those changes to you. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: I booked this hotel rather last minute. It was very affordable. The rooms are always clean and the bed is extremely comfortable. The only knock I will Wyndham is the bartender was rather rude. He seemed to engage with the older customers at the bar. I look young and was pushed to the side. Other than that I thought everything was great. I would rate overall experience an 8.7/10
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for providing your feedback from your stay with us.  We value your opinion and take it very serious.  We strive to provide exceptional service and will continue to work with our team to make sure we address the concerns.    We hope that we have another opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Nice end to a long week
Summary: Very clean , comfortable rooms with space to spread out and relax. Did not have time to try the food or other amenities but the room was really nice. Shuttle service is not 24 hours so be aware if you have an early flight.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This is a business hotel but it is good for personal and pleasure stay. We are pleased with the hotel appearance, facility guestroom and cleanliness, hotel front desk staff friendly and prompt service. We are very pleased with the quality of the beds which gave us three very comfortable nights. The only issue we encountered during our stay was issue with bathtub slow draining which we deemed a one-off problem. Still recommend this Wyndham hotel and we will not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Really great bed. Pillow top beds. Spent the whole day at Disney and didn't get a lot of sleep however because the bed was so soft I.got great quality sleep and went the whole day and night at Disneyland no prob. Great tasting breakfast buffet too. It's 24$ but they use real eggs, fresh cut fruit (not the pre cut warehouse kind) and many toppings for oatmeal. Very quiet rooms. Didn't hear anybody or the freeways. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Nice view from the 14th floor executive room. Clean with everything working. Under a hundred bucks.parking was $20. 🤨 . But other than that, it was a Great deal. I definitely be coming back again.thank you so much for making my stay a great one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Very pleasant rooms with very comfortable beds. Service was very professional and courteous.  The food at the restaurant was very good.  I was there on business and this hotel made for a very comfortable stay.  I am a light sleeper and did find the noise of the nearby traffic to be an issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Great hotel, exceptionally clean room with super comfortable bed.  I wish all hotels were as nice.  I hope my future travels include a flight out of Orange County Airport departing early in the morning or returning late at night so I might stay at the Wyndham again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This is a conveniently located hotel, clean, attractive, quiet (my room was next to the elevator and I didn't hear it at all), with complimentary shuttle service to the airport, UCI, and elsewhere.  The breakfast buffet is awesome--lots of choices, very fresh and tasty--and the food in general was delicious. For beer lovers, there is a selection of craft beers on tap. Very reasonable for the location, facilities, and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Beautiful hotel - clean - all people very helpful - hostess in the restaurant was the best at 6 am! Fitness and pool area are nice, but accessed only by a private, small elevator which doesn't give one a great sense of safety, my only complaint.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Rooms were clean, front desk staff friendly, breakfast buffet modest but very good quality.  Not impressed with the shower (barely stayed on, low pressure).  Very helpful shuttle service within the local area saved me a couple of Uber rides.  Not my favorite hotel in the area for the price point, but plenty decent value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Great affordable rate for a great king size bed room. The young lady at the check in counter was awesome and accommodated my request for a room in a higher floor and put me in a suite for the same price. I also got a 20% off breakfast coupon. I’ll definitely stay with them again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Stayed here for business April 09th. They offer a shuttle to and from the airport. Located about 15 minutes from the airport. Check in was very fast. Lobby area and rooms are very nice. Everything looked newly remodeled. Bed and pillows were very comfortable. Bathroom is spacious with lots of counter space and towels.  Water pressure in shower was a bit low.    I looked at the gym and pool area but didn't use either. Location is on the 3rd floor in a corner area of the hotel.  Gym is small but seem to have enough to get a good work out in (i.e treadmill, elliptical, weights etc.).   Overall had a great stay and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: The shuttle service was impeccable. I enjoyed the breakfast restaurant. The room was clean. The AC could have been much better. My room never got cool enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Quite new, well-appointed and comfortable if not overly spacious rooms. $20 per night parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: It is a nice, clean hotel with a super friendly staff.  The bartender was exceptional.  I came down to borrow a wine glass, and he asked if I needed an opener. He loaned me one without question and trusted me to leave it in the room when I checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Hotel was nice and clean but the rooms are small and the...
Summary: Hotel was nice and clean but the rooms are small and the wifi was spotty. I stayed for 2 weeks for business so these two things probably affected me more than most.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Fairly Convenient to John Wayne Airport
Summary: Solid full service choice within a 12 min uber ride from John Wayne.    Quick front desk check in with fairly complete amenity shop.    I ordered room service (nachos) fir dinner and again (scrambled eggs) for breakfast.    Both were delivered quickly and the pricing wasn’t too crazy.   The room was a little tired but acceptable.   This is a business hotel, not a resort.   Effective WiFi and plenty of tv channels.     Bed was extra comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: The customer service was amazing and helpful. Only complaints were bath tub wasn’t dragging properly so I was swimming in my own shower and I was in one of the last rooms in the hallway and I could every thing that was going on on that floor
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Aliyyaha2018, we appreciate the comments and feedback. I have taken those comments and gone over the issue with our maintenance team to ensure this does not repeat again. We do hope you will give us another opportunity to showcase those changes and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I spent 3-nights in a corner suite. 450-sq/ft of space and the most comfortable bed ever! I was there for a massage conference so when I was done, I set up my table in the room and could move around it freely. It was a little noisy in the hallways, as a high school band of kids made their way down the halls.   Upon arriving, the front desk was very informative with the facility and available times. Friendly bell-hop who gave more details about how to move about the building to reach the pool/gym and laundry.  I would highly recommend this hotel for a comfortable night’s sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Good hotel, convenient location, good amenies and value
Summary: Good stay and reasonable value on Hotwire.  Convenient to SNA, room was clean and very open.  Front desk was accomodating.  Even added complimentary cookies.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Awesome Hotel... so close to the Airport... free shuttle to and from the Airport, Staff were great... room and especially the beds were amazingly comfortable and the Hotel was so clean.  We had a Deluxe Double bed Room and it was awesome and the view from the Hotel was incredible.   It houses a Restaurant as well and service and food were fantastic.   I joined Wyndham in 2007 and am so grateful I did ... you're treated Royally and its like coming home wherever you go.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I love this hotel, have stayed here many times . Tim Smith the guest service manager is amazing, I travel a lot and Tim goes above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable, will always stay at this hotel when I am in Irvine
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: My first stay at your property. I was pleasantly surprised at the level of service and quality of the room. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: For the price of  room you should have better services for warming food. Also the food selection is almost unhealthy choices. The bathroom doors were put on incorrectly. They should swing in to bathroom not out.
Manager Response: Dear dsimms2018,  Thank you for letting us know how we can better serve you.  We have shared your feedback with the appropriate leadership so we can address the concerns accordingly.  We truly care about your experience with us.    Guest Relations

Summary: Very comfortable place to stay.  Everything worked okay, internet, TV, hair dryer.  Room was very clean and quiet.  I only had the breakfast buffet, but that was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This was a perfect location for me to attend an overnight meeting. The hotel shuttle picked me up from the airport timely. I did not need to rent a car because my meeting was within walking distance and the restaurant in the hotel was perfect. All the staff were friendly, helpful and professional. Sit down breakfast was pricey, so ordered a coffee and muffin (freshly baked) to go at the register which was affordable and all I needed. Please check the air-filter in room 1005, it looked like it needed to be changed, I did not report it during my stay since I was only there one night.
Manager Response: Dear Cb0de,  We truly appreciate your feedback about your stay.  We are delighted to hear that you felt our shuttle met all of your needs.  We will most certainly check the filter in the room you stayed.  Thank you for letting us know.  We value your feedback.  We appreciate the opportunity to take care of your needs.

Summary: The hotel room was beautiful.  Clean and ready when I checked in.  Room service was prompt and courteous with great food.  Would definitely stay here again and am suggesting to use the hotel for our company's annual meeting in 2019.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Check in was terrible, there was no greeting upon arrival and the font desk host made very little eye contact & explained nothing. She lacked hospitality 100%.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your needs when you stayed with us.  We strive to deliver an exceptional experience for all of our guests.  We have shared your comments with our team so that we may continue to develop our staff to deliver memorable service.  We hope that we may have another opportunity to deliver for you.    Thank you

Summary Heading: Hole in the wall and bed faux pas
Summary: I've stayed at hotels at least twice a month and I decided to stay at the Wyndham in Irvine wow where to begin.... First impressions busy hotel waited 13 mins front of line no worries. Then get upsatirs to find my 1 king is 2 doubles. I confirmed months ago it's was a king. Tim manager says let me see what I can do 30 second gold later nothing he can do. Then theres a hole in the wall!!! Lmao I died 🤣. It's covered with a painted board. I remember when I was younger and paid for the cheapest hotel I could find. Should have stayed at hotel Irvine. This makes the Travelodge look like the Ritz
Manager Response: Dear Sheik S,  Thank you so much for informing us of your experience.  We appreciate the opportunity to address your concerns.  We have addressed your feedback accordingly with our team.  Our team is dedicated to providing service and products that allow our guests to enjoy their visit from start to finish.  We hope that we have another opportunity to exceed your expectation.   Guest Relations

Summary: Hotel was clean but the beds were super uncomfy. At first lay down, it's ok but it caused back discomfort and for me and my pregnant wife. Feels like a outdated old bed that needs to be updated.
Manager Response: Dear vtam32,  We are delighted to hear that you felt our hotel was clean and met your expectations.  Thank you for sharing your thoughts on our beds in the guest rooms.  Our guest room beds are fairly new at the property.  We apologize that the bed did not meet your expectations in comfort.  We hope that we have an opportunity to have you with us again so we can provide you with a great experience.   Guest Relations

Summary: Mattress not comfortable-did not sleep well, bathroom faucet too short, toilet moves as you move, need to flush twice, water pressure in shower was weak, and,  there is no small refrigerator in the room. Parking fee was not mentioned at all when you book. I did not report these due to a one night stay/visit to Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear 8vicb,  We truly appreciate your feedback.  We strive to provide an exceptional experience for all of our guests that enables comfort and rest.  We do provide refrigerators upon request and our parking fee should be noted upon booking.  We apologize this was not clear and will address.  Thank you again for allowing this opportunity to address your concerns.    Guest Relations

Summary: My one night stay at one point had $1000 tied up in my Checking account. I was triple charged and am still trying to get the amount credited to my account.
Manager Response: Dear Nanettel2018,  Thank you for staying with us at Wyndham.  Our sincerest apologies that you had issues with the charges from your stay.  If your issue has not been resolved, please contact the management at the property and we will address immediately.  We take your concern serious and want to ensure that you are taken care of.

Summary: The room needs a refrigerator.  The parking gate was a problem if you go in and out. Cars backed up, due to gate problems.
Manager Response: We're sorry to  learn you were in town because of a family emergency but thank you for choosing Wyndham for your stay.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the issue with the parking gate.  The service provider was not able to get to our issue immediately but the technical issue was resolved today.  We hope this didn't cause you any delays.  Thank you for your patronage and we hope you will return to stay at Wyndham again in the future.

Summary: We were there for softball, so as is typical we weren't in the room very much. Beds and pillows were very comfy. (But doubles, why do hotels even have double doubles and not queens) I always prefer a separate vanity because it allows me to get a few minutes extra sleep on our early game mornings so two of us can be getting ready at the same time,  there wasn't one. The grab n go breakfast was ready earlier than promised. As we walked out at 5:45, we appreciated the goodie bag, of snacks, fruit and a Gatorade, we chose to leave the muffin to be warmed in the microwave. Check in was quick, except the clerk forgot to mention anything about breakfast or give me the tickets or the handout that gave information about our group's amenities and agreements. They overcharged many in our
Manager Response: Hello Larry, Thank you for taking time to post your experience on TripAdvisor!  We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay and found the to-go team breakfast convenient!  Unfortunately our parking system had a technical issue that prevented the  reader from receiving and retaining the correct parking rate.  Hopefully anyone that was charged an incorrect amount let us know while they were here so we could adjust and correct the amount.  Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We hope to welcome you to Wyndham again in the future when your travels bring you back to beautiful Orange County.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Wyndham Irvine-Orange County Airport.  It was so accessible from the John Wayne Airport.  Also, one of the best seafood restaurants is right near the entrance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great experience with others!  You are right!  Our location, in a pedestrian-friendly area offers so many restaurant options nearby.  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The front desk, shuttle, and bell staff were wonderful.  The breakfast buffet was good, but not well stocked when I arrived with at least 1 hour before service ended. The waiter was verbally irritated about the fact that we added a 4th to our party of 3. I did enjoy room service and dinner (food and service)  in bar area however.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay here last week , we like our room  Front desk staff was good , Scott b was very helpful and attentive toward guest requirement , happy with his service  Free airport shuttle was fast , Everything was good we will stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I stayed at the Wyndam Irvine-Orange County Airport Hotel to attend a conference at the hotel. The hotel is a little worn, but the room was clean, the bed very comfortable and the service excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This hotel is one of the nicest hotels in the area.  Love the environment, love the room, and service. It Is by far the most affordable hotel with the added luxury and convenience guests deserve.  They allow you to check in early and check out late. Also, the hotel is close to some of the best restaurants in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I have stayed here several times.  The staff are attentive and helpful.  The room is always very clean.  The restaurant are good as well.  If you prefer there are several good restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I stayed at The Wyndham Hotel Irvine-Orange County for a few days for a business-related trip and I couldn’t be more happier!! Every aspect of my stay here was phenomenal! From the moment of my check-in, my room accommodations, quality restaurant & bar within the hotel, all the way to my check out, I received no less than 5 star service wherever I went!! Plus, the location is desirable and very convenient to nearby stores & other restaurants. I enjoyed every minute of my stay here and would definitely come back here again if I given the chance!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, near airport but can’t hear any planes! Perfect!
Summary: The only downside to the room is the lack of a mini fridge. It’s really an amenity I think a hotel like Wyndham should offer their guest. Other than that this is my second stay at the hotel and I enjoyed as much as the first. Also I understand the parking fee but I do feel as though it should be waived for club Wyndham owners at the least.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We were travelling to Dana Point for a wedding st the Ritz Carlton at the end of December 2017.  I booked a room with two queen beds and a pullout couch.  Three of us stayed in the room.  There was ample space with a small kitchenette including a microwave and refrigerator.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast had a great selection of food.  Parking was good with plenty of space available.  No complaints at all.  Central location.  Would definitely stay again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Clean and decent room but $18 per nightly parking for...
Summary: Clean and decent room but $18 per nightly parking for guests who stayed at the hotel us quite too much.  It would be nice to lower this fee for hotel guests or included as part of the room charges.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your business and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: I tried different hotel's, but never experienced Wyndham. I...
Summary: I tried different hotel's, but never experienced Wyndham. I love it. Very nice, warm welcoming environment. I will definitely consider this hotel again for my next vacations
Manager Response: Dear Mahastit2018,  Thank you so much for letting us know that you felt your experience was welcoming and met all your needs.  We truly appreciate you choosing our hotel for your destination of choice.  We look forward to having you with us again.   Guest Relations

Summary: I attempted to checked in on Christmas Eve ALLLLL of my Credit Cards were Maxed out and the Front Desk required a $150 Credit Card deposit hold. The front desk was NOT understanding to the fact that most people world wide Max out Credit Cards during this time of the year and i shared this Note to the front desk upon attempting to check in. Never the less the front desk still required a Credit Card hold of $150 which was difficult to provide on Christmas Eve along with stores and banks closing early. I also offered placing the hold on 2 Credit Cards totaling $150 and that suggestion was denied by the Mgr. Needless to say I had to leave the Hotel attempting to scrap up cash to place down for the room deposit. I felt the Hotel could have been a bit more Understanding considering
Manager Response: Dear Reginawilson1966,  Our deepest apologies that you felt our team was unsympathetic towards your circumstance.  We train our team to be helpful to our guests no matter the circumstance.  We have shared your feedback so we can continue to improve the service we provide to all of our guests.   Guest Relations

Summary: It’s located in a safe and modern area, close to the freeway & plenty of restaurants/convenience stores. The hotel itself is very nice and for only $90 a night, it definitely exceeded our expectations. My only complaint would be having to pay nightly for parking and the leaking fire sprinkler.
Manager Response: Dear Vyviantee,  We are glad to hear that you felt your stay was perfect.  Our team enjoys hearing that they delivered on your expectations.  We look forward to having you with us again.    Guest Relations

Summary: We stayed the night here while visiting Irvine.  The hotel exceeded our expectations!  It was in a great location kind of tucked away from the major roads.  So the noise level was low.  The lobby was nicely decorated and they still had their Christmas decorations up.  Our room was very clean and it had free bottled water.  The beds were very comfortable.  But what we really appreciated was the staff.  The staff was very friendly from the moment we stepped on to the property.  The gentleman who checked us in was very professional and nice.  We really appreciated Saul in the morning.  The property lost their hot water in the morning.  We understand these things happen.  My husband and I both had to shower in cold water.  Luckily for our son it was  fixed rather quickly.  When we
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  We appreciate you acknowledging one of our team members for taking care of your needs when staying with us.  We strive to provide memorable experiences that encourage your reasons for stay with us.  We look forward to another opportunity to have you stay with us again.    Guest Relations

Summary: Stayed here with our kids over Christmas. Rooms and hotel were nice and clean, our double room wasn’t anything fancy but we would definitely stay here again.  Great location near hotel - about a 2 min drive to the airport as well as restaurants (IHOP, McDonalds, El Torito, etc) and I believe there is a Starbucks at an hotel next to this one (although this hotel serves Starbucks coffee downstairs)
Manager Response: Dear Isabellak97,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt our hotel was nice and clean.  We strive to deliver an experience that is comfortable and meets all your needs.  We are glad that we met your expectations when with us.    Guest Relations

Summary: Stayed with my family to visit OC winter Fest. Beautiful hotel, really comfortable beds.  Location was perfect, very convenient for us.  Staff was kind and friendly.  We'll come back for sure.  We had a great time.
Manager Response: Dear LupitaCalexico,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  It is great to hear that you felt our team was friendly and kind.  We have shared your feedback with our team.    Guest Relations

Summary: Stayed here for business and hotel came through for most of my needs.  I'd been on road for several weeks, so delighted hotel had reasonably priced guest laundry on 2 of their floors.   Also. though grilled vegetables seems waaay over priced at restaurant, I nevertheless forgave this disappointment when I ordered their garlic wings - sauce on side, which I again reordered at checkout to take with me. Absolutely delicious sauces.  Much Kudos!  Since for me, stay way was optimal to regroup; to continue travels for another week, i.e. laundry, restful sleep, etc, I understand disappointment for local visitors who desire nearby restaurants and shops.  My only suggestion is to secure agreement with nearby 24Hour Fitness - and the reason I rated "Very Good" vs "Excellent."
Manager Response: Dear Howdy55,  We are excited to hear that we exceeded your expectation while with us.  We appreciate the feedback on how we can continue to improve.  We look forward to having you with us again.   Guest Relations

Summary Heading: They charge $45 a night for parking
Summary: Pros: 1) The room is very clean. 2) Friendly staff  Cons: 1) They charge $45 a night for parking and $18 a night for Wyndham members.  I refuse to stay here again because of the exorbitant parking chargers.
Manager Response: Dear Bishopric,  We are glad to hear that you felt our hotel met your cleanliness expectations.  Our hotel daily overnight parking is $20 and not $45.00.  If you were charged incorrectly, please feel free to reach out to the property so we may make the appropriate correction.  We appreciate you staying with us and hope to have you back with us again.    Guest Relations

Summary Heading: Basic Accommodations; Nothing Special; OK Value
Summary: This Wyndham is OK for a business traveler who needs a place to sleep and shower.  The room rates reflect what you get - average basic accommodations.    This property is not easy to find.  There is no signage visible from any major street and hotel staff seemed to be incapable of providing clear directions.  This isn't an issue if one uses the hotel's shuttle from the airport, but be forewarned if you are trying to find the place in a rental car.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your feedback.  We truly care about your experience you had with us.  Our team takes your feedback very serious.  We are dedicated to creating a memorable experience that will want you to come back.  We hope we have another chance to have you back with us.  Guest Relations

Summary: Everybody was very nice. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The room service menu had nice variety. There is a restaurant downstairs and a convenience stop.  There was not a fridge or microwave in the room but there was a microwave by the vending and ice machines.  Overall a positive experience, especially for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Lauradg2017,  We are delighted to hear that you felt the hotel experience was very nice.  We look forward to having you back with us again.  Guest Relations

Summary Heading: Had a great stay - exceeded my expectations
Summary: I was very pleased with my stay here. Good value for money for CA. I had a good size room in a quiet part of the hotel. All the staff were friendly and polite. The hotel is well located with restaurants within walking distance. Has a nice pool and outside eating area. If I had a complaint it was I had to pay for a cup of coffee in the morning - not a big deal but at a lot of less premium places this is free. Very convenient for John Wayne airport and just under one hour to LAX in good traffic.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We hope that we have another opportunity to deliver for you.

Summary: Actually at a motel you get breakfast for free. This is essentially an over priced mid range hotel which charges extra for everything. Apart from being "dressed up" as a luxury hotel, and having clean but rather sparse rooms, this hotel isn't much Nothing is free (parking, breakfast, even water bottles are extra). The AC was very loud in my room - actually woke me up. The restaurant closes early and there aren't all that many options (and nothing much around to choose from).  Worse of all - the team forgot to give me the wake up call I asked for... very unprofessional.
Manager Response: Dear WightLight,  Our deepest apologies that you had such an experience with us.  We truly care about all of our guest stays.  It appears we fell short in delivering a great experience for you.  We have shared your feedback with our team so we may continue to work hard to take care of our guests the way they deserve.   Guest Relations

Summary: The only not-so-desirable attribute about the Irvine Wyndham is the hassle that people have to go through to get a parking ticket (even though 1st 15 mins is free) when they are dropping off people. There should be a drop off lane.
Manager Response: Dear DanmG2016sr,  Thank you for staying with us at The Wyndham Irvine hotel.  We appreciate your feedback regarding to our parking of the hotel.  We are dedicated to making all of our guests experiences seamless and easy to visit us.  We look forward to another opportunity to have you with us.    Guest Relations

Summary: Paid extra for room to include evening reception and continental breakfast on a Saturday night. After checking into hotel was told it was only included Monday through Friday. Would not have paid the extra $$ if had known. Would still have stayed at hotel but wouldn't pay higher price for nothing.
Manager Response: Dear Constance,  Thank you so much for sharing your valuable feedback.  It is very important to us that you receive what you book.  We have shared your information with the appropriate leadership to make sure this does not happen again.  We hope that we may have another opportunity to serve you as you expect.   Guest Relations

Summary Heading: This horrible deposit nightmare that nobody is trained in
Summary: I have 38 credit cards. Held the room on one. Held the rude 109$ deposit. 200$ held for 9 days.front desk girl told me 3 days called 4 times for attitude and out and out lies. U did it wrong and I’m the customer that literally pays all of your bills. Keep treating people this way...u have been around long enough to know u will screw yourself wyndham.
Manager Response: Dear Wyndham Guest, Please accept our sincere apologies for the experience you had and the inconveniences caused by the credit card hold during your recent stay with us. Every bank is different in terms of how long it takes to release your funds so please check with your bank to be certain.  Hopefully by now, all has been resolved.   We value your feedback and thank you for staying with us.  We hope you have a wonderful experience on your next Wyndham stay, wherever your travels take you.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel that is extremely convenient to John Wayne Orange County Airport. It is primarily focused on being a business hotel and seems very well set up for that with its meeting rooms and location right in the middle of a business park. We were not on business, but found it to be a great place for a personal stay as well. Very nice rooms, a pool and hot tub, and right in the middle of everything we wanted to do. Our only complaint was that they have two sets of washer/dryers and one of them was not working. The laundry soap dispenser in both rooms was also not working. They offer valet laundry, so obviously their self-serve laundry rooms do not seem that important to them. Also be aware that parking is $18 (as of this writing) per day.
Manager Response: Hello Robert, Thank you for your great comments about your recent stay with us. We're glad you were comfortable and found your room to be nice and comfortable.  Thank you for noting that the guest laundry needed attention. We inspect daily but we rely on an outside company to repair and replenish supplies.  We hope to welcome you back when your travels bring you back to beautiful Orange County!

Summary Heading: Good friendly staff , nice area , rooms are good and clean...
Summary: Good friendly staff , nice area , rooms are good and clean pool is nice parking is plenty  nice hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your great comments about your recent stay with us!  We appreciate your patronage and hope to welcome you again!

Summary: This was perfect for our stay in Orange County.  Room was very clean and comfortable.  The front staff was friendly and professional.  The housekeeping staff were very helpful.  It's located near John Wayne Airport but plane noise was never an issue.  This hotel makes great sense if you are a business traveler or you're a vacationing family with an incredibly busy agenda.  There isn't much to do on the property and there isn't anything to do in the immediate area.  Also, there aren't any restaurants within walking distance except for the one in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sloped_Bench, Thank you for your recent visit to the Wyndham Irvine in Orange County. We're delighted that you found your room to be clean and comfortable and our staff to be friendly and professional.  There are several great places to eat and drink right here in the concourse and information is available right guest services desk. We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon.

Summary Heading: Do yourself a favor - go elsewhere
Summary: The only reason the hotel gets a "2" is because the room was clean; it was so bad that, for the first time ever, we had to leave in the middle of the night. Here are just some of the reasons:       1. The front desk people were, universally, "calling it in". They seemed really unhappy to be there.      2. The hotel is in a office park, so forget about walking anywhere to eat, especially on the weekend.      3. The room was one step above a Days Inn; and we paid for a larger room! I can only imagine what the regular rooms are like. The bathroom was pretty large, but ridiculously set up so there was no place to put your toiletries. Seriously, there was room for a toothbrush and a glass, that's it.      4. We paid to be on the "Executive Level", which includes beverages and
Manager Response: Dear Experienced Traveler,  Our sincerest apologies that you had multiple dissatisfying situations when you stayed with us. It is our goal to provide services that will help you unwind and enjoy your stay with us.  We shared your feedback with our team so we can continue to strive for excellence in every encounter.   Guest Relations

Summary: Great Irvine / Orange Country Airport location. Easy access without getting on the freeway from airport. Good breakfast buffet.  Very comfy bed. Clean. Modern. Will stay here again as I have to travel to Irvine for business frequently.
Manager Response: Dear CharmChari,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Wyndham.  We truly appreciate your feedback and glad to hear you had a comfortable visit with us.

Summary Heading: Fun getaway with a great view and atmosphere...
Summary: Great stray with a great view..certainly one of the best inhave stayed in the recent months......cant wait to do it all over again......definitely will come back and carpe diem at wyndham
Manager Response: Dear Edrasl2017,  We appreciate you staying with us for your fun getaway.  We are looking forward to your return so we may continue to provide an experience that is memorable for you.

Summary: The facilities and surrounding area was beautiful as city areas go.  The Mexican restaurant just a couple blocks walk through lovely business building green spaces was delicious!  We also received a complimentary upgrade with an amazing view, although some of the benefits such as snacks and breakfast weren't available on the weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Kurtb374,  We are delighted to hear that you felt the property was beautiful and it allowed you to enjoy yourself with us.  We look forward to having you with us again.

Summary: I was moved to that property due to construction at my original destination.  The room request information was not transferred over.  I tried to print something in the business center, but the toner was out.  I had to email my doc to the front desk to have it printed.  Worked okay, but not convenient.  The room was comfortable and reasonably quiet.  There was a bulb missing from a lamp and the water flow in the bathroom sink was awful.  The service in the dining room was terrible for both dinner and breakfast.  The food was okay, but nothing special.  Did I mention the service was terrible?  The employees were more interested in chatting amongst themselves than serving the customers.  Nothing else was available without a drive somewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Jayjj9502sv,  Thank you so much for your valuable feedback regarding to your stay.  Your feedback allows us to make the appropriate adjustments to our business to ensure we are providing services to our guests that meet or exceed their needs.  We hope that we will have another opportunity to deliver for you.

Summary Heading: Theft in my room, response was no accountability
Summary: I was stranded in OC 8/29-9/3/17 because of Hurricane Harvey and stayed at the Wyndham Irvine for 5 nights. The stay was pleasant enough until the day before checkout when I removed the 'do not disturb' sign and had the room cleaned. I had some groceries, 2 bottles of wine, and a brand new customized putter in elongated box in main part of the room when I left at 11am. When I returned to the room at 5pm, I noticed all the food and wine was gone. Not a big deal, as I spent $100 to replace it from local Ralph's grocer.  The next morning, I went down to ask for packaging tape so I could pack my things for the flight home to Houston, now that the airports were open. To my surprise, my brand new putter in the box was nowhere to be found. The only other people in the room in the last
Manager Response: It is truly unfortunate that we were unable to rectify your claim regarding a golf putter. The safety and security of our guest is one of our top priorities and we consider theft a serious issue. The unusual circumstances surrounding your stay are sincerely regrettable. We have thoroughly investigated the issue internally using all available resources and high standard protocols. We also invited and welcomed an independent investigation through our Insurance company to guarantee a neutral entity was involved.     As we discussed, the Insurance teams investigation concluded there was no supporting evidence to suggest our associates were involved in the disappearance of your putter. We sincerely apologize for the time required to conduct our investigation.  However, we wanted to ensure our investigation was thorough and transparent before reaching a conclusion.   We are available to answer any additional questions you may have.

Summary: If you ever have an event here and get a chance to work with Dawna, Corrynne, and Marilu, you'll be treated with the best service you can find. The process of setting up a small event is seamless.   Marilu, the banquet manager, and her team were there to help with any needs we might have have from the minute I arrived. She made sure that everything was setup correctly and was a phone call away.   The food was excellent. Everyone had high praises about everything that came out.   The location of the hotel is less than 10 minutes from John Wayne Airport. This made it an easy travel for outside travelers who flew in.  The rooms were clean, spacious and modern.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher,  It was a true pleasure to be of service to you for your event with us.  We are glad you chose Wyndham Irvine for your business needs.  We have shared your feedback with the team members you have mentioned to ensure they know the impact that they made on your meeting with us.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to provide you with an exceptional experience.  We look forward to having you back with us.    Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: needed assistance due to recent Orange/Anaheim Hills wildfires
Summary: We were recently evacuated due to the Orange/Anaheim Hills wildfires and needed a hotel asap.  We were tired and smoky and just wanted a place to lay our head.  A friend of ours got this for us.  We work at UCI so we got the UCI discount.  They wanted to charge us for parking (which no one told us about on the phone), $18 per car and we had 2.  I reiterated to them that we were fire evacuees (on the phone and in person) they waived one but not the other.  We heard other hotels waived such fees.  We had pets and they charged us that fee.  I get that one.  Breakfast?  no free continental breakfast for even the fire evacuees and there were many staying there.  Maybe Wyndham management should have taken into consideration that their neighbors were going thru a terrible time and
Manager Response: Dear lmalulu2176, Thank you for you for sharing with us your recent experience at the hotel.   We consider guest feedback a “gift” and appreciate the opportunity to address your concern.  I am so very sorry that  a tragic event prompted your stay with us and that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our #1 goal is to provide an exceptional experience for our guests.   We did our best to accommodate last minute reservations and rooms for those affected by the fires and we did so at a deep discount.  Regular rates in this area are quite a bit higher than the University rate you were extended.  We’re very sorry you were affected by the terrible fires and we hope you and your family have fully recovered.

Summary Heading: Rooms are small and do not have a micro or fridge. If...
Summary: Rooms are small and do not have a micro or fridge. If you're lucky enough to get one if the few ones they have you can request a fridge. Grab and go's breakfast are not an ideal breakfast for athletes, more of a snack.
Manager Response: Dear Benita,  We apologize that our guest room does not meet your needs.  We provide refrigerators upon request and have microwaves available on guest floors for easy access.  We appreciate the opportunity to receive your feedback so we can continue to provide amenities in the hotel that make it easier on our guests.

Summary: I stayed here with my family for my brothers wedding and it was a very unplesant experience. FIrst when we arrived I noticed they were charging for parking and that is obsurd! I've never stayed at a hotel that charged its guests to park there. The second issue was that there was that there was some type of sports event going on and all these young highschool kids were staying at the hotel and it took about 10 minutes just for the elevator to go from the lobby to my floor. I will definitely spend a little more next time and stay some where more classy!
Manager Response: Dear Matthewka3499nv,  Our apologies that our hotel did not meet your expectation.  It is our goal to deliver a great experiences for all of our guests.  We appreciate your feedback regarding to the parking fee and apologize that this was something you did not expect.

Summary Heading: Second visit within a couple of months- again excellent
Summary: After our great experience in June we decided to go back to the Wyndham when we came back to OC last week. Again we had a flawless experience. Friendly staff at check-in and at breakfast. The highlight was Ross at the executive lounge, he is the business representative a hotel can only wish for. He is a true gentleman and displays great customer service wiyh everything he does and says.
Manager Response: Dear Matthias Z,  It is great to hear that you had a flawless experience at our property.  We have shared your feedback with Ross so he understands the impact you made with him.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Fantastic hotel not too far from the airport. Staff were great and really helpful. The rooms are superb. The food especially the chicken wings was great.  Shuttle bus every half hour after 5.00am All round great place.
Manager Response: Dear James,  Thank you for letting us know that you felt our staff was great and really helpful.  Our team is dedicated to delivering on outstanding service and they will be delighted to hear you received just that. Thank you

Summary: The true meaning of a five star hotel. Great location in a corporate environment. Close a lot of upscale amenities. Very quaint room. With a great view of the city. Staff was professional, but not friendly. Over all, we enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Buyforerreal,  Thank you for your feedback on how you felt our hotel was a true five star hotel.  Our team works hard to deliver exceptional service and provide a great stay for all. Thank you

Summary: The staff was very cordial and helpful. They made my stay very comfortable. The food in the resturant was great and presented well and the portions more then adequate. Thank you for a safe and homey place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear K996HQkatiea,  We are energized to hear that you had a nice stay with us.  It is important to provide experiences that allow our guests to unwind and feel comfortable when traveling for fun or business.  Thank you

Summary: Stayed at Wyndham Irvine on way to Huntington Beach.  Enjoyed a great room on the 14 floor as a member of Wyndham and took full advantage of the afternoon wine tasting and appetizers, then the free shuttle to a nearby Mexican restaurant.  The private morning breakfast for members on the 14th floor was also a treat.  Highly recommend it to others needing to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Dear AtlantaVon,  It is wonderful to hear that you felt like a queen when staying with us.  We work hard to offer amenities and services that connect to you.  We look forward to having you back with us.  Thank you

Summary: This hotel was very clean, orderly. The front desk staff was exceptionally polite and helpful. The room was a delight.
Manager Response: Dear J1061RAjohnl,  We appreciate your positive feedback regarding to our front desk team.  We are delighted to hear that they provided you with exceptionally polite and helpful service.   Thank you

Summary: Within the spectrum of 'Customer Service', at one end is 'United Airlines' and at the other is 'Starbucks', the Irvine Wyndham Hotel is at the Starbucks end of the spectrum
Manager Response: Dear CharlesgV9068QJ,  We apologize for your experience with us and if there is something we can do to better understand how we can deliver at the top of your service spectrum, please let us know as we truly care about your feedback and how we can improve.  Thank you

Summary: This is the first time I have stayed at this hotel. My wife and I found that the hotel was very clean and comfortable and was in the right location for all our needs. We will be back on our next visit. Excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear 01632WOjohnd,  We are glad to hear that we hit the mark in all aspects of your stay.  We hope to have you back with us.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Okay, but I've stayed in better hotels
Summary: This hotel is in a great location if you are doing business nearby or flying in from SNA. I do have a few gripes though. I wanted to help reduce my environmental impact by reusing my towel/sheets, but they changed them daily anyways. Also, as I was checking out and the staff (at front desk) was kind of rude, and acted like I was being an inconvenience to him and snarky. Not what I expect from a front desk attendant.   The food and staff in restaurant was very kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear treehopper8705,  Thank you so much for your valued feedback.  We teach our team to provide exceptional experiences and we apologize this was not the interaction that you had.  We will continue to develop our team members to take every step to ensure our guests feel welcome and taken care of each time.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to deliver for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Hotel is about a 10 minute drive from John Wayne Airport, also situated right in the middle of a corporate park, walkable to many nice restaurants and also pretty area with man made lakes and nice buildings.Hotel itself is pretty average, but clean and comfortable. Lobby is large and simple, rooms are large, air conditioning worked well. Bathrooms were plain, bed was comfortable. Overall had a nice stay and would return.
Manager Response: Dear ExpertTravelCritic,  We are delighted that you felt the hotel met all your needs in comfort.  We strive to provide an experience that you can feel a seamless and memorable stay. We look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great property in a good location
Summary: This was my second time staying at this property. The rooms are comfortable and clean. The staff is very friendly. The property is clean and well maintained. It’s a great place to stay.   The only complaint I have is that most parking spaces are exceptionally narrow and definately not Irvine City Code code compliant. The compact spaces measured just under 7 1/2’ wide. Not the 8’ required by City Code for a compact. Also, it’s difficult to find parking for mid-to-full size cars. There are a handful of spaces that can accommodate mid-to-full sized cars, but it’s usually filled with compacts.
Manager Response: Dear PrescottJae,  Thank you for letting us know that our team provided you with a great experience.  We strive to be the best in Orange County.  Thank you for your additional feedback regarding to the parking.  We have shared this with our team to see if there are any additional steps we can take to meet all of your needs.  We look forward to having you back with us again.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Staff was very friendly. The rooms are standard and no surprises or anything. Free shuttle services to and from the airport, and you can request free transport within 3 mile radius of the hotel. Great for business stay.
Manager Response: Dear doggfrenzy,  We are glad you had a good stay and experienced our friendly staff.  We are dedicated to providing you with a great experience and look forward to having you back with us soon.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We've had our high school reunions at the Wyndham in Irvine for the last 5 years. The staff is very helpful and the food was great. We had our own private area and even had a DJ.  Everyone had a great time.  Our room was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Carol4homes,  We are grateful for your great feedback regarding to your frequent visits to our hotel and that you felt our team delivered on point with your expectations.  We are excited for your return with us.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel. There was a spot on my bed sheets. I couldn't...
Summary: Great hotel. There was a spot on my bed sheets. I couldn't tell if it was an old spill that couldn't be removed or not. So, I didnt use that sheet. But other than that, I had a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear billyjeanu,  Thank you so much for allowing us an opportunity to address your concern.  We take your feedback serious and our team is dedicated to providing a great hotel experience at every interaction.  We have shared your stay feedback and hope that we may have another opportunity to deliver for you. Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Our group stayed here at Wyndham Irvine for 3 nights. Front desk staff were very welcoming ( They even asked us which floor is considered bad luck in Japanese Culture when we booked the rooms, very nice). I really liked the view from my 9th floor rooms which i could see the 405 freeway. I loved their lighted mirrors in the bathrooms, and the bed sheet smelled fresh and clean. We had a meeting of 80 people with catering service in the next day, Banquet Manager was very professional  tried to accommodate our request as possible. The food was great, we ordered a carved station with a chief ( Filet Mignon ) as an additional option, and turned out to be great! Our 80 guests ( mostly Japanese ) were very happy with the ending Dessert selection ( Cheesecake,  Chocolate, Key lime pie
Manager Response: Dear Yukohawaii2002,  Thank you so much for staying with us at The Wyndham Irvine.  We truly appreciate your great feedback on the service you experienced.  We look forward to having you back with us on your next visit to Orange County.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My family stayed here for four days over Labor Day and found it to be a great experience. It was clean and pleasant. Great location, not far from the 405, and central to where we were visiting. I'd recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear jmspid,  Thank you for your feedback regarding to your stay.  It is great to hear that you felt the hotel provided you a calm and clean experience that hit your expectations.  We look forward to delivering for you again on your next stay.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Always a great experience!! This is a hotel you walk into and feel welcomed to be there with amazing customer service! Everyone is always very nice and helpful to make sure you have an enjoyable time on your visit. Will be back soon!!
Manager Response: Dear kevintG6975CJ,  We appreciate your feedback regarding to your experience at The Wyndham Irvine.  Our team is dedicated to deliver for you each time you are with us.  Look forward to your return.  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly people, great food, shuttles to and from the airport and within 3 miles of the hotel.
Summary: The hotel itself is comfortable and clean. They have a green policy and will leave your towels if you hang them. The restaurant has healthy options and the food is excellent. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Their shuttle will take you anywhere within 3 miles of the hotel and uber is always available. Executive level has a buffet in the morning for a slightly higher priced room. You could probably order room service in the morning on a lower floor for the same price. I have enjoyed both of my week long stays.
Manager Response: Dear Felicia1326,  Thank you for your feedback.  It sounds like we were able to connect with you on a couple areas of your visit.  We look forward to having you back with us.

Summary: Stayed at this property for one night.  Very clean property, clean rooms.  Needed a fridge in my room and one was brought up at no charge.  Staff very accomodating
Manager Response: Dear TKellarB,  Thank you for staying with us at The Wyndham Hotel.  We take pride in our team and it is good to hear they made you feel welcome.

Summary: Very comfortable rooms, friendly staff and good food. Good for a short visit or if your staying in town for a while. This used to be a Holiday Inn year's ago, it was no where as good as it is now.  Wyndham did a great job when they took it over.
Manager Response: Dear Navin,  Thank you for your kind words regarding to your stay with us. We are glad to hear that it made the difference for you.

Summary: Close to airport. The service staff were attentive and helpful. We rented a car as there is no shuttle to Disney, but it was nice to combine a couple of days at Disney with a day at the beautiful beaches!  Disney is short 22 minute drive and the beach is closer. What a fabulous stay we had. The pool was the only let down as it is inside.
Manager Response: Dear Susan P,  It is great to hear that you chose our hotel for your getaway.  It is nice to unwind with family at a hotel that engages that for you.  Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for the feedback regarding to our pool.   We hope to see you on your next visit.

Summary: It's like I said before. Great Place and even greater staff, especially Alex who was there in the evenings.
Manager Response: Dear M2303bywilliamj,  It is a pleasure to know that you felt our hotel was amazing and that you felt Alex made a difference for you.  We appreciate the feedback.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: The difference between good and GREAT
Summary: This is my first TA review so forgive me if I am long winded.  I stay 75-100 nights a year in hotels for work and vacation and consider myself somewhat of an expert on service to some extent I just usually don't publish anything. But this review has been a very long time I have been staying at the Wyndham Hotel in Irvine for over 10 years and it has been a place to stay when my home is under construction, underwater, when we want to  get out of the house and stay at a hotel for a night or two, have business associates stay somewhere near our local offices etc. So in my opinion this is one of those hotels that you can truly have a personal relationship with the staff and feel at home and comfortable. Perfect pillows, great linens extremely , good food and conscientious
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, We are delighted to hear your feedback regarding to your experience with us.  It is great to hear that you felt The Wyndham Irvine Hotel was a top notch experience and we hope to be your only choice of hotels.  We look forward to your return with us.

Summary Heading: Good Stay at Nice but Unremarkable Hotel
Summary: I was in Irvine for business and stayed at this Wyndham hotel for one night. It's a nice hotel with a free shuttle from the airport and anywhere within 3 miles of the hotel. I liked my room and especially the bed, which was very comfortable. I didn't use the gym or pool, but would have if there had been an outdoor pool. The breakfast buffet was good, but expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Sharzanni,  Thank you so much for your feedback. We take pride in knowing how you feel your experience was.  We will continue to work hard to deliver on all of our guests expectations and offering an experience that is memorable.    We hope that we may have another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Wyndham Irvine-Orange County Airport is an excellent hotel and one of the best in Orange County.
Manager Response: Hello Jeffe, Thank you very much for posting your positive comments on Tripadvisor!   We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay at Wyndham and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Both days of meetings went really well- we were greatly impressed with the service of Marilu the Banquets Manager on-site and David Trevilla who helped us with several technical difficulties. Josie B., the catering manager, was also quick to respond when needed and will work with you to make sure you get everything you possibly need for the meeting. We greatly appreciated how everyone was really helpful and nice, and the meeting space was large enough that more chairs could have been added (prepped for 200) but were not needed. Prices in comparison to many of the other hotels near the airport are a lot more reasonable- especially on meeting space and food items. The meeting spaces are well taken care of, but I will note that the A/C in the Avalon room was a little loud and made
Manager Response: Dear caseyclayson,  Thank you so much for your direct feedback regarding to our team members.  It is amazing that our team delivered on your expectations.  We have shared with these team members your feedback so they know the impact that they made.  We look forward to having your meetings with us in the future.   Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great beds . Super clean and quiet. Nice staff. Priced right . Very simple . Awesome food served in hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel for the traveling public.Especially for those flying in and out of John Wayne airport.✈️
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post comments about your recent stay at the Wyndham Irvine.  We're delighted  that you enjoyed your stay and found the hotel to be clean and quiet and convenient. It's a pleasure to serve you and we hope to welcome you again when your travels return you to beautiful Orange County, California!

Summary Heading: Best Team and Incredible Customer Service. I am beyond pleased with the welcome we received.
Summary: Great staff!!!! I would definitely come back and stay here and also recommend this Hotel to everyone!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your generous comments about the Wyndham Irvine team and the service you received during your recent visit!  There is nothing more gratifying than knowing that our team members proudly demonstrated the Wyndham "Count on Me!"  culture and attitude! We look forward to having you back with us soon!

Summary: im very satisfied with this hotel an everything. the only thing I dint like is that I dint get any points for the nights stayed I think that's a big -0 also I sent my family to Disneyland this week but I booked it in another place so I can get point for the nights bing stayed.
