Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your satisfaction with your recent hotel stay at the Wyndham Irvine.  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay.  If your earned Wyndham Reward Points are not yet reflected on your account, please contact our member services team at 1-866-Wyn-Rwds (1-866-996-7937) and a team member will be happy to assist!

Summary Heading: Great Location to Strike Out on an O.C. Adventure
Summary: Would have liked more notice about the parking fee, but everything else met or exceeded standards.  The staff was helpful and the place was very clean.  The packed snacks in the morning were a nice bonus.  There was some rattling from the A/C, but we were so tired that it wasn't worth reporting and having to deal with the possibility of moving to a new room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The beds were very comfortable. They have happy hour at the bar. The location is very convenient to the airport. I will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting you great comments on Tripadvisor!  So glad you enjoyed our location, happy hour and very comfy signature Wyndham beds!  We'll look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the O.C!

Summary: I have not stayed at Wyndham in a number of years. This was a business trip.  The room and service was excellent.  I would stay her again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have stayed in this Hotel many times, with whole family and just the hubby always fits our needs is very inviting. Staff is awesome. Hotel is clean, rooms are superior. Location location location Great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post your kind words about the Wyndham Irvine.  We strive to provide a  great experience for our guests and your review is truly appreciated. Thank you for recognizing our awesome team members.  Attitude is everything and compliments coming from a loyal guest like you  mean a lot to all of us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I really wanted to like this hotel. The pictures made it look much more modern than it really is. Hotel Irvine is my usual "go to" favorite while staying in Irvine. I should have stuck with my gut.   Pros:   • Location- very close to airport  • Airport shuttle- runs every 30 min  • 24 front desk/ snacks available if    hungry. Selection is more than typical vending machine options. Frozen pizzas, burritos ect   JUST Whatever: (neither PRO nor CON)   • Indoor pool- relatively small in size. Has weird smell. Probably due to being an indoor pool. Smells musty!  • Outside seating area- tiny and not at all as pictured. They must have shot the photos in a wide lens.  • Basketball Court (if that's what you call it)- lol! Not that we used it to play bball just parked right next to it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel staff friendly and knowledgeable. Great location for us. Clean and comfortable unit. I definitely would go back next year.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is wonderful, still staying here but wanted to write a review, close to the Orange County airport which is where I want to be. Seldom do I have hotel reservation problems, but tonight was one of them, that was NOT Wyndham's fault. The front desk staff Daniel, was very professional, super friendly, and very helpful. I was impressed by with his customer service. My issues were resolved with the third party company that I made the reservation through. This is a great property, I would recommend it for business and leisure travelers.
Manager Response: none

Summary: for the price, this hotel is average. the staff was nice though. the gym is small but sufficient. the pool was under construction. my room was so hot and the ac didn't work. i'm sure they would have fixed it if i had asked but i didn't care enough.  carl's jr. and starbucks without walking distance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice (but not fancy) hotel with pleasant staff and reasonable prices. I have been staying here often for many years and I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice location!bed are super comfy and clean. Indoor pool and spa. Love it here.  Will be back soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I guess we found our new favourite in OC. After a disappointing week at the AveoftheArt in Costa Mesa, we decided to book the second week for my wife's extented stay at the Wyndham.  Although we don’t have any membership there, we got a free upgrade with free lounge access and free breakfast, parking is free and the room is spacious with plenty of storage and most important nicely isolated allowing a restful night and a restful sleep. Customer care is outstanding even with a personal follow up by the GM, will definitely be back there when back in OC. Great job by Diane driving true customer service at this place - a wonderful and refreshing experience
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a renovated/redecorated hotel that is much more upscale and modern than most others. The only thing that would make the rooms better would be a mini-fridge.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love this hotel because the staff always goes out of their way to service me. I just visited the hotel this past weekend. I was there for leisure time. I had a couple of fun events to attend. The manager, Sofiane, is professional and he always takes good care of me for any of my stays at the hotel. I stayed two nights this time. My favorite suite was available and super clean. Nice and quiet. The shuttle service took me to several places and actually waited for me. I will always be a customer of this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Food was Good and service good. The house Keeping staff was great hey worked with to get my room serviced with the minimum disruption the work schedule.  Food service people also did and outstanding job they helped be be accommodate my locarb diet.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Renovation and continued Great Service!
Summary: I have been staying in this hotel for almost 17 years. It was a Crowne Plaza when I first started staying there and it was an excellent hotel. The take over by Wyndham only made it better. There is a Phillapino van driver who has been there at least 21 years and he is the nicest man you could meet. The management of the hotel should really acknowledge his dedication! The rooms, hallways, and bathrooms are still spotlessly clean and updated. The bedding is great and the front desk staff is welcoming and knowledgeable! This is one of if not the best airport hotel for people in the Irvine area!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was ok, but I disagreed with the parking fee of 18 bucks per day.I am a Wyndham member and that still charge my credit card for my and it was suppose to be free
Manager Response: none

Summary: While this wasn't an amazing experience, there's really nothing wrong with the hotel.  We got a great rate on Priceline.  Check in was very friendly and efficient.  The location was ideal for us -- close to the airport and my client, and walking distance to several restaurants.  The room was clean, quiet and spacious -- the wireless was free and fast.  There's a convenient snack food kiosk, and microwaves on every floor to heat up food.    Only two complains are the parking is a bit overpriced, and the TV not up to state of the art.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There was excessive noise by other guess. Hammering in adjacent room. Slamming doors. Guess screaming to someone in the room to open the door. All this occurred between 1-3:30 AM. I called the front desk to complain but it took about 50 rings before they answered. We found coffee packs left in the coffee maker. Parking fees are excessive for self parking, specially when the entrance and exit bar system was not working properly. Internet was down.
Manager Response: none

Summary: In general, the hotel was good.  The general condition of the hotel was good, clean. The room was clean and comfortable.  Bathroom spacious and good. I didn't like the fact that I had to sign up for their rewards program (free) in order to be able to connect to the internet. On top of that, the first night I had some trouble with internet however it seemed to be a problem in the general area. The staff was helpful and offered me the option to use the business centre. In general the staff was helpful with many situations (de-magnetized room key, access to parking, internet issues) In terms of pricing, I got a good last minute deal but I would not pay full price when travelling with kids.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, great location, outstanding staff
Summary: The hotel is very conveniently located in Orange County. Well connected (airport, freeways) and easy to get to. The Irvine Wyndham is very modern and rooms and hallways have a high quality finish. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Particularly Maribel (breakfast service) and Rhea (shuttle driver). They both went beyond their duties to make our stay very pleasant. The shuttle service is VERY convenient to go shopping and to move around the surrounding area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location close to John Wayne Airport. Staff were very helpful and reliable. Clean rooms, fast WiFi!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our company used the Wyndham for a luncheon event.  The meeting space was great!  Food was very very good!  Service was outstanding. Marilu Tovar, the Banquet Manager was wonderful!  Working with Josie Blandino, the Catering Sales Manager was awesome!  She is a real asset to the hotel and knows what it takes for her guests to have a successful event!  We will be using the Wyndham Irvine for all our future SoCal events !!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our office recently moved and I was looking for conference room space/food service/rooms for two very important meetings.  Josie Blandino made it happen!!!  With changing dates, special orders, she took the reins and provided excellent service at both meetings. She also connected me with Marta del Rio-Mata, who gave us great corporate rates for hotel stays.  Our guests raved about the facilities, food, and great service making me look very good to my boss...Thanks to all.

Summary: The room was nice, people were friendly and I had a nice stay.  You should know that there is an additional parkig fee.  The hotel appeared to be updated from a resent remodel.  I did have a little bit of confusion in getting to the workout room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location near the airport was ideal and its proximity to events we attended in Irvine was great.  Plus, it is a relatively short drive to the beaches.  We appreciated the helpfulness of the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent business hotel, wouldn't recommend for vacations
Summary: I am taking classes at UCI for several days a week, for several weeks so am staying at a variety of hotels nearby for where ever the best price was.  That being said, this is a decent hotel.  The room was good, the sleep was good, the shower pressure was great.    Parking is about $17 or so a night and is very convenient to entering/leaving the hotel.  The restaurant is meh.  For breakfast they charge about $20 for the buffet and it was lackluster, and good for grabbing a random plate of food and getting something in your tummy quickly but not being like DAMN that was a good $20 breakfast.  I did it the first morning and wouldn't go back, I went to McD's for an egg mcmuffin instead.    The restaurant isn't open at dinner, so you have to order in the dark bar and wait for your
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose the Wyndham because if was close to the University our daughter was graduating from. It turned out to be a really nice hotel to stay at and reasonably priced for the area. The front desk staff and other employees were very nice and accommodating. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is clean. beds are so comfy. Staff is very helpful. Will be staying again soon. The fees could be a little less but the rest of the hotel makes up for it. Free wifi is awsome. Havent tried the bar yet but maybe next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible one night stay and service
Summary: Unfortunately my last visit to the Wyndham Irvine was so bad I will most likely never stay there again and recommending all colleagues to not stay there. It seems the hotel is declining in conditions and customer service. I had to be transferred to 3 different rooms because the air was not working. A power surge did hit the area but the no air started prior. Maintenance tried to repair the first unit. Occupied my room for more than hour. After no being able to fix, I was transferred to another room and that air did work as well. The maintenance supervisor showed and tried to fix the unit ; however, he was so mad and cursed the whole time about his employees. Very unprofessional. He left without repairing the unit and left me sitting there for more than hour with no air. I called
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was easy to find. As I pulled onto the property, there was a self-parking area that charged $18 per day. I've stayed at other 4-star hotels in the area that charged more and was a hassle to get my vehicle. That said, the $18 per day was ok.  As I walked into the main lobby, it was clean and nicely decorated. The front desk staff greeted me and were professional throughout the check-in process. The front desk agent informed me of a choir of youth that was staying on the property and to avoid any issues with my stay due to noise, he moved my room to the top floor. I appreciated that he went out of his way to accommodate me.  The room itself was clean and well decorated. The amenities were what I would expect from a 4-star hotel. The views from the top floor were very

Summary: The room was clean and spacious. The free bottled water in the room was a nice touch, although I didn't drink it. The front desk staff was extremely helpful and respectful. Just awesome experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Tall Hotel in Business Center, Close to Airport
Summary: Business hotel but we wanted close to John Wayne airport to make a quick getaway after our visit.  Pool and Hot Spa were Excellent!!!  Food was Great although eating in the Bar was loud and full at Happy Hour.  Room was clean, 9th floor was a great view of some of Irvine's business district.

Summary: I was overnighting at the Wyndham Irvine-Orange County Airport and my mother came to visit me since she lives nearby and wanted to spend the night.  We had a couple issues and questions that came up. Saul, at the front desk, took care of my mom and all of our needs in a very professional manner served with warmth, a smile, and company pride. Thank You Saul!  On a side note: Beautiful, clean hotel with the most comfortable pillows and conveniently close to the airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok for a quick, last minute trip
Summary: Lobby looked nice, I didn't expect a 5 star hotel but I just thought it would have the basics. It didn't have a mini bar which was frustrating because I had some food I needed to keep refrigerated. They didn't have 24hr room service and the hotel is located in the middle of office buildings so if you're hungry in the middle of the night, too bad. They have free internet which is good, though it's not password protected. I preferred to just use my data. The walls seem to be very thin because I could hear the next door guests talking. The bathroom was a good size and clean. Their TV would have been good if they let you use the functions. I tried to use the HDMI but I couldn't, seems like they disable it because they also do not provide you with the TV's original remote control.

Summary: This hotel has a great staff, very welcoming and helpful.  In addition, the rooms are clean and comfortable.  The restaurant downstairs offers an excellent breakfast buffet and the exercise room and pool were solid facilities.

Summary: This hotel is perfect for conducting business meetings. The location, parking and service were all great. Additionally, the meals ordered through out the day were presented nicely and were delicious. Everyone we worked with was extremely accommodating, especially Josie and Merilu. It was a great experience overall. Thank you to the Wyndham staff!

Summary: The staff was very professional and pleasant. I enjoyed my stay and look forward to coming again.

Summary: Great location near the airport. Rooms are nice, but starting to age just a bit. Friendly staff, but it took hours to get a room door fixed which left some of our group locked out for several hours. They accommodated us as best they could by giving us access to another room to shower.

Summary Heading: Great but loud the last day
Summary: The hotel was nice except for the 8am work being done in the unit next door.  Over all the service was good and the shuttle drivers were excellent.

Summary: Nice Hotel. In an industrial area so not much around to walk to. They charge you $18 a day on top of the room fee for the privilege to park your own car. That's kinda steep. No free self parking available.

Summary Heading: Elegant does not always mean excellent
Summary: I have been a Wyndham member for over 15 years, so what this means is that I expect a certain quality and experience from Wyndham. I stayed here a few months ago, and have since revisited as a guest with others, and my experience did not change so I will stick to my personal experience.   Upon arrival when approaching the front desk, I was not greeted. I stood there for a moment and then someone finally looked up at me. There were 3 clerks before me and was not one greeted me upon entrance. When I was acknowledged, it was with a “Yes”, not a “Welcome to Wyndham” as I am at other properties. I had bags in hand and on my back, so it is not like I did not appear to be traveling. Upon approaching the desk, I let the desk know I was checking in, at this point still no welcome. Upon
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very mediocre.  Won't stay here again.
Summary: Staff was perfectly friendly and hospitable.  But the overall property was...dingy.  There was nothing in particular that was dirty, but there was nothing that was comfortable or that sparkled or that felt inviting.  The property seems like a budget airport property.  I've suggested to our corporate person that the hotel be taken off of our approved list.  Personally, I'll never stay here again.

Summary: I had a wonderful experience this time. I stayed in my favorite room 1433, it was clean, nice and quiet.

Summary Heading: Great place even though our neighbors sucked.
Summary: The staff and rooms at this hotel were clean, friendly, and accommodating! We had issues with our next door neighbors being loud well past 4 am, and while security coming to their door did nothing to keep them from holding their rave, orgy, auction, whatever the heck they were doing, the staff tried to make it up to us in the morning with vouchers for a free breakfast. While we didn't accept (we had breakfast plans at Disney), we appreciated the gesture to try to make things right.

Summary: Booked a 2-bed room because it was cheaper but when I arrived late last night the very friendly and chipper gentleman at the front desk confirmed all details with me and I told him I'd love to get a single bed if possible and he upgraded us no problem. He even asked my preference on floors, if I wanted high or low. I really had an enjoyable time at check-in, which is not usually the case.  Room was average sized and clean, bed extremely comfortable and the shower was just perfect. Lobby area was average and parking was ample, although not as much for the non-compact cars. Parking was $18/night for self-park (no street parking close by) but convenient, as it just took the room key to open the gates.    Because I booked this hotel at such a great price I would absolutely return if

Summary: I stay at this hotel several times a year.  The hotel staff is always pleasant and helpful and hotel is always neat and clean. It's close to the airport and walking distance to many restaurants.

Summary: Room was very good. Nothing slightly below good rating. Quiet, clean, etc. Reception desk top. Good value for the price. We recommend this hotel

Summary: We had two rooms both of which had leaking windows due to the storm.  They were able to relocate one of the rooms but not the other.  They were going to send the maintenance dept up but never did.  We called several times and no one showed up.  The carpet in our room was wet the whole weekend.  It got some of our things wet.  At check out, there took $100 off our bill.  I appreciate that but do not feel it was an appropriate amount due to our inconvenience. This is our 4th year staying at this hotel for Winterfest.  Each year, we also experience problems with extreme slow service in the bar/restaurant.  They never seem to ramp up the staff to match the occupancy rates.  It's frustrating.

Summary: Plus: Comfortable beds, clean room and bathroom. This hotel was convenient for our event at Concordia University. Front reception at restaurant on Saturday AM was friendly and helpful as well as housekeeping staff and front desk Sal when we registered Friday night. I heard the indoor pool was nice from my daughter (I didn't use it). Although it is close to the freeway and airport, the noise was minimal and did not cause an inconvenience.  Minus: I iron daily (rarity for some). The ironing board was warped and caused unnecessary wrinkles on my clothes. The iron had water already in it, I changed it but it still caused my clothes to smell mildewy. The front office asked if I wanted it cleaned but I was leaving that morning.  Parking...$12-$18 We paid $12 while others in our group

Summary Heading: A few things wrong but they made up for it.
Summary: We came down for a Waterpolo tournament. It happen to be the storm of 2017. Worst SoCal had seen in a while. So our room ended up with a leak. They were booked solid so they did what they could to patch it and gave us free breakfast buffet tickets. When they did have a new room available they not only switched us to it but gave us a free upgrade to a suite. Only other complaint is the elevators were slow and 1 was out of commission.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments on TripAdvisor.  The big storm took a toll on the hotel and we found ourselves with a handful of rooms with window leads.  We're sorry that you were inconvenienced with a room move but pleased that you enjoyed the upgraded accommodations we provided and the complimentary breakfast.  We have three guest elevators and I understand that one was being serviced while you were here and we are sorry about that.  We hope you’ll return again when your travels next bring your family to beautiful Orange County!

Summary: We have been traveling to Orange County for various baseballl and water polo tournaments since our children were very young.  We had the pleasure of staying at the Wyndam last October and again this February.  The Wyndham OC Airport is our new hotel of choice.  Regardless of where other parents choose to stay, we will be checking into this hotel!  Excellent staff, clean rooms, and perfect location.  What more could a person need or want?  Oh, I know!  HONESTY!  During our last stay I left my new Fitbit Charge II on the bathroom counter.  Not only was it found and promptly returned, so was the pillow that I didn't even realize I had left.  I LOVE this place!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my first experience hosting a meeting at this hotel. Roshni, Corrynne and Marilu were wonderful to work with. I received many compliments of the cleanliness of rooms, the food in the hotel tasted wonderful and the meeting room was very great place to have a meeting. The lunch buffet was very organized and the food was delicious. I highly recommend this hotel for future meetings.

Summary Heading: I regularly stay at this property at Siemens employee rate...

She was breast cancer patient, and since I'm a survivor plus Retired RN, I offered to accompany her on her visit the next day...the staff and doctors ... and patients at Clinic were Wonderful to me...staff led me on a complete tour of clinic...and if I go back to Irvine, I'll certainly get an Oxygen Treatment! Can't say enough about the hotel and Irvine.

The room service was timely and the food was very good, I especially recommend the made to order chocolate chip coconut cookies with milk.  I was very disappointed in the TV reception.  We were sick most of our stay and had to watch TV a lot, and the stations lost reception quite a bit.  In both our

The Embassy Suites next door was amazing - less expensive, friendly staff, complimentary coffee and breakfast. So glad we left.

Thank you Wyndham for everything and for hiring great employees as such. Happy Holidays =)

Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for business and it did not disappoint!  My room was very roomy and clean. Bed was comfy and I had every thing I needed. Summary Heading: Nice Hotel Close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: My adult son and I selected the Wyndham Irvine because it was close to our business location the next day. The hotel is convenient to John Wayne (Orange County CA) Airport as well as the university.  You probably will still need a car though, but rental cars and parking are relatively cheap.  The hotel itself is modern and nicely appointed, but pretty generic.  The staff was helpful and friendly.  The room was large with 2 queen beds a large desk and an upholstered chair adjacent to the window.  The free wifi worked perfectly well for exchanging e-mail.  Everything seemed to be fresh and clean.  In short, this was a good place for business, even though
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property was well located, easy to get to and the staff was OUTSTANDING. Room was clean and bathroom was very spacious. BED WAS AMAZING Great deal for your money.

Summary: Hotel was nice staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. Will recommend and andnstay again in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments on TripAdvisor!  We're delighted that you found our associates friendly and our rooms clean.  We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary Heading: 4 Star Rating; 5 Star Rating Bed; 1 Star Rating Parking Fee Charge
Summary: The beds are so comfortable. I make this my hotel of choice when working in the OC despite shuttle bumping priorities given to airline staff over other guests. Hotel is fairly clean, great beds, nice room, bar is nice but a little pricey. Definitely not a 5 star hotel but they charge 5 star prices because of the location. Tip: For the price of food and drinks at the hotel vs walk-able restaurants, all very comparable pricing and good food so it just depends on if you want to get out and walk or stay in to dine. Also the parking fee is costly, ridiculous and shouldn't be charged to guest for staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments about your experience at the  Wyndham Irvine!  We're glad you enjoyed the guest rooms and found the bed extra comfortable. You are right that guests have many restaurant choices within walking distance and most are comparable in price   The hotel provides airport shuttle service to and from the airport all day and evening but other local area transportation is solely based upon availability.

Summary: Love the hotel. Clean and comfortable. If only if hotel would accommodates free breakfast or maybe at least free Coffee in the lobby.
Manager Response: We appreciate your great comments about the hotel and we appreciate your patronage!  Hotel brands have unique and standard offerings and at the Wyndham Irvine we offer complimentary airport transportation as well as free high-speed internet access. We understand that these two value-added services are important to our guests!  Most full-service brands like Wyndham do not offer food and beverage in the price of the room.  We hope you found our hotel to be a good value in Orange County and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: I made my reservation about a week before my arrival. Upon my arrival I found out I was upgraded to a suite with no extra charge. Just wonderful. Nice and relaxing room with a view of the city.  Very nice staff and my suite was very inviting.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to post your comments on TripAdvisor!  How wonderful that you were surprised and delighted by the suite upgrade you were given at check-in.  We appreciate you sharing your  positive experience with us and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel beds are small and rooms are not equipped with a refrigerator or microwave. You can request a fridge for a fee. However for as much as the hotel charges, it should be included. Key cards in and out of parking lot rarely works. Food prices in restaurant are extremely expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing to our attention the challenge you had with your room key working properly for parking.  We recently initiated a software upgrade and believe the issue has been corrected.  Most of our rooms are equipped with king beds although we do have rooms with two double beds for those who request them.  For future reference, microwave oven's are available on each guest floor in the vending area.

Summary Heading: The hotel is very nice like decorated, had clean rooms and...
Summary: The hotel is very nice like decorated, had clean rooms and in a terrific location. The only reason I didn't give it a five star rating, and may have been my own fault that I didn't question this, is that it had an $18 a night parking fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your generous comments about the Wyndham Irvine! How nice it is that you enjoyed the location and shared that the decor and cleanliness met your high standards!  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary: We stayed here for four nights and had a very pleasant stay.  The rooms are fairly quiet (some freeway noise but not bothersome), there is a nice flat-screen tv, plenty of towels, and, best of all, the beds are very comfortable.  In fact, their beds are some of the best that I've slept in.  And they had four pillows for each bed.  The room and bathroom were clean and well-stocked; there is a coffee maker and regular coffee and there is an ice maker and microwave down the hall as well as coin operated washing machine and dryer.  Everyone at the front desk were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for posting your great comments on TripAdvisor!  It's terrific to learn that you enjoyed everything about the hotel -especially the beds!  Please come back to visit again when your travels bring you back to beautiful Orange County!

Summary: Speed of service in the bar area is slow and a bit confusing when there are multiple guests. This has been a reoccurring problem as I stay at the hotel at least once a month.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Wyndham was conveniently located easy freeway access making it the best place to get to all of our weekend events at the Spectrum and in North Tustin
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: First Time Staying at a Wyndham Hotel and it was positive
Summary: I stayed at this hotel because it was nearby the restaurant where the family was hosting a 90th birthday party on a Saturday evening.  We worked with Shane Wilkinson, Sales Manager, to reserve a block of rooms for the relatives.  Shane was very helpful and we were able to get a group rate and the parking was $9/night instead of $18/night.  We were able to get early check-in and most of us were all on the same floor.  We also arranged to reserve an area in their restaurant, the Copper Chef Kitchen, for a party of 50+ for the breakfast buffet the next morning. The restaurant manager was very accommodating.  Overall the hotel and restaurant experience was very positive for our family party.

Summary: It is a good experience for us to enjoy the lovely Irvine Hotel.  We have a wonderful time at Irvine Hotel

Summary Heading: Nice unless you want to eat
Summary: The rooms are nice but the food... All of the food is extremely overpriced.  The service is friendly while they are there but so infrequent that it almost feels like neglect.  Waiting 15-20 minutes for a refill on beverage (water, coffee, dinner, breakfast...doesn't matter) or for 30 minutes for your check after completely finishing the food (each night this happened and I was eating alone so there was not any conversation to leave alone by the servers) is too much. Summary: I booked this hotel through Expedia. I kindly asked the front desk lady if she could double checked on my reservation because I had no idea this hotel was going to charge me a parking fee for $18. Manager Response: none

Summary: Our team stayed at this location for a softball tourney. Overall, we had a great stay! Our room was great, it smelled like it had been remodeled (new carpet) and the maid service was awesome. The beds were wonderfully comfortable and I loved the light bar around the mirror in the bathroom. It was nice to have an ice machine on every floor and there was also a microwave next to it.   The only negatives were:  No in-room fridge or microwave. This is a must if staying for more than a couple days. We were able to get a fridge brought to the room for a small fee for the week. There was a microwave as mentioned, next to the ice maker.  There's no lobby coffee. This is such a MUST HAVE! There is in-room coffee, but we were always requesting extra pods which they accommodated, but we
Manager Response: none

Summary: At a reasonable rate, this hotel provides an exceptionally clean and nice room.  The hotel is in a business park so it is very quiet, safe, and surprisingly clean.  Very close to freeway so you can go to any destination within minutes.  Staff was very nice and friendly.  Will come back and stay again at this hotel.  They have a separate charge for parking (additional $20 a day) though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Unfortunately it was a late night stay for an early morning flight.  The accommodations were lovely and the staff couldn't  have been more helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family enjoy staying at this hotel especially having the To Go Bags that were provided when the softball team stays there for Sothern California tournament.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is nice with good rooms,  nice bar, airport shuttle.  Not a lot in the business park in this area for sightseeing or restaurants unless you have a car.  Hotel is mostly quiet, although I do not like adjoining rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It wasn't clean - there were hairs and marks on the bed sheet and lamp table.  And the bathroom had blood marks on the ceiling and more hairs in the sink and toilet.  I'm not sure if I'll stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter left behind some clothes and only some of them were located. They were all left in a pile so they should have been all together. When I first called they said they didn't locate any of the clothes. They called me back and said they located everything but the pants. The supervisor said everything is logged when they find items left behind. I am guessing this didn't happen because nothing was logged for my room when I called the 1st time. I really like this hotel but very upset that only part of the missing clothing was turned in.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: With the exception of the un friendly and un helpful staff...
Summary: With the exception of the un friendly and un helpful staff in the restaurant this hotel is a wonderful place.  The front desk staff is kind and accommodating, the rooms were clean and looked to be recently remodeled.  Highly recommend, great location and easy access to all in the OC.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was in a perfect location to be close to a family member who was in Hoag Hospital. The dinner menu is well-rounded and the meal I had was excellent. The staff was friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was clean and comfortable they have us a rollout bed at no charge due to us booking late in the evening after a baseball game. Very courteous staff!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had an amazing time in Wyndham. The hotel personnel's were very nice and friendly.  My gratitude goes for the " Bobby" one of the hotel's employee, He helped me a lot. The rooms was very clean, and also the breakfast was really good. The parking price was fair enough. In general, I really enjoyed my trip.
Manager Response: Hello Esi R, Thank you very much for taking the time to post your positive experiences with staff at the Wyndham Irvine.  We're delighted you enjoyed your time with us and that the accommodations, food and service met your expectations.  We appreciate your patronage and hope to welcome you again when your travels bring you back to Orange County. I'll be sure to let Bobby know you found him to be exceptional!

Summary: Second time we've stayed here. Great room, comfortable. Location is great to so much in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive review of the Wyndham Irvine. We're glad you enjoyed your stay at the hotel and in the area.  We'll look forward to your return!

Summary: We rented a corner suite with a breathtaking view.  It was accompanied with a nice breakfast and super fast check and check out  We would draw the curtains and had windows the size of doors to look out of, it was one of the best hotels I had stayed in.  Housekeeping was awesome as well.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley G, Wow!  What a wonderful review.  It's rewarding to read a generous post like yours.  So glad you enjoyed the over-sized corner room with a view and that the breakfast was nice!  Easy in and easy out is what we always aspire to provide. Thank you for staying with us.  We hope you'll be back when your travels bring you back to beautiful Orange County.

Summary: The staff at the Wyndham are welcoming and courteous. We stayed on a holiday week-end, which was very busy. The hotel was also guesting two sport team tournaments. Even with a lot of teenagers running around, we enjoyed our stay. The only negative issue is the parking. The parking for guests is $18.00 a day which adds up quickly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. Service was excellent and staff very helpful. It was convenient to shops, restaurants and attractions.
Manager Response: Dear Linda, Thank you for taking time to post your kind words about the Wyndham Irvine. Service excellence is what we strive for every day and it's great to know that you enjoyed your stay and found the staff to be so helpful.  I'll be sure to share your comments with our team.

Summary: this is one of the best hotels in the area of John Wayne Airport, nice rooms, no fwy noise even though it's right up on the freeway and nice staff. They tend to have a lot of groups going through so that can be a drag
Manager Response: Dear Valerie, Thank you for taking time to post your recent eview of the Wyndham Irvine.  We're thrilled you've designated us as one of the "best hotels in the area"!   We do have youth groups and sports tournaments during the summer and we do our best to separate the groups from the others so that everyone enjoys.  We hope to see you again!

Summary: This hotel met or exceeded our expectations: Clean, comfortable, great location, near airport, near great restaurants, service great. Would highly recommend it to anyone traveling to Orange County, California.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive review of the Wyndham Irvine hotel location, service and staff!  We appreciate you taking time to share with others who are making hotel selections based on TripAdvisor ratings!

Summary Heading: We were there for a soccer camp, this was the hotel...
Summary: We were there for a soccer camp, this was the hotel suggested by the camp, it would have been helpful if transportation was provided to & from the camp worked out between the camp and the hotel.  No refrigerator was provided in the room for drinks etc. The hotel only had one working washer which made it impossible to clean uniforms for the following day of camp. I had to make several phone calls before the trip because of the confusing email confirmations.Needed late check out, made arrangements to check out at 3 when we returned from camp our key was turned off. Minor issues.
Manager Response: Dear Susan, Thank you very much for posting your comments on Trip Advisor.  It's important for us to understand when we do well and where we need to improve.  Unfortunately, transportation for groups isn't something we regularly do because we are committed to providing continuous pick-up and delivery to the airport.  I understand that we did have one washing machine out of service for a day or so and I apologize for the inconvenience this caused you. The machine is repaired and working, albeit too late for you. It seems to me that when our associate approved your late check-out, he or she failed to let you know that you would have to have your key re-programmed at the desk so that it would work beyond the regular check-out time.  Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to demonstrate excellent customer service.

Summary: Our Gala was a huge success and our guests were very happy.  Food was great and staff really took good care of us.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a terrific review about your experience at the Wyndham Irvine! We have enjoying hosting the KidSingers Gala for years now and we are honored to be the hotel of choice for this prestigious event!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nicely remodeled hotel.   Staff very friendly and helpful...
Summary: Nicely remodeled hotel.   Staff very friendly and helpful.     Issues with cable TV reception  which I was told were in the wall and rewiring is needed?!
Manager Response: Dear Richard, Thank you for posting your positive comments about the Wyndham Irvine on Trip Advisor! We're delighted that you enjoyed the hotel and found the staff to be friendly and helpful. Please accept our apologies about the reception issue you had with your television. We have had a few issues reported and a result, we're conducting an audit of connections in every room.

Summary: It was a decent place to stay. Parking was confusing to check in. When we initially checked in our comforter was wet, so we asked to change rooms. The pool area was very messy and a bit confusing to get to ( down an elevator, walk down the hall, down another elevator). All in all nothing stood out as exceptional, it was a convenient place.
Manager Response: Dear 824michellei,  Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your thoughts.  I am sorry to hear about the issue with the comforter but happy to hear my team was able to accommodate a room move for you.  I have shared your review with my Executive Housekeeper and he has discussed this with his team.  We are committed to providing you with a better experience in the future.  We hope to welcome you back soon.   Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but needs to improve service
Summary: Our family had 4 executive rooms / suites and maybe we had too high expectations. The rooms and beds were nice and it was hot outside, but we had to keep turning the a/c cooler hour by hour, it could not keep. We used the pool with our kids and grandkids and that was great and alot of fun. The executive room for happy hour was great and we all had a nice relaxing time, the best part of the stay! The breakfast was going as well with excellent coffee.  I just think that the price of these executive rooms, the rooms should have had refrigerator and microwaves.  The only bad part of the stay was one in our party needed a refrigerator and it took 4 requests and two hours to get it up there when finally the supervisor had to get it up there.
Manager Response: Dear Foxtrotter20,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about the challenges you had with the A/C and with the fridge delivery.  I have shared your review with my entire team and we are committed to using you feedback as an opportunity to improve our services.  I hope you will stay with us again the next time you are in Irvine.  We look forward to earning a 5-star rating on your next visit.    Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for 3 weeks for business. I want to make special mention of Leon, who works at the service desk, and was a great help to me. Although everyone on the staff including the front desk , restaurant and bar were great, Leon was especially kind, friendly, and helped me with my heavy bags and office equipment.  I work in a service industry, and know how difficult it can be to find an employee who goes above and beyond his job duties to make a guest feel special and well-taken care of. I hope other guests have the pleasure of meeting Leon, and being made welcome as well.
Manager Response: Dear Greekfeast,  Thank you for the kind review and for taking the time to recognize Leon for his great service.  I am happy to hear that Leon was able to have such a positive impact on your stay.  I will be sure to share your review with Leon and the rest of my team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: What a sweet Bar  ! Rewards paid for this room in a Last MINUTE rsvp. Thank you Wyndham !! I stayed in Wyndhan Hotels as often as posible. They always have a great breakfast, and have a Lupper on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Some of them have OPEN BAR at lupper for a few hours. OUTSTANDING ! I would have hit it up more but Happy Hour was Start Time for work. They are very acomadating for any size Groups, with ample parking for Larger Vehicals. Thanks again, Richard Independent Contractor
Manager Response: Dear RichardbF487TV,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for being a loyal Wyndham Rewards member!  We are happy to have had you as out guest and look forward to welcoming you back soon!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed for Two Nights. We usually go to OC for medical treatment at UCI, and we find it has a great Location, and actually stay there every 3 months!  We had a little inconvenience with the shuttle service the morning of my son's treatment, and altough at the Front Desk couldn't get a solution for my problem (we were late for his appt) We met Bobby, and he was very assertive and very kind and quickly spoke to manager and took us to our appointment.   From then on, he really did a great effort and worked to give a better service in the name of Wyndham.  I really recommend you to stay. Great beds, the breakfast buffet is delicious and it has a great location.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriela C,  Thank you for making Wyndham Irvine your hotel of choice in OC and for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stays with us and that Bobby was able to provide you with such a great experience.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: They've done everything to make my stay very comfortable, the only thing I dislike about hotels close to the airport is they charge for parking. If you join the Wyndham Rewards program you get the parking for $8 less per night. So I would suggest signing up at the desk as you register.
Manager Response: Dear Larry A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for becoming a Wyndham Rewards member!  I know you will enjoy this great program and all of the many perks that come with being a member.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I fine establishment with great staff. I highly recommend you give this hotel a chance to impress you.
Manager Response: Dear D9990IFbrianb,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to earning a 5-star rating on your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: + Comfort - room was excellent + Location - safe and well connected with the roads. Good parking facility but expensive - Restaurant inside - Only 1 person manning reception which delays the check-in process alot - When someone is coming to the resort, there is no provision to park. The person will end up holding traffic to park till the check-in is conducted
Manager Response: Dear Dpsdsn,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the hotel are much appreciated.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and we have discussed our staffing levels.  It is uncommon for us to only have one person at the desk but we are going to work harder to ensure this doesn’t happen moving forward.  Thanks again for your feedback.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great location for business travel (very close to Orange County airport; plenty of places to eat within easy walking distance).  Super friendly staff, especially in the restaurant and bar!
Manager Response: Dear 81earled,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, restaurant, and bar are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The room was very clean and neat, the staff was fantastic, friendly and knowledgeable, Loved the fact their was a shuttle to where ever we needed to be. and fast and polite. drivers.
Manager Response: Dear 173virginiaj,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the complimentary shuttle serve are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: My 2 complaints, #1 charging me to park my cars, thats not...
Summary: My 2 complaints, #1 charging me to park my cars, thats not right. #2 bathrooms have no exhaust fans.
Manager Response: Dear 271aranb,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us.  I am sorry to hear that you were not fully satisfied with your stay.  Though I can understand your frustration with paying for parking, these fees are consistent with other full-service hotels located in the airport area.  I hope that your travels bring you back to Irvine again and that you’ll allow us the opportunity to earn a better rating form you soon.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had the opportunity to use the Wyndham and their catering staff for a family event.  I couldn't be more complimentary and appreciative of the job they did.  From the moment we entered the lobby of the hotel, there were a couple of hosts who were right there to direct us to the elevators and the ballroom.  The food was very well done -- selection was just right.  The servers did a very nice job.  We had just come from a large memorial service and emotions were high and the servers did a great job of being there if you needed their assistance but not "being seen or in the way" if they weren't needed and the family was just needing to be together.  The manager was super nice and helpful to my daughter in particular and I wish I had gotten his name.
Manager Response: Dear Mommasavannah,  Thank you for your kind review.  Though I regret the reason our services were required, I am happy to hear that my team was able to provide your group with a positive experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice place, great value, caring staff
Summary: Clean comfortable and sincere staff Hector Hernandez in bar, see him for quality attentive sincere service. Thank you Hector! MY REVIEW MUST BE 200 characters, really!!!! SOMETIMES LESS IS MORE  DAH DAH DAH 205 characters...happy now
Manager Response: Dear Clayton W C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I apologize that for the 200 character minimum is on place but it does help ensure we get the feedback we require to effectively improve our services.  I appreciate you adding enough verbiage to make your review qualify.  Thank you as well for taking the time to recognize Hector.  I will be sure to share your kind words with him and with the rest of my team.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I love everything about the hotel. The only Hong I don't like is paying daily for parking and then there's no where to park. To many time they run out of parking spaces if you get back late at night.
Manager Response: Dear Mcem2001,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am happy to hear you loved everything about the hotel.  I do apologize for any issues you experienced with parking.  Though we have had a few events recently that have resulted in a full parking lot, we typically have plenty of space to accommodate all of our guests.  Again, my apologies for any inconvenience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The beds in the room was uncomfortable. They sank in on both sides. Just terrible. I didn't get a good night rest. Also my room was on the side near the 405 freeway which was loud. The front desk person should always ask the customers if they would be satisfied with having a room near the freeway. It was annoying and kept me awake most of the night.
Manager Response: Dear 406ethelj,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the bed in your guest room.  This is not the typical response that we get about our beds, but I certainly understand how an uncomfortable bed can make for a miserable night.  The beds we offer are custom made for Wyndham and we regularly receive praise for their comfort.  Again, I apologize that they did not meet your expectation.  I also apologize for any inconvenience you experienced being on the freeway side of the building.  Should you decide to stay with us again, we would be happy to block a room on the opposite side of the building.  Though freeway noise is very rarely an issue for our guests, we would like to do all we can to make sure you are happy.  Thanks again for your feedback.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff does not clean the room well everyday, crumbs were on the sofa and carpet after cleaning. During my 9 day stay they replaced the ice bag only once. Internet were cut off more than once for over a hour.
Manager Response: Dear Wkit33,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with the cleaning of your room and with the Internet.  I have shared your review with my Director of Housekeeping and with my Director of Engineering and required that both issues be addressed immediately.  We pride ourselves on providing our guests with a very clean product and I commit to you that this will be discussed with all our housekeeping staff.  We will also make sure to address any issues with our complimentary WiFi service.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: A beautiful room - clean and comfy.  Great night's sleep - I would stay there again and recommend it whole heartedly.
Manager Response: Dear Suechology,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel are much appreciated.  It’s great to hear that you would recommend our hotel  I hope we have the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star stay soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Here on a soccer tournament and the Hotel was in a great location close to everything.  Daniel was full of information and was great help.  The breakfast and the staff were exellent.  Thank you for making this an easy and great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Francisco I,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Daniel are much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with my entire team.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good stay for a quick trip to Irvine for a graduation at UCI. Comfy beds, big bathrooms, clean accommodations and free wifi. Conveniently close to airport--they provide a free shuttle to and from airport. Folks took advantage of Indoor pool and jacuzzi; small but serviceable. Didn't try the restaurant but they do have a lobby bar with a daily Happy Hour and $5 drinks. In the middle of very office park-y area so not much to walk to. However there's a Specialty's Cafe with a Peet's Coffee right across the street, which was great. Located near freeway which made it easy to get around.
Manager Response: Dear May E,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to enjoy some of our hotel and local area amenities.  I hope your travels bring you back our way again.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Went for nephew's wedding in Huntington Beach.  Great location, close to everything, quiet on weekends since it is in the business district which was nice.  Will stay again as we have family in HB.
Manager Response: Dear 688cathit,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and even happier to hear that you plan to return in the future.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Just have to comment on the cleanliness and the comfort of the room. The bed is soft on top yet firm. The bathroom shined. Thanks Juana. We also just returned from a great lunch. My wife had the Kobe Burger and of course it melted in your mouth. I had the California Chicken sandwich it also was wonderful. Special Thanks to Ana Cruz and Jose in the restaurant. Your next stay in Irvine should be at The Wyndham. You will not be sorry.
Manager Response: Dear Mike35394,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Juana, Ana, and Jose are much appreciated. I will be sure to share your review with them and with the rest of my team.  We all look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We missed the last flight to our destination and stayed here for the night. Very close to John Wayne Airport and the have shuttle service within 3 miles of their Hotel, Shuttle driver Chris was very helpful and knowledgeable. we ate at a restaurant near-by  that the hotel provided a list of options. Only drawback was the noisy rooms, we could here everything coming from the adjoining rooms
Manager Response: Dear Troy A,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you selecting our hotel for this unexpected stay in Irvine.  I’m happy to hear that Chris and the rest of the team took such good care of you.  I do apologize for any noise issues you experienced.  I hope this did not prevent you from getting a good night’s rest.  Should you find yourself back in Irvine, we hope that we’ll have the opportunity to welcome you back.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The room was nice and large, but lacked a refrigerator.  The rooms air conditioner had trouble cooling the room even though it was only 78 degrees outside.  I think this was because the hallways were very warm.  I asked the front desk why the hallways were not cooler and she said they were set to 76 degrees. It was more like 82 or 84 degrees. I do not understand why some hotels do not cool there hallways more, stop being cheap people! The bathroom was large but was a little dilapidated with paint peeling off the tile. Yes, they did paint the tile instead of replacing them in there last renovation. :(  The hotels location was great and close to many things.
Manager Response: Dear Csteets,  Thank you for your review.  Your feedback is important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to provide it.  I am sorry for any inconvenience you experienced with the air conditioning.  We do have air conditioning in all of our hallways so I regret that this was an issue for you.  I have shared your review with my Director of Engineering and he has inspected all of our AC unites to ensure they are functioning properly.  I am happy to hear our location worked so well for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The 1st day of my stay I had to ask for soap because there weren't any in there. 2nd day of my stay I had to ask for face towel. Other then that my stay was great.
Manager Response: Dear 260timothyt,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind review.  I am sorry for the lapses in providing you with the basic amenities of soap and face towels.  This is certainly not typical for our hotel.  I have shared your review with my Executive Housekeeper and he has conducted some additional training with our team to ensure all rooms have the appropriate amenities.  Thanks again for the feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good location, even though it's close to the airport we never heard a plane flying over. Comfortable beds. The pool was freezing though.
Manager Response: Dear D7caldwell,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that the pool was freezing.  I have shared your review with my Director of Engineering and we’ve verified that the pool heater is working.  I’m not sure what happened during your stay, but I am pleased to inform you that the pool is currently being heated to a very comfortable temperature.  I hope your travels bring you back our way.  We look forward to earning a 5-star rating for your nest stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Checked into the Irvine Wyndham and was warmly greeted by Daniel. It was so refreshing, after a long day, to be met with genuine attention and kindness. Our room was very nice and we enjoyed the happy hour. Hotel is located close to the airport. I would recommend this hotel. The van service was right on time. An excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear Butlersgift,  Thank you for the very kind review!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that Daniel was able to provide you with such great service.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My experience is always nice when I stay here. Great customer service. Bobby at the valet is very good at his job and helped me out a lot during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear 112natasha,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to share your feedback on Bobby!  I will be sure to share your review with Bobby and the rest of my team.  Thanks again!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel was very comfortable and the bed and pillows were insane!  Never had a bed and pillow as comfortable in a hotel. No negatives except maybe the bar staff could be a little more friendly. Felt like they thought they were doing us a favor. Everything else was top notch. Definitely staying there again when I'm in town.
Manager Response: Dear 74kennethp.  Thank you for the kind review!  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed the bed and pillows at the hotel and that you felt your stay was top notch.  I’ve shared your comments about bar staff with my restaurant owner and we’ll be meeting with our bar staff to ensure they step up the service.  Thanks for the feedback.  We look forward to your next stay and to providing you with a 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were there at this hotel over Memorial Day weekend for a soccer tournament. The hotel was filled with many teenagers as groups/teams of other tournaments were staying there as well. Yet, it was surprisingly quiet. The beds were very comfortable. The location is great - it was easy to get to the venues and the beach. On a note: rooms do not have a fridge or microwave.
Manager Response: Dear 231sabinec,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope that you’ll have the opportunity to return soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I normally don't sleep at least the first night in a hotel or a strange bed. However, I slept like a baby and a very comfortable bed. The room was clean with plenty of towels,  and a good value.
Manager Response: Dear 5Andrina,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to get a good night’s sleep.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with another great stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had a 150 people company conference recently at this hotel.  It was a wonderful experience from begin to end.  Corrynne Santana was absolutely great in handling everything and making sure that we had a successful event.  Special Thanks go to the Banquet Manager, Marilu and her staff who did an awesome job of handling, setting and organizing the food.  I have had nothing but good comments from all the attendees including the food which was great.  Thank you to front desk staff for handling the reservations and parking so efficiently.  Thank you to other lobby staff who were always willing to lend a helping hand.  A special Thanks to Shuttle Drivers who brought folks from airport and took them in a timely manner.  Great experience over all.
Manager Response: Dear Mydada2,  Thank you for bringing your event to our hotel and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am so happy to hear that your event went so well.  Your kind comments about the staff and the hotel are much appreciated.  Thank you, as well, for calling out the great service you received from Corrynne and Marilu.  I will be sure to share your feedback with them and with the rest of my team.  We look forward to welcoming your group back soon and to providing you with another successful event.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Rooms are great..  Location is perfect for both work and airport accessibility.  Food is really good and the bar is open early and stays open late at night.   I consistently stay here whenever I come to orange county.
Manager Response: Dear Bergdana,  Thank you for making Wyndham Irvine your preferred hotel in Irvine and for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the bar are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Parking is $18 dollars per day on top of hotel charge.For that amount you could easily upgrade to a nicer hotel.I was charged for 3 nights of parking even though I only used parking facility 1 day.The place is old and the rooms are run down.If your lucky you will get a quiet room.A lot of people party there on weekends in rooms so it tends to be loud.Their restaurant makes Denny's look good.The bathroom had plumbing problems and was obviously not fixed properly.
Manager Response: Dear 834d,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry for your experience with us.  I would love the opportunity to discuss you stay in further detail and to correct any billing errors that may have occurred with the parking fees.  Please feel free to message me directly if this has not already been resolved.  I have shared your review with my team.  We are committed to learning from you feedback and to providing you with a 5-star stay should you provide us with another chance in the future.     Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights for a business seminar and they were great, picked us up at the airport, drove us back and forth to the seminar which was at another hotel which saved us money on cab rides.  Great staff and the whole facility was very clean and comfortable.  We even got a continental breakfast two of the 4 days, but was not around when they were having their cocktail hour.  Would come back again.
Manager Response: Dear Davis E,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service and the Executive Lounge.  It’s great to know that you would choose our hotel again.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were returning home and decided to stay in Irvine overnight. We made our reservation on our phone at Wyndham Irvine.We were greeted at the front desk by Daniel. He cheerfully welcomed us and made us feel at home.He put us in a great clean room.I couldn't be more pleased with our stay.The next time I'm in Orange County I plan to stay at Wyndham Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Martymilo,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you’re in Irvine.  Thank you as well for taking the time to provide your feedback about Daniel.  I will be sure to share your kind words with him and with the rest of my team.   Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: You can't get much more convenient to John Wayne airport than this. Must hotels that are this close to the airport, are noisy, but this one is not. Nice clean rooms, in a facility in the business district. Within walking distance of many of the major banks. Good restaurant with basic menu. Free shuttle. 5 minute ride. Ac system that you can actually regulate was most appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Scwaterfalls,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that our location and many amenities worked so well for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great front desk service and clean room. Love our stay. This is our second time here and this second time is better than the first. Always getting better. We also got a great deal for getting the rewards program. If u are a frequent visitor and or traveler I suggest u get it. It saves u on the parking and gets u some free breakfast and a small gift. I have nothing bad to say about this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Anabla1,  Thank you for the great 5-srat review!  We appreciate being your hotel of choice in Irvine and are excited to hear that your second stay was even better than your first.  We look forward to many future stays and to providing you with more 5-star service!    Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Booked executive room, which had nothing special or extra then Thor regular room. Sink would drain slow, took 45 min for someone to come & take a look. Was not able to fix it right way so had to ask him to leave but just leaving the sink whole open.
Manager Response: Dear Shweta S,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  I have shared your review with my Director of Engineering.  Our goal is to provide all guests with a 5-star experience and this should have been taken into account when the maintenance was being done in your room.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced and hope that you will try us again in the future.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had a great time as honeymooners at the Wyndham hotel, orange county. The provided services was more than perfect! workers are very kind, helpful and nice. Mr. Sofiane, Mr.hani and Mr. Bobby were very kind and outgoing, they helped us a lot with many things. They also suggested beautiful places to visit. The hotel in general is nice, clean and decent.
Manager Response: Dear Lubnaalhamad,  Congratulations on your marriage!  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about our staff members are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a 3 night stay at the hotel and overall was very positive.  Staff was very accommodating.   Shuttle service (free) available to take you any place within 3 miles.
Manager Response: Dear KathleensP6038BB,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear you positive stay with us and that the staff and complimentary shuttle service help make your stay enjoyable.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for many different directions..
Summary: They have been renovated a few years ago so inside is pretty much brand new and nice decors. But, not much else you can expect..   The hotel location is awesome! Close to JWA, freeways that goes north, south, east, and beaches and shopping malls. Yes, this location for travelers who has rent-a-car for sure! But if you do, you can go get some pretty good food near by at the Diamond Jamboree :)
Manager Response: Dear Da Y,  Thank you for the kind review.  It’s great to hear that our location worked so well for you.  We find that our proximity to dining, shopping, and all the major Orange County attractions is a great draw for our customers. For those without a rental car, our complimentary local area shuttle is a great alternative and can provide guests with transportation to a number of locations – including the Diamond Jamboree shopping center.  Thanks again for your review.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Customer service is first class with Andrew working the front desk
Summary: Right away last night when we walk in to check in, Andrew, greeted us with a friendly smile and honestly made us feel so welcomed and hooked us up big time by upgrading us to the executive floor where there is a free breakfast and automatically asked if we wanted a late check out since we were checking in at almost midnight. First class service Andrew, keep doing a great job and soon enough you'll be running this place. Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear Alexa B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Andrew for his first class service!  It’s great to hear about Andrew’s proactive approach to ensuring you enjoyed your stay with us.  I will be sharing you review with my entire team and we will be sure to thank Andrew for taking such great care of you.  Thanks again for your review!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Delivers as promised for a Wyndham with friendly staff but nothing especially memorable about this hotel. Comfortable king bed, all the basic bed/bath amenities you would expect, tub bath (not walk-in shower). Sound insulation between rooms could be better.   The 14th floor has a small dining room with TV. Good for continental (not full) breakfast.  Very convenient to airport.
Manager Response: Dear Spencerusa,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am happy to hear that the hotel met your expectations and that you found us to be a convenient option for you.  I am happy to hear you were able to take advantage of the Executive Lounge on the 14th floor.  I hope your travel bring you back our way and that you allow us the opportunity to serve you again soon.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff was extraordinary; especially the concierge and front office staff. Concierge gave me perfect instructions to UCI and the front office team let my son take a shower after his lacrosse tournament. Very accomodating!!!
Manager Response: Dear 260phyllisj,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the concierge and front desk staff are much appreciated.  It’s great to know that our team was able to provide you with such an excellent stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wyndham Irvine is a great hotel.   Bobby was extremely helpful and kind . I do HIGHLY  Recommend staying here because this hotel easily is a High Five (5) Star I must add..... our boys are extremely thrilled about the indoor pool :)
Manager Response: Dear Elvia M,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Bobby and the hotel are much appreciated.  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that your boys enjoyed the indoor pool.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star stay!      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Marilu was a wonderful hostess for our music group meeting
Summary: Wonderful service from Marilu in food service and and attractive hotel.  The location was very convenient and will be happy to stay there again.  Things were clean and easy to find.      We will stay there for years to come I hope when we have our annual meetings
Manager Response: Dear Mtucker28028,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Marilu for her service!  We truly enjoyed having your group with us and look forward to welcoming you back next year.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Located close to the airport and business buildings in the area. The Wyndam Irvine Hotel is a great place to stay. The rooms were decent size and the bed was very comfortable. There is a restaurant and bar on site and and conference rooms for meetings. Staff is ok but didn't go out of their way to help me when i misplaced my phone. I asked them to call it and see if it was someplace i put it. When I went down to check they said they called but when I found my phone there was no phone call from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Gordon Y,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am sorry to hear that my team did not do more to assist you with your lost phone.  I will be sharing your review with my team and we will use it as an opportunity to improve our guest service skills.  I hope that you’ll visit us again soon.  We look forward to earning a 5-star review for your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham was nice, but not exceptional.  We had trouble with the TV.  It would often briefly pause. Its biggest asset is the closeness to the Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Roland450,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry for the issues you experienced with the TV.  I hope this issue was brought to my team’s attention and that they were able to correct it for you.  I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you’ll be willing to give us another try.  We look forward to providing you with a 5-stra stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager
