Summary: I stayed in whndham irvine 4 nights and it was great time ,and I enjoy my stay because one of the staff he is HENY  help me alot and  because of him i love wyndham. Any time i will in irvine i will stay at this hotel for sure and i hope to fined HENY every time . Thank you HENY
Manager Response: Dear Abo0ods,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Heny are much appreciated. I will be sure to share your review with Henry and the rest of my team.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My first attempt to stay at the Wyndham in Irvine didn't go as planned, with my family in tow and after 4:00pm arrival, we were turned away due to a reservation error. My disappointment was compounded by the alternative motel found so late in the evening, horrifying comes to mind. Once we returned home and I was able to reach out to the General Manager at the Wyndham... Well to say that I was pleasantly surprised is an understatement, I provided all the details via email so the Manager could verify, then he called me direct to discuss his findings and how he wanted to make it right for my family and I. Clearly, Wyndham Hotels and specifically in Irvine, CA is a wonderful hotel. Yes, they made a mistake but they went the extra mile to make it right and get me to come back and
Manager Response: Dear Robert W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review.  And an even bigger THANK YOU for allowing us the opportunity to make things right!  I truly regret your initial interaction with my hotel.  Our goal is to always provide guests with a great experience and I know that we fell well short of doing that for you.  Your willingness to give us another shot is very much appreciated.  I am thrilled to hear that we were able to redeem ourselves and that we have earned the place as your choice hotel in Irvine!  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Ms. Amanda Gomez provided my wife and I Rock Star customer service!  She was very friendly and accommodating for our one night stay. Ms.Gomez went above and beyond our expectations by assisting us with not only our belongings but keeping our perishable goods from going bad. She went to great lengths to follow up with my wife and I regarding our thoughts on the overall hotel service. I am very proud to rate a 5/5! My suggestion to those planning to stay at Wyndham In Irvine is to ask for Amanda at the front desk!!! She is relentless in her effort to exceed your needs, with a personal touch that's second to none. I look forward to my next enjoyable and memorable stay at the Wyndham :)
Manager Response: Dear Michael W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Amanda for her rock star service!  I am so happy to hear that she was able to create such a great experience for you.  Like you, we all look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Excellent Service at check in and check out. Very friendly employees made me feel welcome since the moment they receive me with a very beautiful smile ..................................................
Manager Response: Dear Andrea I,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Compare the price to ordering pizza hut pizza, wings and breads ticks is a st about the same as ordering a pizza from room service. I also got the Thai lettuce wraps it was a good deal😆 suprizingly.
Manager Response: Dear 349janelll,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed the room service and hope the rest of your stay was just as enjoyable.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and to providing you with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Bobby provided us great customer service! Very friendly individual and helped my boyfriend and I since day one. We had breakfast Friday morning and it was delicious, the omelets are to die for! Stayed for 2 days and had an overall great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Jromo22,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Bobby and the restaurant are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was at the hotel for 6 different days and the experience was amazing! it was my first time here and I felt like I was at home, I want to give a huge shout out to Bobby. His customer Service is outstanding, he welcomed me the first day and every question I had during my stay he was able to help me with every single one of them. I will definitely come back.!
Manager Response: Dear Jiovanny L,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Bobby for his outstanding service!  I am very happy to her that he was able to help create such a positive experience for you here at the Wyndham Irvine.  We all look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff were really friendly and accommodating for our monthly meeting!  Very easy to work with especially with several onsite changes.  Location was easy to get to for many of our attendees.  Would highly recommend this venue.
Manager Response: Dear Christine S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that your monthly meeting went so well and that you would highly recommend us.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your next event and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Some Good - Some not so good
Summary: Spent two nights there. Well located and convenient. Food was actually very good (I had breakfast on day (menu) and lunch the next day (menu also). The buffet looked very poor and unappetizing....so glad I ordered off menu.  When I drove up at check in, no one approached car to welcome or offer valet despite there being two employees about 10 feet away have their own conservation. Very poor first impression.  Room was very large and spacious.  Internet was poor and check in slow.
Manager Response: Dear RW4321,  Thank you for the review.  We appreciate your honest feedback and are committed to using your comments as an opportunity to improve.  I apologize for your experience with our bellmen, the Internet access, and the check-in process.  I have shared your review with my management team and we are taking appropriate actions to ensure your next stay with us is a 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome Front Desk, Conceirge and Room Service Staff
Summary: I have been staying here weekly for the last 4 months. From checking in with Karan to Ross in the Conceirge lounge and Ann in Room Service their customer service is impeccable. Addressing my by name each time I access them for service to just being overall genuine friendly people make my stay so pleasant each week.
Manager Response: Dear Mmurray861,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Karan, Ross, and Ann for their service!  We truly appreciate being your hotel of choice over the last four months and look forward to welcoming you back many times in the future!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel a little out of the way.
Summary: Nice room, comfortable accomodations. We were able to check in around 11am which was really nice since we were there for a swim meet in OC. They also gave us a later check out. The only negative is the $18 parking fee.
Manager Response: Dear Logandf,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comment about the accommodations is much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with another great 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed for 2 nights (Friday & Saturday nights) and very much enjoyed this hotel! I felt like I was in a much higher priced hotel room due to all this property's upgrades and attention to detail. Can't wait to have an excuse to return! Although, this hotel was across the street from the SNA airport, I was not disturbed in the least! - Roger
Manager Response: Dear Rogerf41,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that you had a wonderful stay and, like you, we look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Employees were friendly and welcoming, and the room was clean and comfortable. Even though the bar was being remodeled, Happy Hour was still available. Unfortunately the staff in the bar wasn't AS pleasant as the desk and concierge, but no complaints.... the kids loved the pool and our single night there was great!
Manager Response: Dear R6335CNandreab,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We truly appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that our bar staff wasn’t as pleasant as the rest of our team.  I have shared your comment with our restaurant / bar manager and we will be sure to address our service levels immediately.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Nice and clean comfortable and quiet ....Staff was helpful and friendly... Thank you Daniel for making our Anniversary even better..... happy hour food and drinks were actually happy hour prices so good valve and service in the bar was great
Manager Response: Dear Debbie H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Daniel for his friendly service.  Your kind comments are much appreciated and will be shared with our entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Happy Anniversary,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel was fabulous, food was good. gym and pool very nice. The area was very nice. I called hotel before booking my transportation to ensure the shuttle could pick me up.  As it turns out they do not pick up Irvine but staff was not trained to know this and after 40 minutes and 3 calls I was told this and that I would need to take a taxi.  Having said this and how upset I was with ill informed staff the Manager Karan did pay for my taxi to the hotel , but I still had to get back to Irvine train station in a taxi, My thoughts are that this staff should know where their shuttle goes and if it does not go someplace they should give options they should seem to want to help, not be dismissive as Francesca was with me.  Karan did apologize and the clerk that was helping me was very
Manager Response: Dear Debbie S,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  I am very sorry for the incorrect information that as provided to you regarding the shuttle service.  Karan shared your situation with us and we have completed some additional training with our guest services staff to ensure they are all aware of where our shuttle does and does not go.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and providing us the opportunity to address the issue. We look forward to seeing you back soon and to providing you with another 5-star stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I always stay at the Wyndham when traveling to Orange County. The staff members are extremely "customer centric" and strive to exceed my expectations. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JohnlG193TT,  Thank you for the great 5-srat review and for making Wyndham Irvine your hotel of choice when traveling to Orange County!  Your kind comments and your recommendation are much appreciated!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Bobby is the best, he made me feel like i was at home, i have stayed at a lot of hotels. i wish i could bring bobby everywhere i go. he is so incredible, one time he came to pick me up and before i came out bobby was at the front door, He is like family. i have told all my friends about him. the service is fabulous.I have a interior design business i wish i had 100 people like him. I just want to say thank you Bobby, your the best, God bless you bobby
Manager Response: Dear Starchild2015,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for talking the time to share your feedback on our associate, Bobby.  It’s wonderful to hear how Bobby was able to create such a positive experience for you during your stay with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to providing you with another great 50-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Marilu and the entire banquet staff at the Wyndham did a wonderful job with our full day company meeting.  Everything we needed was provided and they were very flexible with changes made.  They were attentive and accessible. They took care of everything from parking on up.
Manager Response: Dear Ohmarysummer,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Marilu and the banquets staff are much appreciated.  We enjoyed having you program at our hotel and look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My room was great, nice and clean. Get two free water bottles and wi-fi included. They have robes with disposable slippers you can use so you don't walk on the carpet/floor barefooted. Overall, experience was good and I liked that it's tucked away in a business park, but you can still walk to nearby restaurants. The onsite restaurant is good too.
Manager Response: Dear 517jasmines,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of the many amenities the hotel has to offer and that you were able to enjoy the convenience of the many restaurants in the area.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: There was a little trouble checking after business hours in using a company credit card. So my stay was reduced by one night.  Yes, I had to leave and return the next day during business hours.  The room was wonderful and my stay was pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear 121kdk,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am very sorry about the issue you experienced during the check-in process but happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I will be following up with my team to try to better understand what happened with your reservation and will make every effort to ensure future check-ins go more smoothly.  Again, I apologize for any inconvenience caused by the hotel.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We held a multi-day training conference at the Wyndham Irvine. I cannot say enough about the incredible accommodations, food, meeting rooms and the service! Corrynne met all of our needs relative to arranging the logistics beforehand. During our meetings, Marilu and her staff were like angels meeting our every wish and need. We didn't have to ask twice for anything and in most instances, they anticipated our needs! We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Michaelen2016,  Thank you for holding your conference with us and for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Corrynne, Marilu, and the hotel are much appreciated.  We are excited to hear that you’ll be back.  We all look forward to your return and to providing you with another great conference!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My organization came to the Wyndham Irvine for meetings and a conference. The staff was very responsive and accommodating. Although I didn't take advantage of this, I was impressed that the hotel had a shuttle service to the malls. The shuttle to and from the airport was on time, and the drivers were very helpful.  A group of us had dinner at the restaurant and was served by a most cheerful waitperson - her smile was like sunshine.  I had the short ribs tacos which was delicious. Two of my colleagues had saladas which they both said were excellent. The catered food for our meetings, although good, could use some creativity or more taste or something. The meeting attendees were appreciative of the healthy choices like Odwalla juice, hummus and sorbet.
Manager Response: Dear ElainewS2239KY,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It was our pleasure to have you and your organization with us and I am happy to hear that your event was such a success.  Your kind comments about the hotel, the services, and the restaurant are much appreciated and will be shared with my entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: great hotel and location staff was incredible
Summary: I was only there for two nights and they hotel was clean and beautiful the staff was very helpful and friendly. I took a couple of trips to other places in ca with Bobby he was very kind and courteous and went out of his way to make me feel comfortable and for someone traveling alone that can make your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Donna K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Bobby and the rest of the staff are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear Bobby made you feel comfortable with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, great service, great food, great staff!
Summary: Loved the staff, all were friendly and accommodating! Tiffany and Bobby were especially helpful. Love the Thai lettuce wraps and many of the room service/restaurant selections! There is free shuttle service to any location within 3 miles of the hotel which is very convenient. Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Calgirl333,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Tiffany and Bobby for their great service!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and the restaurant and we all look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very friendly staff nice location comfy rooms indoor pool lots of activities for kids free shuttle service overall great experience
Manager Response: Dear Sherry M,  Thank you for the kind review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to earning a 5-star rating on your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I worked with the hotel banquet staff to coordinate meals for a mandatory training. Our group consisted of about 80 attendees on day 1 and 45 attendees on days 2 & 3. The service was excellent, the food was good and the prices were reasonable.  Thank you Marilu B. & staff!
Manager Response: Dear Hicap,  Thank you for holding your event at our hotel and for taking the time to share your experience with us!  We are happy to hear that your event went so well.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments with Marilu and the rest of my team.  We all look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel was great. Very close to the airport and still had a convenient shuttle. Rooms were very clean and modern, and included two free bottles of water with check-in. Food at the restaurant downstairs was pretty good, though typical hotel prices.
Manager Response: Dear EmilybI1196DJ,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the restaurant are much appreciated.  I hope you travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My partner found this hotel via priceline. We stayed here on 4/9/16, on the 4th floor/Rm. 410. We only stayed one night and didn't leave our room; therefore, we did not explore the grounds.   Check-in was quick and painless. The staff at the check-in desk were professional and very helpful. During check-in the staff actually informed us that the parking fee could be decreased from $18/night to $10/night, by joining their free rewards program.  I really like and appreciate that the room was VERY clean. We must have gotten one of the renovated rooms because the carpet was very clean and everything looked new, no wear and tear on anything, EXCEPT, the A/C.   Our room had a king size bed and was quite comfortable. The closet door is an accordion style mirrored door. The television
Manager Response: Dear Azthdiva,  Thank you for the very thorough review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you would select our hotel again for a future stay.  I do apologize for the experience you had with the AC unit.  I have shared your review with my engineering department and they will be addressing the issue immediately.  Please keep in mind that the hotel does have mini-fridges available for our guests for a nominal delivery fee.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Even though part of lobby was under construction,everything was organized for hotel guests convenient.
Manager Response: Dear 1johnnyy,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am pleased to inform you that the renovation of our restaurant and bar are nearly completed.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back and to earning a 5-star rating on your next stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff and facility are top notch. I recommend facility to all. Our visiting customers are always in good hands at the Wyndham Newport/Irvine facility.
Manager Response: Dear BrianbK512HW,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We are thrilled to be your hotel of choice when bringing travelers to the area and we look forward to welcoming you and your guests back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel, very convenient. Close to airport & freeways.  Rooms comfortable, beds led to-excellent sleep. Restaurant is delicious, despite larger portion being under  remodeling. Lovely pool & fitness center. Staff are helpful & knowledgable.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca P,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the restaurant are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Had a 6 floor double room. Very quiet and nice view.  Wanted for nothing. Free bottled water in the room along with a coffee/tea maker. Breakfast buffet was excellent.  Lots of options.  Their main restaurant was closed for remodeling but the bar was open and you could still order anything on the menu from the kitchen.  The evening I arrived  I was checked in very quickly by friendly front desk staff. Check out was simple  at the desk but would have preferred the bill under the door method.  Overall, it was a very nice experience, well located if you want to go for a morning or evening walk.  Will stay again. Free internet, plenty fast.
Manager Response: Dear TCBJ36Yrs,  Thank you for the very kind review.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: When it takes 2 calls and 40 minutes to get a shuttle for a 10 minute ride, there's a problem. With restaurant remodel under way parts of the lobby were filthy.
Manager Response: Dear David E,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry for any inconvenience you experienced with our complimentary shuttle service.  We do our best to provide all of our guests with a local transportation when they request it; however, there are times where the demand inhibits our ability to immediately accommodate some requests.  At these times, we do our best to meet our guests’ requests at the earliest possible time.  I hope that the rest of your stay was enjoyable and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you’re I the area.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The beds were very comfortable and I loved how insulated the rooms were.  It was a very quite hotel.  Not to mention an extremely knowledgable and friendly staff.  Daniel Perdomo was at the front desk when I checked in and went out of his way to help me know about near by services and make sure I had everything I needed.
Manager Response: Dear Jaredfergi,  Thank you for the very kind review and for taking the time to recognize Daniel for his service.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was lovely. Only 2 complaints: the ironing board was broken, and we were not given the room originally promised.. But this was resolved quickly..
Manager Response: Dear Bryanr584,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am sorry to hear that there were some hiccups during your stay but happy to hear my team was able to correct these issues quickly and to your satisfaction.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at other hotels in the area and was not that impressed with this one. Parking was $18, maybe I've just been lucky but I frequent this area and there are definitely nicer hotels where you don't have to pay a parking charge. The building Itself is old. All of the ac units were really old and loud. We complained about the one in the room next to us because it was making a louder than usual noise. They came and fixed it but we still heard others. Maybe an upgrade is in order. We booked on Hotwire and got a good deal but that was erased by the parking. Also the Hotwire deal books a single queen bed room and we asked if we could change to a king bed or even a room on the opposite side of the building so we wouldn't hear the freeway and we were told there were no other
Manager Response: Dear Alison f,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry that our hotel did not meet or exceed your expectations.  Your review has been discussed with my management team and appropriate action is being taken to address the issues you experienced with the AC units.  I also apologize that we were unable to accommodate your room request.  It is our policy to accommodate any requests when our inventory allows.  In this situation, it appears we did not have options to provide to you.  Again, I am sorry we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Room was clean, accommodations were average i.e, no instructions for alarm clock; could not reset time or change alarm options to radio. Shower head and stem pipe were loose. Paid parking for $18.00 a day was a little steep.
Manager Response: Dear Alica a,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the alarm clock and the loose shower head.  I have shared your review with my team  We are committed to providing all of our guests with the best experience and will use your feedback in an effort to improve.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Overall, I enjoyed my stay but a few things I need to bring to your attention. #1 When I made my reservation I was not informed of your parking fee of $18.00 a day #2 Some of our towels had rust spots on them- perhaps those should be taken out of rotation and #3?upon self check out in the room when it instructs you to leave your room key it should instruct you to press the service button on the key pad to exit the parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Ingridr541,  Thank you for your review.  We truly appreciate your feedback and will be taking the appropriate actions to address your points.  We hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to earning a 5-star rating from you on your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Pleasant staff, clean and comfortable room.  Easy access to various locations.  I had a late end of the day snack at restaurant .  Food was actually pretty good.  Next business trip, I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 263shirleya,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the staff and the restaurant are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next trip and to providing you with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My room was very comfortable.  The AC wasn't cold enough so it got a bit warm by mid day.  The environment was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Tamdatan,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for the feedback on the AC.  Our engineering team regularly performs maintenance on these units and we will do our best to correct this issue.  If you are able to let us know which room you were in by sending me a message, it would be greatly appreciated.  Again, thank you for the feedback.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The AC in room 524 was not working correctly, set the AC at...
Summary: The AC in room 524 was not working correctly, set the AC at 65 and the temp in the room stayed at 77
Manager Response: Dear Suzannef283,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  I apologize for the issue you experienced with the AC.  Your review has been forwarded to my maintenance department and the AC issue has been addressed.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: For the most part everything was good.  Clean, food was very good.  The phone by the bed didn't work.  They fixed it.  The phone on the desk didn't have the room service button working correctly, it always had a busy dial tone.  Had to call operator to transfer each time. Workout room was always full.
Manager Response: Dear T4317YTpatrickg,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize for the issues you had with the phones and appreciate you bringing them to our attention.  Your feedback is valuable to us and your review has been shared with my team.  We all look forward to your next visit and to earning a 5-star review from you soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We LOVE this hotel and will always stay here when ever we are in town.  Sofiane, Karan and the rest of the team went out of their way to make us feel at home. Rooms are clean, very comfortable, easy access, great views, and a staff that well understands taking care of the customer.
Manager Response: Dear 793ramonc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for your very kind comments about Sofiane and Karan.  It’s great to know that we’ve earned the privilege to be your hotel of choice in Irvine.  We all look forward to your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: very good hotel.  But need access to Coffee for first bus pax to airport. most other airport hotels provide it
Manager Response: Dear TWAPilot01,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your feedback about early morning coffee is appreciated.  The hotel does provide complimentary coffee in their guest rooms for those guests that need to depart prior to our restaurant opening.  With that said, we will discuss your feedback to determine if there are other options we can offer moving forward.  Thanks again for your feedback.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great rooms with new renovations. Overall great service from staff. Only inconvenience was the billing error. The room was charged to my credit card when it was processed as a direct bill to my company. The issue was reversed, however, required two follow up calls from me.
Manager Response: Dear Robertz183,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am sorry for the inconvenience you experienced with the billing.  We regret when issues like this happen and I apologize that you had to make multiple calls to resolve it, but I am happy to hear it was corrected.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to earning another 5-star review form you the next time you’re in town.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham is within walking distance of my Irvine office, so that gets plenty of points from me.  Beds are comfy, rooms are quiet, and the top floor ammenities are fine.  It's close to the airport, but you do need to call to have the hotel shuttle pick you up
Manager Response: Dear ChalkmanSf,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate your staying with us and talking the time to share your feedback.  It’s great to know that we’re in such a convenient location for you and that you’ve enjoyed your stays with us. We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a great location
Summary: Unfortunately I did not have enough time to enjoy all that this hotel has to offer but I was very impressed with my short visit.  Huge facility.  Very clean and excellent staff.  Look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your short stay with us.  Like you, we also look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very convenient to John Wayne Airport... Overall good property If you have a very early flight you may have to take a cab
Manager Response: Dear 957russelld,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay though I am surprised to hear you required a taxi to get you to the airport.  The hotel’s complimentary shuttle starts at 5:30AM daily and should be early enough to get guests to the airport for any departure.  I apologize if for some reason a shuttle was not available for you the morning you departed.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Overall a positive experience. The facilities were clean and not worn out. The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear JeffxZ6442DH,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear you had a positive experience with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: From making the reservation, to checking in, staying and then checking out, the Wyndham staff did everything the best!!  This is a fantastic hotel to stay at, very comfortable, easy access, superb views, and a staff that well understands taking care of the customer.  This stay was in conjunction with an Association event.  The leaders of the association were so impressed they have booked next year's event with the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Ronald G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We are so happy to hear that you and your group enjoyed your stay at our hotel and we are thrilled to know that you’ll be back next year.  We look forward welcoming you back and to providing you with another great event!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Irvine - Gateway to Entertainment & Great Service!
Summary: I definitely picked the right hotel to stay at! It is a lovely hotel but what got me writing this review was the personalized service I received from Daniel Perdomo at the front desk! The hotel is super lucky to have him. He made me feel so welcome after a long 2 1/2 hr drive. He was friendly and personable and really set the tone for my weekend stay. I normally don't even review a hotel until I check out but I just had to give a shout out to Daniel. He helped me get directions to the conference location, he let me know I could be shuttled to the nearby venue so I didn't have to pay for parking there, he made sure I checked in quickly enough so I had time to enjoy a jacuzzi before it closed at 11pm. He let me know I had complimentary water in my room and then topped it off by
Manager Response: Dear TheWorldTraveled,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your very kind comments about Daniel and the hotel are much appreciated.  It’s great to hear that Daniel was able to have such a positive impact on your stay.  I am also happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of so many of the hotel’s amenities.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!       Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My stay here was wonderful! All of the staff are very accommodating and friendly. Bobby helped me multiple times taking me to the store, helping me with my baggage, even helped me with an issue I had checking in, and gladly had his manager help me on a case to case basis. I'll definitely stay at the Wyndham Irvine again!
Manager Response: Dear Heather H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that Bobby was able to provide you with such great service.  He is a great employee and your comments about him will be shared with our entire team.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: One of the best in town
Summary: The rates for the date I stayed were pretty pricey but it was still a good deal especially booking directly . I wanted to add a upgrade that was offered only , so I called and Daniel at guest services was so awesome and  made me aware that the upgrade that I wanted was available but I would not be able to utilize all the perks that came with it so instead of providing me with that he did it even better upgrade because I was paying so much for the room and I stayed there before and he really showed great hospitality and customer service and I would recommend this hotel to my friends and will stay here next time I'm in town. Thanks Daniel & the Wyndham !
Manager Response: Dear 112natasha,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience with Daniel.  I am so happy to hear that he was able to make your stay with us so enjoyable.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star stay!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel room was clean and nice service throughout the hotel. It was perfect for my mother and i
Manager Response: Dear J247OTjessicam,  Thank you for the kind review!  I am happy to hear that you and your mother enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to you returning soon and to earning a 5-star review for your next stay.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic, friendly service in an inviting environment
Summary: Great service here at the Wyndham!  Front desk, bell service, shuttle service - all of it!  I ended up in the ER on my first day of a work trip and was learning to manage crutches 1000 miles from home.  The team here was eager to help and made sure I had everything I needed.  They even offered to shuttle me to my worksite (just across the street) because of my trouble getting around.  Fantastic!  The rooms were great - large, comfortable, and elegantly appointed.  I travel a lot for work; I appreciate a comfortable bed above ALL ELSE -and the Wyndham delivered.    The in-room dining offered a good selection, wasn't overly expensive, and was very tasty- not to mention, delivered hot and fresh (no soggy fries here!) which, when you're on crutches, is important.  I am returning to
Manager Response: Dear DeutschDiana,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I hope that you’re recovering well and able to set the crutches aside very soon, if not already.  I’ll be sure to share your kind review with my entire team.  We all look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We spent 4 days at the Wyndham Irvine for a conference.  Marilu and her staff were attentive, flexible, and did everything we asked and needed, to make this conference the most positive possible experience for our Board, for our presenters (each day by ensuring that each room was perfectly set up for each presenter) and attending to any problems immediately.  Their special attention to these issues, and surrounded room set up and meal service made this an outstanding conference experience for conference attendees, who had overwhelmingly positive survey responses to the venue and staff.   I would consider this facility for a future conference, and recommend it to any group seeking a great place for a conference.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia,  Thank you for bringing your group to our hotel and for taking the time to hare your experience with us!  We truly appreciate all the kind comments about the hotel and our team.  I would like to especially thank you for the kind words about Marilu.  She is an incredible asset to our clients and to our hotel.  We appreciate you taking the time to recognize her.  Thanks again for the feedback!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I need more stars...5 is not enough!
Summary: We hosted a conference at the Wyndham Irvine last weekend, and the customer service is beyond impeccable.  Marilu and every single member of her hospitality team were wonderful to work with.  The facility is excellent of course, but the customer care is remarkable.  We will probably come back the next time we have the conference in Southern California.
Manager Response: Dear Nathan O,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your feedback about Marilu and the rest of the team is much appreciated.  I certainly hope we’re able to turn that "probably" into a "definitely" as we would love to have you and your group with us again!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: In town from Vegas and wanted to stay a little out of the way. Found this place on Hotel Tonite and got an awesome rate. Was very pleased with the cleanliness of the property overall, the room was nice and spacious, not too large but was perfect for two people. The bed was so comfortable that I didn't want to get out of it. I wasn't excited about the $18/day self parking fee but it beat other hotels that I've stayed at. The staff was very friendly and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear My4mdjz,  Thank you for the very kind review.  I am happy to hear that you found us on your Hotel Tonight app and that your stay with us was so enjoyable.  It’s great to hear that you would select our hotel again.  We look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel.....reasonable price!  SUPER comfy bed!
Summary: If you want a great nights sleep at an excellent hotel, with good food and a fun times bar, pick this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Debrar473,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: overall very nice; people very pleasant and helpful...
Summary: overall very nice; people very pleasant and helpful; exercise/pool area a bit "weird" to get to - not direct; would like a buffet breakfast opportunity
Manager Response: Dear T4056ZTnancyg,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  Please inquire about our daily breakfast buffet offered in our restaurant the next time you stay with us.  Thanks again for your feedback.    Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It's a nice hotel with a helpful staff, but not much to do in the area.  That's really the only drawback, that you have to take an uber/taxi to find anything to do.
Manager Response: Dear Eric346,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear your enjoyed the hotel.  Should you find yourself back in the future, please ask our Guest Services team about all the restaurants within walking distance and about the complimentary shuttle service that will take you to some great shopping and entertainment areas.  Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My fiance and I had a standard king with a great view. The heated indoor pool/spa was awesome and Bobby helped us out tremendously. Parking wasn't bad and the breakfast buffet was one of the best i've had.
Manager Response: Dear Jendox87,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that your stay went so well.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The rooms and accommodation were great - the workout room...
Summary: The rooms and accommodation were great - the workout room was horrible. It was too small and never any availability to use the room. Also, they were having leakage problems and there were buckets all throughout the room.
Manager Response: Dear Judyl750,  Thank you for the feedback.  I am sorry for your experience with the fitness center.  Though it does offer the basics for a good workout, we recognize that it is not overly large or extensive.  I have shared your feedback with my team and all water issues have been resolved.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed the rest of your stay.      Best Regards,   Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It's a nice hotel, beds are comfortable. The location is perfect. The costumer service is great, especially Hany, he is very helpful and nice person. If you need something ask him. He knows about the area and the hotel services and was very helpful and knowledgable!
Manager Response: Dear Andrés R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that Hany was able to provide you with such excellent service!  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was impressed with the room, plenty of light to see everything, and plenty of plugs for all my electronics right at desk level.  Very close to the Airport.  Only thing I didn't like was that a coffee was $4,50 seems a little steep.
Manager Response: Dear A C,  Thanks for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel, don't waste your time at the bar
Summary: Just checked In to this hotel. Check in was fine, friendly staff at the front desk. Room was fine and clean. Comfy beds. I wanted a drink so I decided to go to happy hour. There was 3 people working and 5 people drinking. I waited 15 minutes for a drink. They made it and completely disappeared. Worst service I've had I walked out. Better off buying a bottle and drinking in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Che M,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry about your experience in our lounge.  I have shared your review with my Food & Beverage Director and he will be working with our staff to improve services in this area.  I hope your travels bring you back our way son and that your next experience earns us a 5-star rating.  Thanks again for your feedback!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It was a great hotel with a good service and a friendly staff. It was incredible. I will recommend to any person that will be in Irvine to stay.
Manager Response: Dear DouglasmW706QO  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with my team.  We all look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience! Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Here's an HONEST review for you.  I find myself traveling a lot for work these days, about 2-3 times a months for 2-3 nights at a time. I had been bopping around different hotels in and around Irvine, Costa Mesa & NPB. The 1st time I stayed at this hotel back in June, Karan checked me in after a very long day and was so great. So much so, I came back the next month, then the next month, then the next.   I found out they are pet friendly so I started brings my 2 small dogs on my business trips, which so great when I'm a bit home sick. So I started staying there more frequently. They are always so sweet to my boys.  Also, the views from some of the rooms are ridiculously fantastic. Like seriously, amazing.   But frankly, there are nicer, more high end, newer hotels in the area but
Manager Response: Dear Eleanor714,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and the very thorough feedback about your prior stays with us.  I’m sorry to hear that you’ve experienced a number of issues with us in the past, but happy to hear that Karan and the team have been able to overcome those issues and provide you with an overall pleasurable stay.  Thank you for booking us again for your next stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a conference in February. The front desk staff is very helpful. I had a couple issues and they helped me as best they could.   1. The service in the bar is horrible. It is run separately than the hotel, burials the hotel name attached it. Slow service, cold food, and bad attitude.   2. Housekeeping dropped my brand new laptop. The insurance company and hotel are dealing with it. I have no outcome yet to detail here.   3. I needed a charger for my car and called ahead. They said they had one in the garage. I passed up the Tesla Supercharger (45 minutes for a full charge) to charge at the hotel overnight. The Wyndham garage does not have a charger. A charger is located across the business park in a paid parking lot that has a maximum of 2 hours. Those slower
Manager Response: Dear Christine Z,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I apologize for the issues you experienced and have shared your review with my management team.  We will use your feedback as an opportunity to learn and improve our services.  I hope that you will select our hotel again in the near future.  We look forward to proving you with the 5-star stay you deserve!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Clean, comfortable hotel. 15 mins from Disneyland without the noisy kids running down hallways you would get closer to the park. Would stay here again next trip.
Manager Response: Dear O7861CRjennifer,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would choose our hotel again.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here several times, and most recently brought my wife and daughter with me. I had two separate reservations and the desk staff was very accommodating in allowing us to stay in the room. Unfortunately, there was an error, they had somehow tied my extension to a date later in the following week that I was returning and had someone in our room ready to move our things out, he was very reluctant, apologized profusely and what chasing his manager down to over ride what the hotel manager on duty had told him to do. They were in an oversold situation for double beds. I want to the front desk and they were more than happy to help, but the manager wasn't, he was a bit belligerent, even when he realized the mistake around the reservations was his, not mine. We ended up
Manager Response: Dear Jeihri,  Thank you for the feedback.  I appreciate your taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize for the mix up and for the way my team handled this situation.  I have shared your review with my team and we have discussed your experience in detail.  I am confident that this is not an issue that will repeat.  Again, thank you for sharing with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: We had an excceptional 2-night stay at the Wyndham Hotel...
Summary: We had an excceptional 2-night stay at the Wyndham Hotel.  The service was excellent and our room was lovely.  We would definitely return again.
Manager Response: Dear PatricklE461DX,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!   Your kind comments about the service and the room are much appreciated.  It’s great to hear that you would choose us again.  We look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very clean and comfortable. The beds were so comfortable. The staff was excellent and very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 576alexandriab,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!   It was our pleasure to have you as a guest and we look forward to the next opportunity to provide you with another 5-star stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Reservation and check in were easy... The room was amazing...Beware of the $18 a night parking fee...The liquor in the bar was bottom shelf...We were there for Valentines Day the room service menu was challenged...to top it off the housekeeper threw away the box our COLLECTIBLE Waterford Toasting Flutes were kept in. I m not sure they are ready for upper middle to high end customers looking for excellence and value.
Manager Response: Dear K7710ZRhelens,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that my team disposed of the box for your flutes.  I have shared your review with my Director of Housekeeping and asked that additional training be conducted to ensure we are not removing items like this form a guest’s room.  I hope you will be willing to try us again in the future as I am confident that we are fully capable of providing you with a great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, comfortable hotel with excellent customer service
Summary: Excellent front desk staff. Daniel was especially helpful with my reservation mix up (even though it was my fault). Very much appreciate his help. Room was a bit small but nice and comfortable. Very good location - close to good restaurants and sights.  Breakfast should included with the price as the price is a bit higher than other comparable hotels.
Manager Response: Dear AnnW6923DM,  Thank you for the very kind review and for mentioning the assistance you received from Daniel.  I am happy to hear he was able to help you with the reservation mix-up.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with a 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Please keep in mind, the Wyndham properties are fantastic and we stay at Wyndham properties often but for this time at Wyndham Irvine Orange County Airport...we were disappointed. Positive Notes... property is beautiful, very clean and some what friendly. The Disappointing Notes...upon check in I was not informed that the parking would be an additional $18.00. I've never paid for self parking so I never thought to ask...and we have stayed in many high profile properties as well and never paid for parking. Next time I'll ask. We were given a room with 2 Queen Beds...the beds appeared to be undersized, more like a full size. Which made a very un-restful night for us. We learned about the $18,00 self parking charge by someone slipping our receipt under our door...that was a new
Manager Response: Dear Daniel H,  Thank you for your review.  I would like to start by apologizing for the surprise parking fees.  Though we do note the parking fees on our website, we realize that many of our guests book their rooms through channels not controlled by the hotel.  We do our best to provide these channels with our fee information, but this is not always passed along to the guest.  I assure you the fees we charge are in line with the market and consistent with most airport locations.  I’m happy to hear that you felt the hotel was beautiful and clean.  I hope you’ll consider us again the next time you’re in the area.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I tried to check in at 2:45 pm and was made to feel stupid that I was 15 minutes early.The room wasn't ready until 3:45 and after a 8 hr drive was ready to relax.I booked the big suite because I was down for a 14 and under water polo tournament and wanted a place for the kids to hang out. It was the only room that stated it had a refrigerator and microwave .There was no microwave in the room and when I asked the front desk they told me each floor had a common microwave to share .I asked why that room was the only one advertised to have a microwave and was give no answer .Lastly, the phones did not work and I had to have them replaced. The suite it self was very nice.I thought it was reasonably priced,had great views,and was good size with great views.
Manager Response: Dear Hennryn2015,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  Your feedback is valuable.  I would like to apologize for the delay in getting you into your room.  Though we do our best to accommodate a 3:00PM arrival, there are times that circumstances don’t allow us to do so.  The specific room you booked is unique in our hotel, not allowing us the flexibility our other room types offer.  I regret any inconvenience you experienced while we made the room ready for you.  I also apologize for the inaccurate information about the microwave.  This should not be listed as an amenity in the room and is in the process of being corrected.  Again, I apologize for any inconvenience.  I have shared your review with my team.  We appreciate you taking the time to write it and are committed to addressing the issues you’ve brought to our attention.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel was nice. Staff was accommodating. Beds were too small for a family of 4 with adult (16-19yo) children.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqiemos,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I hope you and your family were able to get a good night’s rest, despite the size of the beds.  We look forward to welcoming you back should you find yourself in our area again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The Best Ever for our Chamber Music Conference
Summary: Our chamber music group of 40 were treated better here than the 20 prior years in other hotels.  Shane, our Sales mgr,  Corrynne, Conf. Service Mgr- and Marilu, our personal coordinator - were each over-the-top accommodating, and attentive to every detail. The meeting rooms were superb, the food delicious, and the guest rooms very nice. We hope to return here every year. We enjoy being spoiled!
Manager Response: Dear CelloDentist,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We truly enjoyed having you and your group with us.  I am happy to hear that Marilu and the rest of my team took such great care of you.  I hope we have earned the privilege of being you host hotel in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great service, hotel feels dated though
Summary: I have to say, the customer service here is fantastic.  We were in town for the Surf City Race and somehow my reservation was incorrect and inadvertently cancelled even though we were confirmed for the race shuttle. The front desk staff got us a room at the same rate I had for the race and it was no hassle and they were super friendly in doing so.  Our hotel room was clean.  It just felt dated.  Rooms were small for two double beds (or queens?).  Just needs an update.  Same with the lobby and the restaurant.  Nothing special.  Reminds me of the 80s.
Manager Response: Dear Love2spin,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  Your kind comments about the fantastic customer service are much appreciated.  I’m sorry to hear that you felt the hotel and restaurant are dated.  I am happy to inform you that we are going to be updating our restaurant and bar over the next month.  I hope you’ll try us again in the near future.  We look forward to hearing your thoughts on the upcoming improvements.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for the Surf City Marathon. Rooms were great, beds were awesome. The concierge service was very helpful finding shopping and recommended a great restaurant nearby. Breakfast before the race was good, the servers were very helpful.  The dinner the night before our race, unfortunately, was not a good experience. The restaurant was very understaffed and the two servers there were very disorganized and made little effort to provide us with any kind of service. This was the only negative experience we had, the rest of the service was awesome, including the shuttle to and from the race site.
Manager Response: Dear Mary Ann E,  Thank you for the kind review!  We have enjoyed the many years we’ve worked with Surf City and look forward to welcoming you back next year.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced in our restaurant.  I will be sharing your comments with my Restaurant Manager and we’ll make sure we address your concerns.  Thanks again for the review!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: M. y room (833) was a corner suite, beautifully appointed and comfortable in every way. The furnishings and appointments are showing very few signs of wear, simply because the building is so well maintained and administered. I ate well in the bar of the hotel, and not quite so well in the dining room (which is why I rated the one notch below "excellent").     The staff are unfailingly kind and capable. The musical society of which I am part was pretty much unanimous: it would be extremely hard to find a more welcoming crew of people at the registration desk, in the hallways, looking after our welfare during the several days of our musical event, and so on.     The hotel is a five-minute shuttle ride from the John Wayne Airport, a convenience that weighed heavily in the
Manager Response: Dear Ciceronian,  Thank you for the very kind review.  We truly enjoyed hosting your group and hope we have earned the privilege to me your host hotel the next time you’re in the area.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments with my entire team.  Thanks again for your review.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: hotel employees are super! diner not so much.
Summary: The concierge guy was fantastic. One can do after another! Hotel staff very pleasant! Both of my rooms were very nice! My guests were well pleased and comfortable. Paying for parking is silly. If you want 199 for the room just say so. don't charge 135+ parking + fee this and fee that. Be honest with pricing. We were in from MO. and chose to use the diner  there. Dinner serice on a 200 dollar tab Took us almost 1.45 hours for our plates to come we were a group of 6. the 2 that ordered fish were made wrong. we were done with our dinners before the other 2 plates came out. no discount no screw you or we're sorry or here, eat a waffle while you wait... it wasn't a good scene in the diner. even though the steaks were 33 bucks. I expected more. but that's the diner. employees of hotel
Manager Response: Dear Brandi C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that Hany, our Concierge, was helpful.  I also want to thank you for your feedback about the parking fees and your restaurant experience.  Regarding the parking fees, we choose not to just include the fee in our rate as we have many guests that do not have a car when they stay with us.  We do not want to charge those guests for something they are not using.  Though our practice is consistent with the hotel industry and with the other hotels in our market, I understand where you are coming from and appreciate your feedback on this.  I apologize for the dining experience you had with our restaurant.  I have shared your feedback with my restaurant manager and we will be discussing it in detail with our entire restaurant team.  Thanks again for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The front desk personnel was  quite efficient and courteous.  The room including bath was clean and comfortable.  The meals were quite tasty but in my view  could have a greater variety. The ancillary staff including shuttle operators were friendly and helpful.  Myself and spouse were pleased with our experience.
Manager Response: Dear L9179XWjamess,  Thank you for the very kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments about the hotel and the staff with my entire team.  We all look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Overall our stay was good. However there was a major disconnect between the Reservations department and the Front Desk.  My original reservation was for the night of the race.  I called a week prior to extend the reservation to include Sunday night.  I checked in without incident and presumed all was well.  In the morning, I noticed the room receipt was for the one night, so I told the Front Desk again that we were staying another night.   The hotel was also offering a shuttle to Huntington Beach for the race as part of the reservation.  And getting dropped off was fine. The driver seemed to have been asked to shuttle the runners at the last minute, but he got us there in plenty of time and dropped us off at the Hyatt Regency. He also indicated that was where we would be getting
Manager Response: Dear Willie212016,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced with us.  I truly regret the mix-up with your reservation and with the shuttle service.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Rooms.  We will be using your review as an opportunity to learn and improve.  We are fully committed to ensuring the issues you experienced will not repeat.  I hope that you will try us again the next time you’re out our way.  We look forward to welcoming you back and to providing you with a great 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Today I choose Wyndham Irvine OC to stay for the week for a business trip. I was greeted by a friendly staff who was fast at getting me checked in. Once I got to my room I noticed something quite disturbing. In the restroom it looked like someone had used the toilet and forgot to flush. So I proceeded to flush, when I noticed pubic hair on the seat and the toilet would not flush. I immediately call the front desk and they apologized for the inconvenience and got me set up in a new room.  The new room reeked, as if someone had smoked a pack of cigarettes in there. Again, I spoke with the front desk and asked if someone would spray air freshener or something. I left for a meeting and returned to a clean smelling room. You could still smell the faint stitch of cigarettes,but it was
Manager Response: Dear Ashley W,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us.  Though we did have the opportunity to talk while you were in house, I did want to take a minute to apologize again for the issues you experienced.  These issues were unacceptable and they have been discussed at length with my entire executive team.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon and that you’ll be willing to give us another opportunity to provide you with the 5-star stay you deserve.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Love this place!  Wouldn't stay anywhere else!
Summary: I love this place... everyone there is so exceptional.  They really go above and beyond to help you.  The location is super convenient, food is great, the beds comfy, rooms clean and updated... and the people - they really make it.  Ross on the Executive level, David at the bar, Leslie in group reservations, EVERY front desk representative... they make me happy and I feel like family each time I stay.  I've stayed at other Wyndham properties, and this one really lives up to the name.
Manager Response: Dear R C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the hotel are much appreciated.  It’s great to hear that so many of our team members were able to have such a positive impact on your visit.  We look forward to providing you with many more 5-star stays in the near futrure!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everyone, from the front desk, to food service, to room attendants....such nice, accommodating people!  There were 35 people in our conference attendance.  Our meal service hostess, Marylu, made our group dining experience special, even adding unexpected decorations to our Valentine dinner. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Paulette S,  Thank you for the very kind review.  We truly appreciate you and your group selecting Wyndham Irvine for your conference.  I’m happy to hear that Marilu and the rest of the team helped make your event a success.  We all look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I attended a 3-day workshop at the Wyndham Irvine and was so grateful for the terrific service and accommodations provided; Marilu and her staff took wonderful care of us, and went above and beyond all our expectations. We had a terrific weekend and would look forward to be back.
Manager Response: Dear Julie H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the service that Marilu provided are much appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share your review with Marilu and the rest of my team.  Like you, we look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wanted to just say that Will at the front desk was very helpful..  After a long night of lets just say "Adult Beverages"  I needed help!  I had no idea what room I was in.  Talked to Will and he sprung into action found my and escorted me up to my family waiting because I had the key.  Great staff, Clean comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Dear Jarrod B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for calling out Will for his exceptional service.  It’s great to know that the Will and the rest of our team were able to provide you with such a great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Our stay at the Wyndham Irvine hotel was great! The front desk messed up a couple of times with our check in but Daniel was very professional handling the situation. Breakfast was delicious. Overall great staff and great little get away for Valentine's Day weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Alex S,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I apologize for any errors made by my desk staff but am happy to hear that Daniel was able to make things right and turn your stay with us into a great one.  I hope we can look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed the classic rooms, the good staff and the location. Breakfast was good, lots if fruit and nice fresh egg dishes. Possible to breakfast healthly and tasty. I can recommend this. Quiet and parking. Will probably come back. What else is thre to say ?
Manager Response: Dear JJAA54,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and enjoy hearing that you will probably return.  We look forward to your next visit and to earing a 5-star rating the next time!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very clean. Fast internet. Excellent service. The lettuce wraps are delicious and quickly delivered to your room.  Solid business hotel. Coffee maker in room works well, with plenty of choices. Easy and quick ride to the airport. Great running path as wel.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia D,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the complimentary Wi-Fi, the food, and the other hotel amenities are much appreciated. I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: simply the best overall value to me in my recent experience of staying in hotels for the last 40 nights...by far
Summary: the people seem to enjoy their jobs.  they are friendly and available to help whenever you might need them.  they treat you like you are an important customer and they want to earn your business so you will keep coming back...
Manager Response: Dear Fox_efe,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We truly appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  You absolutely are important to us and we hope we have earned your business the next time you’re in town!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay for anything I recommend the 14th floor best view and Nice  breakfast in the morning
Manager Response: Dear 610thinht,  Thank you for the kind comments about the hotel and the hotel’s Executive Level.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the upgraded services.  I hope we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay in the near future.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent! One of my best hotel experiences ever.
Summary: The front desk staff is as excellent as are their luxuriously-appointed rooms & suites.    Supervisors Karan & Tiffany are shining stars in their profession, & true assets to their company. Also, Daniel & Amanda were very friendly and accommodating--in fact, the entire front desk staff carried themselves with more class & professionalism than I have experienced at just about any hotel which I have been a patron of--this includes many 4 & 5 diamond luxury hotels across the States & Europe. I stayed in a Corner Studio Suite, which had an almost 180 degree, panoramic view of Irvine's financial district & commercial highrise buildings, set against the emerald green (winter time) hills of Turtle Rock, Shady Canyon & the picturesque Saddleback Mountain Range. The suite had beautiful
Manager Response: Dear Bryan,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that so many of our associates had such a positive impact on your experience.  I will be sure to share your very kind comments with my entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to providing you with another great 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel room was great and clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. They provide shuttle services within the area and the driver, Bobby, was the best! He even gave me a free breakfast buffet voucher. I had a great stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Sgambhir92,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Bobby are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I really have nothing bad to say about this hotel besides there parking situation. I arrived at 10:00 pm and there were no parking spots available after paying $19.00 a night. I complained to manager that I couldn't find a parking space and he suggested parking in a red zone at first. I told him I don't want to wake to find that my car was towed. He's suggested to check up on the car and I couldn't believe what I was hearing. I told him I was tired and I wasn't going to check up on my car when I paid $19.00 a night for parking. I'm here to sleep in confidence knowing my vehicle is safe. He finally snapped out of it and removed the parking charges and offered me his parking spot since he was about to go home. He saved the night but only after the fact. I couldn't believe what was
Manager Response: Dear Bernardos770,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you found the hotel to be great despite the concerns you shared about the parking.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with the parking while staying with us.  I appreciate your thoughts on this issue and agree that it should have been handled better by my team.  I have shared your review with my Director of Operations and instructed him to use it as a teaching opportunity with our desk staff.  We always strive to improve our services and your feedback will allow us to do that.  I hope you’ll try us again the next time you’re in the area.  We look forward to providing you with the 5-star experience you deserve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is a very average hotel a step above a Courtyard type of hotel. Full service but old  and needs some serious updating.   The gym is horrible and has many machines that do not work.    I would not stay here again.    I attended a work conference which the hotel conference rooms are ok but again old.
Manager Response: Dear Matt D,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am sorry that the hotel did not live up to your expectations and for the equipment not working in the fitness center.  I have met with my maintenance department to ensure all equipment is functioning properly.  We do a daily check of the equipment in an effort to ensure it is all working and non-functioning equipment is repaired as quickly as possible.  I apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: If really soft mattresses are not your preference, probably not for you. My back injury was aggravated staying here. Service eye was second to none and the shower water pressure was fantastic !!
Manager Response: Dear Ron J,  Thank you for the kind review.  I’m sorry to hear that the mattress was not firm enough for you.
