We frequently receive inquiries about how to purchase one of our mattresses but I recognize that mattresses are not a one-size-fits-all product.  I appreciate your kind comments about the service and the shower.  I hope that your stay was more good than bad and that we can look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My friend checked in the hotel with a baby. She left her phone in the restroom of the lobby. Bobby, the hotel stuff helped us to locate the phone and delivered to us immediately. Thank you Bobby. Very nice stuffs and completely satisfaction. About the hotel, The room is clean and modern. Mattress is comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Chris W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Bobby for his service.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Rooms are small, but the service is great
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay there.  The shuttle service is great.  They will pick you up and drop you off whenever. The restaurant is excellent and the service is really good. I have stayed at a few places around this hotel, and prefer this one.
Manager Response: Dear Real_Colorado_Native,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the shuttle and restaurant are much appreciated.  We are happy to have earned the spot as your preferred hotel in Irvine!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel is only minutes from the airport. It's a nice hotel and has a nice pool. The hotel is about 20 minutes from Laguna Beach. Great if you don't want to spend a ton on a hotel. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. GPSs get confused when you try to pull into the area, but location is good.
Manager Response: Dear Saebr18,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I hope your travels bring back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: As the Maid of Honor to the Bride, we had an epic itinerary consisting of Vegas & Cabo San Lucas for a Bachelorette Party.  After an amazing night in Vegas, we ended up missing our flight to Cabo San Lucas where the rest of the Bachelorette Party was out waiting for the last four of us to arrive!  In our efforts to get to the party as soon as possible, the road to Cabo San Lucas led us to Orange County where a couple of us would be catching the first flight out the next day.  Wyndham is conveniently located near the airport and has complimentary shuttle service.  IT was just what we needed and we quickly booked this hotel through the HotelTonight app. Upon arrival, Tiffany Gibbons checked us in and was so understanding to our story.   She gave us the best room she could that was
Manager Response: Dear Robin B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to share your story about Tiffany.  I am very happy to hear that Tiffany was able to turn an unexpected pit stop into a great experience.  We are happy to have played a small part in your epic Bachelorette weekend.  We look forward to providing you with another great stay should your travels bring you back our way.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: To start the hotel only has 4 elevators. That means a decently long wait to get up to your room and get down from it.   Once you exit the elevator you're greeted with a stale odor and dimly lit hallways.   The rooms are tastefully decorated and likely the best feature of this hotel.   Lastly: I called the front desk and asked for towels. I waited a while then called back and said I had been waiting for 30 minutes. I was then called back and scolded for calling again. His exact words were: "It's been 17 minutes since you called. The house keeping is very busy they will get to you as soon as they can." Having a call returned by and angry Russian man and being scolded is completely unacceptable.
Manager Response: Dear Arash R,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry that we were unable to provide you with a much better stay.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are using your experience as an opportunity to learn and improve.  I hope that you’ll be willing to try us again in the future.  We look forward to providing you with the great stay that you deserve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Requested a specific room and the staff was able to reserve it for us. Very helpful and friendly. Location is excellent .... quiet area and easily accessible
Manager Response: Dear Don B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon. We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Horrible front desk and booking interaction
Summary: After calling front desk and having them transfer me about 6 times to reservations, my call kept getting dropped. I went online and the website was under "maintenance" to book a room. I called front desk yet again to finally book the reservation in hopes that they would honor the online price, "Mary" from front desk Wyndham Irvine booked the room and didn't acknowledge the frustration that accompanied trying to book this room. Her disingenuous attitude was apparent over the phone. Upon attempting to check in the room, we learned that my reservation was "cancelled" and that I had no room!!!!! The hotel transferred me to reservations, only to find them not know exactly how it happened. By the time I got to my room, the whole booking experience has ruined my overnight stay. Gave me
Manager Response: Dear Jco80,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am very sorry about the difficulties you went through to book a room at our hotel.  I completely agree that it shouldn’t be that difficult and I will be looking into the matter to ensure other guests are not having the same challenge.  I appreciate you bringing this to my attention.  I would also like to apologize for the way my staff handled the situation.  This will be discussed with our entire front desk team and some additional service training will be conducted.  Again, I appreciate you sharing this with me.  I hope that you’ll be willing to try our hotel again in the future.  We look forward to earning a better rating from you on your next stay.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing Staff makes it a delight to stay here
Summary: For the last 16 years I have been staying at this hotel and the staff never disappoints.  A recent remodel of the property lends to a very pleasant stay.  The amazing staff, from the highly professional Sofaine behind the front desk who consistently goes beyond what is necessary to insure every guest need is well taken care of, to the warm smiles of Jose and Steve driving you around in the shuttles, to David at the bar downstairs and Ross upstairs providing a welcome escape from a busy day of work, the entire staff deliver top rate service.   It goes without saying, I look forward to each stay with such world class people.
Manager Response: Dear David V,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize so many of our employees!  Your 16 years of loyalty and your very kind comments are both much appreciated!  We look forward to your future stays with us.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the Wyndham Irvine airport hotel. They took excellent care of us. Comfy beds, clean room, and shuttle to anywhere nearby. They recommended awesome restaurants.  They strive to take excellent care of their guests.
Manager Response: Dear Courtney W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  We look forward to your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I leave in Irvine and I travel the world a lot; never in my traveling life have I ever been treated so courteously. Amanda at the Irvine Wyndham was amazing in her customer service knowledge. To use a legal term, she made me "feel at home", therefore my stay at wydham hotel will be continuous henceforth. Thank you Amanda and the Wydham family. ~Ibrahim
Manager Response: Dear Abrahamd2016,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Amanda for her great work!  I am happy to hear that Amanda and the rest of our team provided you with such a positive experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff was helpful, and kind while the dinning was fresh and delicious. We loved the indoor pool and spa. Our room was clean and the concierge was accommodating. But, it was the manager who really  made the stay so great!
Manager Response: Dear Mike M,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the staff, the dining, and the hotel amenities are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We will be avoiding this hotel in the future. Our stay was anything but enjoyable. We stayed 5 nights, December 27-Jan 1 Pro: comfortable bed Cons: 1- entrance to the property was confusing at first since you cannot enter from the street it is on, you have to drive through the business district it's located at 2- parking is $18 but $9 if you sign up for the rewards and can be a hassle coz of the gates 3- we weren't lucky enough to be offered any assistance with anything or friendly staff  4- was given room 931 when we checked in. As soon as we got off the 9th floor, it's was freezing. It was 40 something degrees at midnight and the door to the stairs were propped open because there was an odor.  5- after coming back to find something to eat at 1 am, we enter a room that had a
Manager Response: Dear Redlilli,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write such a thorough review.  I am very sorry for the issues you experienced at our hotel.  Though I regret that your stay with us was so poor, I truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I will be discussing your review in detail with my entire team.  We will use your feedback as an opportunity to improve our service.  I hope that you’ll give our hotel another try in the future.  We look forward to earning a better rating from you on your next stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham Hotel Irvine in orange county California is a great property.  it's been recently remodeled and it's beautiful.  the rooms are very comfortable.    The front desk staff is very friendly and accommodating.  our check-in was very smooth with no problems in making sure our needs were met.   I was most impressed with the front desk staff's friendliness and professionalism.   our van driver, Andy, was so much fun.  we were laughing the whole way from the airport to the hotel and he is very informative on the local area.  Andy made suggestions for good restaurants, including the restaurant in the hotel.  I think we may just go there tonight.  he's a great employee and if you have a chance to ask Andy any questions he'll be most happy to accommodate as well.
Manager Response: Dear Dca1957,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Andy are much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The only complain really is that the Internet connection was a bit slow and streaming videos was poor or perhaps it was just my service provider over all it was a great hotel I would book my next stay there l.
Manager Response: Dear 921miguele,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review.  I’m sorry to hear that you experienced issues with the internet.  We recently upgraded our network and issues are not common at our hotel; however, technology can sometimes not work as expected.  I hope you were able to alert my desk staff of the issue.  We are committed to correcting issues like this immediately.  Please let us know if you have any challenges during your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Amanda at the front desk is a Star employee!
Summary: I have been staying at Wyndham hotels but I stay at this location several times a month. I did not like it at first because of the location being in a business district and not much else around it.for dining or shopping but It is a nice 3 star hotel with nicely appointed rooms. I don't use their restaurant and bar because frankly they look dull. Had a couple of bad receptions with the front desk until I was helped by a front desk agent Amanda, who is the star of this hotel. She has a million dollar smile, and great elegance about her but in a warm and friendly way. I love it when I encounter her during my visits because she reminds me that great hospitality and guest care are still around. I would like to start seeing more upgrades for my loyalty, so we will see. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Tamim A,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that you’ve had some bad experiences with our desk in the past, but I’m happy to hear that Amanda was able to change your opinion.  I will be sharing your review with my team. We are committed to making sure your future stays with us is excellent regardless of who check you in.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We spent one night at the Wyndham hotel at the Orange County airport.  We fount the hotel and its accommodations to be excellent.  Our only problem was finding the entrance to the hotel off the main road.  We had to circle back and finally noticed a small sign indicating the entrance.  Also, the drop off point was a little confusing as it appears you need to go into a gated parking area in order to turn around.  All other aspects of our stay were excellent.
Manager Response: Dear ChillicotheTraveler,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced getting to the hotel, but I’m happy to hear that all was excellent once you got here.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff was very knowledgable and friendly. Karan was helpful, welcoming, and  very efficient all while busy assisting many guests. His genuine warmth and professionalism was much appreciated. The newly decorated rooms are nicely appointed and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Angela T,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I will be sure to share your review with Karan and the rest of my team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed the night before flying back home. Our room was very nice and the staff was amazing. We wished we had more time to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mike K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m sorry to hear that you were only able to stay with us for one night. I hope your next trip is longer and that we have the privilege of providing you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This was my family first year ever traveling for Christmas and it was great. Upon arrival a gentleman name Bobby immediately assisted us with parking and all of our baggage. The front desk was extremely helpful and informative. I joined the rewards program and received a discount on my parking. The hotel is very clean, quiet, and all around out standing. Thank you for making me and my family feel right at home! Happy Holidays!!!
Manager Response: Dear Missy94124,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Bobby for his service.  I will be sure to share your kind comments about the Bobby and the hotel with my entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-ster experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: As soon as my mother and I pulled up, Bobby was right there to greet us and answer any questions that we had. When we went to check in, one of the three wonderful ladies at the front desk gave us a discount for becoming a Wyndham rewards member.👏🏾
Manager Response: Dear Samuel O,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate your staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  Your kind comments about Bobby and the ladies at the desk are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Divorce is tough on stay at home moms and their kids. Decided to come here last minute with my son for the holiday.  If you don't have a ton of money for presents than presence is your best bet, right? Money is super tight, and I spent almost every last dollar getting here and on the room. The desk staff were super sweet and understanding about not having money on a credit card, and took a cash deposit instead (our cash for breakfast!). My son loved the room, the pool and the lights of Newport Bay. Santa is a bit non traditional this year  but Christmas morning with breakfast in bed will be a sweet surprise. Thank you Wyndham OC.
Manager Response: Dear JoAnne W,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  I realize that staying at a hotel on Christmas was probably not your first choice but I am happy to hear that you selected Wyndham and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I’m also happy to hear that the staff treated you well.  Non-traditional or not, we’re happy to have been a part of your holiday.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Front desk person stated he'd provide me free parking, as a gift for our anniversary, then received parking bill, advised them they lied to me and they stated they would return money and never did.
Manager Response: Dear Nadia S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am truly sorry that my team did not follow through on this promise and I will be addressing this with them.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly if this issue has not yet been resolved.  I would be happy to personally assist in correcting any charges that should not have been posted.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Thanks to Supervisor for Excellent Damage Control
Summary: Excellent job for Andrew (Night Auditor) and Karan Kumar (Front Desk Supervisor) whom very knowledgeable about customer service in hospitality industry.  Both of them have an excellent damage control's skill.  Thanks for everything.  The hotel room very spacey, quiet, cleans, comfortable and great view (corner room). Good breakfast buffet especially salsa.
Manager Response: Dear Tatianalexander,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that Andrew and Karan were able to have such a positive impact on your stay.  I will be sure to pass your kind comments about them and the hotel along to my entire team.  Thanks again!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean. The bed is comfortable. There is a shuttle that can take you anywhere within 3-miles of the hotel and a bar at the lobby that has 'happy hour' and good food.  The downside... You have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Laradi23,  Thank you for your kind review.  Your comments about the hotel, the shuttle and the happy hour are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon. We look forward to welcoming you back.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed for three nights.  Very quiet and comfortable.  Nice happy hour perks.  Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Patrickjv2015,  Thanks for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your three days with us and that you were able to take advantage of our happy hour offering.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great first impression of hotel through Bobby
Summary: Bobby was extremely helpful and patient.  He took his time to explain how parking works, asked about my stay, and offered to help me with my bags.  He also recommended me to get breakfast at the hotel, which was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Kare987,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  Your kind comments about Bonny are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff were really friendly and helpful. I had to cancel a previous hotel reservation and the personal here help me get settled with a room. The room was really neat and clean. And they had no problem picking me up from the airport. I recommend Daniel and Andy. They were really helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Josue A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your comment about the staff is much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that Daniel and Andy were able to provide you with a great experience.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel.Very good service Bobby
Summary: I very like this hotel .Hotel very clean and cosily.   People work polite and helpful in this hotel.Especially very nice guy Bobby.He help me with my dog.He is very friendly and attentive.I staying  here second time.I am highly recommend stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kristina V,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Bobby for his exceptional service!  We appreciate your staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stay at the Wyndham in Irvine on a fairly regular basis and the staff there is amazing, especially Naveen. They're always quick with a smile, go out of their way to answer my questions and make me feel at home. Their shuttle drivers are also extremely nice. It's such a nice service to have available. Rooms are clean, restaurant has good food and the bar has great servers...my only small complaint is that the gym doesn't have a lot of equipment.
Manager Response: Dear ScottHeth,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and enjoy being your hotel of choice in Irvine.  It’s great to hear that you’re able to take advantage of some of the hotel’s many amenities.  I appreciate your feedback on the fitness center.  Though the area is not large, we try to ensure the equipment we offer allows our guests to get a solid workout while they’re staying with us.  Thanks again for your review.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Just like home at the Wyndham Irvine Property
Summary: The room is great and the staff personnel are wonderful.  I have to give a special thanks to the people at Wyndham that make me feel like it is home.  Visitors can feel free to ask for these fine employees because they will always treat you good!  I would like to name the people that make me feel special.  They are all great so there is not any specific order to the names and these are the ones that I can remember:    Karan, who is a superstar, Sofi, who is a wonderful gentleman, Gary, Naveen, Tiffany, James and of course Ross.  In the restaurant, Ashley and Ann are the best.  These individuals make me feel that this is my home away from home and if anyone wants to feel that way, please stay at the Wyndham Irvine because you definitely will be treated that special.
Manager Response: Dear Nevia H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that so many of our employees made such positive impacts on your stay with us.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with my entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We all look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everything was great at this hotel and the location is perfect in Orange County. Close to Walmart, restaurants and shopping malls.  We stayed in the suite and had a wonderful and relaxing stay.  Highly recommended for travelers whether pleasure or business!!
Manager Response: Dear 103doriss,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and your recommendation are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this Wyndham by the John Wayne Airport multiple times. Each time I have visited has been wonderful!  The staff is very pleasant and inviting!  Daniel checked me in for this 2-night stay.  He is always so helpful with a sweet demeanor and smile!     The rooms are set up beautifully, very clean and the beds are very comfortable!  They have  a great restaurant, bar, and great food!  I will definitely stay here again on my next trip!
Manager Response: Dear Arroyoe,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Daniel for his exceptional service.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that we have earned the spot as your hotel of choice when visiting the area.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: "Bobby" works at the hotel, he was very kind to drive us to Irvine University although he did not work for transport. People here are very kind and helpful. The rooms are good and clean, here is a picture of the view outside from my room window..
Manager Response: Dear Anoud Q,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Bobby and the rest of the staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: One star because you can't give zero.  After going to dinner I returned to my room around 11:30 pm. Much to my horror, when I pulled back the covers, it was obvious that the sheets had not been changed. There was a plethora of pubic hair on the sheets. I slept on top of the sheets and checked out in the morning. About a week later I contacted the hotel by email and told them of my experience. After several missed calls I finally received an email from the hotel manager informing me he had done a "thorough" investigation and that the sheets had, in fact, been changed. The inference was that I was a liar, however they would credit my account with 15,000 points! What a joke. Not even lip service as to making sure it wouldn't happen again blah blah blah, just call your customers a
Manager Response: Dear Dellanno31,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  We deeply regret the issues you experienced while staying at our hotel.  Your review has been discussed in detail with my team and we are all fully committed to ensuring all of our guests have a much better experience than the one you have described.  I hope that you’ll consider our hotel again.  We look forward to providing you with the stay you deserve.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This was my first visit to California. Our shuttle driver Bobby was great and provided 5 star service. Bobby provides superior Customer service. Gina in concierge was phenomenal. I truly look forward to returning for next business trip.
Manager Response: Dear Shakhan K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that Bobby and Gina were able to help make your stay enjoyable.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with both of them. We all look forward to welcoming you back soon and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed there over Thanksgiving while visiting family in the area. Couldn't have been more pleased. Great customer service, clean and very comfortable room. Definitely would stay there again. Easy access to airport, too.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer g,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My wife and I began a new tradition of a 2 day local excursion to do our Christmas shopping. Although we live 30 miles from Irvine, it was far enough to feel like a mini vacation. We had a lot of fun and were productive with regard to our Christmas shopping as well. The resort was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. Overall an excellent experience. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear EricfT4927EA,  Thank you for including us in your new tradition and for taking the time to provide us with such positive feedback.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and even happier to hear that you’ll be back.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Overall my stay was fine except for the fact that I discovered upon getting home, that I was charged for an extra meal that I did not have.  For one night, I was charged for the room service dinner that I did have, but then was also simultaneously charged for a second meal in the restaurant, even though I had not eaten there.
Manager Response: Dear D5286EYchristopherb,  Thank you for your review.  I apologize for the extra charge for the restaurant meal.  I trust that you have been able to resolve this with my team. If not, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me directly and I will be more than happy to look into this.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Good, but lacking attention to detail
Summary: First of all, the Wyndham here in Irvine is nice.  But I have some mixed feelings about it.  While it is a nice, make that very nice hotel, there are some issues.  As for the plusses, the rooms are very nice, the beds are comfortable, the staff extremely friendly and helpful, and overall it’s a nice place.  The work desk had plenty of space to work.  Despite its proximity to the freeway, which my window faced, and the airport, the room was whisper quiet. But I have some reservations that keep me providing a higher rating.  As nice and modern as this place is, there are some maintenance issues.  The TV was persnickety and took some fidgeting with the remote to get some of the channels to work properly.  The toilet would run continuously unless you raise up the handle.  There were
Manager Response: Dear Valleyblue,  Thank you for staying with us and for the very thorough review.  Your feedback is valuable to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize for the issues you experienced.  I have shared your review with my team and we are committed to ensuring your next stay with us is much better.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with a 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at the Wyndham Irvine (for the second time) and our experience from check in to check out was amazing. We were greeted with a warm welcome by the valet, and were checked in by Daniel P. Daniel assisted us with a late check out, helped us sign up for the Wyndham rewards program and made us feel very welcomed. Our housekeeping staff, waitress at brunch, and even the chef at the Paradise were all wonderful. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Kwetabug,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Daniel for his amazing service!  Your kind comments are much appreciated and I will be sure to share them with my entire team!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here numerous times. My husband and I have stayed together, and each of us has stayed alone on various trips. We live 100 miles away, and don't want to drive home when we come down on the weekend to visit friends and entertainment venues. And we love the proximity to John Wayne Airport,, to the beach, shopping, and entertainment. It is always beautifully clean and comfortable. My one gripe is $18 a night for parking, and there is no available street parking within walking distance. However, being a member of Wyndham Rewards brought that cost down, and it is much appreciated. The rooms are very comfortable, there is a wonderful view from everywhere, and the staff provides great service.
Manager Response: Dear 172dinad,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for being a Wyndham Rewards member!  We appreciate your many stays and truly enjoy being your hotel of choice in Irvine.  We look forward to your next visits and to providing you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: A week end with our grand kids
Summary: The room was fantastic. We were on the 10th floor in a corner room, with a great view of Orange county. My wife wouldn't let me close the drapes so she could look out the windows. The room was clean, and comfortable, and we actually wanted to spend more time there. But the reason we were there was to see our kids... But we will be back again
Manager Response: Dear Larryz590,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your weekend with us and that your wife enjoyed the view!  We look forward to your next visit and hope that you’ll have a bit more time to enjoy your room the next time you’re in town.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I like the hotel but very disappointed about being charge for a fridge. I don't think that you should charge for a fridge in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanetted77,  Thank you for the 5-star review and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m sorry to hear that you were not pleased with the fridge delivery fee.  Your opinion is valuable to us and we will take it into consideration as we discuss our current policies here at the hotel.  Thanks again for your review.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Typical place for the business people rather than tourists. Due to the location practically in the middle of the cross-roads, you may find the rooms noisy and difficult to sleep well. I have attached the picture taken from the 9th floor but it looks and feels it is rather 3-4th and the road is really close to you. Food choice for the buffet breakfast is very limited comparing to the European 4 stars standards. No vegetables, if you do not count potatoes, no meat cuts and cheeses. Omelette station is the only viable option to eat. Room are equipped with very decent ironing sets. Internet is quick and stable. Room service works very fast, I had my steak delivered in maybe less than 20 minutes. Do not take the cheapest white wine – it is barely drinkable at all.
Manager Response: Dear Palek,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize that our buffet and wine did not meet your expectations.  Though this is an area we usually get high marks in, I will be sharing your feedback with my Director of Food & Beverage.  We will certainly take your feedback into consideration.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We would love the opportunity to earn a 5-star rating on your next visit.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were in room 1212 next to the elevator and we didn't hear it once!!!. We had a very nice view of the city and our room was great. King bed that was very comfortable. The staff were very friendly and very efficient. The hotel has a very tiny store, not really a store just vending machines by the front desk, nice lobby and lots of parking. Free wifi  but $18.00 a nite to park your car. I had requested adjoining rooms as we were traveling with  his 2 older sisters but they got room on 7th floor. It was a very quiet hotel and  a good location for what we came.
Manager Response: Dear SanchaRose,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I apologize for not being able to accommodate your request for connecting rooms.  We do our best to provide our guests what they are looking for, but can be limited in our ability to do so when our occupancy is high.  I hope you will be traveling back our way soon.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We thought the rate was OK when we first made the reservation.  What we didn't know was you had to pay for parking at $18 a day.  How many people don't have a car at a hotel?  Also if you wanted a refrigerator it was an additional $10.  Soap in the bathroom, we got a total of one small bar for our 3 night stay.  They can't afford to put a bar of soap for the bath and sink?  Thermostat limited the lowest temperature to 65 degrees. Free coffee in the lobby maybe would make you feel better, um no.  They direct you to the Starbucks in they're restaurant. The 2 micro cups you can make in your room don't cut it.  Maybe these kind of issues are more common in California but it isn't anywhere else. On the upside the bar and restaurant had good food and service.  Also Specialty's Café
Manager Response: Dear Tony K,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  Your feedback is valuable to us and I will be sure to share your review with the rest of my team.  Should you find yourself back in our area, we’d love the opportunity to provide you with a better stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Spacious Rooms, Friendly Staff, Comfy Beds!
Summary: Stayed here on business for a week about a month ago.  The rooms were quite spacious and the beds were extremely comfortable.  So much that it made it difficult to get up for my early morning workouts.  The gym could be better, but I managed to make use of the equipment in there to program my crossfit wods.  The staff was very friendly, especially Ana Cruz, the hostess who greeted me every morning with a warm smile and friendly "good morning!" as I entered the breakfast buffet.  The food was very tasty.  I especially enjoyed the salmon and veggies on the menu as well as the kobe burger.  I didn't leave the hotel much but I did notice it was in close proximity to eateries and a shopping mall.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Msladyk,  Thank you for the great 5-stare review!  I am happy to hear your week with us was so enjoyable.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments with Ana and the rest of the team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Thanks to Bobby who works at the Belldesk!!he was the one who helped us carry our items and luggages around back and forth to our room..He was of great help when we came back to the room everyday with tons of bags in our hands.. He really deserves a high recommendation!!
Manager Response: Dear Yara B,  Thank you for the great feedback and for recognizing Bobby for the exceptional service he provided.  Your kind comments are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Overall my stay met my expectations.  I've stayed at this...
Summary: Overall my stay met my expectations.  I've stayed at this property before and everything was great.
Manager Response: Dear P4189VAalexb,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that we were able to meet your expectations and provide you with a positive experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Daniel was awesome. Everyone should ask for him at the front desk. Professional and helpful. Great attitude!
Summary: The room had an amazing view of the airport and Orange County at night. Room was super spacious and very clean. The wife and I had an amazing stay and are definitely coming back. So far this Wyndham and the New Yorker by Wyndham have met our expectation.
Manager Response: Dear Uli714,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for calling out the awesome service you received from Daniel!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a pleasant stay. Very clean hotel and wonderful staff. Breakfast was amazing. A Big thank you to Daniel at the front desk for checking us in quickly and helping us with parking and accommodating all of our needs. I would highly recommend this hotel and I am looking forward staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tatyananeborak,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kid comments about the hotel and about Daniel are much appreciated.  Like you, we are looking forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed staying at this hotel every time. The rooms are very clean, the staff incredibly kind and willing to go the extra mile, and the hotel manager is a wonderful man (I had an interaction with him regarding my stay) with a good heart, and desire to help at every turn. The hotel is well managed and is in an excellent location. I would recommend this hotel over the Embassy Suites next door for your next stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ali S,  Thank you for staying with us and for the very kind 5-star review!  It’s great to know that we’ve earned the spot as your choice hotel in Irvine.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great spot for a beach weekend getaway
Summary: We loved this hotel! It's close enough to the beach but away from the crowds. It sits in a sort of business park and it was nice and quiet at night. No refrigerator though, so don't plan on taking back your leftovers when you eat out.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifervazquez,  Thank you for the nice review.  I’m happy to hear that you loved your stay with us.  Should you find yourself back in the hotel, please keep in mind that a mini-fridge can be delivered to your room if needed.  Thanks again and please hurry back!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have been traveling to Irvine frequently lately and have stayed in several hotels around the John Wayne Airport area.   The front desk staff is really your gateway to a good room on a good floor and has information about the area.  Most of the hotels in the area, the front desk staff is stiff, meaning they really do not make you feel welcome. The Wyndham is completely the opposite!  The last few times I have stayed there I dealt with Kumar at the front desk.  He always remembers me and greets me by name. He even knows that I like to have a room closer to the elevator and will accommodate me without me asking.  He has a great smile and demeanor that is totally conducive to making you feel welcome and important!  The last time I was there, Kumar was not at the desk. The other
Manager Response: Dear Kristi S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share your review with Karan and the rest of the team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I travel to this hotel frequently to visit my daughter in college. On this occasion my husband was with me.  We were completely overwhelmed with a surprise upgrade to a suite from Karan Kumar. Everyone treated us like a special visitor and went out of their way to make it beyond comfortable.  The operator, Jennifer was so helpful. When I come to Irvine, THIS is where I am staying... for good.
Manager Response: Dear Madeline T,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that Karan and the rest of my team were able to provide you with such a positive experience!  We are thrilled to be your hotel of choice and look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had some hiccups, and unprepared guests and family... Bobby and Andrew up front helped make something nearly impossible come through. They were ALWAYS on top of making sure we had the best outcome possible, very helpful and went ABOVE and BEYOND to make sure we got everything we needed and then some. I would recommend this hotel to anyone, and we look forward to being back in the area to stay there once again.
Manager Response: Dear Miranda P,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that Bobby and Andrew were able to assist you and that they helped to deliver an exceptional experience.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: My experiance at Irvine Wyndham hotel
Summary: Karan was the manager of the Wyndham hotel in Irvine, and for the first time after comng here for two years we were extremely pleased.  Karan was helpful, polite, informative, and very warm in his presence.  We enjoyed our stay, and exspecially liked Karan and the service he provided.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Karan for his exceptional service!  I am happy to hear that you’ve been a regular customer of ours and even happier to hear that Karan was able to take your stay to a higher level.  I am pleased to inform you that Karan was just recognized with as our Associate of the Quarter because of the many review likes yours that we’ve received.  Thanks again!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This property is a well-located hotel in Irvine, near John Wayne Airport, many restaurants, and easy freeway access.  The rooms are clean and well-appointed.  The staff is friendly and efficient.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Nancyceleste,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel’s amenities and staff are much appreciated!  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us to provide you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Comfortable room, great staff. Quiet on the weekend.  Business area and not many places to eat open late. Especially on the weekend
Manager Response: Dear James S,  Thank you for the nice review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Should you find yourself back at our hotel on a weekend and looking for late night dining options, please see our Guest Services team.  They’ll be happy to refer you to one of the many options located in our neighborhood.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great price, great comfortable and clean room. Stayed here several times and always had a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Davlyns2015,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for making us your choice hotel when traveling to Irvine!  We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel was good value. Need to fix cracked tile getting onto...
Summary: Hotel was good value. Need to fix cracked tile getting onto elevator. Food in restaurant was not that great.
Manager Response: Dear Sharone960,  Thank you for the nice review.  Your kind comments about the hotel and the restaurant are much appreciated.  I also appreciate your feedback about the cracked terrazzo on the lobby floor.  That is a major project that is being discussed and we hope to have a resolution soon.  Though it does not pose a safety risk, we certainly understand that it needs to be fixed.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The bed is so comfortable. Very clean room and bathroom. Service is great. Amanda at the front desk was very nice and helpful. Some room are very close to the Hwy so you get a little bit of noise, but nothing major. Good selection for the room service menu, some options can be expensive (fish dishes). Parking $18 overnight. Good WiFi, quick connection.
Manager Response: Dear Julie D,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and recognizing Amanda for the helpful service she provided.  I’ll be sure to share your review with my entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to delivering another 5-star experience to you!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had arrived late to check and realized then that I had over booked my stay. Karan was very helpful & more than accommodating to help through the refund process when booking through Priceline.   I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear K U,  Thank you for the kind review and for recognizing Karan for the helpful service he delivered.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we are able to earn a 5-star rating from you on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I loved this hotel. Not so much this time. The front desk staff this time was short and rude. My room had the view of a rock roof and an air coditioning unit. I walked in the room and pushed the ottoman with my foot and the leg fell off. The front desk staff was very rude. I had to pay for a second room for my assistant. I just checked in and they asked me for my Id again for the credit card I just used. Then he got more rude and said we don't do it that way. There are many choices around and I could take my company's business elsewhere. We booked 7 rooms that night. Not good customer service!!!
Manager Response: Hello Timothy,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I deeply regret the issues you experienced.  I wanted you to know that we have discussed your concerns in detail and we have conducted additional service training in an effort to ensure your next experience with us is much better.  We value your business and want to continue to be your hotel of choice in Irvine.  I hope you will provide us the opportunity to deliver the experience you deserve on your next visit to the area.    Thanks Again,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel . service and food
Summary: We did a reservation for Wyndham hotel and found very economic and clean. We have been welcomed by bellboy Bobby. He was very helpful at every part. He arranged everything we needed. Very friendly and hardworking person. We also saw same attention at the reception and restaurant. Breakfast buffet was excellent at the restaurant. Room were very clean  and good size. We recommend everybody to go and visit that hotel. We will go there whenever we need to stay at Irvine. Prices by the way compare the quality very affordable.
Manager Response: Dear Tulin E,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your feedback about the hotel, the staff, and the breakfast buffet are much appreciated!  Thank you as well for recognizing Bobby for his service.  I will be sure to share your review with Bobby and the rest of the team.  We all look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was very accommodating.  Our event went off without a hitch,  We were very happy with the support we rec'd from the hotel mgmnt.
Manager Response: Dear Jim W,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear your event went well.  I hope you will consider us for your next reunion.  We would truly enjoy welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: was nevery told about any amenities
Summary: At check in I was never told about a 150 security deposit whichas I feel is a bit high also I wast informed about breal fast when I went to ask about a  voucher I was told rudely that your rate doesn't come with a voucher
Manager Response: Dear X7392FXdaniels,  Thank you for your review.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I apologize for the surprise with the security deposit.  Based on the deposit secured, it appears your stay was for more than one night.  Though we understand that the practice of collecting a security deposit may not be familiar to all travelers, it is the policy of most hotel chains.  I would also like to apologize for the rude response you received from my staff.  Though it is true that not all rates include breakfast, this should always be communicated in a friendly and positive way.  I have shared your feedback with by Director of Rooms and it has been addressed with our staff.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was here for a high school reunion event.  The hotel was very accommodating, nice rooms, and great service.  This was my second stay at the hotel and I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear 356bonnieh,  Thank you for staying with us again and for taking the time to share your feedback!  We appreciate your repeat business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Beautiful Hotel! Always such nice hospitality here especially Bobby. Very sweet! Everyone is great. Very clean and luxurious at a great price.  I highly recommend you all to stay here when in town. Thanks Wyndham in Irvine- Orange County Airport :)
Manager Response: Dear Crystal G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  We especially appreciate you taking the time to recognize Bobby for his exceptional service.  I will be sure to share your review with our entire team.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The overall experience was refreshing.  The staff was very helpful and professional. The rooms were spacious, just what I expected. The conference meeting rooms were comfortable and inviting. The dining was exceptional. I am looking forward to our meeting next year at the same location.
Manager Response: Dear Jeromeej,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the dining are much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you and your meeting back next year!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Not my top choice in Irvine
Summary: The Wyndham is not my first choice to stay when I am here. Even though I was on a business trip with expenses reimbursed, I would not want to come here for any other reason. There is no free breakfast, you have to pay I think at least 15/day for it. Parking per day is more than that. I requested a fridge in my room and it was not provided. There is a microwave on every floor near the ice/vending machines, not in individual rooms. The service and rooms are nice, but it was these little things that irritated my stay. I would much rather stay at the Embassy Suites in the next building that has free breakfast,WiFi, cocktails, and cheaper parking. Also, when checking in, I informed the employee I did not want to sign up for Wyndham rewards but I was still required to fill out the
Manager Response: Dear A8080TNsuzie,  Thank you for your review.  I’m sorry to hear that we were unable to meet all of your needs.  I apologize for the fridge not being delivered and for the issue you experienced with the Wyndham Rewards enrollment.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are conducting some additional training to ensure these issues do not repeat.  I certainly understand your desire for the many amenities you mentioned.  We recognize that there are more expensive hotels in the area that offer these items  We want you to select the hotel that best fits your need.  Should you decide to return to our hotel, we will do all we can to ensure your stay is enjoyable despite the lack of some of the amenities you mentioned.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good clean hotel.  Not fond of the $18 parking charge.  Not much in terms of eateries in walking distance but the food in the lounge was pretty good.  Early check in was available and I checked in at around 10a.m.
Manager Response: Dear Honolulutraveler,  Thank you for the kind review!  I appreciate you choosing Wyndham for your stay in Irvine.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  Should you find yourself back in our hotel, please ask the desk for a list of walking distance restaurants.  We have 20+ restaurants within a short walk from the hotel.  Thanks again!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We travel all over and very often. As a matter of fact in the last 3 weeks this is our 4th hotel.   The staff, very unpleasant and not helpful at all. When we arrived we were told by the bellman to unload luggage and go park our vehicle prior to checking in. Once we checked in and got into our room found the newly renovated room to have new carpet, and nothing else. No safe in room for your personal items either. Went to leave hotel couldn't get out of parking lot as when we checked in they didn't ask us if we had a vehicle so they didn't program our card to get out of the parking lot.   Nobody was ever in the restaurant, we went and nobody was there to staff, we waited 10 minutes, then left. As we were leaving someone came out of the back but we said "we're leaving". Didn't
Manager Response: Dear Mtrusnack,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry about your experience with my hotel.  I have shared your feedback with my entire team.  The many issues you experienced have been discussed in great detail and we have put actions in place to ensure future guests do not encounter the same problems.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with me.  I assure you; your feedback has been heard and addressed.  Thank you again.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I work for a company that has a great relationship with this hotel. We always recommend them whenever some one comes into town. Rooms are extremely clean, very spacious and modern. I mostly host events in their ballroom on the 2nd floor. The ballroom is huge fitting over 300 guest, it doesn't have any of those weird hotel colors and tacky carpet. It has neutral décor. The best party about hosting events here is working with Marilu, she is always the manager onsite for our events. I cannot tell you how hard she works to make your event exactly what you want and more. Countless times she has saved our event. She thinks on her feet and is so nice and charismatic. I highly recommend using this location for any event space!
Manager Response: Dear Megan R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We truly appreciate being your choice hotel for events in Irvine.  Thank you as well for your very kind comments about Marilu.  She is a great asset to our hotel and to our clients and it’s great to be able to share feedback like yours with her.  We look forward to your next event!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Our stay here has Always been excellant. The Managers, staff at front desk are Amazing. Very professional  and makes sure your stay is one of the best. Excellant Customer Service. Beds are so comfortable and I recommend  this Hotel to everyone.  I give this motel High Ratings.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the comfort of the beds are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: When your away from home and busy, busy, busy with a conference your attending there is nothing more important than a lovely smile and greeting first thing in the morning at breakfast.   No the food wasn't top notch, and it was always sort of slow to get, but Maribel our waitress made our wait so pleasant it was not an issue!  My friend and I were attending a writers conference and enjoyed our breakfast and sometimes lunch served by Maribel, whose conversation and attentiveness was beyond all other servers. If I owed a restaurant I would steal her away!! Kathy and Darlene
Manager Response: Dear Darlene Q,  Thank you for your very kind review!  Your comments about Maribel are much appreciated.  I’m sorry to hear about the time it took to serve you, but I’m happy to hear that Maribel was able to make your experience pleasant.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: nice and friendly staff, clean rooms - will stay again.only issue was the cost for parking $$$, ouch!
Manager Response: Dear 268melvinl,  Thank you for your review.  We value your business and your feedback.  Your kind comment about the staff and clean rooms is much appreciated. I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Front desk makes you feel welcome
Summary: I booked the Wyndham on Von Karemen in Irvine several times, but the last time I visited Karan Kuhmar at the front desk was both accommodating and fun to work with. He has a very welcoming attitude and since the front desk is the first people you meet with, he made us feel extremely happy to be staying there.
Manager Response: Dear RoyalRoadInc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate your repeat business.  Your kind comments about Karan are much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with Karan and my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I DID NOT KNOW THIS PLACE EXIST
Summary: I was looking for an affordable place and I found out that there is a Wyndham Irvine. I like this place better than the previous hotels that I was in at Costa Mesa. I will be a returning customer for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Valentino M,  Thanks for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear you found us and that we’ve earned the spot as your choice hotel in Orange County!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham Irvine/Orange County Airport recently while visiting my son at school.  I chose this property because of value, close proximity to the school, reputation and positive reviews and because they allow small dogs.  We ended up not bringing our dog after all, but appreciate the Wyndham for accommodating pets.  The hotel is nicely appointed in sleek, contemporary decor, and is impeccably clean and quiet, despite its location near the airport. Free wifi - thank you!  $18 parking per day not appreciated - my suggestion: just bump up the room rate and include parking.  Our room was spacious enough, clean and nicely appointed.  Only suggestion for Wyndham and many other hotels that offer rooms with "two double beds" is to offer two queen beds instead of two full
Manager Response: Dear HornsofCA,  Thank you for the very thorough review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you would recommend our hotel.  Your kind comments about the hotel, the amenities and the restaurant are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and hope that you’ll be able to bring your dog with you when you make it back our way!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Love this place because the staff is so attentive! Daniel P. made sure that my stay was amazing. He covered every detail and even anticipated things I had not thought of. If your wondering like I was if this place is worth it. It is because the location is in the heart of everything. It's clean modern and the breakfast included fresh bananas. There is a pool but it's indoor and the micro gym gets the job done. Stay here on biz or just cuz ;)
Manager Response: Dear E G,  Thank you for the great 5-srat review and for taking the time to share with us your experience with Daniel!  I greatly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share your review with my entire team.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Amoderately good place to crash over night. The toilet...
Summary: Amoderately good place to crash over night. The toilet flush was continuously flowing during my stay. The airconditioner was not cold enough even at 68 F. Its a very moderate hotel for a short stay.
Manager Response: Dear Nipanjana,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I’m sad to hear that we weren’t able to provide you with a better experience.  I apologize for the issues you experienced with the toilet and the AC.  I certainly understand how both of these issues can impact a guest’s ability to get a good night’s rest.  I have shared your feedback with my team.  We are committed to ensuring your next visit is much better should you be willing to try us again.  We look forward to providing you with the 5-star experience you deserve.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: When I book this room for our 3 day stay, I booked an Executive suite and thought that I was just going to get a little extra bump out for a sofa and chair, and was surprised to see that our room was actually a suite with two rooms (living and dining room and bedroom with two full bathrooms) and were on the concierge floor with free continental breakfast and free cocktails and savories in the evening.  The hotel was fabulous.  It made our stay in Orange County great.
Manager Response: Dear Charles F,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our Executive Suite exceeded your expectations.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great location, Great service,  Confused did I pay less or just get less after the first day? The first day there were water bottles then there were not.  If only one towel was used I was one short the next day.
Manager Response: Dear DanbH5551MV,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  I appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback.  I wanted to take a minute to address your question about getting less.  The hotel provides two complimentary bottles of water to our guests on their day of arrival only.  We want to make sure guests have something to drink in their rooms when they first arrive.  We have a small market in the lobby for any additional needs our guests may have.  Regarding the linen, I apologize if my team did not properly replenish your towels.  They should have replaced any towels that were removed.  I have shared your review with my Executive Housekeeper.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: What a pleasant surprise! I stayed at The Wyndham Irvine with a colleague of mine for a conference and then we decided to stay an extra day for a brain storming session. Daniel at the front desk and the restaurant staff treated us like royalty. They anticipated our needs every step of the way! Wyndham Irvine is the perfect business hotel that caters to executives in a way that makes us feel special.
Manager Response: Dear Christie C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about Daniel and the rest of the team are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: You can ask for anything you like. A fridge in your room, a phone charger to use during your stay, and the staff will shuttle you to nearby locations, which is a huge plus. I had to bug them to leave coffee in my room daily and search for staff at the restaurants, but other than that, I was very pleased with the helpfulness of the staff and the cleanliness of the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear 811claudiaw,  Thank you for the very kind review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of so many of the hotel’s amenities and services.  I do apologize for the issues you experienced with the coffee and restaurant staff.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are all committed to ensuring your next stay is a 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed here many times.  We use Priceline then upgrade to a suite for an extra $30 or so, which provides access to the concierge level -- not sure why they do this but the only drawback is the breakfast and cocktail hour amenities occur during the week and not weekends although you still pay for it in the suite upgrade. The hotel is a bit tired and the pool/workout area isn't on par with the rest of the property but the rooms are clean and the service is excellent.    Frankly, we've noticed if it weren't for Sofiane, the front office manager, and the level of service he seems to expect (his linked-in shows he came from a five-star hotel in Newport and Italy) from the staff we wouldn't stay here.  He remembers us and makes us feel welcomed, which is important.
Manager Response: Dear S O,  Thank you for the 5-star review.  I am happy to hear that Sofiane and his team have been able to provide you with such a positive experience.  We value your business and look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The service was good, I liked the room, the location in...
Summary: The service was good, I liked the room, the location in Irvine was convenient for the Writer's Conference held there and which I attended, and what I liked best was that I got the room in the same hotel where the event was conducted.  I only wish that the rooms had a security box, small refrigerator and came with a pair of indoor slippers!
Manager Response: Dear Crunni,  Thank you for your kind review.  We enjoyed having the Writer’s Conference at our hotel and look forward to welcoming you back in future years.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  For you next visit, please keep in mind that we can have a small fridges and slippers available to be delivered to your room.  Just make your request at the desk when you check in.  Also, we do have safety deposit boxes available at the desk if needed.  Thanks again!  We appreciate your feedback.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Clean & nice hotel, no outdoor pool, was indoors & not very appealing.   Nice bar, friendly staff.Air conditioner in rm was very loud.  Nice to have shuttle service but no one told us of this perk.
Manager Response: Dear Susan J,  Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  Your kind comments about the cleanliness and staff are much appreciated.  I apologize for any inconvenience the AC might have caused you.  I have shares your review with y team and we are all committed to ensuring your next stay with us is a 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Everything was going well except parking. I experienced the...
Summary: Everything was going well except parking. I experienced the inconvenience of in/ out of the gate.
Manager Response: Dear 257duc,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that you experienced issues getting in and out of the parking lot.  I have shared your review with my team.  We are committed to making sure the gates are functioning properly at all times and will make every effort to ensure you do not experience similar issues on your next stay.  I hope your travels bring you back soon.  We would love to provide the 5-star experience that you deserve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was nice, we loved the corner suite. But Daniel P at the front desk went out of his way to make our trip amazing. We had a nightmare issue with our rental car and he arranged for their shuttle to transport us so we could return it and get to the new rental location. I was traveling alone with my daughter and it really gave me peace of mind to know that he would help us. We'll definitely stay there from now on!
Manager Response: Dear DenaDN,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about the service that Daniel provided to you are much appreciated.  I’m happy he was able to help you with your transportation needs.  Thanks again and hurry back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel was clean and just the right size for my needs. I...
Summary: The hotel was clean and just the right size for my needs. I stayed here for 5 days and did not have any problem at all. I only needed to buy my own water because free water bottles are only good during the first day. I love that they have the flavored water at the main entrance of the hotel. My room has an iron and iron board which I love during my hotel stays. The internet was free and with excellent speed. The staff was friendly and courteous. I love the pillows too!
Manager Response: Dear Mabellejoygolingv,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and all the amenities we have to offer.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Employees have a really bad attitude -- must come from the top.
Summary: I attended a conference here over the weekend. Not one of the employees has a smile on their face -- when you can find an employee that is. During our opening session yesterday, the conference organizer said our breakout sessions would be delayed because clearly only one person from the hotel was working our conference and so the conference organizers would need to pull across the air walls themselves to divide up the meeting rooms and arrange the tables as there was no one else there to help beyond the one guy who was also in charge of bringing water, glasses, etc.  A special quick buffet luncheon has available for us on Saturday at $14.95. It consisted of two different kinds of pasta, a piece of focaccia, and lettuce. For those of us who can't eat gluten, there was really
Manager Response: Dear TravelingGal62,  Thank you for providing your feedback.  I am very sorry for your experience at our hotel.  The many issues you’ve shared are unacceptable and your review has been discussed with my entire team.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback as it has provided us with the opportunity to learn and improve.  I hope you will consider returning to our hotel in the future.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with the stay that you deserve.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The check-in desk people should greet & welcome guests when they walk through the lobby doors and wish them a good day when they depart. If they are all busy, they do not need to. But I stayed there a week & no one acknowledged my presence. Was it because I did not wear a business suit? ALSO, shoving a bill (to pay for parking) under my hotel door, while I AM SLEEPING, is insulting. Why would any hotel do that? Would you even want to touch something that was laying on the floor?  The paper stated that they were charging me $18.00 per day for parking at the hotel! Another insult. What did I pay for when I booked this trip? Is it customary to charge ala carte for parking? Why should a hotel guest pay for parking anyway? I will NEVER stay at this hotel or another Wyndham hotel
Manager Response: Dear Naomiellenk,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that my staff did not make you feel welcome during your stay.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Guest Services and we are conducting some additional service training to ensure this issue is resolved.  Regarding the folio that was provided to your room and the parking fees, these are very common practices with the hotel industry.  Many hotels provide a copy of the invoice in this manner and most hotels at or near an airport or downtown location charge parking fees for guests that utilize their lot.  In fact, most hotels in the Irvine area charge rates above our rates.  I certainly understand that this may not make these practices acceptable for you but I did want to communicate that these procedures are common.  I hope that you’ll reconsider staying with us should you find yourself back in our area.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel but could do with updating
Summary: The Wyndham is a good business hotel, located close to the airport and many businesses in the area. The rooms do have that 80's feeling, and could do with some updating. Breakfast is good and staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Hamburg103a,  Thank you for your kind review.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m happy to hear that the location worked well for you and that you enjoyed the breakfast at our hotel.  I hope your travels bring you back soon.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was very impressed with the hotel.  The rooms were good and all the amenities were outstanding.  The lounge area was very fun.
Manager Response: Dear Richard H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the amenities are much appreciated.  We look forward to you next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Adequate accommodations.  I specifically stayed at this hotel to attend a conference, which in past years had been held at the Radisson.
