There's no balcony at this hotel, no in-room refrigerator, and no in-room safe (the safe is located down in the lobby - so I read but didn't confirm). Most disappointing was no soap in the bathroom.  Had to call down and have soap delivered to the room.  Completed the breakfast in-room dining card so we could have breakfast delivered by 6:30 a.m. -- received a call in the morning asking whether we had placed an order for breakfast because they had found our order form tucked away in a desk and weren't sure whether it was a current request.  Dinner had to pay cash for our room service because we were told the computers weren't working to charge
Manager Response: Dear Rosalind42,  Thank you for the very thorough review.  I am sorry that we were unable to provide you with the experience you expected and deserved.  The credit card issue you shared is regrettable, but, fortunately, not common.  Our ability to process credit cards is dependent on the ability of our system to communicate with the banks.  We did have some connectivity issues recently, but I am happy to inform you that this has been resolved and this should not be an area of concern moving forward.  I’m also sorry to hear about the mix up with your breakfast order.  I’m happy to hear the food was delivered, but apologize that you had to be called to confirm the order.  Regarding the coffee at dessert, this is always an option offered to our meeting planners but we will always go with what they have selected.  I hope that your experience wasn’t so bad that you won’t give us another shot.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with the 5-star experience you deserve!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very comfortable; great location near airport and within...
Summary: Very comfortable; great location near airport and within reasonable walking distance of numerous restaurants.  Staff was friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear 81earled,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel are much appreciated.  It’s great to hear you were able to take advantage of the many restaurants in our area.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The service and hospitality from the moment of check-in to my final check-out date was beyond excellent.  The bed was very comfortable; however, I personally prefer a firmer type bed and not the pillowtop style.  I probably could have requested that, butvwas already settled in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Dwightgirl,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: the airport shuttle service was great.the tv was...
Summary: the airport shuttle service was great. the tv was non-responsive or at best extremely slow responding to the remote. there was a nasty stain on the material covering the footstool.  I put a towel over it. it was quiet and comfortable, I slept very well. I ordered room-service which arrived about 10 - 15 minutes later than promised, but the food was excellent. there was some slight smell of sewer gas from the a/c, which seemed odd as I was in a room on the 8th floor.  the a/c was very effective.
Manager Response: Dear RobertrU3754SK,  Thank you for the great feedback!  We appreciate you choosing our hotel and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m sorry to hear about the issues you experienced and have shared your review with my team.  We are committed to addressing these issues and ensuring your next stay with us is a 5-star stay!  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel!  Love the location - it's close to everything - restaurants, entertainment, and the 405 freeway.  Loved my view from the 12th floor.  All the staff is so nice and helpful.  You can't beat this hotel for a good night's sleep either - top of the line bed and linens.  I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Connie K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Well we booked this hotel on the spot as the other hotel we were to stay in was not very accommodating.  I can not say enough of how wonderful we were treated. We were greeted by Gina. Who could not do enough for us. The young woman at the front desk immediately found us a corner  room which was twice the size of a normal hotel room.  My husband was having daily eye surgeries and all we wanted was a clean nice hotel. And that is what we got.  I can not say enough about how great the front desk,housekeeping and other services were.  We are still here to Saturday but I just wanted to thank all for a quite pleasant stay and for accommodating us on short notice. You are all  wonderful.. Thanks again!!
Manager Response: Dear Nora S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your business and your feedback are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that Gina and the rest of the team took such great care of you.  I hope that you surgeries went well and that your trip was a complete success.  We look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We just used the Wyndham for a special meeting last eve, September 15th--superb staff led by Josie Blandino, catering director/Sales manager and shout out to Marilli who worked and supervised the function until the very end--Food was very good and the service was seamless. The trade group we hosted said it was one of their best meetings....
Manager Response: Dear John S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you choosing our hotel and taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am happy to hear that your event went so well and I will be sure to share your great comments with Josie, Marilu, and the entire banquets team.  Thanks again!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay near John Wayne Airport
Summary: This is a good place to spend the evening after a long cross country flight. Also a short drive to Newport Beach. Room was spacious and clean. Excellent bedding. However, there is no microwave or refrigerator in the room. The vending room did have a microwave that could be used. The lobby has a mini - market for after hours snacks. Free continental breakfast on the 14th floor lobby/elevator area was good.
Manager Response: Dear FRE2RUN,  Thank you for the kind review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of the complimentary breakfast in the Executive Lounge.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Air conditioner was so loud, I got only three hours of sleep the first night. The office changed my room the next day.  It was better the second night, but only got four hours of sleep.  It was a business trip, so it was hard to function at the meeting.
Manager Response: Dear Warren C,  Thank you for your email.  I apologize for your experience with the AC noise.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Engineering and we have revisited our preventative maintenance program to ensure the AC’s are services more frequently.  Again, I apologize for your experience and hope you will consider us again in the future.  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The comforter and decor on the bed were stained. The air...
Summary: The comforter and decor on the bed were stained. The air conditioner was soo unbelievably loud and squeaky that we could not sleep. I would not recommend this hotel, I wish we had stayed at the Westin South Coast as we had only switched to be closer to the airport for drop off the next morning, very huge regret.
Manager Response: Dear Ksj956,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your disappointment in our hotel.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are committed to learning from your experience and providing all of guests with a better stay.  I hope you will reconsider and provide us with another opportunity in the future.     Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: When booking room it's description indicates City view and our surprise buisness office buildings view! No city! Total dissapointment
Manager Response: Dear Marthar247,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear you were not pleased with the view from your room.  Though we typically get positive feedback from our guests about the views, I can certainly understand your disappointment if you expected something more.  I hope the rest of your stay was great and that you will be willing to visit us again when you travel back our way.    Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Was ok bathroom door was loose so it woke everyone up when using the restroom. The neighbors were very noise so was a bit expensive for the room.
Manager Response: Dear J2740TNdavidm,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about the noise you experienced.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Engineering.  He has reviewed your feedback with our preventative maintenance team and they are checking all bathroom doors to ensure this issue is resolved.  Again, I apologize for your experience.    Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My main complaint is the hidden fees that seems common in most hotels now and days.  I do not like having to pay extra for parking especially when I'm in the suburb.  The other weird thing is the direction for the pool has you going to the 3rd floor only to take the elevator to the ground floor.  Shouldn't there be a more direct route. I was also unable to get internet access due to something happening on the MAC layer.
Manager Response: Dear 217trit,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I’m sorry we weren’t able to earn a 5-star review form you.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will take it into account as we move forward.  Though I understand your frustration with the parking, these fees are standard for airport properties.  We continue to keep our rates at the low end of what the full-service hotels charge in Irvine.  Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do about the pool access.  That is a structural design that cannot be modified.  I’m also sorry to hear that you were unable to connect to our complimentary Wi-Fi.  That is not a common issue here and I regret that we were unable to resolve the problem.  Again, we appreciate your stay and hope that you’ll try us again in the future.  We would love the opportunity to earn a 5-star rating from you on your next visit!     Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay.  Daniel P. provided outstanding customer service.  He was handling the front desk by himself, and managed to help out a bunch of people --including us -- very quickly.  And, the room was really nice.
Manager Response: Dear Evan11111,  Thank you for the great 5-srat review and for calling out the exceptional job that Daniel did!  Your business and your feedback are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotels Lie About Holds on Credit Cards!!!
Summary: My business paid for the room upfront, but upon check-in the Hotel Insisted that I provide a credit card for "incidentals"...I was informed that the Hold would be released upon checkout....We are 5 days later and still NO RELEASE OF THAT HOLD!!!  I know that all hotels do this, but what a bunch of CRAP!!!  The rooms are some of the smallest in the Wyndham Hotel Chain that I have stayed in.  The electrical outlets were missing covers, if I had a child I would have screamed louder about this.  But you think that in ONE WEEK of my stay that they would have come to fix that.  The thermostat in the room has an out auto shutoff in the middle of the night and only turns back on when it senses movement.  The room would FAR EXCEED THE 73 degrees it was set at in the middle of the night.
Manager Response: Dear 169jaem,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry for your experience with the hotel.  I appreciate you taking the time to discuss this issue with me and hope that you are satisfied with the final resolution.  I realize that your first experience with us was not good, but I hope you’ll be willing to try us again the next time you’re in town.  We look forward to making your next stay great!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean great view service and food was terrible
Summary: If you are looking for a quick stay near the airport by all means stay here. My room was very clean. The bathroom did smell but I believe it is because the rooms are laid out poorly and the door must always remain shut. I had a beautiful view on the 9th floor facing south. Andrew was amazing at check in! I lost my wallet and need someone to send a form to hotel. The bellman was disgusted/angry when I told him it will be a while and that he didnt have to stare at me and wait. That he can help other guests as it could take a while. The pillows were lumpy and very hard. I called to ask for 2 more pillows it took a little over 45 minutes @9pm wow! Grabbed a quick bite in the resturant before hitting the road. I had to send food back 3 times!, The manager only gave me 10% off keep
Manager Response: Dear Brandon A,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with the bell staff and with the restaurant.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are using it as a learning opportunity.  I hope that you’ll try us again in the future and that we’re able to provide you with the level of service that you, and every guest, deserve!  Thank you as well for your kind comments about Andrew!    Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: We held a business dinner event there that we were very pleased with.
Summary: The dinner event was very organized, thanks to the professionalism of Marilu Tovar and staff. It was served in a timely manner with great attention to detail. She was able to assist us and take a lot of the pressure off, so we could focus on our attendees and the success of our meeting.  We are sincerely thankful for this level of service, which made for a successful evening for all. We would recommend the Wyndham Irvine for all your business endeavors.
Manager Response: Dear JohnX9814EE,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We really appreciate you choosing our hotel for your dinner event.  It’s great to hear that Marilu and team took such great care of you.  We hope to have earned your future business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a great experience staying at this hotel.  I met two of my friends who were visiting from Virginia and we had a blast staying at this hotel.  The staff were very kind and helpful especially Bobby in particular.  He is so kind and attentive and would always greet us every time we went in and out of the hotel.  He was quick to ask us if we needed anything or if there was anything he could do for us to make our stay enjoyable.  The man is a great asset to Wyndham and they made the right decision by hiring him.  I hope they continue to hire people like him.  Thank you for Wyndham for allowing us to have a such a great stay at your hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Ali M,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and staff are much appreciated.  I have shared your review with Bobby and the rest of the team.  We are all looking forward to your next visit!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Amazing Staff and Hospitality!
Summary: I was hesitant on reserving a hotel near the hotel as it can always be a risk but this hotel was great. Clean, staff was nice and the rooms were nice and clean. The doorman, Bobby, was probably the highlight of our trip. After being delayed for 24 hours in an airport on the East Coast, my friends and I arrived at the door to be welcomed by Bobby with a huge smile. The four days we stayed there, he was always smiling at the door, directing us on what to do, helping us or even, just enjoying a laugh with us. I applaud him and applaud Wyndham for hiring and keep such dedicated staff. It's not an easy job in the heat of the summer and waking up at 3am/4am - standing at the door. Bravo to Bobby and 5 Starts to Wyndham. As this was my first stay outside of the Starwood Hotel family, I
Manager Response: Dear Mees_1980,  Thank you for taking a risk on us and for providing us with such great feedback!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Bobby are much appreciated!  I have shared your review with my entire team and we have recognized Bobby for his exceptional service.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I got a great rate and the front desk person, Karman was great! He helped me check in and the staff was very courteous and accomodating! Having a back surgery recently it was hard to get around but the staff made my stay easy and comfortable. The room was clean and nice! I cannot say enough great things about the hotel. Absolutely 0 complaints and my family and I will stay there again when we go to Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Quentin W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I hope your recovery is going well.  I greatly appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience with the hotel and staff.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing and an example of a great one. I used to rent through a third Party and always pray to get Wyndham as a one of the available choices. The hotel's employees are helpful and understandable. I met with Mr. Hany who led me to discover the big world of Wyndham and their new 5 stars hotel in Anaheim and other beautiful places like their hotels in Hawaii and in Miami. I really advise to booking at Wyndham.
Manager Response: Dear Mansour A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that we’re your hotel of choice in the Irvine area.  I’d also like to thank you for mentioning Hany and the service you received from him.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with him and the rest of my team.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean and comfortable.  Delicious Breakfast Buffet...
Summary: Very clean and comfortable.  Delicious Breakfast Buffet every morning.  Rooms are fairly quiet, I was able to sleep with no problems.
Manager Response: Dear V709YTbrendam,  Thank you for the very kind review.  Your comments about the cleanliness and comfort of your room are much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was only here for one night, but I thought it was a very adequate hotel.  I was unexpectedly upgraded to the top floor which gave me access to small lobby area off the elevators. I missed the complementary happy hour, but did take advantage of the little breakfast in the morning. Fresh fruit, bagels and pastries, packaged cereal, coffee and juice.   The room was clean and comfortable. See photos below. Even though it's close to the airport, I didn't hear traffic or plane noise.   Best things: - free shuttle to/from airport  - free wifi everywhere in hotel - friendly staff - nice bathroom amenities  - Comfortable bed - easy access to bedside outlets  Worst things: - slow shuttle arrival (be sure to call when you get off the plane) - TV signal was not reliable  - bar/restaurant
Manager Response: Dear Beachfam_rp,  Thank you for your kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of the Executive Lounge during your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: first time stay at a wyndham  property
Summary: Very clean, nice room and bath.  Good service and reasonable prices.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 541terryk,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your visit to Irvine and are pleased to find out your stay was so enjoyable.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon	 General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome facilities. I loved the basketball court, gym, and...
Summary: Awesome facilities. I loved the basketball court, gym, and bar. The food was good, and the popcorn in the bar was also good. I would liek to become a rewards member, because if I can, I will always book Wyndham from now on.
Manager Response: Dear O5771KBchristopherw,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you had such a great experience at our hotel.  We would love to have you join the Wyndham Rewards program!  Please visit wyndhamrewards.com to register.  Thanks again and hurry back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon	 General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Service, updated and quiet rooms
Summary: The Wi-Fi and parking is included in the stay rate.  Parking was easy, the location is close to area businesses and the airport.  The staff were 'present' and helpful. After a little scare when an unannounced fire alarm test took place while I was in  the elevator, the staff was quick to offer an apology with a small package of water and a chocolate bar.  I wasn't upset or angry over the situation, so it was a pleasant surprise they went this far to ensure my stay was a good experience!
Manager Response: Dear L J,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with such kind feedback!  I apologize for the fire alarm, but I’m happy to hear my team took the extra step to ensure your experience was positive.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon	 General Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my girlfriend for one night over the weekend. It was an excellent experience. Parking was easy to find, and very close to the main entrance. Upon entering, we were greeted very politely by the front desk agent named Andrew. He was very friendly and professional. We felt welcomed right from the get-go. We stayed in a studio suite, and it was beautiful. The windows were the length of the entire wall, and the view reminded us of staying on The Las Vegas Strip. Besides the excellent service, our favorite part had to be the beds. I don't know what kind of mattress you use, but I honestly don't think I've ever slept that well anywhere. I would highly recommend this hotel! I can honestly say I did not have a single complaint. 10/10
Manager Response: Dear Adam R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that Andrew and the rest of the team were able to provide you with such an excellent experience!  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon	 General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 1 night ... Everyone was courtesy from the lady who handled my reservations to the staff at the hotel
Manager Response: Dear 86deannag,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: The staff is very accommodating and helpful.  The rooms are very clean. The reason for the 4 stars is that there is no safe in the room and the restaurant is not up to par. The menu is limited, which is not really a problem, but I ordered a medium rare hamburger and I got a well done one. I didn't have enough time to send it back so I had to eat it.  Otherwise it is a great place to stay and there are other restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Dear Hotcoco93387,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that the staff was accommodating and that your stay was good overall.  I’m sorry to hear you were not fully satisfied with your experience in our restaurant.  I have shared your feedback with my restaurant manager and we are committed to ensuring your future meal is cooked to perfection!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed two nights at this property while attending a conference. I was pleasantly surprised on all levels. The rooms were new and spacious, the bed very comfortable and the linens and towels of a superior quality. The bathroom was spacious.  Our meeting room was comfortable throughout the two-day conference - NEVER had the usual "too hot/too cold" experience one often has in meeting rooms where the temperature can't be modulated well - and it was over 100 degrees outside!  Our buffet lunch was OUTSTANDING - healthy salads, wraps, and maybe not so healthy (but delicious!) cookies for dessert.  Shane Wilkinson, their sales manager, did an exemplary job in overseeing to the needs of the conference producers and individual attendees.  As somone who used to handle event logistics for
Manager Response: Dear Beherenow11,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and that your meeting was such a success.  Thank you, as well, for calling out Shane’s exemplary service.  I’ll be sure to pass your very kind comments along to him and the rest of our team!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I want to especially than Karan who assisted me throughout my stay.  The staff is really nce and the hotel is also nice with a lounge area, a bar with a happy hour and a restaurant that aims to please.
Manager Response: Dear Nevia H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to share your feedback about Karan!  I am happy to hear that the staff and amenities combined to provide you with such a great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: not what the reservation specialist said it would be.
Summary: when I called to make a reservation for the Miracle Distribution Center Conference, the attendant said that the rooms on 14th floor would be a little more, BUT there would be breakfast with them.  I make a reservation for Friday, Aug 14, and Saturday, Aug 15th, checking out on Sunday morning.  THEN when I got there, I was informed that there was no breakfast on the weekends.  Your employee had sold me the room with a breakfast, and I had nothing but your employee's word to realize what he had promised and sold to me was never there.  That is a very bad policy to have your employee tell your potential customer one thing, and then for the customer in good faith to get there, and not to have that be the case. So he lied. Sharon Welker, Room1428. You should refund me the extra that
Manager Response: Dear L7637XQsharonw,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with our reservations agent.  I have shared your review our central reservations office and they are conducting some additional training with their team to ensure they understand our hotel’s offerings.  I agree with you 100% and regret that this happened.  I have instructed my team to refund the difference between the group rate and the upgrade rate you paid.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Well appointed hotel with cheerful colors and comfy furniture. The staff was friendly and accommodating. Breakfast is a plus, platters of candy and coffee/tea always available. This is a warm wonderful hotel. We'll be back tomorrow!
Manager Response: Dear JenniferlQ8687SG,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for coming back so quickly!  We truly appreciate your business and look forward to providing you with many 5-star stays!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I appreciated the friendly service, but the room itself had a bathroom issue, it smelled like a sewer and ultimately we had to change to a new room at around 10pm at night.
Manager Response: Dear Gwen M,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the bathroom sink.  Though we do our best to prevent this type of issue, things like this can happen.  Though I regret you had to deal with this, I’m happy to hear my team was able to accommodate a room change for you.  I hope that you’ll try our hotel again the next time you’re in the area.  We would love the opportunity to earn a 5-star review form you on your next stay!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: overall the room was quite nice a few things i noticed: upon arrival there were 3 people working at the front desk and no guests. they were involved in a conversation and it took at least a minute for one of them to look up and acknowledge my presence. i was disappointed that there was no refrigerator in the room.i had to have someone from their it dept. come to my room to get internet connected.  i had booked two consecutive nights separately. i had to check out after the first night and check back in which was inconvenient. when i arrived back in my room late the second night (12:30 a.m.) upon getting into bed i heard a dripping noise, then i noticed that half of the bed was wet.  there was a ceiling leak. i called the front desk, they sent someone up to look at it. i didn't
Manager Response: Dear KarenrV279BS,  Thank you for your review.  Your feedback is very valuable to us as it provides us with the opportunity to improve.  I have shared your comments with my entire team and we are all committed to ensuring your next stay with us is much improved.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we are able to provide you with the 5-star experience you deserve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I  use hot wire when I book a hotel room, I also know which one is the wyndham and I ALWAYS choose this hotel. The staff is so accommodating and very nice. If there's a noisy neighbor, no problem it's takin care of immediately. The beds are extremely comfortable, the air conditioning always works, ever since the remodel this hotel has been a pleasure to stay at. I will never choose another hotel.
Manager Response: Dear CraigbH3830IP,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review and for making us your choice hotel in Orange County!  I am so happy to hear that you’ve enjoyed your past experiences with us and look forward to welcoming you back on a regular basis.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My friend I travelled to Orange County for the business purpose and stayed at this property. This is our first time staying at the Wyndham property. We are Marriott points members and we usually stay at Marriott, but this time we didn't get a room. So we tried Wyndham and I am glad that we tried. The rooms are nice and clean. I really like their shuttle service, it was so convenience for us. But the best part of the property is their service skills. All of the staffs are great and very helpful during our stay but the best person is Karan. He has the best customer service skills I have ever experienced, I think he is the supervisor. Every time I see him he is smiling and have willing to help attitude. I had a minor air-condition issue during my stay, he was very apologetic and
Manager Response: Dear Mel J,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you decided to give our hotel a try and that Karan and the rest of the team were able to create such a positive experience for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way regularly and that we have been able to earn your future business here in Irvine!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel itself along with staff were excellent; to bad it costs $18.00/nite seems quite excessive for regular uncovered parking. Another thing is all the doors  in the building slam behind one's self.
Manager Response: Dear DanielaF986JC,  Thank you for the 5-start review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  I’d like to inform you that we’re aware of the issue with the doors and are in the process of replacing the hardware on all of our guest room doors to correct this issue.  I hope you make it back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It's certainly not a bad hotel to stay at. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The hotel provides a shuttle within a 3 miles radius which helped since I didn't drive. There are a few improvements the hotel could make. First would be having an outdoor pool since California has good weather. Second would be expanding the variety of the breakfast spread. At almost USD 20, the spread is very limited. Lastly, the concierge and hotel staff did not seem to know the area very well. They were unable to answer questions on attractions around the area.
Manager Response: Dear Tesh K,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your recommendations on how we can improve.  Though there is nothing I can do about the pool, I will certainly pass your comments about the breakfast buffet and the staff’s area knowledge along to me team.  These are areas that can certainly be addressed and we appreciate you bringing them to our attention.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I thought the facilities were nice, but didn't appreciate the lack of notice about the $50 per day security deposit that was added to my bill.  In addition, I did not receive an informational invoice upon check in which added to the concern I had with the refundable security deposit.  Made me wonder if I might be overcharged by someone pocketing money since I had no proof of the charge in hand.  Fortunately, the morning I checked out I found that an informational invoice had been slid under my door.  I'm glad I carefully reviewed it too because an additional $18 per day for parking was added to my bill despite having no vehicle onsite.  I wasn't impressed with one of the front desk staff members, I felt she was impatient and snarky when I questioned the additional $150 added to
Manager Response: Dear 782shannonc,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about your experience and to hear that you would not recommend our hotel.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will use your review as a learning tool in order to provide a better experience for all of our guests.  It is our expectation that the guest be informed of all fees during the check in process.  Though security deposits and parking fees are common, the guest should be made aware of them up front.  Since you did not have a car, I hope you addressed the parking fees with the desk staff.  If not, please reach out to me and I’ll get this corrected.  I would also recommend our complimentary shuttle service to get you to / from many local shopping centers and restaurants should you find yourself at our hotel without a car.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Just needed a place to sleep after a busy day at Mouse Land and booked this blindly through hotwire based on location, star quality and price. Very happy with the value and the hotel definitely lived up to its rating with a nice, quiet, comfortable room. Checked out the indoor pool area which was a bit of an adventure to locate but looked like a good place for a few laps for exercise if that's your thing. The pool, and hotel in general, seem geared more toward the business traveler rather than families such as ours.  Only things I could find fault with were the $18/day parking fee, which seemed excessive especially on a Saturday night when there was absolutely no reason for anyone to be parked there except for staying at the hotel. This property is located in the middle of a
Manager Response: Dear SFcatamount,  Thank you for the kind review.  I’m happy to hear the hotel worked out so well for you.  Should you find yourself back at our hotel in the future, please stop by the front desk for an extensive list of restaurant options within walking distance of the hotel that are open on the weekend.  We look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a short trip to southern California recently and the reservations were made for me.  I haven't stayed at a Wyndham in years and was a little leary. However, this was a fine hotel.  The trip arrangements included two dinner and two breakfast buffets and they were very good for hotel buffets.  The food was fresh, even the lettuce for salad, and the warm entree's were fresh and not dried out.    The room was spotlessly clean and provided a very comfortable bed.  The people who worked in the hotel were all helpful.  An overall very good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher T,  Thank you for the kind review.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Your comments about the hotel cleanliness and the food quality are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another pleasant experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great hotel in Orange County to stay. Staff is great especially Daniel Perdomo.  He was very friendly and help us out a lot. Rooms were very clean and non smoking. Great bar and restaurant area. Also near John Wayne Airport with many restaurants and other places to visit
Manager Response: Dear Workplace0,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and thank you for sharing your experience with Daniel!  I have shared your kind feedback with Daniel and entire hotel team.  We all look forward to our next opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel on hotels.com… Not knowing about parking rates and that they did not provide a rollaway bed… After calling the hotel and requesting a rollaway bed the attendant that I spoke with said they would put one in my room no problem before I got there. And when I arrived at the hotel there was no rollaway bed set aside and the room that I was in could not house a rollaway bed because of the fire safety issue.  Daniel Perdomo is the best employee that works at Whyndam! He not only comped our parking fees because we were new people to the area… But he changed our room in order to house a rollaway bed. He was so helpful and patient with me and my two friends, that we felt so taken care of and it took away all of our stress of traveling to LA. Thank you Daniel for all
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Daniel for his exceptional service!  I’m sorry to hear about the initial confusion on the room but very happy to hear that Daniel was able to quickly resolve the issues to your satisfaction.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon and that we are able to provide you with a 5-star experience from the minute you walk in!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very nice, new hotel near John Wayne Airport, Orange County, California. Convenient to I-405, good restaurants nearby, but no nightlife to speak of. Shuttles will provide rides. Indoor pool, spa & cardio room. Food is very good, but restaurant is a bit pricey. Bar has ample space & some specials.
Manager Response: Dear BobcF997PF,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear you were able to take advantage of so many of the hotel’s amenities.  Should you find yourself back at our hotel, please ask the concierge or the desk staff for some great recommendations for nightlife.  There are a number of great venues in the area, some of which our complimentary shuttle can drive you to.  Thanks again!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel property was great, clean comfortable rooms, nice pool (indoors) and spa and gym. Nice area to sunbathe outside the pool. and out in front a nice sitting area by a fountain. Staff was very nice, however, the transportation department would only take you 3 miles, period and a taxi to long beach was $100.00. Lobby was a nice meeting place and banquet food was quite good with good service as well.
Manager Response: Dear Richard S,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your kind comments about the hotel, the amenities, and the staff are much appreciated.  I’m sorry we were unable to provide shuttle to Long Beach.  In an effort to provide the best possible local area service for all of our guests, we are required to avoid longer trips.  Should you find yourself back in our area, please take a look at other options like Uber or Lift for your transportation needs outside of our three mile service.  I believe you will find these to be much more economical.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It's clean, quiet, parking area is gated and well lit. It is worth to pay the parking fee. Your vehicle is worth protecting. (See my other review for the OTHER hotel we stayed in) I regret not having come and stayed at the Wyndham. We've been here previously and this time being our second. We will continue to come and stay here on future trips. It's a wonderful place to stay and relax.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly L,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that we have earned the privilege of being your hotel of choice in Orange County.  We look forward to your many returns!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have been staying in this hotel several times, it is an elegant spot in Irvine. It is great if you are arriving or leaving from SNA. The management is really an added value, they always over delivers your expectations. Strongly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Antony O,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and look forward to the next opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Reserved 2 Queen beds and the beds were not queen size...
Summary: Reserved 2 Queen beds and the beds were not queen size. They were full beds. Rooms looked old and small.
Manager Response: Dear Maggie W,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry that the hotel was unable to provide you with a room with two queens.  Should you find yourself with a few minutes, I would love to hear how you booked your room.  The hotel doesn’t offer any rooms with two queens and I would like the opportunity to address any sites or staff members that are committing something we don’t offer.  I have my Director of Rooms looking into this as well, but your feedback would be helpful.  Again, I apologize that we were unable to accommodate your request.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel was ok, no mini fridge, restaurant was lacking, just ok, didn't match the price. Entire staff struggle to communicate in English. Asked simple questions, about rewards, parking, invoices, and don't know what the response was.
Manager Response: Dear 242darnellr,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a 5-star star.  I have shared your review with my entire team and we will be using your feedback as an opportunity to improve our guest experience.  I hope you will try us again in the future and look forward to the opportunity to earn a 5-star review on your next stay.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is an older hotel that has been recently renovated. The employees are nice, the room was nice and clean, with older furnishings. The location is in a business park. Parking at $18.00 a day..... next time I might pick another place. The noise from the doors in the hallways will wake you up. They are very loud.
Manager Response: Dear Kodachromeshooter,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m happy to hear that you found the rooms and employees to be nice.  I’m sorry to hear about your experience with the guest room doors.  We are currently exploring options to reduce the noise from the doors and hope to have this issue fully resolved soon.  I hope you will visit us again in the future and that we are able to earn a 5-star review on your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean and an accomodating staff!
Summary: This property is centrally located and is an excellent hotel for the price!  I would highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear Kimberlyh975,  Thank you for the kind review!  I am happy to hear that you found the hotel to be clean, the staff accommodating, and the location ideal for your travel needs.  Your recommendation of our hotel is much appreciated and I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: 160 guests for breakfast and dinner?  No problem!!
Summary: I would like to give Five Stars to Marilu, the banquet manager for the Wyndham Irvine hotel.  We recently hosted more than 150 people for a two-day business meeting. Marilu and her excellent team were flexible when plans changed, opening the buffet earlier and closing later than scheduled. No problem.   The food was fantastic, service was crisp and professional.  In addition, when i needed help with signage to direct participants to the event registration desk and to the buffet, she not only provided the signage but brilliantly colored arrows that were easy to see from a distance.   Marilu also helped us print some documents that were essential and with her usual smile and 'can do' attitude, took care of it quickly, efficiently and professionally.  If you need banquet services
Manager Response: Dear Carol S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that your event with us went so well!  I would also like to thank you for taking the time to recognize Marilu for her efforts.  Marilu is a great asset to our team and to our customers and it’s great to see her get such great feedback from our clients.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments about Marilu, the food, and the customer service with my entire team!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Room was similar to most of the 3 and 4 star hotels in the area. Comfortable bed, furniture on the older side. Clean hotel with helpful front desk staff. Only concern were the doors slam very loudly, even shaking the walls. Kinda wakes you up in the morning when people start to leave their rooms. Not really sure why the hotel does not fix this to allow people a better sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Tammyb155,  Thank you for the review.  I would like to apologize for your experience with the door slamming.  I have shared your review with my Director of Engineering and have tasked him to come up with solutions to this issue.  We are committed to correcting this to ensure our future guests do not have the same experience you do.  I look forward to welcoming you back in the future and hearing that this issue has been resolved to your satisfaction.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The air quality in the bedroom is terrible! The rooms are...
Summary: The air quality in the bedroom is terrible! The rooms are not very big and have an oversized desk that takes us most of the free space. We were there as part of a group and were supposed to be offered breakfast every morning.  The hotel's version of breakfast consisted of a bottle of Gatorade or Propel, a bag of sunflower seeds and a fruit. Will not return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JuliasO3760BH,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m sorry to hear that about your disappointment with our hotel.  Due to the services we provide, we are actually required to conduct air quality testing throughout the hotel.  This was done recently and the air quality was found to meet all quality guidelines.  If you could share with us the room you were in, we would love the opportunity to check that room specifically for any concerns.  Regarding the breakfast for the teams, we offer a number of options to our tournament directors when they contract with us.  In an effort to keep the room rates lower, some choose to go with a limited grab & go breakfast option.  I certainly understand your concern and will be happy to share your feedback with the tournament director if you would like to let me know which group you were with.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Reviews like yours allow us to focus on areas with opportunity for improvement.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It was a good value.of the two weeks that we stayed at the hotel security was a problem a women that period outside our door a man standing in his underwear screaming into the phone numerous times after 11:00 pm screams and running in the halls No security!
Manager Response: Dear L281OGmikes,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about your concerns with the noise.  Our policy is to address these types of issues immediately.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and he has met with our security staff to ensure these issues are resolved promptly moving forward.  I hope you’ll consider us again and that we have the opportunity to provide you with the 5-star experience you deserve!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Parking cost is ridiculous. Front desk customers service needs some adjusting. Have empathy, don't be a stick figure.
Manager Response: Dear StephenhA5474HK,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry for your concerns with the parking fees and with the customer service at the desk.  Though our parking costs are in line with the other full-service hotels in the airport area, we recognize that this can still be a concern for some guests.  There are hotel options in the area that do not charge for parking.  Our hope is that the overall experience you receive will make it worth the extra parking fee.  From your comments about the service you received, we clearly fell short of our goal.  I do apologize.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will use it as an opportunity to train our staff for better results.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay. Access to there upgraded room was such a wonderful plus! Nice to be a Rewards member thats for sure.  I ad 2 rooms for the night. We attended a party and the extra room was for over flow, they stepped up and even added a cot to the upgraded rooms.
Manager Response: Dear RichardbF487TV,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that my team was able to provide you with extra space for you and your family.  I hope you find yourself back in our area soon and that we have the opportunity to earn another 5-star review!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I would like to pass on a Big Thank You to all the staff at the Wyndham Hotel Irvine.I stayed at the hotel for 10 weeks with colleagues of mine from Australia. I stayed in a corner suit room during my stay,  the room was extremely comfortable and cleaned daily by the friendly hotel services, always cleaned to a very high standard.I would also like to thank The hotel Manager Sofiane Lahouasnia (Hotel Guest Manager) for the great service we experienced during our stay, as well as Tiffany & Josie and the boys from Guest services for taking such good care of our billing during our long stay, they were both very attentive and always willing to help. A special thanks to Hector, David, Marisal, from the Lobby Bar and restaurant who were aways friendly and are able to make your
Manager Response: Dear Hephaestion31,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to share such great feedback about so many of our team members!  Your kind comments about the team, the cleanliness, and the location are much appreciated!  I hope your travels bring you back our way in the near future and that our team is able to provide you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed with about 100 other athletes and their families.  This hotel is very business orientated hotel, not good for sports teams.  should have been notified of this upfront when the group rate was trying to be established, which by the way was very pricey.  They did not go out of there way to accommodate such a large group.  The sack bag grab and go breakfast was horrible and not intended for athletes. They deserve a hot breakfast,   I defiantly would not stay here with a family or sporting group. If I travel for business I might consider.  The location is in a business park and feels more like a overpriced Best Western.  You need to have parking card to go in and out, sometimes there is a line to get out since someones card demagnetized. What a horrible vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Marcydarcy2015,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you felt we were a bad choice for families and sports teams.  We host numerous tournaments throughout the year and strive to be a great choice for both the leisure traveler and the business traveler.  Regarding the grab and go breakfast option we offered your team; please note that the hotel does offer many breakfast options when contracting with the tournaments.  The option provided to your group was selected by the tournament in an effort to reduce the room rate during a very high demand (and high rated) period.  We will certainly keep your feedback in mind and look for ways to improve the options.  We want you - and all of our sports groups – to feel like they’re getting a good value while staying at our hotel.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I've stayed at this hotel many times when visit...
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel many times when visit disneyland...it's about 15 minutes away but it's worth the drive...
Manager Response: Dear CindyV,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate being your hotel of choice when visiting the area and look forward to many future stays!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 6 nights twice room was not cleaned. I was awakened by the smell of cigarettes many times. Employees smoking on stairs stunk up room. Grab and go breakfast was weak.
Manager Response: Dear WilliamW,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced while staying with us.  It is our policy to service every guest room unless the ‘Do not disturb’ sign is up.  I have shared your feedback with my housekeeping department and asked that our policy be reviewed with all room cleaners.  I have also shard your comments about the employee smoking with my entire executive team.  This is absolutely not allowed and we will be visiting with all employees to ensure they understand our non-smoking policy.  I appreciate your bringing this to my attention.  I hope you will try our hotel again should you find yourself in our area.  We would live the opportunity to provide you with the great stay you deserve!      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel is in a good location close to the airport and to major freeways. The hotel is easy to locate. The hotel is maintained in a good state of cleanliness and all utilities functioned well. The view from the 14th floor was a very good one. The hotel stay was knowledgeable and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Josephfletcherk,  Thank you for the king review.  I am happy to hear that our central location worked so well for you and that you felt the hotel was well maintained.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review on your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very pleasant hotel however they charge for parking I did...
Summary: Very pleasant hotel however they charge for parking I did not see any notification of this when I set up my reservation.  They agreed to reduce the parking fee from $25.00 to $12.00
Manager Response: Dear 328raymonds,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  Though we do note the parking fees on our hotel website, we recognize that some third party booking sites to not share that information with their customers.  I apologize if this caused any inconvenience.  I’m happy to hear that my team made a concession for this lapse in communication.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My visit to Wyndham was amazing ! My special thanks to Boby the bellman that gave us an excellent service ! Always a smile on his face ! I will recommend to  all my friends and my family members to this Hotel !  Keep up the good work Boby !!! 👍👍👍👍👍
Manager Response: Dear Papjijo,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for taking the time to recognize Bobby for his excellent service!  I am happy to hear that he was able to have such a positive impact on your stay.  I’ll be sure to share your review with Bobby and the rest of the Wyndham team!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Quick overnight stay before early meeting. Internet was a complete failure and frustration, and was very important to our stay.  Called staff, etc.  Could not remedy.  Bed comfortable Shower fixture issue, handle did not stay in one spot causing temperature to change, and shower faucet leaked.  Wish room had better lighting.
Manager Response: Dear ChristinehT3457TR,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced at our hotel.  I have provided your feedback to my Chief Engineer and he is looking into each of them in an effort to ensure the issues are resolved.  I hope that you’ll consider staying with us again.  We look forward to changing your opinion and earning your future business.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Yes it was a place to sleep and yes, the bedding was clean, but I would have liked to be able to say more positive things about the place. I expected more out of a Wyndham Hotel. The lobby is nice, but our room had peeling wallpaper in the bathroom, the back elevator (to the pool) was out of service, the internet connection kept dropping, and guest services treated us like we were not spending enough money to warrant their smiles. If you need a place to spend the night then this will work, but do not expect more.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie O,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you with the experience that you deserved.  Our goal is to have every guest feel they received top-notch service and look forward to the opportunity to return.  I have shared your feedback with my team and you have our commitment that we’ll take advantage of the opportunity to improve.  I hope you’ll consider staying with us again.  I look forward to hearing about how much better your next stay goes.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: PArking was 18 dolllars, we were part of the wedding party and they said they gave a discount to 15. When I went up to the room there was no bar soap. I called the front desk and they said they would send soap up. No soap arrived.  Went to front desk and asked if we could get a free breakfast ticket. The manager stated we don't do that here! He gave me a discount to $10 for parking and a 20% discount for breakfast. That night at the wedding the groom told me that the hotel was supposed to give me a card for free breakfast. No thanks to the manager I was able to have a free breakfast by meeting the wedding party in the morning at the hotel restaurant. The manager was rude and had no people skills! On top of this the hotel night stay was over $150 and thats with a wedding party
Manager Response: Dear Craig B,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  I have shared your review with my team and we are committed to using your feedback as an opportunity to improve.  I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.  We would love the opportunity to provide you the service that you deserve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My family stayed at the hotel this past weekend and everything was great. We were traveling with our daughter, her husband and our twin 15 month old grandchildren. The hotel staff was exceptional with making our stay great. The hotel was very busy and everything including service, rooms cleanliness and comfort, elevators, restaurant all were working effortlessly and we felt very welcomed and appreciative from all the staff we interacted with. Well done to the the staff and management of this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jared4290,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the hotel are much appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share your review with my entire team.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you and your family back in the near future!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Wells Fargo New Hire Training Lab
Summary: Overall, the quality of the hotel was very good. The internet connection in the conference rooms were excellent, however the room temperatures required sweaters all the time.  The restaurant manager was excellent as was his staff. I would enjoy staying again at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear StevensX9792LD,  Thank you for your very kind review!  I’m happy to hear that the complimentary internet service worked so well for you and that your experience with our restaurant team was so positive.  I’m sorry to hear about the room temperature in the meeting space.  This is something that can easily be addressed should you require meeting space again in the future.  I am pleased to know that this concern would not prevent you from staying with us again and look forward to the next opportunity to provide you with a great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable room and beds.  Be aware that parking is at additional cost.
Summary: We had a very pleasant four day stay at the Wyndham Irvine.  The room was quiet, clean, attractive and comfortable.  The bed and pillows were especially comfortable; so much so that we checked to see which brand they were so we might get similar pillows for our use at home.  The bed was a nice pillow top mattress.  One thing to be aware of : parking for the hotel is at additional cost.  To park added $18 per day to our costs.  This may be normal in this area, but we were not aware of this extra expense when booking.
Manager Response: Dear BSlarks,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you choosing our hotel and taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I’m very happy to hear you enjoyed the bed and pillows.  Comfort is critical for getting a good night’s rest.  I do apologize for the surprise parking fees.  Though these fees are spelled out on our website, there are some third party websites that limit the information we are able to share with people that book through them.  I hope this will not deter you from booking us again in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Attention to details; key for Customer Satisfaction
Summary: TV was not working, A/C was not working, after calling front desk and waiting for a while, asked for a different room; the answer was; "come down to reception and we'll give you a different room" No courtesy, no apologies for inconvenience, etc. I have stayed at other hotels, and in similar cases they have offered to bring the New room's key to my room, and even to "move" my belongings to the new room. Not that I needed it, but obviously, not the same service standard at this facility...
Manager Response: Dear 242ernies,  Thank you for your stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am very sorry for your experience.  You are absolutely right to be disappointed in the service you received.  Our policy is to assist guests when a room change is required and we clearly failed to follow through with this.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are using your review as an opportunity to revisit our procedures and do some additional service training.  I hope that you’ll consider staying with us again in the future and that we’ll earn the 5-star rating that you deserve!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is the fourth time I have stayed at a Wyndham property in the last six month's. My first three stay's were outstanding! This my first stay at this property and boy the whole experience was poor to be polite! Parking was a pain in the butt and there is no valet! Hell, the mall has a valet! When I checked into my room I thought it must be a mistake! This room was so basic, so dated I thought I had just checked into some road side motel! It did not even have a mini fridge! I went back to the check in counter and expressed my concerns, but when your hotel is fully booked, complaints fell on deaf ears! But they did bring a fridge up to my room and waived the $10.00 fee for it! Woo hoo! Not to bad of a compensation for a $200.00 a night room! I will never stay at this hotel again
Manager Response: Dear K727BUstevenm,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m very sorry that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  Our goal is to provide all of our guests with a 5-star stay and we clearly missed the mark with you.  Though we have been recognized by TripAdvisor with a Certificate of Excellence for our consistent high scores, we realize that we may not be the best hotel for all guests.  That said, we would love to welcome you back and to have the opportunity to earn a better score.  If you find yourself coming back to our area, please don’t hesitate to reach out to ma and I would be pleased to personally assist you with your reservation.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice & clean! TV Remote did not work, the problem was...
Summary: Very nice & clean! TV Remote did not work, the problem was quickly resolved by the very polite & nice front desk.
Manager Response: Dear 338deettas,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m sorry to hear about the remote not working, but happy to hear that our team was able to address the issue quickly.  I hope we see you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I have no idea why you would have an indoor pool but it is...
Summary: I have no idea why you would have an indoor pool but it is very unsatisfactory!! I look forward to enjoying the pool and hot tub/spa when I travel and it was a very uncomfortable feeling. The pool area is stuffy/muggy. The water looked yellow. I will not stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Heatherd377,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback.  I’m very sorry to hear that you were not happy with the indoor pool.  Though we realize it is not the ideal set-up for everyone, our indoor pool does allow for year-round use regardless of weather.  We also offer an outdoor sun deck for guests that are looking to spend some time in the sun.  Again, I apologize that this didn’t fit your needs and hope that you would consider us for a stay that may not require access to an outdoor pool.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We needed a place that was close enough for us to travel around that part of California and this was a very nice place we found.  We were close enough to the beaches and not to far away from LA to spend a day up there.
Manager Response: Dear Poohkids2  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that our central Orange County location worked so well for you.  Being located near the best Sothern CA beaches, amusement parks, and shopping makes us the perfect place for a family vacation.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star experience!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Room and room service is great. I stay here often. Most...
Summary: Room and room service is great. I stay here often. Most recent stay was along north west side and wifi sucked. Issue was never resolved for entire week long stay. Both phones and laptop work fine away from hotel. Otherwise it'd a nice place to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the room service are much appreciated.  I’m sorry to hear about your experience with the WiFi.  I have shared your review with my Chief Engineer and he is working with our provider to ensure any deficiencies are immediately corrected.  Please let me know if you have any issues on your next stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very bad and un happy with the service and overall stay.The rooms had AC and toilets that were not even working will never go back.
Manager Response: Dear 695lataa,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am so sorry for your experience at our hotel.  This is certainly not the kind of stay we want any guest to experience.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are committed to using your review as an opportunity to improve.  I hope you will consider staying with us again and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review from you.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Excellent service throughout this hotel. The breakfast buffet was superb, as were the selections on the dinner menu. I was not expecting the quality of food that we received. Also the happy hour menus, both food and drinks quite nice.
Manager Response: Dear Dave L,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I have shared your feedback with my entire team.  I hope we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay in the near future!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: First time I have been to a Wyndham and been disappointed.   Staff was not welcoming and at one point flat out rude to one of the parents.  Was not impress in the least with the grab and go "breakfast".  The sandwiches that we had to microwave were frost bitten and they only had 1 microwave to use.  I asked if there were any others and was told there was one on each floor and 'good luck".
Manager Response: Dear Michelle L,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  Our goal is to ensure all guests have a great stay and it’s clear we failed to provide that for you.  The grab and go breakfast is what is selected by the tournament director and has been well received by most of our youth groups.  With that said, I have shared your feedback with my team and we are looking into the product quality to ensure we do not have any frost bitten foods.  We have also increased our microwave count to ensure limited wait time.  Though I can’t change your previous experience, please note that we are taking the appropriate steps to ensure future guests have a better experience.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Friendly, efficient staff. Great hotel. Top notch food. I would recomend this to anyone. The shuttle will take you to and from the airport and also drop you off anywhere within a three mile area. I am going back in 3 weeks.
Manager Response: Dear Randy S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff, food, and shuttle are much appreciated!  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is great for business. Not for families traveling. You must request a fridge which is $10 a day. It is not close to restaurants.  It has a restaurant on property but rather expensive and slim menu options.  The elevator to the pool was out of service the entire week we were there.  They offered no resolve.  They neglect to tell you that they charge $75 a day for incidentals. However,  there is no mini bar,  no fridge,  no frills for such an outrageous charge.
Manager Response: Dear Lauriem906,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m happy to hear you felt we were a great hotel for business but sorry to hear that we didn’t meet the needs of your family.  I would also like to apologize for any inconvenience the pool elevator situation may have caused.  Though the pool was still accessible, we realize the exterior entrance may not have been as convenient for you and your family.  I am happy to inform you that the repairs to the elevator have been completed and this issue has been resolved.  I hope you will consider staying with us again if you find yourself back in our area.  If you do, please ask the desk or concierge staff to direct you to one of the 11 restaurants located right in our business park.  Or feel free to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service to visit the District, a great outdoor shopping center with many dining options.  Thanks again for your feedback!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Had 2 full days of work in Irvine and needed a great place to sleep, check emails, get the weather, have some quiet and most important - a full size and delicious breakfast.  This was achieved at this location even with several girls baseball teams attending tournaments and staying t the hotel. I missed out on the exercise rooms, pool and basketball courts this trip but would definitely book this hotel again if I had more time to explore the local area.
Manager Response: Dear X8512LQwilliamp,  Thank you for the kind review!  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of the great Orange County weather!  We look forward to your next visit.  I hope you’ll have the opportunity to stay longer and enjoy all the hotel and the area has to offer.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The man who check us in was very nice and genuine. We checked in on Friday July 10th at around 10PM. He explained everything to us and really made us feel welcome!
Manager Response: Dear 518mylenem,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that your check-in process went so well and that my team was able to provide you with everything you needed.  I hope you enjoyed your stay with us as well as the wedding.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: concierge is more a salesman than a helper...
Summary: i asked for a king size bed and got an email confirming this, when we arrived we were told that they had got a queen (one, not even two beds in the small room), and that they didnt understand how i got a confirmation like it with a king size bed; me and my wife are tall people and never ever have been able to sleep o a queen before, it was midnite when we checked in and was raining, so... we stayed. we asked for help to the concierge with disneyland tix, and got a 45min explanation on why go to the other wyndham property were they were going to invite us dinner as long as we listened to some speech about wyndham hotels.. never going back to a wyndham.
Manager Response: Dear DavidgR8589QX,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that we were unable to accommodate you with a king bed.  As a taller guy myself, I certainly understand the challenges of smaller beds.  Though we always try to meet our guests’ needs, there are times when a specific room type is just not available.  Again, I’m sorry we weren’t able to accommodate you.  I’d also like to apologize for the issue you experienced with our concierge desk.  Though they do want to introduce our guests to the possibility of becoming a Wyndham Vacation owner, they should do so only if you are interested.  I have shared your review with my concierge staff.  Thanks again for taking the time to share your feedback.  I hope you will reconsider staying with us and allow us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience next time.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I like the welcome bag becoming a member! Thank you! Bummer I was on a diet and couldn't eat the carbs that were in it, but enjoyed the water  :-)  Very nice hotel, I will come back.
Manager Response: Dear J9867SYchristinam,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for becoming a Wyndham Rewards member!  Sorry you couldn’t enjoy the treats but I hope you’ll enjoy all the benefits the Wyndham Rewards program offers.  We look forward to you next visit!!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Overall stay was good, new beds still with the tags attached. The AC worked well but made some odd noises at times, may need to have some service work done. Has some trouble woth the key card to the 14th floor for breakfast finally had to have lobby give me a spereate key for elevator and keep mine for the room, quite strange?
Manager Response: Dear Michael C,  Thank you for the review.  I’m sorry to hear about the issues you experienced with the AC and the elevator key but happy to hear that the overall stay was good.  I’ve shared your feedback with my team and we’re looking into the challenges you experienced.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star rating on your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Attending workshop at Beckman Center/ University of CA. Irvine
Summary: Wyndham Irvine was an excellent place to stay for me. The breakfast, the shuttlle services provided back and forth to university, shopping malls, and airport was awesome.   Overall all services were excellent.   Fred Djahanguiri, Engineering Consultant, Nashville, TN.
