Manager Response: Dear Fred D,  Thank for the great 5-star review!  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments about the hotel with my entire team.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My husband and I were coming from a day at universal studios and were leaving California the next morning from John Wayne airport and check-in to Wyndham Irvine. The hotel staff was very nice to us and our room was so comfortable, clean and beautiful. Just 5 minutes to airport!!! Thanks Wyndham Irvine for a great night sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Vonda T,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed your short layover with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way in the future and that you’ll be able to spend more time with us!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were not expecting too much from this hotel, which was part of a softball package. As it turned out, the staff was extremely helpful and friendly, the room above our expectations, and so far the accommodations have been great.  A refrigerator was placed in our room upon request, and the furnishings were better than other places we have stayed in the same price range. It is nice to have an actual dresser with drawers and nightstand with drawers to place items in. The room appears to have been freshly redone, and the bathroom is very clean and updated.
Manager Response: Dear LVnan16,  Thank you for your kind review!  I’m happy to hear that we surpassed your expectations and I hope that we have earned the right to be your choice hotel in Orange County.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments with my entire team.  We look forward to your next stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Average hotel, but the price was right.
Summary: Average property, but unfortunately we were on the same floor where they had some rowdy guests where a fight ensued at 2:30 a.m. and the cops were called by either another hotel guests that was woken up or by the staff.  Other than that, they did accommodate a refrigerator upon my request (if you plan on staying at this property, call ahead for one as other guest were not as lucky to receive one).  Their restaurant does offer a great omelette and waffles. The Marriott across the street was much nicer...a bit pricier, but I'd probably stay there next time.
Manager Response: Dear TravelingsAMust,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry that you were impacted by the unfortunate situation with the fight.  This was completely out of our control and is not a common issue at our hotel.  We brought the authorities in as soon as we were made aware of the situation.  Thank you for the kind comments about the restaurant are much appreciated.  I hope you will reconsider our hotel for your next visit.  We would love the opportunity for you to experience our hotel the way it’s meant to be experienced – fight free!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Fast check in large room pleasant staff easy to park excellent lunch
Summary: There was always someone in the Lobby to assist you got a ride to the nearby Restaurants Van available for the Airport Pick up and departure . Font office staff answered my questions promptly about leaving parking and gave me the new keys
Manager Response: Dear Naveen A,  Thank you for the review!  Your kind comments about the staff, the shuttle service, and the restaurant are much appreciated!  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another fine stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed again last week at the Wyndham Irvine Orange County Hotel.  I love the room size in this hotel, very generous and the service at the front counter is always friendly and efficient.  I think the parking fees are a bit steep at $18 per night, though it seems all hotels are looking for ways to make more money out of their patrons these days.  The breakfast food is good and again the service is efficient.  Loved the free and uncomplicated wi-fi log in.  I'll be back
Manager Response: Dear LinzOz,  Thank you for the repeat stays and for the kind review!  We appreciate being your hotel of choice in Irvine and look forward to many future opportunities to serve you.  Our goal is to earn a 5-star review form all of our guests and we look forward to earning that form you on your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We made a last minute decision to visit Costa Mesa / Irvine over 4th of July weekend.  Found a reasonable rate on Hotwire for this hotel.  It was our first time staying here, and we were overall unimpressed with our visit.  LOCATION: The hotel is very close to John Wayne airport, and is in a very commercial / business orientated area of Irvine.  It is easy to access from the 405.  STAFF: We arrived very late at night, and were checked in by Michael.  He was warm and courteous, as were almost all of the employees we met at the hotel.  ROOM: Our room was OK.  The good: the bed was comfortable, the room had free Wi-Fi, and the bathroom was clean and roomy.  The bad: we could hear everything outside our door and in the adjacent rooms.  Sometimes it sounded like the people in the
Manager Response: Dear CantFindMyBlueBird,  Thank you for the thorough review.  I am sorry to hear that we failed to impress you.  Our goal is to provide every guest withy a great stay and to earn the right to be their hotel of choice when traveling to Irvine.  I have provided you feedback to my team and we are reviewing all of our rooms for the items you called out.  We are committed to addressing these issues and hope that you will try our hotel again in the future.  Thank you as well for the kind comments about Michael.  It’s great to know that he, and the rest of the staff, provided you with the service you deserved.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Major renovations and a top notch staff!
Summary: Hotel has undergone extensive renovations to both the public areas and the guest rooms. The staff is both pleasant and knowledgeable. Prices are decent for the area and it is in very close proximity to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Vester7,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back or way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Need to inform quests of costs and meal plan
Summary: I was never informed prior to my stay that there was additional costs for parking at your hotel.  I would have not stayed at your hotel if I knew this.  Quests need to be informed of this cost at the time of booking a reservation.  Also, I was suppose to get complimentary breakfast during my stay, however never got breakfast on Saturday or Sunday.  This information needs to be relayed to quest at the time of booking a room.  Additional, the quest across from our room smoked and the smell vented into our room.  This is suppose to be a NO smoking hotel. I reported to the front desk, however apparently nothing was done because the quests continued to smoke.
Manager Response: Dear U7914DOjamesm,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  I am very sorry about your experience with us.  I would love the opportunity to learn more about your reservation and how it was made.  Though our website does clearly spell out our parking fees, there are some sites that do not.  We have been working with these sites to provide better information to our guests and it would be very helpful if I knew which site you booked through.  This information would also allow me the opportunity to look into the breakfast situation.  I would also like to apologize for the guests that smoked near your room.  Though we do enforce a $250 penalty for guests that smoke, we find some guests disregard our policy and smoke anyway.  I regret that these issues came up and that they were not resolved to your satisfaction by my staff.  I have shared your review with my team and we are providing additional training.  We would love the opportunity to redeem ourselves if you travel back our way in the future.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We love this hotel.We stayed here last year too for 4 th of July.The area is so pretty,clean,quiet.The room was spacious and very clean.The beds were so comfortable and the pillows also.The hotel is close to Newport Beach,Laguna Beach and Huntington Beach,just perfect!!!We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear EmiliaGlavan,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday weekend with us and that you were able to take advantage of our hotel’s central Orange County location.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Incredible experience made possible by Front Desk Supervisor: Josie Leon
Summary: Checking into any hotel over the holiday weekend almost always is guaranteed to be anything but seamless. Being in a rush to have a room ready for myself to sit down and unwind. I was eager to beet the 4th of July Crowd and feared a lengthy and grueling check-in. I fortunately had the pleasure of working with Front Desk Supervisor Josie Leon who went beyond her call of duty to ensure all my needs were met in a quick and tidy fashion. She was able to answer all my obscure questions and get me situated with a gorgeous room in a prompt manor. She routinely checked in with me as I came in and out of the lobby to ensure I was satisfied with my stay. Josie is a titan of industry and sets the standard for all hotel service employees who work with their guests face to face.
Manager Response: Dear Damon B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Josie for her excellent service!  I am happy to hear that your holiday weekend went well and that we were able to play a small role in that.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Feel it is very inappropriate of you to charge us, a paying guest, an additional fee to park the car.
Manager Response: Dear Pamc496,  Thank you for your review.  I appreciate your feedback regarding the parking fees.  Though our policy is consistent with most full-service hotels in our area, I understand your frustration.  I hope that the rest of your stay outweighs the negative of having to pay for parking and that you will consider us again if you travel back to Irvine.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The service was horrible.  We were told checkin was at 3.  We arrived at 3:30 and were told the room was not ready.  In addition the lady behind the counter told us check in was not until 4.  Obviously, it was our fault the room was not ready because we were to early.  We waited in the lobby and went back at 4 only to be told it still was not ready.  We were not happy.  We were told we could leave our phone number and they would call us when it was ready.  We wanted to freshen up before going to a restaurant, but that was not going to happen.  We finally got a phone call, sometime after 5 that our room was ready.  When we called to make our reservation, we asked for a roll-away bed and was told that would not be a problem.  When we finally were allowed to check in we were told
Manager Response: Dear O7253QUnicoleb,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry about your experience at our hotel.  I certainly understand your frustration and completely agree that the situation was unacceptable.  Our check in time is, and always has been, 3:00PM.  I apologize if you were told something else.  I also regret that we were unable to provide you with a roll-away for your room.  I have shared your review with my entire team.  We are committed to using your feedback as a learning opportunity.  Though I can’t change what happened to you, I hope that your feedback provides us the chance to ensure this experience is not repeated with another guest.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.        Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Most of my Wyndham points came from budget stays at Days inn properties, during trips to either check out colleges, or visit 2 of my 4 kids that are in college.  So when I was looking online at hotels for my youngest daughter's UC Irvine basketball camp, and I saw that this property was available for roughly the same amount as one of the budget ones with a combination of points & cash - I snapped it up!  First impression: WOW - this is how the other 1/2 lives!  Beautiful lobby area with tasteful décor and reception desk featuring a polite and helpful check-in person after 1 AM.  After a long drive, I had to use the lobby restroom, and was delighted at how pretty it was.  Strange thing to notice, I know, but it was a LONG drive from our corner of Arizona.  Our room was lovely,
Manager Response: Dear Melissa N,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of the new Wyndham Rewards redemption program to secure a great deal at our hotel!  The recent changes to our program will allow you to book even our finest resorts across the world for a very small amount of points!  I’m also happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much.  Our goal is to earn a 5-star review from evert guest.  It’s great to know that we succeeded with you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Wyndam Irvine location. Our stay was outstanding. This higher end hotel catered to our every need. The staff was courteous and the service was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Anitac880,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the service are much appreciated.  I hope you find yourself back in our area soon.  We look forward to providing you with another outstanding experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay but a few changes could have made it an outstanding one. In the room if there was a choice of pillow firmness, ( there were only hard heavy ones) it would have been nice. Also my reward points were not credited to my account
Manager Response: Dear 880marip,  Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts on how we can improve.  We will certainly take your recommendation into consideration.  Regarding your points, if you have not yet received them, please reach out to me directly and I will be happy to look into this for you.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stay at this hotel several times a year.  While its not the newest hotel, the staff is always friendly and accommodating and the hotel in general is always clean.  Its centrally located to just about anything in OC and very close to John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisbZ3004CV,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the cleanliness are much appreciated.  It’s great to know that we’ve earned your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: The staff was very accommodating to our needs. Allowed us the option to check out late if needed and the rooms were very clean. Everything was great A+
Manager Response: Dear Lori R,  Thank you for the great 5-srat review!  Your kind comments about the staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: Save your money!  Our room smelled like stale cigarettes, the Air Conditioning in our room was not sufficient to keep our room cool, not to mention they don't have air in the hallways. People were screaming in the hallway at night, there was even a fight.  When I asked for extra toilet paper and soap the front desk began to question me about when I was leaving.  The service at restaurant was terrible, the waiter was rude, didn't bring our order correctly and the high chairs were all broken.  Horrible, horrible, and did I mention this place is horrible?
Manager Response: Dear Tinaa972,  Thank you for your review.  I am extremely sorry about your experience with our hotel.  This is not a typical guest experience and we are truly saddened that we were unable to provide you with a better stay.  I have shared your feedback with my entire team.  We will take advantage of the feedback you’ve provided and commit to using your review as a learning opportunity.  I hope you will be willing to try our hotel again in the future so that we can provide you with an experience that you deserve and that is more consistent with our high service standards.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: Pros - The rooms are quite clean, comfortable and very little outside noise.  The staff are professional and eager to assist guest.  Cons - breakfast must be purchased, parking in and out is a hassle ($18.00 per day) and no microwaves or refrigerators inside the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear lawrencea468,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your comments about the staff and the hotel are much appreciated.  Should you find yourself back in our area again, please keep in mind that fridges are available for delivery to your room and we have microwaves located on each floor.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham Irvine for one night (booked through Priceline), as we wanted to visit Newport Beach. The hotel is brand new and conveniently located near the airport and Newport. Only downside is the 18$ parking (though it's a daily rate with multiple entries).
Manager Response: Dear Laetitia F,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and felt the hotel was a good value.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another good experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: I stayed here 3 different times in 2015.  Each time was for a few days of business travel. You can't beat the price for the value you get.  It's clean, service is responsive and dependable, and the location is great.  Staff is friendly and professional, and respond promptly to requests.  They don't nickel and dime for everything.  They don't pretend to be the Ritz, but give you a solid 3.5-4 star value consistently.   For me, the draw back is that on one occasion I checked into a room that had an empty shopping bag on the sofa from the last visitors, and once the housekeeping forgot to empty a trash can I filled.  Minor lapses in detail I would like to see improved.  The gym is only open till 11pm.  For me that's a draw back bc my days end late and I work out late.   Bottom
Manager Response: Dear Joseph Y,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I am happy to hear that we’ have been your choice hotel throughout the year.  I do apologize for the small lapses that you mentioned and have shard your feedback with my team.  We are committed to addressing these issues and to earning a 5-star rating form you on your next visit.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: The smoke free rooms these days should smell, well, smoke free. I immediately noticed the stench of cigarettes and a burn mark on the dresser. Then when I walked into the bathroom, hair. Not a little hair, lots of long blonde hair. Yuck. They do a really lousy job keeping the rooms clean.
Manager Response: Dear AZKenM,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with us.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a 5-star experience and we clearly fell short of doing that for you.  I have shared your feedback with my housekeeping team.  We will utilize your review as a training opportunity and take advantage of the information you have shared with us.  I hope you will be willing to try us again in the future and that the steps we are taking will clearly demonstrate our commitment to proving a great stay.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: I've stayed here many times and I keep coming back. It's the best deal around. This place has so much to offer. While sitting in the hot tub someone told me the hotel should have a high star rating. I agreed.
Manager Response: Dear Nate3992,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We are thrilled to hear that Wyndham Irvine is your go-to hotel in Orange County!  We appreciate your business and look forward to many future opportunities to welcome you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary: A lovely hotel in a great area, plenty of parking even during a VW show weekend, staff helpful and polite, room was spotlessly clean, didn't eat in the hotel itself but there are a couple of great eating places within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Christiamk762,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  We enjoy being a part of the VW program and look forward to welcoming you all back again next year!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon

Summary Heading: Best place for a corporate conference
Summary: The service was amazing on all levels, from the conference sales team, to the banquet supervisor,, to the general hotel accommodations for our guests. Our coordinators went above and beyond to make our schedule run exactly as planned. They made it so easy for me to successfully orchestrate the coordination of the meeting from the small details, to the larger ones associated with a conference.   We received fantastic feedback from our guests staying at the hotel and plan to continue to book solely at the Wyndham for that reason.
Manager Response: Dear Katana W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It was our pleasure to have you and your group stay with us.  I am happy to hear that the program went so well and that we have earned the right to be your choice hotel in Irvine.  We look forward to your next group and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham Irvine Orange County is conveniently located.  The entrance and parking is a bit awkward.  There was a bit of construction going but overall the full use of the hotel was available.  The rooms were very clean.  House keeping staff were friendly.  Though no one was rude the staff at the desk and door could be a little friendlier.  The pool and gym were very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Z3219PTmichaelm,  Thank you for the thorough review.  We appreciate your business and your feedback.  I am happy to hear that your stay was pleasant and hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  I have shared your review with my team and will be working to ensure your next visit earns a 5-star response!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff VERY professional and friendly. Food was good with a nice variety of options. Inside and out well maintained and clean.  Upgrade the lighting to make it bright and it will make a nice difference.
Manager Response: Dear Charles S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff, the food, and the cleanliness are much appreciated.  Thank you as well for the recommendation about the lighting.  We’ll certainly keep that in mind when making changes at the hotel.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were in town for the VW Classic, this has been the host hotel for years. Great stay! and friendly people. Thanks
Manager Response: Dear JustinbJ6707GP,  Thank you for the review and for coming back each year!  We always enjoy our weekend with the Classic!  We look forward to next year’s show and to having you back with us again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent but could use some touches...
Summary: Overall, great.   Remodel the  bar area.... dated and uninviting.  Add a small  refrigerator and safe in each room.  Otherwise  very good.  Staff very helpful.  Heard from a colleague that the breakfast buffet was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear KAHegg,  Thank you for the feedback and the recommendations.  I am happy to hear that your overall experience with us was great.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us.  I wanted to let you know that we are currently working with a designer to complete some upgrades to our bar and restaurant areas and we expect this work to be completed later this year.  I hope you will visit us regularly to see the progress first hand.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The room was exceptional! Very clean, perfect! The staff...
Summary: The room was exceptional! Very clean, perfect!  The staff was extremely professional.  The restaurant was nice and food delicious!
Manager Response: Dear Hendrik V,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that your stay with us was so enjoyable.  I hope you’re able to return to our hotel soon!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this property for 3 nights! They were very nice! Let us check in early and also check out later, except the maid kept knocking... Which was a little stressful lol.   The rooms look to be newly done.. The beds are brand new and soo comfy! There's new carpet and the room is modern!  The only thing that was odd was the furniture looked like they maybe waiting on new  prices.. But they were in good shape and didn't look out of place!  The bathroom looked remodeled..but the shower is a little small they should maybe consider doing a remodeled shower and floor tiles but it was still very nice and clean not a major issue just an opinion! They cleaned our room everyday and we never had an issue with that!  They had coffee downstairs and it was spendy... We
Manager Response: Dear Lauren G,  Thank you for staying with us and for the great 5-star review!  I’m sorry about the issue with the maids knocking on your door.  I’ve shared your feedback with my Director of Housekeeping and he has discussed this with his team.  I’m very happy to hear the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  I hope we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Service at the front desk was great! Kim (don't have last name) was just wonderful. Welcoming and accommodating requests. She is an example of great customer service. Rooms were clean and nice. Breakfast buffet very good, but understaffed to pour water and coffee.  Location for work was good. Excellent value for the money. I would recommend and stay again I was kept awake all night by loud neighbors. Noise abatement not good between rooms.  Wish the shuttle would go more than 3.5 miles out.
Manager Response: Dear KarengL5316VL,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for calling out the exceptional service you received from Kim!  I am happy to hear that she – and the rest of our team – was able to create such a great experience for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: So far was worht the try.
Summary: Even though it wasn't super fancy, but it was the ideal hotel. Nice rooms, cool features and felt like I was at home. Hope to stay at this hotel again someday.
Manager Response: Dear Bernardo G,  Thank you for giving us a try and for the kind feedback.  It’s great to hear you felt at home with us.  We look forward to your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: RBN held their weekly business meeting at the Wyndham Hotel.  The service was excellent and the food was delicious.  It is a beautiful hotel and a great place to have any size meeting or event. I believe the Catering Manager, Marilli, is very concerned with all of your needs and does an A+ job.
Manager Response: Dear TobyBird,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We enjoyed having you and your organization here for your weekly meeting.  I am happy to hear that the meeting went so well and appreciate your kind comments about Marilu.  We have shared your great feedback with our entire team.  We look forward to the next opportunity to welcome you and RBN back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The management of this hotel, Sofianne and Bill, has brought the service level of a five star hotel such as the Montage in Beverly Hills to this Irvine property.  The rooms are clean and tastefully decorated and the staff provides an incredibly professional level of service.  They are personable, attentive and extremely sensitive the needs of their guests.  Without question I always feel at home when I am at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Lusciouslee,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for calling out the excellent service you received from Bill and Sofiane!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel.  Desk Supervisor, Kim Cantrell was attentive, listened to my needs, and graciously offered further assistants, with are special need of a refrigerator. Our stay was wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear Pamruns,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Kim for her excellent service.  I will be sure to share your review with the entire team.  We look forward to our next opportunity to provide you with a great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This Wyndham location is my preferred stay whenever I am visiting OC. Even though I have stayed at the surrounding Marriott, Hyatt, Embassy, I keep coming back to the Wyndham because of their reasonable prices, accessible location (super easy to access or cross over 405, 55), and above all their CONSISTENTLY AWESOME customer service. I realize that this is not an easy feat on the part of management and staff given how many times I've stayed with them over the years, even through their remodeling. This past trip was no exception. Kim and Gary at reception made sure that my stay was trouble free and comfortable. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Dear TxFlyFish,  Thank you for the continued business and for the great 5-star review!  We are thrilled to be your go-to hotel in Orange County.  Your comments about Kim and Gary are much appreciated and I will be sure to share them with our entire team.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Four Star comfort at two star price
Summary: Everything top notch:  room, restaurant, bar, pool, fitness, location, staff, early check in...terrific place that will occasionally offer a mid week discount...like I found.  First ever I have seen on outside booking sites and I book this area frequently.  Needed to stay and extra day and their price was almost as good as the booking site.  Parking fee of $18 was a shock.  Should be up front CLEARLY STATED.  Did get discount, however, for multiple day stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jim C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and amenities are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of the special pricing we were offering.  Regarding the parking fees, though they are clearly stated on our website, we understand that many guests book through other third party websites.  We have worked with these third party sites and have noted parking fees on the sites that will allow us to do so.  There are some sites that will not provide us the ability to display the parking rates.  I do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Thanks again for the feedback.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Fantastic hotel. Rooms are updated very nicely and great common areas. Staff is great also. Highly recommend this hotel. While I was staying there, I arrived late from work and it was raining. The security guard was doing his rounds and immediately came over to ask if I wanted to share his umbrella. Blown away ! The staff at the front desk was fantastic also.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I really appreciate you bringing your experience with the security guard to our attention.  It’s great to know that he has embraced our hotel culture of providing guests with a great experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that you’ll get some So. CA sun the next time you’re here!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Room - Don't Like Hidden Fees
Summary: Loved the room, the staff was friendly and quality service.  Additional charges for parking, non-friendly pet policy really make this an undesirable location to stay however. Price is unjustified in my opinion
Manager Response: Dear Shazz_zzam,  Thank you for your feedback.  Your kind comments about the room and the staff are much appreciated.  I apologize that you did not find the hotel pet policy and parking fees to your liking. Though we are a pet-friendly hotel, we do charge a fee for pets to offset the additional cleaning process that we go through with rooms that have been occupied by a pet.  This is consistent with most pet-friendly hotels.  As for the parking, again, our policy is in line with most full-service hotels in the area.  We recognize that there are some hotels in the area that do not charge for parking and we encourage guests to explore their options prior to booking.  Our policies are listed on our website.  I hope that the service you received outweighed the issues you experienced and that you will consider us again if you find yourself back in Irvine.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed for 3 night & was very happy with this hotel. I named my price through priceline & got a great price. When I arrived I figured I would end up in a room with 2 beds & was correct. I asked if I could have a king room & the lady at the desk was already in the process & asked if I would like a high floor too. Usually when one books on priceline we get the leftover crappy room, not the case here. The room was clean & very comfortable, wi-fi works well. Very good location, easy access from nearby freeways. Only drawback is the extra cost for parking as most nearby hotels offer free parking.
Manager Response: Dear Sracing,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate all of our guests, regardless of how they booked.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon. We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very comfortable and clean, extremely quiet room right off the freeway!  Great location for evening walks.  Beautifully landscaped.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear your stay was quiet and comfortable.  I hope you come back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Uneventful, just the way you like it
Summary: I had no problems or issues during my stay. Just the way most people prefer it. Employees were very pleasant. Always made eye contact and acknowledged me being there.
Manager Response: Dear 397kirkc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that your stay went well and that the employees made you feel welcomed.  We look forward to your next stay and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We booked two joint rooms and upon arrival we discovered that what we booked was not available.  Called that morning to make sure that the rooms were available and we were told that the rooms were ready that morning.  When we arrived with 4 kids and two adults we were shocked to learn that we were going to be separated for the entire stay.
Manager Response: Dear 543jerzyb,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your experience here at the hotel.  Though we do our best to accommodate all of our guests’ requests, there are occasions where it is just not possible.  The hotel does offer a small number of adjoining rooms; however, these rooms are limited to studio suites and ADA accessible rooms, not standard guest rooms.  Again, I apologize that we weren’t able to meet your request, but I hope that rest of your trip was enjoyable.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: this is a nice hotel, i ordered room service and received it pretty quickly. the room was nice and big as well.
Manager Response: Dear 830michelew,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your comments about the hotel, the room, and the room service are much appreciated.  I hope we have earned your future business and that we can look forward to providing you with another great stay soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Was in Irvine for a business seminar. My first time staying at this hotel. Beautiful, spacious  clean room. Wonderful happy hour that I made sure to make it for both days. Met very interesting, nice travelers. Will definitely return
Manager Response: Dear Ani P,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of the happy hour.  It’s great to hear that you’ll be returning.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham Irvine is a nice clean property, There really is nothing negative to report about the hotel. Paying for parking was a bit pricy but since the airport is right next door I suppose the parking fee is needed to keep the lot being filled up with long term airport parking.
Manager Response: Dear Gilvalasvegas,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you’re traveling to Orange County.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Place to hold a meeting
Summary: If you want to have a meeting that is worry free call the Wyndham in Irvine, they have the best meeting spaces, food and the customer service is GREAT!!!  The entire staff is so professional,  from cheking in, the attention to detail for my meetings & the catering department  is increadable, they always make my meetings  a huge success.
Manager Response: Dear Armamareyes,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recommending our hotel for meetings!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the food are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next event and to providing you with another great experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was beautiful. The staff is very helpful and makes the stay wonderful. Restaurant is great. It was a delightful experience.  Great place to stay for meetings as well as vacations. Shuttle service is a plus.
Manager Response: Dear 467shamalas,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Booked this hotel thru Expedia non published rates for under $100. Not a bad deal for a weekend when all the surrounding hotels are sold out. Called the fron desk twice to inquiry about double beds or roll always both times was advice they have been sold out for a while but would make a note. At check they accommodate us with two double beds my daughter was a happy camper thank you. Check in fast and easy. They did advice us that parking was $18 good thing we didn't park our car we left it with the other people staying at another hotel.  Rooms and bathrooms are very nice and spacious a bit on the modern decor. All the employees we encounter during our stay were very friendly. Over all a great experience especially for the price we paid
Manager Response: Dear Latinos28,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that we were able to accommodate your request and provide you with a nice stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Although I was only staying one night, the stay was very enjoyable. The room was inviting, clean and comfortable. There was only a couple drawbacks in regards to the room. I had thought I had booked a room with a fridge, but no fridge. The bed was too soft for my comfort level and the bathroom lightening was a bit dim. I was charged for parking on the property. Was told to use the room key card and I wouldn't be charged. Make sure to have this clarified. Lastly, I wanted to work out but the access to the workout room and pool was not available from the interior of the hotel. Direction taped to the door wasn't very clear either so I just went back to the room and workout using internet.  The room and hotel was very clean, quiet and enjoyable. Would come back again.
Manager Response: Dear 267juanitas,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you would return to our hotel.  I apologize for the issues you experienced at the hotel.  Though none of our rooms come standard with a fridge, we do have them available for delivery upon request.  The hotel does charge for parking.  The guest room key is used to enter / exit the lot, but an overnight fee is applied. I apologize that this was not clearly explained.  I am happy to inform you that we have just completed the repairs to the pool / fitness center elevator and interior access to those areas is available again.  I’m sorry for the inconvenience.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with a 5-star experience.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My day was not so great until I checked in and was provided outstanding service by Kim at the front desk.  Not only was she very personable but extremely helpful with getting us checked into a nice room and straightening out the accomdations provided by the organization for whom I was traveling.  I would stay here again for the simple fact that they have people like her working for Wyndham!
Manager Response: Dear Pete J,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that Kim was able to turn your day around for you.  Our goal is to provide every guest with this kind of experience and I really appreciate you letting us know how we’re doing.  We look forward to your next stay and to providing you with another 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Tough first day Turned into Very Good Stay
Summary: Lacrosse Sports team unruly and noisy. Managers unsuccessful in mitigating. Hard to move to new room next day. A suite! Manager Comped us an entire 5 day stay in a suite! Workout facility was closed which was unfortunate.  Overall-no fault of management. Would stay again. Very nice rooms and restaurant. Close to Fwy and all that S Cal has to offer.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff F,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am sorry to hear about your experience on your fist night here, but I’m thrilled to see that my team did the right thing to make sure the rest of your stay was enjoyable.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review form you on your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: There was a lot of commotion at the hotel during our stay so it was pretty loud with slamming doors at all hours but staff was friendly and location was good.
Manager Response: Dear BrianbD4635UJ,  Thank you for your feedback.  Your kind comments about the staff and location are appreciated.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with the noise.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon as we would love the opportunity to provide with a much more restful stay on your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Had one of the most pleasant experiences today checking in.  Kim Cantrell was outstanding.  So far all of the staff are friendly and professional . The room is nicely appointed and very clean.  Will definitely recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Dear JandWandK,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the room and the staff are much appreciated.  We especially appreciate you calling out the great service you received from Kim.  It’s great to know that she was able to have such a positive impact on your stay.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Kim Cantrell really took care of us.  When I was checking in, Kim asked if I had a low/high floor preference and I said "a quiet floor".  She put us on the private floor and was really pleasant to deal with!
Manager Response: Dear David D,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am so happy to hear that Kim was able to make your stay so pleasant.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we are able to earn a 5-star rating on your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I've stayed many times at this property, over the past few yrs.& have enjoyed the hospitable nature of the entire hotel staff, from the manager to the driver of their complimentary shuttle! However, the bedding & pillows are feather/ down & I am allergic to them. I always call ahead to remind them to change it out. They're always happy to accommodate me, EXCEPT- There's always something that they forget to switch! Ex. The pillows have been changed but not the comforter & duvet or vice versa OR hasn't been completed at all.  If the request was correctly handled consistently, this property would get an excellent rating. The rooms are very nice, with bath & grooming products . High-speed internet is at your disposal.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffery1933 M,  Thank you for the great feedback and for your repeat business.  I apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced with the bedding.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we are all committed to getting this right.  Please don’t hesitate to reach out to me directly the next time you’re coming to town and I will personally ensure all is taken care of correctly.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel is beautiful, the front staff is amazing. However we had arrived late do to traffic, and when we got to our room, it was dirty, the sheets were dirty the sink was dirty. We had to wait for the night staff came to clean up. The next day the maids were so loud they woke us up. They were loud all three days we were there, on Sunday they didn't go clean our room so when we came back our room was dirty, the sink kept over flowing when one of the rooms next door would turn on their shower, that was not pleasant. However the front staff was great and the hotel is a nice place, they just need new maids.
Manager Response: Dear Lorenau439,  Thank you for the feedback.  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are much appreciated.  I am very sorry about your experience with the room at check-in and for the issues you experienced with your room.  I have shared your feedback with my entire team.  We look at feedback like this as an opportunity to improve and we will not let this opportunity pass us by.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we can look forward to you returning to our hotel.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Loved everything about my stay, the staff and the hotel were excellent at every point.  I already have my room booked for the next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear N0rcalgirl,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for already booking your next stay with us!  We truly appreciate being your hotel of choice and look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed at Wyndham Irvine Orange County Airport for two nights as part of a high school choir trip. The rooms were nice and the beds very comfortable. The staff were accommodating with our group. It would be nice if the beds were queens but they were comfortable. The facility and all rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Br0589,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your kind comments about the rooms and the staff are much appreciated!  We enjoyed the opportunity to host you and your high school choir and hope that we will be your choice hotel should you find yourself back in the Irvine area.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: When calling the property the front desk told me they had a pool that was indoors as well as outdoors. FYI they do not have an outdoor pool. WHY would they lie? Or, was the employee unaware of the hotel he worked at and completely disregarded my concern for a hotel with an OUTDOOR pool. Normally, this would not bother me but it was a special weekend for my husband and I felt like I had been taken advantage of. Hotel not worth the price in my opinion! The staff working were rude and unaccommodating. We booked two nights but checked out after one.
Manager Response: Dear 162cameronb,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry that you were misinformed about our hotel pool.  I completely understand your frustration and agree that this situation was not handled well.  I am not sure why the incorrect information was provided to you but we have met with our entire guest services team to ensure they have the correct information about our pool as well as our other amenities.  Again, I would like to thank you for your feedback.  I hope that you’ll be willing to try us again the next time you’re in the area.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel as a one night getaway with my significant other. I checked in around 3 or 4pm and was called away to a family emergency around 6/7 pm. We collected our belongings and went to the concierge on the first floor and checked out. I asked if possible to have a pro-rated refund for the cost of the night as I had barely used the room at all to which I was told I would need to contact Priceline (who i used to book the room) to get the refund.  Upon speaking with the priceline representative, they (Priceline) said they called the Wyndham and were told that they are refusing to give a pro-rated rate. So effectively, the Wydham employee at the front desk lied to me saying it was out of their hands. I was extremely disappointed in the service I received and will most
Manager Response: Dear Syeda203,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry for the experience you had with our hotel.  This situation was not handled well and I have discussed it in detail with my team.  I would like the opportunity to make this right and request that you reach out to me directly at the hotel.  I hope we can correct this issue and earn the opportunity to be your choice hotel in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: So I have started this exciting tour around Orange County, gaining new experience in life, staying in hotels instead of renting an apartment like regular college girl would do. So far I have been to 12  different hotels in Orange County. Since I am a student I try to stay within 2 starred - 4 starred hotels. Wyndham hotel earned my love. They strive every time to satisfy your needs. The rooms are always clean and well designed. Staff is very welcoming and wanting to help you with anything they can. I have stayed here pretty long time and I had chance to meet almost everyone who works in the hotel. Once again the staff is very nice, polite and welcoming. Kim Cantrell one of the ladies at the reception was outstandingly nice from all. Since day one I have seen her she tries to
Manager Response: Dear Kira V,  Thank you for the great 5-star experience!  Receiving such high praise from a guest that has stayed at so many of our competitors is a great honor and we truly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts.  I would also like to thank you for your kind comments about Kim.  Kim is one of our newest employees.  She has quickly settled in to her role with us and we have received numerous great comments about her since she joined the team.  I hope that we become a regular choice for you in Irvine and that we can look forward to providing you with additional 5-star stays in the future!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Generally, the experience was as I expected, except that the room was not made up on the second day by 4:30 pm and I had to wait in the lobby.  Also, the restaurant, Paradise, was very casual; the food, however, was very good. I stayed on the Executive floor, but any floor would have provided about the same amenities, with the exception of the free continental breakfast, which was underwhelming.
Manager Response: Dear E9828MJbrianr,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  I have shared your review with my team and we will use your comments as an opportunity to learn and improve.  I hope you will give us another try the next time you’re in the area.  We would love the chance to earn a better score from you on your next visit.  Thanks again for the feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay for me and friends
Summary: Me and my group were able to stay in 4 rooms on the same floor, in close proximity, which made for a wonderful experience. The staff was excellent with our requests!
Manager Response: Dear Cynthias372,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I’m very happy to hear that we were able to accommodate your group and provide you all with such a great stay!  We hope to have you all back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Nice and clean room and crews are very kind! Except the minor problem in elevator to acess swimming pool, everything was fit on me. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Jimhyunh2015,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that your experience with us was excellent.  I do apologize for the issue with the pool elevator.  This major repair is expected to be completed by mid-June.  I hope your travels bring you back our way and that we can look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: A business hotel during the week but we've stayed here for two weekends and the accommodations are quite comfortable -- pay the extra $20 to upgrade to a corner suite.  Most importantly, the staff and Sofiane, the front office manager, know how to treat guests in the most professional manner.  Refreshing!
Manager Response: Dear M O,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am very happy to hear that Sofiane (and team) were able to provide you with such positive stays.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed a week for business.  Hotel has been remodeled since the last time I was there and the Staff was extremely friendly.  Good resturant in the Hotel as well as severl resturants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Bushman171,  Thank you for the kind review.  It’s great to hear that all of the upgrades the hotel completed are not going unnoticed.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I will be sure to pass your comments about our staff and restaurant along to my team.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very satisfied that the room was full of natural light. Also happy with the cookies the chairs the hotel provided. The toilet was out of work for a little while but the staff came very quickly and solved the problem.
Manager Response: Dear Almira_y,  Thank you for the kind review.  I apologize for any inconvenience the toilet may have caused you but I am happy to hear the issue was resolved quickly.  I am also happy to hear that the upgraded room and amenities met your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had the best experience at the hotel April 24, to 27th. Corryne was so helpful, nice and really cared to make my stay great. I would recommend her always. thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Cher R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We are very grateful that you allowed our hotel to be a part of your event and we are happy to hear that your experience with Corrynne was so pleasant.  She’s a great asset to the hotel and to our clients.  I hope we have the opportunity to work with you again in the near future.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed here two nights for business.  Neat, clean rooms.  Welcoming, attentive staff.  Convenient off of 405, but you couldn't tell you were next to a freeway; very nosie-free.  In-room wi-fi was free and fast. Definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Wireone40,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate your patronage and your feedback.  I hope your travels find you in our area again and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The room was excellent. Pleased we were able to get a...
Summary: The room was excellent. Pleased we were able to get a refrigerator in there to store some food items we brought. The staff was polite, courteous and helpful.    There were 2 problems that I did experience. On the night bwe arrived I had checked in in the early afyernoon. The hotel clerk gave me two keys, one for me and one for my roommate. When some of us went to dinner, my roommate had not yet arrived, so I left the extra key at the front desk with his name so that he could get into the room when he got in. When I returned to the Hospitality room our group had, I found someone from the front desk had been calling to try and get in touch with me. My friend was now at dinner in the hotel. I got to the front desk and found they had refused to give the key to my friend. I had given
Manager Response: Dear Jim B,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  Though I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your room, I want to apologize for you’re the challenges you shared with the check-in process and the food.  You are absolutely correct that we had a breakdown in communication and I am sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.  We have used your review as a training tool with our staff and I am confident that this situation will be handled much more appropriately in the future.  I have also shared your feedback regarding the Fettucine Alfredo with my restaurant manager.  We both agree with you 100% and have discussed this with our chef.  Again, I am confident that we have learned from your feedback and will be able to provide future guests with a better experience.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your feedback.  We value the opportunity to learn and improve.         Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I found the hotel to clean and the staff extremely helpful. Though having to use a walker due to a recent surgery, getting around was not difficult, though I could not ride in the shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear Douglas B,  I hope that your healing process is proceeding as desired and that you’re well on your way to recovery.      Thank you for your kind review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and staff are much appreciated.  I hope you find yourself in our area again soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another nice stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Love this place! Another GREAT stay for our DISNEY trip!
Summary: Marion at checkin was great, friendly and made us feel very welcomed. The other employees we ran into were also very genuinely friendly...it showed through their smiles they really enjoy their jobs. Room was great, spacious, clean and comfortable and the shower water pressure was very good. WiFi was easy to use and speedy.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew S,  Thanks you for your great 5-star review!  Your very kind comments about Marion, the rest of the team, and the hotel are much appreciated.  It’s great to know that we were able to help make your Disney vacation a memorable experience.  We look forward to your next trip and to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel for the most part, however, I did need to call the Front Desk to ask Security to attend to a substantial and ongoing noise problem that I had already endured over two days prior.  There were unruly kids in the hall continually slamming doors going in and out of their parents' room across the hall, a woman screaming down the hall, doors slamming at all hours day and night.  The day before check out, the front desk clerk called and told me that high schoolers were going to be staying at the hotel on my floor and I might want to consider moving to a different floor if I extended my stay.  I find it hard to believe that any hotel would condone this situation and feel their motivation is all about money.  I also had problems in their dining room.  The
Manager Response: Dear Nancy L H,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am truly sorry about your experience with the noise and in our restaurant.  Our intent is to provide every guest with a great stay and we clearly fell short of doing that for you.  Like most hotels in our market, we do book youth groups and sports teams on occasion.  Most of these groups are very well behaved and do not cause our other guests problems.  Despite that, we do our best to isolate these teams which is why we recommended a room change if you were going to extend your stay.  Unfortunately, this particular group of kids was not well behaved.  We have discussed the issues with the group lead and have informed them that they will not be welcomed back.  Though this does not help with your previous stay, I wanted to assure you that we were aware of the situation and have taken action to prevent it again.  Regarding your concern with the restaurant, I have shared your feedback with my restaurant manager and we have addressed your concerns with our team and conducted additional service training.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon and that you’ll reach out to me personally so I may assist you with lodging needs.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with a much better experience.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I used this property to house a group attending a conference at the Beckman Center in Irvine, Ca.  The property is very close to the airport and they offer shuttle to/from.  Every staff person I encountered was personable and pleasant and more than willing to accommodate.  The guy that runs the concierge lounge makes friends with everyone so by the time you leave you feel like part of a family!  I highly recommend this property.  The price is reasonable as well.
Manager Response: Dear Shelley R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and Ross in the concierge lounge will be shared with my entire team.  Thanks again!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very clean, quiet and classy.   The customer service was excellent.   Had a problem with the drain in my bathroom, called the desk and within 20 minutes, the issue was fixed completely.
Manager Response: Dear Brooke K,  Thank you for the kind review.  I apologize for the issue you experienced with the drain but I am very happy to hear that my team was able to resolve the issue quickly.  I hope you find yourself back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another nice stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient location, but watch out for being overcharged
Summary: I was flying in at night for an early business meeting the next day.  The hotel stay was prepaid on hotels.com.  In check-in, the clerk insisted I pay a $75 deposit for "incidentals," telling me that this policy is mentioned on expedia.  It may well be, but I didn't book on expedia, and it is definitely not mentioned on hotels.com which I verified.  He finally backed down and then charged me an outrageous (though disclosed) $18 to park my rental car overnight.  The next morning I discovered from a slip of paper under the door that I was double charged for parking--clearly this clerk was unhappy that I wasn't paying them enough for extras.  I did manage to straighten that out, but I will scrutinize my credit card bill very carefully.  Other things to consider if you are a
Manager Response: Dear William K,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience with the charges.  Though our charges are in line with other full service hotels in our market, I certainly agree that customers should be made aware of these charges when booking.  We are working with Hotels.com to determine what, if anything, can be done to provide guests that book through their website with better information.  I also apologize for the duplicate parking charge.  I assure you that the clerk made an honest error in posting the charge and that there was no intent to take advantage of the situation.  I am happy to hear that you caught the error and brought it to our attention.  I hope that you’ll be willing to try our hotel again the next time you’re in the area.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was looking for a nice airport hotel and the Irvine Wymdham definitely filled the bill. Courteous, efficient staff, comfortable bed and an airport shuttle starting at 5:30 AM. The only negative was the cost of vehicle parking.
Manager Response: Dear Bernard N,  Thank you for your kind review.  Your kind comments about the hotel and staff are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: "Driving" Perfect location and was certainly ideal for us...everything is reachable around u (supermarkets, food, shopping, etc.).  Smiley and a very welcoming staff.  Excellent customer service.  On the whole, very clean.  Mr Hany was a very sweet and helpful concierge.  We totally recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Tarek H,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your kind comments about the staff and the local amenities are much appreciated.  Thank you as well for recognizing Hany.  Hany is a great a great associate and I am happy to hear that he was able to improve your stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Got Married Here and My Family Stayed For The Weekend
Summary: I had my wedding reception at the newly renovated Wyndham in January 2015, but I know most of you will be curious about hotel rooms, so I will touch on that first.   The front desk staff is kind, personal and accommodating. The rooms are always clean, and they are freshly renovated so they are brand spanking new. The design is modern and sleek, so you feel like you're staying in a nice place. The beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are clean as well. I had breakfast delivered to my room the morning of my wedding, and I was able to order it the night before and it showed up at my door when I woke up, so convenient! I highly recommend the Wyndham. I worked with this property for twelve months during my engagement, and I visited the rooms often to choose where I would stay for
Manager Response: Dear JennaJoseph,  Congratulations!!  It was absolutely our pleasure to be the host hotel for your wedding reception and your out-of-town guests.  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed your event and that your guests enjoyed their stay with us.  I would also like to thank you for the great review.  Your kind comments are much appreciated and have been shared with our entire team.  I especially want to thank you for your recognition of Corrynne and the job she did for you.  Corrynne is a great asset to our team and to our guests and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with her.  We were so happy to be a part of this very memorable event for you and your family and hope to be considered in the future as you celebrate your successful marriage and any other milestones you reach.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We chose this location for a staycation and we were no disappointed. From the newly decorated rooms to the excellent food for in-room dining. Although this location is tucked away, it is close enough to eateries and even Disneyland to have a good stay. The staff were accommodating and professional.
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth P,  Thanks for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you staycation with us was enjoyable.  We look forward to the next time you need a little time away and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Big hotel room And what a view!
Summary: Over all I give the Wyndham Irvine -Orange County Airport a 9.5 out of 10 (not too shabby). Ross Baumgardner, the attendant in the small lounge/breakfast bar on the 14th floor  was an excellent host! Soft spoken but very attentive, polite and courteous. He suggested I visit the local mall so I went and it was very, very nice.   The hotel room I stayed in was on the 14th floor, it was very spacious and nicely appointed. It had a spectacular view of the freeway and the sun setting over the horizon. The room, 1433, was very clean and presentable...the air conditioning panel was a little ajar and rattling a bit, when I tried to shut it tight it would pop open again.  I noticed the air filter to the ac unit was very dirty, FILTHY!  The filter looked like it had not been changed in
Manager Response: Dear Joe A,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind review.  I especially appreciate the great feedback about Ross.  He is a great employee and often gets recognized by our guests for his outstanding service.  Thank you as well for the feedback on the guest room.  We have addressed the AC filter and ensured the panel is attached correctly.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a five-star rating on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Accumulated three days of dirty glasses that housekeeping ignored.  I asked the front desk to take care of it.  Didn't happen.  I asked again 10 hrs later.  Finally taken care of.  Food at the restaurant was horrible.
Manager Response: Dear Trembd,  Thank you for your feedback and for bringing the issue with the drinking glasses to our attention.  I apologize for the oversight and delays.  I am happy to hear the issue was finally resolved, but I agree that it should not have taken multiple calls.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Housekeeping and we have conducted some retraining of our team members to ensure this issue does not repeat.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  We truly value the opportunity to improve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: No complaints with this hotel. We picked it last minute as we were traveling through town. Service was excellent. The room was very nice. Clean, good shower. The staff was very friendly. It was easy to get the temperature to the right level, not something you can say about most hotels!
Manager Response: Dear CBS_13,  Thanks for the kind review!  Your comments about the hotel, the staff, and the amenities are much appreciated.  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Our stay at the Wyndham was good but we did have multiple issues. The staff was very quick & happy to fix them that's why I rated it a 4. The night we arrived our room keys did not work. The next day we discovered they did not work for parking either. The following day I stopped by the front desk where the room keys were "fixed" to work for parking but they again didn't work for the room when we later returned.  I had to ask the front desk on our third day to have our room cleaned & replenished. I also had to ask for someone to look at the air conditioner which was not working. As I said the staff was more than happy to resolve these issues.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah G,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  Though I’m sorry to hear that you encountered so many issues, I’m very happy to hear that our team was able to quickly resolve them.  I have shared your review with my team and each of your concerns has been discussed in detail.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review from you on your next review.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Standard sized room with a king size bed. The bed itself was comfy as were the pillows. Surprised that there was no room safe. I'm not sure if this is a trend as it's the second hotel this month that had no safe.   The bathroom was clean; faucets and decor somewhat dated.   No complaints about the restaurant.    Try to request a room that does not face the highway; the room could've used better soundproofing. In fact, I was able to clearly hear every time my neighbors closed their room doors; the tight spring hinges cause the doors to slam shut.   Parking is not included. Expect to pay about $18 per day. The steering radius to get into the parking lot is very tight. Be careful not the hit the machine where you swipe your hotel card to lift the parking barrier.   I wasn't crazy
Manager Response: Dear Gary C,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about your experience with the noise.  Our maintenance team does their best to adjust the hinges so that noise is minimized.  I have shared your feedback with them and we’re working through the building to make appropriate adjustments.  Regarding in-room safes, though these are not in our guest rooms, we do offer complimentary safety deposit boxes at the front desk.  I realize they’re not quite the same, but they are available if needed.  Thanks, as well, for pointing out the access to the hotel.  This is a common challenge that we don’t have the ability to correct but we find that once a guest has been here, the issue goes away.  I hope we can look forward to welcoming you back soon!      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel for business trips for the past 3 years. The property has gone from a so-so experience to a very good experience due to all of the improvements they have been making. The updated rooms are now very comfortable. The staff is very friendly. The one area I think could still use some improvement is their Internet connections. Internet service in the room tends to drop out frequently. Improving on the reliability of this connection would upgrade this hotel to a 5 star rating.
Manager Response: Dear Joshua R,  Thank you for your many stays over the years!  We appreciate being your hotel of choice and are thrilled to hear that all of the improvements we’ve made have helped create a better experience for you.  I am happy to inform you that we have recently completed a complete overhaul and upgrade of our complimentary Wi-Fi system with new access points and upgraded bandwidth installed throughout the hotel.  I look forward to hearing how your next stay goes and to, hopefully, earning that 5-star review!      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great find: clean, professional, great location
Summary: The staff were all friendly and worked hard to accommodate our huge party of 60 + with grace and ease.  The rooms were spotless and quiet, the beds were super comfy but the pillows a little stiff (might want to bring your own).  The pool was kind of small, as were the sauna and workout room, but still sufficient.  The restaurant was very good, and as others have mentioned, the buffet was excellent.  I really enjoyed the omelet maker and his omelet, custom made to perfection. The location is great for L.A., easy on and off to major interstates and quick journey to wherever you are going especially for southern L.A.  A find.
Manager Response: Dear SPBSanFrancisco,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I’m happy to hear that you and your group enjoyed your time with us.  I have shared your review with our entire team.  We all look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Customer service counter was slow at responding to anything. Restaurant below average flavors. but room was clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Kirsten Ann P,  Thanks you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that we fell short on the service and the food quality.  I have shared your review with my team and we will use your feedback as an opportunity to lean and improve.  I hope that you’ll try us again in the near future and that we’ll be able to earn a better review from you the next time.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed every aspect of the hotel.  The pool was warm and the hot tub was very relaxing.  I was the only one at the gym, great equipment.  I love the new decor and the bed was wonderful.  I especially want to thank the great staff, especially the Concierge.
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to take advantage of so many of our amenities during your short time with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was on a business trip and our rate included breafast vouchers and they were not given to me.  I had to ask for them.  I got my vouchers but some from my group did not get theirs.
