I appreciated when I checked my rate and called the front desk they were given to me but when I checked in and told them about the vouchers they told me that I was not entitled.  They should of been given to me not that I had to call and verify my room rate.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra A,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about your experience with the breakfast vouchers.  I’ve shared your feedback with my Director of Rooms and he has met with his team members to ensure they all understand the processes involved with vouchers. I am confident that this issue has been addressed and we look forward to providing you with a better experience the next time you’re in town.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was upgraded to the 14th floor upon arrival.   As much traveling that I do, it was a very nice perk.  The evening free wine and the breakfast and coffee was certainly a benefit I was surprised to receive.  The gentleman that works on the 14th is a class act and I enjoyed speaking to him.  Thank you for making my stay a memorable one.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn,  Thank you for the very kind review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your upgrade and that Ross took such great care of you.  We truly enjoy creating memorable stays for our guests and it’s great to hear that we succeeded with you!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The thing that stood out most here was the breakfast buffet. Everything was really good for a hotel breakfast buffet!  Beds were a little firm for my taste, and the desk chair was uncomfortable, but it was a good stay.  Nice, quiet, clean, newly remodeled.
Manager Response: Dear Kayla S,  Thank you for the kind review!  Your feedback about the breakfast buffet is much appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share your review with my restaurant manager.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I appreciate the quality of Wyndam.  I would like to set up...
Summary: I appreciate the quality of Wyndam.  I would like to set up a standard business rate for staying at the John Wyane Airport Irvine Location as that is right next to our Irvine office.  I want to know my cost ahead of time so we can properly bid and get work in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Drew S,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am excited to hear that you would like to establish a rate with us and I will send you the appropriate contact information via a private message.  We look forward to serving you and your organization and to providing you all a great overnight experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: BEWARE!!  Hotel Does Not Honor PrePaid Bookings Made Thru Hotels.com!!
Summary: The Hotel itself was very nice.  Comfortable room, and a very comfortable bed.  However, this review is about the problems associated with making a reservation at this hotel through Hotels.com.    I made a reservation a week in advance and received multiple emails confirming the booking. I was charged for the room at the time of booking.  Unfortunately, when I arrived at the Hotel Desk, the hotel had NO RECORD of my booking, even though the room was prepaid.  It did not matter to the Hotel when I showed them the confirming emails from Hotels.com.  The desk agent simply said they received no communication from Hotels.com or Expedia (Parent company of Hotels.com).  After a lengthy discussion I was given a room with two double beds on Floor 3 (I had reserved and PAID FOR a King bed
Manager Response: Dear 2BucketListTravelers,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I apologize for your experience with your check-in process.  Like many hotels, we have made the choice to partner with third-party booking channels like Hotels.com.  When a guest purchases through these channels, they are actually making a purchase from that channel directly and not through the hotel.  We rely on Hotels.com to pass the booking along to us; otherwise, we will have no information about the reservation.  I am happy to say that we have rarely experienced challenges with this process and, again, I apologize that your stay with us was tarnished by this issue.  I’m happy to hear that you felt the hotel was very nice.  I hope you will consider us for a future stay and that you will consider booking directly through our website to avoid this kind of issue.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed here 3 nights for business & couldn't fault the place. Pick up at the airport was speedy & efficient, check-in was welcoming & quick, my room was quiet, clean & spacious with good wifi connectivity, a comfortable bed & nice hot shower, the restaurant & bar service was excellent & check out & return shuttle to the airport was a piece of cake. What more could you ask for? The hotel was actually very busy due to a large trade show taking place nearby there was a lot of comings & goings but I never felt like the place was too crowded. There was always space to unwind by myself even in the public areas of the hotel & the overall atmosphere was respectfully quiet. I had breakfast in the restaurant which was excellent & a couple of drinks & dinner in the bar which was equally
Manager Response: Dear Simon M,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed so many of the hotel’s services and amenities.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with my entire team!  Thanks again.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Overall an average and adequate property for business...
Summary: Overall an average and adequate property for business travel.  The staff is a little poorly informed regarding public travel options and coordination of information with the convention center events in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel P,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding transportation options to / from the Anaheim Convention Center.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms.  We will do some additional training with our team in an effort to provide a better level of service to our guests moving forward.  Thanks again for your feedback.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and it's close to the airport
Summary: Our room was very nice, and the property was very nice as well.  The bed was great.  It was inconvienent not having a fridge in the room, but that wasn't a big deal.  Also the internet was not secured with a password.
Manager Response: Dear Corwinss,  Thank you for the nice 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  If you find your way back to our hotel in the future, ask our staff about having a mini-fridge delivered to your room.  Thanks again!  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is very close to John Wayne Airport (they have a free shuttle service) and is located in the middle of an office complex. Rooms are large and clean, beds comfortable. MIssed a fridge in the room. Breakfast and parking are both extra (USD 18 each which is a bit steep). There is an El Torito and a McCormick & Schmuckers restaurant within walking distance of the hotel but basically nothing else. There are also a couple of cafes in the office complex though. There is a restaurant in the hotel which we didn't try as well as a bar with a bar menu. Convenient for a business stay.
Manager Response: Dear MiaEJ2013,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the clean rooms and the comfortable beds the hotel has to offer.  It’s also great to hear that you found some of the restaurants in the business park.  Should you find your way back to our hotel, I would like to recommend Mick’s or Tuscany Grill.  These restaurants are also located in the complex and available for lunch and dinner.  Our desk staff is happy to provide you with directions.  Thank you as well for your green- conscious approach to travel.  We greatly appreciate when our guests participate in our green linen program.  Together, we can make a difference!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I have been staying at this hotel weekly for more than a...
Summary: I have been staying at this hotel weekly for more than a year.  The staff is outstanding.  Its my favorite hotel by far!
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thanks for all the stays and for the great 5-styar review!  We are thrilled to be your hotel of choice and look forward to your many returns!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Attended a conference in Irvine at the Wyndham hotel.  I have stayed in many airport convenient hotels, and they are usually good for a night while in route, but generally don't have the amenities that more centrally located hotels do, and if they did you generally don't utilize them as you are in transit.  Well, since the conference was held here, I had a few nights to experience what the hotel had to offer.   First of all, the service from the staff was excellent from the moment I checked in to the time I checked out.  I received a little goodie bag upon check in with some bottled water, pretzels and some short bread cookies.  Nice to have a little snack right off the airplane.  The rooms were nice and pretty clean, typical of a chain hotel.   Good work space in the room and
Manager Response: Dear Toni T,  Thank you for the kind review.  It’s great to hear that you were able to take advantage of so many of the hotel’s amenities while you were here.  We’re very excited about the brand new WIFI system we’ve just installed and the complimentary shuttle service has always been a big hit with our guests.  I have shared your review with my entire team.  They are all looking forward to welcoming you back should your travels bring you back our way.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The food at the hotel was really my favorite part usually the hotel food isn't worth eating. But in this case we were really pleased. We were there for titanium live and they were amazing venue to host a event if your considering.
Manager Response: Dear BradandAleciaPratt,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your feedback about the hotel, the food, and your event are much appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: All service was great. Friendly staff. Only negative was not being able to get grab and go breakfast the night before for the kids since they had to leave before it was available.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa M,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the service and staff are much appreciated.  Thank you, as well, for your feedback on the grab & go breakfast.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will review how we might be able to accommodate teams that are leaving before our grab & go start times.  I am confident that we’ll be able to provide a solution that works for all of our teams.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The room was nice.  We did have to get 2 new pillows, as...
Summary: The room was nice.  We did have to get 2 new pillows, as the cases were dirty. They were very quick to bring 2 new pillows up to us though. ( I hope the sheets had actually been changed, and just the cases were missed.)  The last night of our stay, the pool was closed and that was a huge disappointment to our 10 year old - swimming in the pool is half the fun of taking a family trip.  Overall the room was nice, and the staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review.  We greatly appreciate your stay and your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear about the issue with the pillow cases and the pool.  It is absolutely our practice to change all linen before a new guest checks in.  I’ve shard your feedback with my Director of Housekeeping and we’ll be addressing this with our entire housekeeping team.  Regarding the pool, I’m sorry for any inconvenience you experienced.  We never like to close pool but there are times that unexpected issues force us to do so.  I hope that you’ll come back to our hotel the next time you’re in town.  We look forward to providing you with a great stay and your 10 year old with a great swimming experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: At first entry, the hotel looked beautiful and welcoming. The staff were welcoming and helpful. I was pleased to see that the room was just as nice as the lobby. The only disappointment was the food. We had a catered dinner for our team on 2 nights (simply for convenience) and it was not very impressive. I would stay there again, but arrange food at a restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah M,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would stay again.  I’m sorry to hear that the catered meals fell short of your expectations.  This is an area that the hotel typically gets high marks in.  I will be sharing your feedback with my food and beverage team and we’ll look for ways to make our food experience even better.  Thanks again for the feedback.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Was here for a night and enjoyed the stay. The hotel is geared toward the business crowd, though I found the staff to be friendly and the room very nice. Both parking and breakfast are extra (18 USD for both). Not really any other choice for parking, but plenty of choices for eateries in the area, so I skipped breakfast. It's close to the airport, so expect to hear doors being opened at odd hours, though the airport noise itself was minimal.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremiah G,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you selecting our hotel and hope that your travels will bring you back our way soon.  Your business and your feedback are both valued.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I frequently go to Irvine monthly and always stay at the Wyndham. The property is clean and the staff are very professional.
Manager Response: Dear Mozell Mrs Q,  Thank you for the kind review!  We value your comments about the hotel and the staff and your frequent visits are much appreciated.  We look forward to your return and hope to earn a 5-star review on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at the Wyndham multiple times and is my go - to when in the Irvine/Orange County area. Parking is easy. Check in is easy. Staff is Friendly - the restaurant and the bar in the hotel is well priced and tasty. All around great. LOVE the Executive Floor for breakfast/snacks and newspapers and local publications. I try to spend some time in the Executive Lounge reading the local periodicals to find cool things to do in the area! GREAT VIEWS TOO! Really close to the Equinox in Irvine too for a workout. Also FREE WIFI throughout the hotel, no lengthy sign up process - just open the laptop and get going.
Manager Response: Dear Nick S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that you’ve enjoyed your stays with us and that you’ve been able to take advantage of so many of the hotel’s amenities.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice and updated Rooms, but aminities, I am not sure!
Summary: Great location, nice and attractive walk in ambiance, modern and updated rooms with nice over view of OC airport, BUT, the rest is not all that. We picked the hotel because it has an indoor heated swimming pool, but it was a disaster. The access to the swimming pool is VERY hard to figure out. I went down to check it out by myself and used the 1950 elevator they have. After going through many hoops, I was able to get down to the pool. The pool was not heated. Now, I wanted to take the elevator back to the room; I called the elevator, but it didn't come down to the swimming pool level. I tried and tried and tired without any luck. I had to exit the pool area to the parking lot, back to the lobby and then to my room. I took my kids down in hopes that the elevator will be
Manager Response: Dear Bashar Z,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I would like to apologize for your experience with the swimming pool.  I am aware that we had an issue with pool heater and that the pool went unheated for approximately one week.  Unfortunately, the motor failed and we were forced to wait while a new motor was shipped to us for installation.  Though we regularly service all of our equipment, we can’t anticipate when a mechanical failure may occur.  We did our best to minimize the down time and opted to leave the pool accessible during the motor outage.  I’m also sorry to hear that the elevator was not functioning properly.  I can assure you that all of our elevators are regularly inspected and maintained.  Though I regret your experience was not what you expected, I am happy to inform you that the issues you experienced have all been addressed.  I hope you will try us again in the future and that your experience is more in line with the great experiences our guests typically receive.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked a room with 2 rollaway beds and a queen bed. I also asked for 5 breakfast tickets. We were part of a soccer tournament group. The lady I spoke to who does group reservations was very nice and stated everything would be done exactly as I asked. I was going to be having 5 people in the suite I booked. When I got to the hotel, I had a double bed and one rollaway and only 4 breakfast tickets. The manager on duty gave me a hard time and stated he would try to get in touch with the manager who helped me, but if he couldn't, he couldn't do it. He belittled me on the phone. We finally got what we want after hours of being persistent and then I also asked for comp drinks, which he didn't like. Not a good experience. We also ate in the bar area and it was really busy since the
Manager Response: Dear Ginal615,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you with a better stay.  Though we do our best to accommodate every guest, there are times that we are unable to meet every need.  In those cases, we do try to provide the next best option.  I apologize that you were ever informed that a room adequate for five people would be provided.  The hotel doesn’t offer rooms that will accommodate five people so I’m unsure why this was ever promised to you.  I have already addressed this with my entire team.  Again, I apologize for the inconvenience.  I have also shared your feedback with my restaurant manager and we have discussed staffing levels during events like this one.  I believe we have made the appropriate adjustments and will be better prepared moving forward.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Always good service.  Question:  As a Gold member, are there supposed to be any extras upon check in?
Manager Response: Dear Michael H,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind review.  Regarding Wyndham Rewards Gold Status, no additional extras are included at check-in; however, Gold Status members are eligible for three bonus rewards per year that are not offered to basic members.  These rewards are earned for each 20 qualifying nights stayed.  The rewards consist of bonus points that can be used for free stays within the Wyndham family of hotels.  If you have any further questions about the program, please feel free to contact me and I will be happy to assist.  Thanks again!    Best Regards, 	 Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The location is convenient to the OC Airport as advertised and there is a shuttle to and from the airport for guests. There are a number of good restaurants nearby for lunch or dinner , and one or two that could be considered within walking distance although the area is not pedestrian friendly. The hotel is located within a business office complex and difficult to figure out how to get to from Von Karmen Avenue. You have to wind through the complex as there is no direct access off Von Karman.  The hotel itself is adequate, but bland in character. The room was sufficient and quiet despite being next to the 405 Freeway. There is a restaurant and bar in the hotel, from which we ordered room service for an early breakfast for the sake of convenience. The food was above average but
Manager Response: Dear Meg G,  Thank you for staying with us and for the very thorough review.  I’m sorry to hear that we were not able to provide you with a better experience.  Though we strive to provide every guest with a 5-star stay, we recognize that some of the standard charges applied for a full-service airport hotel are not always appreciated by guests.  I would encourage every guest to shop the other full-service hotels in Irvine to compare them to what we are doing here.  I am confident that you’ll find that our services are very reasonably priced in comparison.  In addition to keeping our rates lower than our competitors, we remove some of the expenses that travelers can incur by providing complimentary airport and local shuttle as well as complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.  It’s great to hear that you would consider using us again.  I hope that we’re able to provide you with a better experience next time and that we can earn a better score form you on your next review.   Best Regards, 	 Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Room was ok but parking fees outrageous. Breakfast was not what our soccer teams needed. Restaurant food ok but service was lacking. Would stay elsewhere in future.
Manager Response: Dear Jerdp2015,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our hotel.  I wanted to take a minute to share that we are revising our team breakfast program and adding some additional items to make it a better meal for the players.  I hope that you’ll consider our hotel the next you’re traveling to the area.  We would love the opportunity to change your opinion!  Best Regards, 	 Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: More affordable choice at the airport
Summary: I stayed here because it was about half the price of the Marriott across the 405.  Check in was quick and easy, hotel is clean and well run.  The lobby bar/restaurant was functional but nothing to go out of your way to visit.  The fitness room had nice equipment but was a bit crowded and for some reason the AC wasn't working well.  Very humid both mornings I was in there.  Other than that, no complaints.
Manager Response: Dear Jim_B_10,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I’m sorry to hear about the AC in the fitness center.  Your feedback has been shared with our maintenance department and we’ll make sure the AC issue has been addressed.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed for Surf City Half Marathon
Summary: Thank you so much for providing shuttle to and from the race.it was the main reason I choose your hotel. Also providing breakfast was a great surprise. The oatmeal was excellent and just what I needed. Letting us check out at 2pm was so nice no pressure to be able to take a shower before leaving the hotel.i would recommend it to my running friends for next year.
Manager Response: Dear Jnrunninglola,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s wonderful to hear that your stay with us went so well.  We’ve truly enjoyed partnering with the Surf City Marathon and look forward to having you and your fellow runners back with us next year!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We got to the hotel and were very happy with the location and the appearance of the hotel. We were greeted by Kailei and she took car of us for the next 10days without any problems. I would recommend the hotel to anyone coming to Irvine city.
Manager Response: Dear Louie314,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and about Kailei are much appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share your review with our entire team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have had the opportunity to stay at the Wyndham Irvine-Orange County Airport several times now and it has always been a great experience. The staff is friendly and accommodating, the rooms are clean and atmosphere overall is perfect. The location of the Wyndham is also a major plus with many restaurants nearby, a large mall across the street and super close to Disneyland!  We will be planning another trip very soon!  :)
Manager Response: Dear Matthew S,  Thanks for you the frequent stays and for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the proximity to so many of Orange Counties attractions are much appreciated.  It’s nice to hear you’re planning to visit us again.  We look forward to your return.  Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This review is overdue.  We stayed at the Wyndham Irvine- Orange County Airport in November of 2014.  Everything was great. Check in process was smooth and welcoming. Room was very clean and spacious. Very close in proximity to various restaurants as well South Coast Mall (my favorite). We will definitely be back soon!  Thanks so much for making our stay a great one!  
Manager Response: Dear Rosanne0406,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  It’s great to hear the hotel location and amenities helped make your stay so great!  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This location is great if you are headed to airport.  Courteous staff who went above and beyond.  Rooms do not have a small refrigerator.  My wife asked front desk to place a medicine pack in refrigerator until morning.  They immediately sent staff to our room with a portable refrigerator.  Maybe some rules about storing medicine, but the end result was very helpful.  My only complaint - which is just me - is the $17 parking fee.  I know it is the "big" city but I always feeled scammed for such things.  OK, $5-7 would be logical, but is just pisses me off.  At least they had a couple of handicapped spots.  Restaurant was not busy - cheeseburger kind of night - it was really good as was service.
Manager Response: Dear Leftygolfer1,  Thank you for the great 5-start review!  We appreciate your business and your feedback.  It’s great to hear that you were able to take advantage of some of the hotel’s amenities.  The cheeseburger in the restaurant is one of the best around!  I’ll be sharing your kind comments with my entire team.  We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again the next time you’re in the area.      Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, always aiming to please. Easy, fast shuttle to/from airport and close-by shopping. Quiet rooms, nicely appointed. Nice business center with free and working internet and printers. Was gouged by a local cab company and informed the staff. They called right away and got me a credit back ASAP. Close to major freeways, shopping, restaurants, attractions. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear A158MVmarkg,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff, the rooms, and the amenities are much appreciated.  I’m also happy to hear that my team was able to assist you with the bad cab experience.   I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great management that helped carry the marathon experience into the hotel, was reliable and courteous with our needs. Definitely an easy clean place to stay in when looking for an overnight.
Manager Response: Dear Melissah361,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while you were in town for the marathon.  It’s great to know we played a small part in making your marathon experience a great one!  We look forward to having you back for next year’s run!  Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It was just a quick overnight stay, but they were responsive. We asked for a fridge and they brought it up in a timely manner!
Manager Response: Dear Kfontable,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the team here was so responsive to your requests.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.   Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding service to the Surf City Marathon!!!
Summary: We just stayed the night at the Wyndham last weekend and were very happy with the hotel including the parking, decor and location.  The room was very nice, clean and the beds and pillows were extremely comfortable.  However, I have to mention the absolutely exceptional service we received in regards to service to the Surf City Marathon.  The primary extra service was the shuttle to and from the Marathon.  I was honestly concerned because the Wyndham is a ways away from Huntington Beach, the Marathon location.   However, Cassie, the person assigned to the shuttle service, provided incredible assurance detailing the process from check-in to the final bus coming home.  The bus was very comfortable, on-time and was in EXACTLY the same spot where we were dropped off (this doesn't
Manager Response: Dear Doug G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that we were able to provide you such a great experience while you were in town for the marathon.  Cassie worked very closely with Surf City to ensure that all of our guests were well taken care of and that the shuttle service went flawlessly.  It’s great to hear that all her hard work paid off!  I will be sure to share your feedback with her and the rest of our team.  We look forward to having you back for next year’s marathon!  Best Regard,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great service.   Lobby staff were outstanding and helpful.  Free transportation to John Wayne Airport (SNA).  Close to airport and a mile to a major seafood center with all kids of seafood restaurants.  Price was decent booked it on hotwire.   Spent less then a 100.00.
Manager Response: Dear 670671.  Thank you for staying with us and for the great 5-star review!  I hope your travels bring you abck our way soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was pleased with the Wyndham Hotel and my room as it was modern and and clean and in a centralized location.  However, there were several issues that collectively made my visit to the Wyndham less then ideal: First, when I booked my room, there was no mention of the parking fee which was an additional $18 per vehicle, per night yet there was no Valet they advertised. Then, the room had been paid for in advance but after check then was a hold placed on my card for the entire 2 night rate plus the $75 deposit. When I questioned the front desk they could only confirm the $75 deposit but had not record of the additional hold. I had to resolve the issue by contacting my bank after the visit and have them reverse the old. Lastly, after arriving home I realized I had left my $150
Manager Response: Dear PeterrK4972LI,  Thanks you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you will not be returning.  It is our goal to provide an experience to every guest that makes them want to come back and it’s clear we fell short of that goal with you.  I’m sorry to hear that the parking fees were a surprise to you.  Though these fees are listed on our website, we find that guests that book through other channels are not always notified of these charges.  We are working with the various third party reservation sites in an attempt to make sure this information is shared.  We recently eliminated the valet parking services and are working to make sure all booking channels are updated.  I’m also sorry to hear about the issue with eth deposit.  Though we release deposits at departure, some backs can take 3 to 5 days before they complete the transaction on their side.  Lastly, I’m sorry to hear that the toothbrush was not recovered.  We do all we can to locate and return lost items and we regret that we were unable to locate your lost toothbrush.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very good for the price.  The rooms are nice and comfortable. The service is good.  The cons: The hotel is far from the malls or stores The parking is expensive. We had a leak on the bathroom
Manager Response: Dear Gabriela N,  Thank you for your review.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and would recommend our hotel.  I’m sorry to hear about the leak you experienced.  I hope you were able to notify my team of this issue and that they were able to quickly rectify the situation.  Thanks again and please come back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The rooms are fair, the location is good. The service is mixed.  If you stay here, you must stay on in a suite or on the top floor.  The attendant on the 14th floor is clearly the best (and most professional) aspect of this property.  His name is Ross and he reminds me of an earlier time in this country when professionalism meant something.  He is why I stay here.  If he left, I would too.
Manager Response: Dear Kris A,  Thank you for your stay and for your feedback.  Your comments about Ross are much appreciated and I will be sure to share them with our entire team.  I am sorry to hear that the rest of the team doesn’t match up to Ross’s level of service.  We’ll be discussing this at length and seeing what we can do to make sure you get that same experience regardless of the employee you’re interacting with.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My only problem was with the bed size and cover. First, I am very tall, even a King size bed is a bit short for me. It would be nice if there was a room or two available for "taller" people. Second, the quilt type cover was way too hot. It would be nice if a regular bed spread was available at the desk upon request.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin S,  Thank you for your feedback.  I’m sorry to hear that your sleep experience was not as good as it could have been.  Though this is the first time we’ve had a request like yours, we will certainly take it into consideration and explore our options.  Regarding the blanket, I’m sorry to hear that my staff did not inform you of the blanket located in the guest room closet.  We keep a lighter blanket in the rooms for this purpose.  I will be sure to share your review with my desk staff and make sure they are all aware of this option.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel allowed a huge party to come in and overrun the seventh floor. They were unbelievably loud and obnoxious. They were using profane language and were smoking Marijuana in the hallway. Our kids, which had softball games the next day could not sleep and our room was overwhelmed with Pot for about 45 minutes.  The desk said they were aware of the problem, but only had one security guard. This all took place at 1:22 AM. After about an hour and a half that calmed down. Then at 4 AM two workers were chatting loudly in the hallway. Clearly this hotel was overwhelmed and could not handle security. And their workers do not understand that people sleep at 4AM in a hotel. I was embarrassed because several families had chosen this hotel from our travel softball team and I was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I sincerely apologize for your experience at our hotel.  The issues you experienced were unacceptable and I understand your frustration.  The group we had in house was a repeat group and we had not had issues with them in the past.  We did not anticipate such a change in their group this time and were prepared to handle the volume of complaints.  We will not repeat that situation nor will we allow that group back.  Again, I apologize for your experience, but I assure you that we have taken your feedback seriously and will ensure this doesn’t happen again.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is great for the convenience to UCI, and they offer a free shuttle.  Rooms are nice, and a great price!
Manager Response: Dear Carla S,  Thank you for the kind review!  I am happy to hear that you found the hotel to be so convenient and that our complimentary shuttle worked so well for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for three days, and its a king bed room. We stayed for 12 days in California for the whole trip and one would be the last to rate.  Pros: lesser price when compared to other hotels nearby. They have a shuttle within 3 miles.  Cons: no breakfast and the restaurant downstairs is pretty bad with high prices and below average food ,so plan before. There are many places to eat nearby. Use their shuttle service to Ralphs and there you will find many food places. There is also a food court nearby.  The rooms are the big minus. They are renovated, but very small and narrow corridors.  Their pool water is cold and the shower near the pool gives cold water.  You have to wait for the shuttle service for 10-15 mins.
Manager Response: Dear Jyothi Sri L,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that the hotel did not meet your expectations.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will use it as an opportunity to improve.  I hope you will be willing to try us again if you find yourself in the area.  We would love the opportunity to earn a better review from you.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Two big thumbs up for this hotel!!!
Summary: Large room, high floor, and terrific staff make this hotel a real gem for travellers and business folks...and perfect for people who are on the road to other points south.  a huge thanks goes to two wonderful people at the hotel:  the front desk manager who upgraded me when i checked in; he was just terrific and so welcoming.  the second wonderful person is russ, who took care of me on the executive level floor...a terrific man who made my staff comfortable and so pleasant.  a great hotel that's right near the airport...highly recommended!!!
Manager Response: Dear Bob-in-dc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that our team took such great care of you.  Ross is an excellent employee and is frequently recognized by our guests.  It’s great to know that you were able to experience his high level of service.  I will be sure to share your comments about Ross and the rest of the staff with our entire team.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel and only a minute away from SNA airport.  The lobby was very clean with plenty of room.  The restaurant/bar was very convenient and the food was excellent.  The beds were comfortable and shuttle drivers/staff were very friendly.  The only draw back was the room size, but I was there on business so I didn't need much room.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear David J,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your feedback about the hotel is much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your kind remarks about the restaurant, staff, and cleanliness with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel. Loved the courtesy shuttle. Very helpful drivers. Front desk staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that the shuttle drivers and desk staff created such a positive experience for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Booking, check-in, stay, auto check-out -- all went perfectly, parking was always available and easy to access - no negatives
Manager Response: Thank you for your first stay with us!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way regularly and that we become your choice hotel in Orange County.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a convenient location. Have stayed at this...
Summary: Great hotel at a convenient location. Have stayed at this property numerous times.  Great value.  Will come back again.
Manager Response: Dear chakib2015,  Thank you for your frequent stays and for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that we have become your choice hotel in the Irvine area.  We look forward to your nest visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I keep returning to this property because is so close to the airport, the airport shuttle is reliable and the staff is friendly.  The hotel has a very updated look and décor.  The rooms are spacious, comfortable and quiet.  I will keep coming back.
Manager Response: Dear D1859EMcarlo,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate your return business and your feedback.  Your comments about the staff, the rooms, and the convenience to SNA are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Wyndham hotel. Very comfortable bed, clean sheets, nice bathroom and enough space to move around. I difinately come back on my future trips to OC. I just have a suggestion though, it would be great if there was a small refrigerator in room.  Thanks, Mathew Saeb
Manager Response: Dear 584mathews,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you plan to stay with us on future trips.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Please keep in mind that the hotel does have mini-fridges available if that is something you are interested in for your next visit.  Just inquire at check-in about having one delivered to your guest room.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The service was great, I asked for a refrigerator and I had it within about a 30 min. The front desk was friendly, they did everything to make sure I was comfortable at their hotel and answered any questions I had. The beds are the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on. We had a great night sleep every night,  The room was pretty clean. the only problem I ran into was that the elevator to the pool did not work and the pool was very cold. Other than that I would recommend this motel.
Manager Response: Dear Winstonf2015,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  I would like to start by apologizing for your experience with the pool elevator and pool temperature.  I am happy to share that both of these issues were quickly resolved.  The elevator is functioning and the pool temperature has been raised to a very comfortable 80 degrees.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We would love the opportunity to earn a 5-star rating on your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed a few days at this property and found it to be very convenient to Newport Beach and very close to the airport which for me is a must.
Manager Response: Dear I9237VEjosem,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s nice to hear that the comfort and convenience of our hotel worked so well for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Chose property based on price versus available amenities and location. Staff makes hotel, from TJ on the sales side to Ross's exceptional conversational banter in the mornings and evenings, to the convenience of the shuttle service and the front desk staff (great people like Rea and Tiffany). At the end of the day, feels like coming home in an otherwise difficult relocation situation.
Manager Response: Dear 516judk,  Thank you for the great review and for calling out the service that you received from our employees.  It is wonderful to hear that so many of our team members were able to positively impact your stay with us.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my team.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Recently stayed for 1 night pre-cruise.  Great location with many restaurants in the area.  Hotel provided a shuttle to/from close by El Torito.  Very nice rooms and hotel.  Staff is very friendly.  Very close to the John Wayne airport.  Only negative was having to pay for parking.  Would recommend this to others.
Manager Response: Dear VailAZTraveler,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and even happier to hear that you would recommend our hotel.  I hope you had a wonderful cruise.  If your travels bring you back our way in the future, we’ll look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was in town for one night on business and chose the Wyndham due to proximity to airport and use of my rewards and was very pleased.
Manager Response: Dear 987nathans,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for being a Wyndham Rewards member!  We appreciate you choosing us as your preferred hotel in Irvine and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Rooms are very nice but when asked to book a room by an...
Summary: Rooms are very nice but when asked to book a room by an exit don't assign a handicap room to those not handicapped! Geez!
Manager Response: Dear 878wendyt,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you felt the rooms were nice.  I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced being put into an accessible room.  Though these are very nice rooms, it is not our regular practice to assign them to guests unless they request them or they are the only rooms remaining.  I will share your feedback with my guest services department.  I hope we can look forward to providing you with a better experience in the near future.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I get the best service at the Irvine Wyndham than in any...
Summary: I get the best service at the Irvine Wyndham than in any other hotel I stay in and I travel for business a lot. They remember me and everything I like. Ross is the best on the Executive Floor as he is personable and a great host.
Manager Response: Dear B1877TXrobertac,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Ross’s services in the Executive Lounge.  It is great to hear that he has made such a positive impact on your stay.  He is a great asset to the hotel.  I will be sure to share your review with him and the rest of our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Good but bring back the valet parking
Summary: My stay was good, nice room, nice people.  My one request is for them to bring back the valet parking.  I have stayed here before and it was one of the reason I planned to stay here again.  It may seem spoiled but it was nice to have someone worry about parking for you and then for them to bring it around in the morning when it is time to go.  I make quarterly trips to Irvine and  I may consider staying someplace else next time.
Manager Response: Dear Noelle K,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your repeat business.  I apologize for any inconvenience our new parking situation may have caused you.  It was certainly not our intention to disappoint any of our guests with this change; however, with the very limited usage our valet parking received, we felt it was the right choice for the hotel.  We will certainly take your feedback into consideration.  For now, I hope that you will be willing to overlook this and stay with us again the next time you’re in Irvine.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is my second time came to LA and first time stay in Wyndham. This is a good hotel, at least better than the one I stayed before. Food is good. Room is big with nice windows view.  It is close to my office so it saves time in transportation. I haven't used the shuttle service, but I will try next time as I decided to stay in Wyndham again next time I travel to LA.
Manager Response: Dear Finna_ccp,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would select our hotel again the next time you are in the area.  I’m happy to hear that you will be able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle service in order to save time and money.  I hope we are able to welcome you back soon.    Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I flew into SNA last week and I called the hotel to see if I could check in a little bit earlier to drop my bags off before heading to the office. A young lady by the name of Kailei picked up the phone and explained to me that the computer system did not have me checking in until the next day (Wednesday) and that the hotel was completely booked. Despite the terrible news, she reassured me she would do everything in her power to find me a room. Meanwhile, I started heading to the hotel, bracing myself for a fistfight and long argument as to whose fault it really was. Upon arriving at the hotel, Kailei was beaming with a smile as she was happy to let me know that she was able to procure a room for me in the 7 minutes it took me to get to the hotel. I was absolutely floored at her
Manager Response: Dear John L,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate your business and your feedback.  It is great to hear that Kailei had such a positive impact on your stay with us.  She is a great asset to our team and has been recognized frequently by our guests for her service.  I have shared your review with her and with the rest of our team.  Kailei, and the entire Wyndham Irvine team, are anxious to welcome you back and to provide you with another 5-srat experience!   Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: never been to a hotel that has double beds in a room, not queen, but double beds...too much money for double beds...last resort destination.
Manager Response: Dear 555kimw,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that you were not pleased with the double beds our hotel offers.  We recognize that this may not be the perfect fit for every guest and regret that we were not able to accommodate you with what you were looking for.  I know there are plenty of options in the Irvine area for you to choose from, but please note that we would love to have you back if you choose to give us another try.  Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham in Irvine offers wonderful amenities in a safe, clean, and picturesque setting.  The staff were very courteous and helpful.  We enjoyed our stay and would choose Wyndham in Irvine again when traveling through the area.
Manager Response: Dear Jonm340,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that the staff was so courteous and helpful.  It’s great to know that you would select our hotel again the next time you’re out our way.  We look forward to your next visit.  Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham....going over and beyond for their guests
Summary: This review is for potential guests, Bill Acuna as well as the rest of the staff. Over the years, in my line of work, I have stayed in hundreds of hotels.  Some of them, by their star rating, reputation, and the extreme prices for their accommodations, I expect nothing but excellence.  I had never stayed at a Wyndham.  So this is why I'm taking the time to single out this particular hotel.  Tony, Fernado and the rest of the bell staff were always welcoming, helpful and treated me like I was special.  Caesar, Ricardo and David as well as the room service attendants were polite, prompt, and very efficient. Front desk staff was outstanding.  Katie, Kylie and Tiffany (and I am sure I am leaving out other names that should be included)  made me feel important and no matter what I
Manager Response: Dear Ashlee L,  Thank you for staying with us and for the incredible 5-star review!  Your feedback about so many of our staff members is much appreciated.  It is great to know that so many of our team members were able to positively impact your stay.  Our goal is to create this kind of experience for all of our guests and it’s good to know that we’re meeting that goal.  Thanks again for taking the time to provide your feedback to us.  We look forward to your next visit. Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this establishment for a week in Dec and I must say that the property was great.  The rooms were clean and neat.  The front desk was very attentive and helpful but their was on individual Matthew P. who was by far one of the most friendliest I've ever come across at my stays at hotels including the Ritz Carlton Kapalua and the Kahala Hilton just to name a few for the sake of comparison.  He went above and beyond to make my stay pleasant and he was more than willing to help with questions or concerns.  Any hotel can rave about their rooms, amenities, property, etc...but what really is hard to come by is friendly staff.  Most people just do it because it is their job but Matthew seemed to do it because he genuinely wanted to make sure you enjoyed your stay at the
Manager Response: Dear David K,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I am so happy to hear that Matthew made such a positive impression.  He’s a great asset to the hotel.  I will be sure to share your review with him and the rest of our team.  I will also share your feedback regarding the shuttle driver with my Director of Operations.  We’ll be sure to address this with our entire shuttle team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review on your next visit! Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The room and bed were very comfortable, clean and the staff was friendly. I was surprised the room was not equipped with a safe.
Manager Response: Dear 474wesleya,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  If you find yourself back our way again, please ask at the desk about our complimentary safety deposit boxes if you would like to have items secured during your stay. Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel met my expectations and is fairly close to the Santa Ana Airport. Check in was quick and easy our room was on the 9th floor and it was very spacious with updated furniture with a nice Samsung tv the bathroom was a little dated and the ceiling in our bathroom was peeling a little above the shower and the shower curtain was torn on one side but all in all the room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable and had plenty of pillows, the staff here was friendly and helpful with recommendations. I was very disappointed to find out upon our arrival that I would be charged $18.00 per night fee to park my car I don't recall seeing anything about a parking fee when my room was booked.
Manager Response: Dear Laura C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Your kind comments about the staff, the cleanliness, and the comfort of the bed are much appreciated.  I hope your travels find you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay. Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night before a flight home from SNA. Check in was smooth and everyone was very friendly. The hotel appears a little bit dated but is VERY clean! The bed was extremely comfortable and the bathroom products were very nice. The only thing I wish they had was a coffee bar. I wanted a late night cup of tea and was unable to locate an open starbucks. (The hotel is in a business district). They do have coffee makers in your room, however, I didn't want to brew one myself..I hope to stay here again the next time we pass through SNA. BTW, there is an $18 parking fee. I hate fees but overall, it was a good experience!
Manager Response: Dear Dsg560,  Thanks you for your kind review.  I am happy to hear that you found the hotel to be comfortable and clean and that you hope to stay with us again.  We look forward to your next visit.  When your next with us, please note that there is a Starbuck’s located just across the street from the business park on the corner of Main and MacArthur behind the Carl’s Jr. Have a fantastic 2015! 	 Best Regards, Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Met expectations, for the most part
Summary: There are certain expectations at upper scale (4 and 5 star) locations.  We expect friendly, welcoming and helpful staff, which the Wyndham certainly had.  We expect a well appointed room, clean and up to date, and I have no complaints in that department either.  In one resect, the Irvine Wyndham broke the rule of inverse inclusion practiced by luxe hotels.  Normally, in upper level accommodations, the more you pay, the less is included in the room rate.  The Wyndham defied that by including Internet access in the room rate.  That's about it.  Self-parking was $18.00 per night.  If you want a minibar and/or microwave, you will have to go to a lower rated property.  These things are available in many three star locations and most mid-range chains have them.  The room did have a
Manager Response: Dear Dan834,  Thanks you for staying with us and for providing such a thorough review.  I am happy to hear that the hotel met most of your expectations and exceeded some of them.  I do apologize for the challenge with the AC noise.  I have shared your review with my Chief Engineer and asked that he test our systems to ensure noise is minimized.  These AC units are all brand new and should not be causing this kind of issue.  I certainly understand the frustration of having your sleep interrupted by unwanted noise.  I appreciate you bringing this to our attention and I assure you that we are working on correcting this.  Again, thank you for your review.  I hope we have the opportunity to improve your opinion of our hotel the next time you travel to our area.         Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel was very convenient for our business. The staff...
Summary: The hotel was very convenient for our business. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were extremely comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear lofo2014,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to serving you again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel is lacking.  Walls are paper thin and noise carries--I could hear alarm clocks in neighboring rooms buzzing.  Internet is slower than dial up.  Impossible to even use it for work.  I had no hot water on my first morning--haven't experienced that since staying at a Motel 6 in the 1970's!!!
Manager Response: Dear SeanmT7304HK,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay.  I am aware of the issue you experienced with the hot water.  This was due to an unexpected issue with our water boiler and was corrected the same day the issue was discovered.  I have also had my engineering department troubleshoot our internet system as this is something we typically get high marks on.  We have reset the entire system and it is working great.  I hope you will be willing to try us again the next time you are in the area.  We would love to earn your business for all of your future trips.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This Hotel has a good name and is in a safe location. Transportation to and from the airport is quick and clean. I called directly and got them to lower the price a additional $25 per night. However they do charge for parking and the sign that said so was not visible on the first night when I arrived. I believe it is $18 night. Very nice clean lobby and the outside of the property seemed well maintained. There was just nothing special about the room. Beds were comfortable with good sheets and small flat screen TV was in the room (took forever to change channels) As expected the bottled water is $5 and a continental breakfast starts at $12 and goes up from there. Not a bad place to stay but for a little more $ the other Wyndham on Avenue of the Arts is in a different league and
Manager Response: Dear Brian C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry for any confusion with the parking fees.  Though the fees are posted at the ticket dispensers, we will be adding additional signage to help prevent any future issues with these fees.  I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of the complimentary shuttle service and that you found the hotel to be clean and comfortable.  Please note that the hotel does provide two complimentary bottles of water in the room on the first night.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you are willing to stay with us again.  We look forward to the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff friendly and very accommodating. Breakfast wonderful,beds comfortable and the hotel was quiet at night so you can get a good nights rest especially when traveling for business.  The shuttle and drivers are the best. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Cherie J,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your recommendation and your kind comments about the staff, the shuttles, and the hotel amenities are much appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a slight issue in regards to the reservation and from what I gathered a possible new employee who was lacking in some pertinent information which caused a bit of a financial stress for me. BUT I was able to get in touch with an individual who corrected it all and had everything in order by the time I arrived :) From there the stay was very relaxing :)
Manager Response: Dear 536kellieb,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am sorry for the initial confusion with your reservation but happy to hear that my team was able to resolve the issue with you.  I’m also happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way son and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wyndham Irvine was a great hotel to stay at. They made my family feel at home and the staff was very nice and helpful. I recommend this location to anyone that wants a great hotel to stay in.
Manager Response: Dear LisabG4734EG,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that the staff took such great care of you and that you felt at home in our hotel.  Thank you as well for the recommendation!  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you’re out our way!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Wyndham-Irvine for two nights in mid-November 2014.  The room was excellent, and the hotel lounge has a wonderful happy hour, with reasonably priced drinks and great food, for a really good price.  They run a good shuttle service between the airport and the hotel, so it is easy and economical to get to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear BobTriptoPanama,  Thank you for the very king 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us in November and that the staff in the lounge took such great care of you.  I hope your travels bring you back out way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wondeful hotel to have a group stay. Cindy Oglesby was fantastic to work with in setting up the stay for our regional meeting. Very accomodating and a wonderful hostess! Convenient location for nightly events as well. A definite recommendation and we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Marci N,  Thank you for the 5-star review and for bringing your regional meeting to our hotel!  It was our pleasure to play a part in your group’s success and we look forward to future opportunities to provide you with additional fantastic experiences at our hotel.  Thank you, as well, for calling out Cindy and all the work she did with your group.  I have shared your kind comments with Cindy and the rest of the team.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed for a night and the hotel is very good in terms of cleanliness, proximity to airport and freeways.  I would come back here again next time.  The staff was very cordial and helped me with scanning documents too :)
Manager Response: Dear Kishorey735,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you had such a positive experience with us and that you would stay with us again the next time you’re in town.  We look forward to that next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I love this location and the hotel service is good but the Road Noise is bad if you are a light sleeper like me.  I changed rooms 3 times and never found a quiet room for my 3 nite stay.  The staff don't seem to "relate".
Manager Response: Dear Michael W,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you experienced and issue with the road noise.  I certainly understand the importance of a great night’s sleep and we regret that this issue you prevented you form a restful stay.  Should you find yourself heading back our way, please let us know in advance and we’ll be happy to block you in a room as far from the road as possible.  Though road noise is a very uncommon complaint that we receive, we will certainly do what we can to accommodate you to avoid this in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I recently spend a weekend at this hotel and I loved it.  Everything from the atmosphere of the hotel to cleanliness and customer service of the staff was exceptional specially the sales manager Yalda was wonderful.  I could not have asked for a better experience and the rates were great.  Also, you can not go wrong with the breakfast buffet with an omelette station.
Manager Response: Dear Wagma H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you had such a positive experience with our hotel.  Your comments about the cleanliness and service are greatly appreciated.  Thank you as well for the kind comments about Yalda.  We have shared your review with her and the rest of the team.  I hope you find yourself back in Irvine soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: recently stayed 3 nights on a business trip. Hotel is clean and well equipped. Staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was typical fare for buffet, but (to me at least) items seemed more fresh than what you usually find. Easy access to the 405 and John Wayne airport is a BIG plus
Manager Response: Dear Lovethedeep,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and that you felt our buffet was fresher than what you’ve found at other hotels.  We try to ensure that our guests enjoy their dining experience with us and it’s great to hear that you felt the breakfast selection was good.  I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: front dest did not have correct info regarding wyndham rewards program and was somewhat argumentative with me about it until i showed him an email with the info i was speaking about.  he upgraded me to a suite after this interchange which was nice, but because of this misinformation from more than one of the emplyees over the past few months i have missed out on at leat half a dozen nights worth of points ot my account and I am upset about this.  very inconsistent!      also were not enough towels in my room and coffee service was not refreshed BUT housekeeping took care of it RIGHT AWAY plus they found some left items for me after i checked out.  that part was great!  i stay here almost weekly at a very good rate and i appreciate it and am most often very satisfied
Manager Response: Dear N M,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I am sorry to hear about your initial interaction with our desk staff; however, I am happy to hear that the issue was resolved and that you received an upgrade in the process.  Please let me know if you still have past qualified stays that you have not been awarded points for.  I would be happy to assist in getting this corrected.  Thank you as well for being a repeat guest.  We appreciate your business and your feedback!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with even more excellent rooms. I had the pleasure of staying in a studio suite and was very happy with my room and service. The staff I encountered were friendly and helpful and made my stay more enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for those in need of rooms in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Madbroseph,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the hotel are much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with my team.  I hope you get back out way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: New Place to stay for Disneyland
Summary: Stayed here on my last trip to Disneyland and was it a great idea! Its literately across the freeway from the airport so when flying in. It's a hop skip and a jump.  The Beds were super comfortable and the wifi was reliable and fast. I enjoyed their TV and channel options. Room Temperature was easy to control and worked great. I'm definitely a fan of this property. Kudos to the house keeping who did a great job refreshing my room everyday.
Manager Response: Dear David G.,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that our hotel now tops your list for Disneyland options.  Our proximity to the park, as well as to Orange County’s best beaches, makes us a great option for guests traveling to the area for business or leisure.  I’m also happy to hear that you enjoyed the beds and other amenities during your stay.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Best better for an airport close hotel
Summary: Now possums, I'm not one to book airport hotels but this one is close to where I need to be this weekend. While two minutes from Orange County Airport it's far enough down the street in a very upscale corporate area and I heard no airplane noise at all. You can pretend your one if those "Real OC Peeps"!   The woman at the front desk was very nice and quick to check us in. The hotel decide is what I would call "Midcentury Dark" with a touch of strange but very clean.  Ok, now for the scandalous part! I woke up early to go to the gym for a bit and while down at the lobby a lady of the night (let's say it was obvious) asked the front desk person if she would need a key to access the 5th floor. Front desk person: "no problem, no key needed" ...and up she went. Lol
Manager Response: Dear Avlcoffeelvr,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am happy to hear that the desk staff took good care of you and that the hotel met your expectations.  I hope that your travels bring you back our way soon and that you select our hotel again for your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Absolutely perfect in every way! Service is first class! We had a double room and it was nice,  big and comfortable.  We just loved it! Room service was exceptional and staff was super friendly!  We had a wonderful stay and will be returning again soon!!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the service, the guest room, and the staff are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that you’ll be coming back our way soon and even happier to hear that you’ll be staying with us.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here several times in the last year and it has always been a good experience.  The rooms are nice and modern.  The staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great 5-star review and thank you for all of your stays with us!  We value your business and your feedback.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly Team members and Luxurious Rooms
Summary: My Company had 3 days of Conference with 40 employees. The team in Wyndham provided us the most kind and professional services to us. Remodeled room and conference room were absolutely clean and comfortable. I was so glad all of our employees were very happy.  Our Company will continue doing business with Wyndham in Irvine location. Thank you very much to Cindy and Lissa for everything.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce R,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and thank you for selecting Wyndham Irvine for your conference!  It was our pleasure to host you and to provide you with such a positive experience!  Thank you as well for calling out two exceptional employees – Cindy & Lissa.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with them.  We look forward to the next opportunity to serve you!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: A Business hotel NOT a Vacation hotel
Summary: If you are a man traveling this is great - it is in an INDUSTRIAL/PROFESSIONAL area not far from the airport. In and out for business works. There is no guest consideration for parking. If you ret a car it is $18 a day and ANYONE who drives through the front to visit or pick you up is put on a clock starting at $4hr up to $12. This was a nightmare for our recent wedding celebration as no one could gather at the hotel without paying for it. We sat out on the curb by a trash can and shuttle vans and for a grandmother and small children that was horrible. Checking in be prepared for a double hit to your credit card with a $75 per day deposit fee - my rate was $75-$119 a day so there was a double hit & my account was frozen the entire time I was there. The bathroom lighting was also
Manager Response: Dear Lori S,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  Our hotel has always catered to both the business and leisure traveler and we frequently receive positive feedback from both travelers.  With that said, I will be sharing your review with my management team to determine if there are things that we can do to improve the experience for all guests.  We appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback and hope to learn from your experience.          Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was at the Wyndham for training and really enjoyed the accommodations.  The staff was great and responsive to our training needs
Manager Response: Dear 16alfonsoc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that your training went so well and that our hotel was able to make it a great experience for you.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel seemed a bit overpriced and the amenities were not...
Summary: Hotel seemed a bit overpriced and the amenities were not there...no fridge or safe in the room.  The complimentary water was nice but the absence of eateries within walking distance was problematic.  The staff were super and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear 785nicholeh,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that you were not completely happy with stay.  I hope you will be willing to try our hotel again in the future.  If you make it back our way, please let us know if you have any special needs.  We have fridges available to be delivered to guest rooms and we offer safety deposit boxes at the front desk.  You can also check with our staff about walking distance recommendations for restaurants.  We have about 15 different options all within a short walk from the hotel.  Our complimentary shuttle is also available to take you to restaurants that are a little too far to walk.  Thanks again for your comments.  We value your business and your feedback.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was very clean with friendly staff. It also included a free shuttle to downtown activities which was very helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
