Manager Response: Dear N4147WJdonnas,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback!  Your kind comments about the cleanliness and the complimentary shuttle are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and to the opportunity to earn a 5-star rating next time!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: From the moment of reservation to check in to check out, we felt thoroughly looked after.  All of our special needs were addressed and surpassed in taking care of!  We would stay at the Wyndham again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Dear Sue-anne C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very happy to hear that the team took such great care of you and that you would select our hotel again.  I hope your travels find you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The property was very well kept. The pool area and gym excellent. The beds were super comfy. Loved it.
Manager Response: Dear Groovysfchick,  Thank you for your great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the property, the pool, and the gym are greatly appreciated.  I hope you find yourself back in Irvine soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel was nice but paying for parking was not. Finding the hotel was a little tricky since it is tucked away in between office buildings.
Manager Response: Dear Jaime P,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you felt the hotel was nice.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Your employees did everything perfect, from the hospatality suite fri & sat with your service people to the suite we had to sleep in. The food @ our reunion party was oh so good. Will stay there again when in the area. Even the restaurant/bar had a great bartender/waiter & the food was really good.
Manager Response: Dear Oldman116,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you had such a good time at your reunion at our hotel.  I am even happier to hear that you plan to return!  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Decent Hotel. Slightly Dated. Good area. Parking charges Terrible!
Summary: Hotel is decent. Slightly dated but kept reasonably clean. We had a 2 queen room and it is not very spacious. The rooms are not kid friendly as there is no microwave or refrigerator. Gym had decent equipment but the bench was broken and nearly dropped 50lb weights on me trying to use it.  The area is great as it is close to various excellent beaches, shopping and restaurant  parking was $18/day. Terrible charge. Apparently it is not a hotel owned lot so the hotel couldn't do anything about it. But surprisingly they had spaces reserved for wyndham rewards members????? I was Wyndham gold member. Was not greeted for it nor was I offered anything for it.  Had breakfast at the restaurant. Little bit on the pricey side. Waiter was not polite at all as he seemed irritated with normal
Manager Response: Dear R C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to provide you with a better experience.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we have addressed some of the concerns you shared with us.  My Director of Engineering has ensured all gym equipment is functioning properly and we have discussed the issue with the impolite waiter with our entire restaurant staff.  I would also like to ask that you reach out to me with your Wyndham Rewards numbers.  I would like to verify that you received the points you were entitled to if this was a qualified stay.  I have also discussed this matter with my desk staff to ensure that all guests – especially Wyndham Rewards Gold Members – are taken good care of.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: After an absolutely horrible experience at a Newport Beach hotel at Fashion Island, we had the good fortune of finding the Wyndham Hotel on Von Karman in Irvine.  The staff was polite, very helpful and considerate of our request of room location.  The professionalism along with a friendly attitude was very refreshing after the earlier experience we endured.  Our room was very clean and everything one would expect from a high-end hotel was provided. We will definitely be guests there again. Another great benefit is that the entire property is NON-smoking!
Manager Response: Dear Pat V,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  I am sorry to hear about your experience at the Newport Beach hotel but I am delighted to hear that my team was able to provide you with the experience that you deserve!  Thank you as well for all the kind comments about the staff and cleanliness.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my entire team.  We look forward to your next stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Steep Parking -otherwise OK for this type of hotel
Summary: Overall you have a certain expectation when you stay at a place like this. It met them but didn't really exceed them. The $18 for parking is my only major gripe  The good: -Very nice gym with modern equipment (*not* half broken and crammed into a converted guest room) -close to the Orange County Airport -nice view from the top floors -thermostat style climate control -Ipod dock (lightning connector)  The bad: -$18/night for parking. In reality you'll probably pay this at any other hotel in close proximity to the airport. But I didn't know this up front so I found this annoying, and I'm sure with a 10 min drive further away there would be no parking fee. -No mini fridge.  I'd stay here on business, But I don't think it's worth the money if it came out of my own pocket.
Manager Response: Dear Circuitmonkey,  Thank you for your kind review.  I am happy to hear that we met your expectations and that you would select our hotel again if in the area for business.  I am sorry to hear that the parking fees were a surprise to you.  As you mentioned, the fees are common in the airport area.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to exceed your expectation s on your next stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent visit overall.  I have only one complaint.  After...
Summary: Excellent visit overall.  I have only one complaint.  After checkout, I was solicited by the concierge who offered what appeared to be a great deal: $99 for two Disneyland tickets and two nights at the hotel.  Turned out it was a scam to sell timeshares, which was concealed unless you read the fine print on page 2 of the agreement.  Very deceitful approach.  Wasted 20 minutes before I caught on and told them no.  Otherwise a perfect visit.
Manager Response: Dear TonyJohnson181,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I apologize for your experience with our concierge desk.  I have spoken to our staff to ensure they are up front with what they are offering.  This offer is certainly not a scam, but I understand your desire to be told up front that they are promoting our Wyndham Vacation Ownership division.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked this room to be close to work from booking.com - my room per night is 144 - but on top of that they charged me 18.00 a night for parking, which clearly was not explained during the initial booking.  On top of that the AC units are so loud it wont help you to sleep.  I wish i got my money back and never stayed here.
Manager Response: Dear Hessam V,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  I have asked my Director of Rooms to reach out to Booking.com to determine if there is a more obvious way we can note the parking fees.  The last thing we want to do is have that charge be a surprise for our guests.  I have also shared your feedback with my engineering team.  Having just completed a large renovation – including brand new AC units – our guests should not be experiencing issues with our AC units.  I have asked that all rooms be reviewed to determine whether we have issues that need to be corrected.  Thank you for bringing this to my attention.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Staff. It looked well kept and very business like, however I was floored when the girl at the front desk questioned our bed preference that was on our reservation. Then the other girl at the desk (who wasn't even assisting us) questioned what our relationship was to each other! I'm glad my partner answered because I was to stunned to respond. The room was clean, but it was a bit outdated with its pod coffee maker and older iPhone alarm clock. I have been to less expensive hotels with more updated amenities. Oh and paying $18.00 daily for parking is a bit steep, it should be included in the price of the room which was costly enough!
Manager Response: Dear Rmrsbx,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience with the room type and relationship questions.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will use it as an opportunity to learn and improve.  We will also take your feedback about the room amenities into consideration.  Though we have just completed a $10M hotel renovation, we plan to have an ongoing focus on improvement and we will add your recommendations to the list.  Thank you again!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great hotel. It is almost an hour drive from the LAX and if you have hired a taxi, it would cost about $140 whereas the shuttle would cost about $40. However, shuttle has a lot of disruptions. The hotel staff was great. Ground floor parking (though not many spaces, unless I have missed a few). Great buffet breakfast. Recommend it for business stay or if you find a good deal.
Manager Response: Dear SaqibChoudhary,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am happy to find that your enjoyed the staff and the breakfast.  I hope your travels find you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: We had a great time and loved the facility.  We will...
Summary: We had a great time and loved the facility.  We will probably return.  First time for us staying at a Wyndham Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Burnie51,  Thank you for your great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and even happier to hear that to plan to return.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great room, but additional services overpriced
Summary: Very nicely decorated and clean room, and very friendly and prompt staff.  The restaurant was ok, food was well prepare but not up to the standard the price implies, and no decent alternatives or even awareness of food allergies.  Ultimately, this hotel was guilty overcharging me for everything, just because they can, ex: Laundry bill for three days worth of clothing $170!!
Manager Response: Dear rpfernandes,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry to hear that you felt the hotel overcharged you for the various services we offer.  Our goal is to provide the best value for a full-service hotel in the Irvine area.  To that end, we regularly shop our competitors to ensure our rates are in line or lower than those being offered at other hotels.  Though I feel that we have done a good job of making sure we provide a great value to our customers, I have passed your feedback along to my executive team members for review.  We will review this issue to ensure we are a good value in our market.  Thank you again for taking the time to provide your feedback.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Not enough characters to give a fair review.  Our stay was average.  No refrigeration, 2 bugs in the bed and bottom sheet did not appear clean, but could have been stains.
Manager Response: Dear Moya-enterprises,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear about the issues you experienced with us.  Cleanliness is something we take very seriously and I have passed your review along to my Director of Housekeeping in an effort to make sure all sheets are cleaned and that any stained product is disposed of.  I hope you will try our hotel again if you find yourself back in the area.  We would love to provide you with the exceptional stay that you deserve.  Also, please be sure to ask our desk staff about having a refrigerator delivered to your room.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Started with a Horrible to Excellent Experience Stay at Wyndham
Summary: Book my room for about 2 weeks before my arrival of September 28th 2014 and make sure that everything is smooth at the time of arrival. Called the hotel on Friday, September 26th and the representative told me that everything is fine and I am set to go. Arrived at Wyndham 4PM Sunday September 28th. Ms. Truong said that my reservation was not paid and that I have to pay from my personal credit card. I said that everything was prepaid because we are using a company credit card and right away she said "OH NO YOU ARE WRONG AND NO I CANNOT USE THIS CREDIT CARD" I ask if I can speak to the manager and she said "YOU ARE SPEAKING TO THE MANAGER" I asked if I can speak to someone else that can help me and SHE SAID" OH NO". My co-employee was checking in with the other representative and
Manager Response: Dear Mervilyn H,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  Though I am sorry to hear about your initial experience with our desk staff, I am very happy to hear that Sofiane was able to rescue the situation and take such good care of you.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Rooms and we will be conducting some additional training with all of our staff members to ensure that every encounter with our team is a positive encounter.  I appreciate you brining this to our attention.  I hope you find your way back to your hotel soon and that your experience is 100% great!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Super-nice front desk attendant, beautiful modern room, and they gave my husband a free bandaid when he cut himself shaving. What more do you need?
Manager Response: Dear Allison S,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing a nice 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the room are greatly appreciated.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel was very welcoming as I was transfered here from my original hotel which was under delayed renovations. They provided free parking, a discounted room and breakfast vouchers to make up for the inconvenience. The room was clean with lots of mirrors (though rather dim lighting), the beds were comfy and the hall was quiet. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful, offering a variety of services. There were also a variety of open, quite seating areas that were worked well for small business meetings. My only complaint was the breakfast buffett. Even with the vouchers it was over priced without much variety and on the second day they had served bad eggs. The wait staff, however, is wonderful and derserve to be well-tipped.
Manager Response: Dear Adele S,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I would like to start by apologizing for your experience with the breakfast buffet.  Though we typically get very positive feedback on our food quality, we will be reviewing our menu and discussing this with our Chef to ensure the selection and quality is always top notch.  I appreciate you sharing your concern with us.  Thank you as well for your very kind comments about the wait staff, the desk staff, and the cleanliness.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we provide an experience that earns a 5-star rating on your next stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I go to Irvine once a year on a business trip with about 25 other people and this is the first time staying at Wyndham Irvine and I absolutely love it. We all decided to stay at the Wyndham and we definitely were happy with our choice. First off Kailei at the front desk was a huge huge help with booking and rearranging the rooms. I also called to see if we can check in early and they said it wouldn't be a problem. The rooms were clean and every time we called for extra towels they gladly came and brought some. The hotel overall was clean and at a great location. Loved the staff and the room. Definitely exceeded my expectations and will be coming back next year with a larger group of about 100 people. We are looking forward to it!
Manager Response: Dear MarlenMadrid,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for recognizing Kailei for her efforts to assist you with your rooms!  I am so happy to hear that you and your group enjoyed your time with us.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my entire team.  We look forward to welcoming all of you back again next year and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great location, setting and environment.   Room spacious, clean and high end.  TV 40in w/HBO.  Huge selling point.  A fridge in the room would have made it perfect.   Could not bring our dinner/dessert back to the room.
Manager Response: Dear Leon C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our newly installed TV’s and expanded HD channel offerings.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay.  Next time you’re staying with us, please ask the desk about having a fridge delivered to your room.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Wyndham for a wedding.  The staff and concierge were really nice and very helpful. We had a wonderful time and really enjoyed our stay.  We would definitely stay there again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear PennyD87,  Thank you for staying with us and for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you had a wonderful time with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Have just returned from a two night stay at this property and I was very happy with my stay. The proximity to Orange County Airport is ideal for those flying in or out and there are many attractions / shopping opportunities just a short drive away. Rooms are very nice, clean and comfortable and the beds were wonderful. Had a great sleep here both nights. I would not hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear FlyJayClass,  Thank you for the great review.  It was our pleasure to be your hotel of choice during your last visit to Irvine.  I am happy to hear that you had a great stay and I look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel however, my wife and I were celebrating our 18th Anniversary away from our children. Happy as we were our room had tenant that smoked in the outside stair wells all evening. We even changed rooms and when ask about their smoking policy we were given a cold hard face of no smoking is tolerated. We shared our story with the front desk and I shall not say what their faces said however, their remarks were as if they didn't care. Live with it...
Manager Response: Dear Jesse W,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience with the cigarette smoke.  Though we are a 100% non-smoking facility with a stiff smoking penalty, we find that some guests disregard that policy and smoke anyway.  If we are fortunate enough to catch them, we do enforce our policy.  Sadly, we are not always able to prevent smoking from happening.  I will be sharing your comments with my desk staff.  Like you, I agree that it is important that guest feedback is received with the respect and appreciation it deserves.  Thanks again for your review.  I hope you will choose our hotel again the next time you are out our way.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel and the staff were EXCEPTIONAL!  From the time we...
Summary: The hotel and the staff were EXCEPTIONAL!  From the time we pulled up to the Valet to the time we checked out.  They were attentive to our every need.  The hotel and out room was very clean as well.  The hotel was also in a nice area.
Manager Response: Dear D_Clark69,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I was very happy to read about your exceptional experience at our hotel.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us to provide you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The furniture was falling apart...  check the drawer in...
Summary: The furniture was falling apart...  check the drawer in room 1110.  Also check vents blowing cigarette smoke periodically.  The front desk did offer to move us to another room, but we were running late for a meeting.  The room smelled fine when we got back to the room, but then blew smoke at 1:00 in the morning (enough to make me sick).  Other than that, it was fine.
Manager Response: Dear Sherry W,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I really appreciate you bringing the drawer in 1110 to my attention.  I have already had my engineering department address the issue.   I apologize for the fact that you experienced an issue with the cigarette smoke.  Though we are 100% non-smoking with a stiff smoking penalty, we still find that some guests choose to ignore our policy and smoke in their rooms.  If we are able to isolate the issue and determine where the smoke is coming from, we will confront the guest and enforce our policies.  Again, I am sorry your stay was negatively impacted by the actions of a guest that chose to ignore our no smoking policy.  Fortunately, this is an uncommon issue so I hope you will be willing to stay with us again the next time you’re in the area.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Wyndham staff at the front desk  is the best very help full  they  go out of there way to help. I came to this hotel last month do to many problem at a Double tree down the way, i check out came over to Wyndhan in fact just was there Aug 31 to Sept 1 same good service
Manager Response: Dear Lionel400e,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you made the move from the Doubletree to our hotel.  I am even happier to hear that you had such a great stay with us and have returned since.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Had a great stay.  Parking is not free, but only $18.00 for...
Summary: Had a great stay.  Parking is not free, but only $18.00 for Overnight. Only recommendation would be to offer free parking to guests. Other than that, great place.
Manager Response: Dear Luis T,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  I appreciate your feedback on the parking as well.  Though we offer one of the lowest rates for hotel parking in the Irvine area, I certainly understand your preference for free parking.  Though we won’t be moving in that direction, it is our plan to continue to offer the lowest market rate.  Thanks again.  We hope to see you again soon!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for business, less so for leisure.
Summary: That being said, couldn't find very much to fault about the Wyndham.  A beautiful hotel, situated close to Orange County Airport, the Wyndham sits in the middle of a series of business parks - making it perfect for corporate customers, but not so much for pleasure or vacationing.  Nonetheless, we were met with a very warm greeting in the lobby - which had a lot of class and was very well presented, especially for the Wyndham's competitive rates.  Our room met the same high standard; was very clean, with very comfortable beds, and free WiFi available.  The hotel's restaurant - which I believe is owned and ran by an external body - seemed a bit pricey, which prompted us to visit a nearby Italian restaurant in one of the adjacent business parks; only 10 minutes walk away.  Despite
Manager Response: Dear DirectorDash,  Thank you for the very thorough review.  Your stay and your feedback are both much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that your overall impression of the hotel was positive and that you would select us again.  I do apologize for the confusion with the ATM machine and for the way the response was presented.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and asked that he address it with our desk staff.  Though I’m disappointed to hear that you opted not to try our restaurant, I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of one of the many options within walking distance to the hotel.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The location is great for the use of John Wayne airport. It's close but far enough away that the area is quiet and they are close to a nice greenbelt for a morning walk and coffee.  The only downside, my husband and I love baseball and the rooms did not have access to the local teams stations(FSW or Prime) however, you could go down to the bar where they had games on but not in the comfort of your room.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara E,  Thank you for the kind review and for your feedback regarding the TV listings.  Your feedback is valuable to us.  As a big sports fan myself, I certainly understand how important access to the right sports channels is.  We will be keeping your feedback in mind as when we look at our making changes to our current TV offering.  In the meantime, I’m happy to hear that you were able to watch your team in the hotel lounge.  Thanks again for your feedback   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good stay, avoid the valet though, the valet made us wait 20 minutes and there were no other cars.  Staff comp'd our valet though
Manager Response: Dear Steve M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am sorry about your experience with the valet service.  I have spoken to my valet manager about your review and reinforced the need to provide timely, efficient service to every guest.  I hope you return to our hotel soon and that your next experience is a 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: If you need to be in this area near SNA, this hotel is very nice.  Was treated great by shuttle drivers, front desk, room was great.  The shuttle took me to the district, where I enjoyed Blues and BBQ at Lucille's.  Good bedding, bathroom amenities, free wi-fi.  Checkout was easy, very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Joshbash,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the shuttles, staff, and the rooms are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our complimentary shuttle to the District in order to enjoy some of the great shops and restaurants they have to offer.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I am currently still here, only reason I haven't left hotel is because none are left as it is labor day weekend. Upon arrival, I was notified that I have to pay $18 a night for me to park my car, maybe ima newb, but I have never heard of paying to park my car that I was a guest at. Not to mention, I had some colleagues visit, and they had to pay as well... When bringing up my outrage I was told I was being argumentative and to not compare my previous stays at other hotels as, direct quote " dont compare us to them "... Ok, well If I am not to compare you to them, and this is supposedly a classier hotel, why was there a half drank dr pepper bottle in my room? Wasn't mine... it was there from a previous guest. There is also a stain on the headboard, and tons of dust behind the air
Manager Response: Dear John D,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry for your experience with our hotel.  After reading your email, I can certainly understand your frustration with our hotel.  Though the parking charges at our hotel are common in the Irvine area and actually at the lower end of what some of the hotels charge, guests that are not used to paying for this service can be taken back by it.  In an effort to ensure this is not a surprise, the charge is noted on our website.  Regarding the cleanliness of your room, any trash or dusk in the room is unacceptable and I appreciate your comments calling our attention to these issues.  I have shared your feedback with by housekeeping department and we are increasing our attention to detail during our daily room inspections.  I would also like to apologize for the false fire alarm.  The unfortunate reality is that this is something that is not really in our control.  With everyone having access to our fire alarm pull stations, we run the risk of alarms being activated.  Once activated, the alarms cannot be disabled until the fire department has given us an all clear.  Again, I apologize for any inconvenienced this caused you.  Lastly, I have shared your feedback regarding the wi-fi with my engineering department.  The hotel recently conducted a significant upgrade in our internet network and we will be troubleshooting the entire system to determine why you experienced a slow connection.  This certainly should not have been the case.  Thank you once again for your feedback.  Reviews like yours allow us to address important issues and improve our service so we greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us.  I hope you will reconsider staying with us again and allow us the opportunity to provide you with a much better experience on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We made our reservation online. The reservation clearly stated Free Breakfast, Free Parking, Pool and Business center. Pool and Business center were true, but they charged me $18.00/night for parking and breakfast was not free. The room was nice, clean, and good view. I will likely not stay at this hotel again because I have better choices for the price I paid after all the extra charges.
Manager Response: Dear Grant P,  Thank you for booking with us and for providing us with your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that the hotel did not deliver what you expected when you booked with us.  I would be very interested in hearing more about your reservation so that I can determine where the error in communication occurred.  The hotel does charge for breakfast and parking with most reservations.  We do offer some rates that included one or both of these services and I would be happy to make any adjustments if these charges should have been included in your rate.  Please feel free to contact me directly to assist you in resolving the concerns you’ve shared.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I wish the hotel have safety box to put out passport and money instead of curry them all the times
Manager Response: Dear Khalid W,  Thank you for your review.  Your feedback is valuable to us.  I appreciate your request for safety deposit boxes.  We want to ensure that all guests are comfortable with the security of their belongings.  Should you stay with us again, please keep in mind that the hotel does offer complimentary safety deposit boxes at the front desk.  Just stop by and see one of our front desk associates for more information.  Thanks again.  We look forward to your next visit.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Its a nice place for a comfortable stay. 14th floor needs access card and has a small breakfast lounge. Rooms are adequate but lack microwave and refrigerator. Has shuttle service to take you to nearby places within a three mile radius. Lot of restaurant options for you to visit and enjoy different cuisines. Inhouse restaurant is spacious with adequate options.
Manager Response: Dear Agabhyankar,  Thank you for the very kind review!  We greatly appreciate all your great comments about the hotel.  I am happy to read that you were able to take advantage of the amenities the hotel has to offer as well as the number of amenities in the area.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another comfortable stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The room was very clean and very comfortable. The hotel did a great job with the renovations.  I was very impressed with the hotel staff. They were friendly and very accommodating.  I will definitely stay here anytime we are in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear M. R,  Thank you for the very kind review.  I am happy to hear that your stay was comfortable and that you intend to stay with us again the next time you’re in the area.  We are excited to be your hotel of choice and look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay in Cali!
Summary: This is an AWESOME property! I have stayed there a couple of times now, and every time we've been there it has been great. The staff is extremely helpful, and accommodating. The rooms are exquisitely decorated, and very clean. Plus, the location is just perfect for Orange County. Seriously, it's by far our favorite place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kami A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your very kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the location are much appreciated!  I hope your travels bring you back your way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another great experience.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: One of the Best for Less!
Summary: This Wyndham Hotel by far has the most professional and friendliness staffs of personal than others that I have visited. Lobby, Restaurant Bar and room was very clean and refreshing to visit as well. I very much recommend to anyone visiting Orange County to stay at this Wyndham if you want a wonderful experience.    Sincerely, John Batis
Manager Response: Dear John B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I was our pleasure to have you as our guest and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Where to begin: Checking in, told phones don't work. Breakfast next morning, asked for tea, got coffee, waiter was mad. Brought wrong kind of tea. Had to get breakfast to go, waited so long. Breakfast in room, sugar/substitute container had mayonaise in the bottom: Those containers it at room temp so would have made people sick. Could not adjust cooling in room so room was alway 76 degrees.Did not have a car, had parking on the bill @ $18.00 a day, anyway!
Manager Response: Dear 562lyn N,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced.  I apologize for any inconvenience the inoperable phones may have caused you.  Unfortunately, the hotel did experience a mechanical failure in our phone system that required a couple days to correct.  Though we did everything we could to fix this issue as quickly as possible, we do understand that it may have caused some level of frustration for our guests and we are very sorry for that.  I would also like to apologize for the issues you experienced with your breakfast.  I have shared your feedback with my restaurant manager and we will use your review as an opportunity to improve.  Regarding the parking fees, please reach out to me directly so I can assist you with getting this corrected.  Only guests with cars should be charged this fee.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: After spending 6 nights at this Wyndham, our conclusion is it tops the list of places to stay in the Irvine-Orange County area.   The value, location, property and staff are all top notch.  Easy access to John Wayne Airport, the beaches, or inland attractions.  Well touched rooms, with a good restaurant and bar on site.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay--the staff was helpful from checkin to room clean up to the breakfasts that Ross serves if you can stay on the 14th floor.  The opportunity to spend our entire SoCal time in one spot and at this hotel really increased the enjoyment of the whole trip.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Kellye W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your business and your feedback are much appreciated.  I am happy to hear that our central Orange County location worked so well for you.  With so much of the OC’s great attractions just minutes away from our hotel, we believe we are the perfect location for any travelers coming to the area.  I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with Ross.  He is a great employee that provides an exceptional experience to all of the guests that take advantage of our Executive Lounge.  I will be sure to share your kind comments with him.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Loud noise coming from a/c vent could not sleep.. Could be a little bit cleaner outside front building,was there for three days, notice outside area pool not been clean.plus $18 dayly parking was to much!!!! Not going back!!!Sorry
Manager Response: Dear Margarito G,  Thank you for your stay and for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that we did not do enough to earn your future business.  I can certainly understand your frustration with the AC noise and I have shared your feedback with my engineering department in an effort to find and correct this issue.  I have also shared your feedback with my housekeeping department.  The hotel usually scores very high marks in cleanliness but we will take your feedback as an opportunity to review our processes and make sure all areas of the hotel are spotless.  I appreciate your feedback and hope you with reconsider your decision to not stay with us in the future.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: light & fire alarm malfunctions made for a miserable stay
Summary: I was booked for two nights here. the first night, the motion-sensor lights in my room kept turning on the lights every few hours.  I had to get out of bed & walk to the front dour of the room repeatedly during the night to turn them off.   The second night just after I'd fallen asleep I heard a loud vacuuming sound in the hall & then the fire alarm went off.  When I went out into the hall it was filled with smoke & a strong chemical smell (like cleaning solvent).  As I made my way to the stairs I was told that it was a false alarm & I could return to my room.  However the fire alarm stayed on for quite awhile & the chemical smell persisted all night. While this is a nice hotel & the staff are friendly & the beds are comfortable, I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jana R,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced with the light and the fire alarm.  I can certainly understand your frustration.  I have shared your feedback with my Chief Engineer and he has one of his team members working through all of our rooms to make sure the entry lights are functioning properly.  The hotel just recently installed all new lighting in the guest rooms and it sounds like there may have been a product or wiring issue in the room you were in.  We will do our best to locate this issue and correct it right away.  I regret that you were disturbed by the false alarm.  Unfortunately, we are unable to turn off an alarm until the fire department has determined there is no cause for concern, even if we’ve determined it was a false alarm.  Fortunately, this is a rare occurrence.  I hope you will reconsider your decision to not stay with us again.  We would love the opportunity to provide you with a stay that is more in line with the service so many of our guest have come to enjoy.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Motel with A/C Motor louder than your grandma's fridge
Summary: I was extremely disgusted at this hotel service. To say it was the worst hotel I have been is an understatement. We checked in to found the a/c broken, only fan coming out of it. The front desk lied that a technician will come to fix promptly and after half an hour of waiting I called and he told me that he was going around fixing, and might take up to half an hour after I pressed him for a time frame. The ice machine was broken at the floor we stayed in too. Didnt know how long they take, but when we came back from dinner, the ac is cool, but now it emits a constant loud motor noise. Even the low setting made the same amount of noise. At 3 am, and unable to sleep, I gave up putting with this crap and complained to the front desk. She was prompt in switching us to another room,
Manager Response: Dear N T,  Thank you for your review.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience with the AC in your rooms.  Though the hotel has just completed installation of brand new AC units across the hotel, we have had to address issues with some of these machines.  Our goal is to either ensure provide a rooms with an operable unit or, if we are aware of a unit that has failed, to keep that room out of service until the proper repairs have been made.  I truly regret that failed to meet that simple goal with you.  I have shared your feedback with my Chief Engineer and asked him to review all rooms to ensure we do not have any other rooms with similar issues.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff is knowledgeable and friendly and their system is so efficient and easy, especially for check-out.  The huge ice water bowl and cups in the foyer were a nice touch, making us feel that our business was appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Charlie H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We really appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I’m happy to hear that your stay was so enjoyable and that you felt that your business was appreciated – because it absolutely is!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Front Desk Staff was great. Rooms were very clean and the housekeeping staff did a great job on cleaning the rooms. Workout area was a little small but all the equipment was working and the area was clean. Plenty of parking and felt very safe. Great location from the airport. Food at the restaurant was very good but the service in the restaurant and bar area was very poor. Overall my stay at the Wyndham was excellent. Will stay there again next year.
Manager Response: Dear John S,  Thanks for the great review!  We appreciate your business and your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay.  I apologize that the service in the restaurant and bar fell short.  I will be sharing your feedback with my restaurant manager and we’ll look for ways to improve service in these areas.  Thanks again!  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My son and I stayed over the weekend in early August, 2014. I had booked a room with double beds through Orbitz but they didn't transmit our request to the hotel. The staff was very good about making the change and did so promptly. The staff in general were very nice. The room was clean and had a hairdryer, shampoo, soap and adequate towels. There was a coin laundry on our floor for guests to use. The location to the airport is excellent and the shuttle was very efficient and the drivers very friendly. That was important and they did a great job with that. Some not so good things were that the shower had no COLD water. That made taking a shower very difficult. The water was scalding. I washed my hair in the sink, which DID have hot and cold water. Very strange. For a business
Manager Response: Dear Shewolfdc,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am very sorry to hear about the lack of cold water in your shower.  As you mentioned, that is very odd and I have forwarded your comments to my Chief Engineer for review.  We have not had any other complaints about this but we are looking into it to see if we can figure out what happened.  I’ve also forwarded your comments about the market to my Director of Rooms.  We’ll see what other items we can add to our shop to make it a better amenity for our guests.  Hair brushes are now on the list!  Thanks as well for your comments about the breakfast, concierge service (the employee in the lobby) and the parking.  We will certainly take all of your feedback into consideration.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Besutiful accommodations no matter what time you check in. Gina the manager this past weekend is from Lithuania I believe. Excellent customer service, very very helpful and so very sweet
Manager Response: Dear Edward A,  Aloha and thank you for the great 5-star review!   Your kind comments about the hotel and about Gina are greatly appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with Gina and the rest of my team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Nice Place with a good business amenities.  Friendly, courteous staff who are just inviting enough to make you feel comfortable but so much as to be annoying.  Internet worked without a hitch.  Room was clean and functional.  I'll go back.
Manager Response: Dear PhilRocks,  Thank you for the kind review.  It was our pleasure having you as our guest.  I am happy to hear that the staff and the internet both met your approval.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a convenient location and the rooms are nice but the parking & breakfast cost is ridiculous.  I hate to say it but I will not be staying at another Wyndham.
Manager Response: Dear Monica C,  Thank you for your review.  I’m sorry to hear about your displeasure with the breakfast and parking fees.  Though our rates are in line with most of the full-service hotels in the area, I certainly understand your preference for lower or no costs for these features.  I hope that as you shop around our market and find similar pricing, you will reconsider staying with us.  We would love to have you back!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay if seeing a show at Verizon Wireless Amphitheater
Summary: We booked this hotel for last Sat. night, due to its proximity to the Verizon Wireless Amphitheater (to see Journey [!!!] & the Steve Miller Band).  It is very close, about 6 miles so it made it very convenient.  And it's also very very close to the Irvine Spectrum, where you have a plethora of dining and shopping options.  The hotel itself was very clean and no complaints about the room, with the exception of the A/C, which like another reviewer commented, could use some updating.  When we set the thermostat at 69 (which we did when we walked into the room because it was stifling), after a few minutes, felt like it reached 69 degrees in a hurry.  So we turned it up to 76 degrees.. which then became too hot.  So we left it at 70 degrees the entire stay.  Yes, it did get chilly
Manager Response: Dear Kelly C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am happy to hear that we were your hotel of choice for your concert weekend.  As you mentioned, our proximity to Verizon makes us a great choice when seeing a concert or attending an event at that venue.  I’m sorry to hear that the thermostat in the room gave you some challenges.  Though it sounds like the AC was working, it appears we need to do some fine tuning on that thermostat to allow for a better experience.  I’ll be sharing your feedback regarding our concierge with my team as well.  Their primary role is to assist you with any of your needs, but they are also here to introduce our guests to Wyndham’s great timeshare options.  Of course, if a guest is not interested, there should be no aggressive sales pitch.  Thank again for your feedback.  I’m happy to hear you would select us again and look forward to providing you with another great stay the next time you’re in town.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: A very average hotel with high rates due to the location...
Summary: A very average hotel with high rates due to the location.  Nothing special about the rooms or service
Manager Response: Dear Abbey W,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your opinion of the hotel.  We value your feedback and will be looking for ways to ensure to all of our guests experience a great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one night, thinking if we liked it we would stay longer but left after one night.  The a/c units in this hotel make a lot of noise.  The engineer came up and said it was normal, however it was impossible for us to sleep well because of the deep growl coming from our neighbor's a/c.  Every time the compressor kicked in, the walls would start humming.  When we asked to move, the front desk supervisor said she had never had noise complaints before, we could have the same problem again- really not helpful and doesn't make a guest feel welcome at all.    From outward appearances though, the hotel looks great, with a contemporary West Elm look.  We stayed at the same time with several school athletic teams, so the hotel was bustling with youthful energy.  The self
Manager Response: Dear 10021NYC,  Thanks you for your feedback.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I’m sorry to hear about your concern with the noise form the air conditioner.  I can certainly understand how frustrating this was for you and I am sorry that we weren’t able to provide you with a better resolution.  Though our AC units are all brand new, they do make some small level of noise when they go on and off.  I also appreciate your feedback on the staffing levels.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and we will be reviewing our scheduling during these high occupancy weekends to ensure we have the proper level of staff to accommodate our guests’ needs.  Again, I would like to thank you for your feedback.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We only stayed for 1 Saturday night, for a quick getaway.  While this was not the most "romantic" of choices, we stayed a "date-night" kind of getaway and spent our money out on the town instead.  (If you are local, check their website for their California resident rate).   While it was nestled in among the corporate towers of Irvine, it was a great location with easy access to lots of different venues/choices in the OC area.  Quick jaunt north on the freeway to South Coast, quick dip south toward the Spectrum or Fashion Island.    The room itself showed its age only in the popcorn ceiling, everything else seemed quite renovated and up to date. The room and bath seemed very clean...until I noticed some type of big white crumbs between the bed and nightstand. So maybe a little
Manager Response: Dear KellyLS,  Thank you for the very kind review.  I am happy to hear that the hotel services and amenities made this an enjoyable stay for you.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my team, including the recommendation to be a bit more thorough with the vacuuming.  Thanks again.  We look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel was clean, the staff was helpful and friendly. The rooms were very clean and the price we payed for our stay was very affordable
Manager Response: Dear Duane S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are greatly appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have th opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Very impressed ! Beautiful clean, impeccable rooms, hotel's presentation in general very neat! Not the best location but convenient to go to either Newport or Laguna. Will stay there again for sure !!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you plan to stay with us again.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great location in Irvine; close to airport, shuttle available to UC Irvine, South Coast Plaza Mall.  Only downside was housekeeping.  We requested a refrigerator and extra luggage rack which took a very long time and a few phone calls.  We were there for 6 nights and not once were the sheets changed.  The sink faucet was left dirty a couple of days; one day they obviously didn't vacuum.  Air conditioning was erratic in its function. Indoor pool nice but very cold water.  Workout equipment very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Gaborh224,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about the challenges you experienced with our housekeeping department.  Though the hotel typically rates very high in this area, we clearly fell short with your stay.  I have shared your feedback with my Director of Housekeeping and we will certainly take it to heart and look for ways to improve.  I’m also sorry to hear about the issue you had with air conditioning.  The hotel recently installed brand new air conditioners throughout the building but we have had a couple units that have not performed correctly.  I hope you were able to inform my team of your challenges during your stay so that we were able to address the bad unit.  We have received a few comments about the pool and have increased the temperature.  Thanks again for your feedback.  It is very valuable to us.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff at the Wyndham was awesome and super friendly. The front desk and Cindy totally went out of their way to make me feel welcomed. The hotel it self was clean and very comfortable. I was welcomed and check in was effortless.
Manager Response: Dear Mik3ywin,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the Cindy and the rest of the staff are greatly appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon.  We look forward to providing you with another awesome stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Overall, our stay was very pleasant.  The staff was...
Summary: Overall, our stay was very pleasant.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The parking attendants were friendly and more than helpful.  I do suggest brochures of, "The District", be available to guests at check-in.  It is a great place to hang-out, in addition to the beach areas.
Manager Response: Dear 241GLO,  Thank you for the great review.  We appreciate your business and your feedback.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and he is working with The District to ensure we have an adequate stock of brochures.  We do typically have them available but we go through them very quickly.  Thanks again and hurry back!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Used the Wyndham as our staff hotel for a week long conference in the area. They worked a great group rate block and provided exceptional service! The rooms were roomy and spotless. Great location and easy access to the Orange County area.
Manager Response: Dear DanR983,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It was absolutely our pleasure to have you and your group at our hotel.  I am very happy to hear that it went so well and I look forward to the next time we can provide you with another 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice stay for wedding. Spectacular shuttle service!
Summary: The Wyndham - Irvine Airport is located in a business park not too far off the interstate. It's a little tricky to find the first time you arrive, but easy to find after that. The staff are friendly and accommodating.   There are plenty of places to eat around the hotel. Tourist attractions and shopping venues are not too far. The shuttle service is very convenient and will drop off guests on a pretty regular basis as well as pick up/drop off at the Irvine airport. They have a great Happy Hour everyday from 3-7 PM. The food is good and reasonably priced (even outside of Happy Hour).      Note that parking is $18 per entry. You do get in/out privileges. Fortunately, wedding guests received a reduced rate of $10 per night. Whew.   The only average mark I'd give them is on the
Manager Response: Dear LoveToGo37,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you taking the time to provide such a thorough review of the hotel.  I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of all the amenities and the location the hotel has to offer. I am sorry to hear that the mattress was not to your liking, but I am happy to hear that it didn’t ruin your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way again soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another 5-star experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel for a weekend getaway to Orange County with my boyfriend as we usually go to the OC Fair every year.  The hotel is located in the business district which was very safe, nice and quiet.  The John Wayne airport is also closed by.  Also there were many eateries near by the hotel as well.  The staff was very nice and pleasant.  I had forgotten my razor at home and they offered to bring one up for me in my room which was nice.  When I asked for a late check out, they were nice about it.   The hotel has an indoor swimming pool and a basketball court which sadly we didn't get to use.  The hotel does have free wifi but at time the connection was weak.  One thing to know though is that the hotel room doesn't have a refrigerator and parking is about $12 a day.
Manager Response: Dear Prin A,  Thank you for the kind review.  Your thorough feedback about the hotel is greatly appreciated.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you would recommend our hotel.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back soon and to provide you with a 5-star stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I booked the hotel for a weekend getaway with my boyfriend. The hotel is located in the executive business areas which is in a safe neighborhood. There were a lot of eateries near by.  The staff were very nice and pleasant.  I forgot to bring my razor bland and they were going to bring it up to me room.  We wanted to use their indoor swimming pool and basketball court but didn't have a chance.   I would recommend this hotel as it clean, nice and safe. One thing to know though is that there is no refrigerator in the room :)
Manager Response: Dear Wanlop A,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay with us.  I am also happy to hear that my staff was able to accommodate your needs.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another good stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice staff and rooms are very clean. Close proximity...
Summary: Very nice staff and rooms are very clean. Close proximity to the airport but you can't hear any flights.
Manager Response: Dear Edwin T,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your comments about the staff and the rooms are much appreciated.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Nice clean room, prompt service.  Only complaint is with the valet service, valet was rude and made us wait 20 minutes while doing nothing.  Hotel comp'd the valet.  Room service has good food.
Manager Response: Dear Steve M,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and providing us with your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your experience with our valet team.  I will be sharing your review with my operations manager and we will be sure to address this with all of our valet staff.  I appreciate you bringing this to my attention.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stay at this Wyndham frequently because of work commitments in Orange County. It's so central, clean, and has also been beautifully modernized. The rooms make you feel like you're in a boutique hotel, the service is excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Taylor K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I was very happy to read how much you enjoyed staying at our hotel.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I will not return to this hotel!  I was told the room rate would be reduced and it wasn't.  I requested a quiet room, and it was not quiet!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience.  If you would like to reach out to me directly with the details of your stay, I would happy to resolve any unresolved issues.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everything was very nice...except the fact the parking is 18.00 and I was not aware until I checked out and got a receipt of charges to the room and that was on there. I believe they could have said that when you go the parking lot and the gentleman who hands you the pass, or even when you give your credit card at check in...something would have been nice besides the receipt that I had already been charged for it.
Manager Response: Dear Alisha M,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am sorry to hear about the confusion with the parking fees.  Though we do have it posted at the entrance and on our website, it is the responsibility of our desk staff to ensure all guests are made aware of this during the check in process.  I will be sharing your review with my team and will be reminding all of them of our procedures.  Thank you for bringing this to my attention.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value for a beautiful hotel
Summary: The first thing I thought when I went in was "wow, this is going to be very expensive" witch means it was very beautiful and classy, but when I knew the price I was really amezed that it wasn´t expensive at all. Then we went up to the rooms and of course, they were as expected. Plus flawless internet, hehe, I love this feature in any hotel.  The only thing missing was ice, yes, ice, hehe. I needed some ice and searched for it on 2 different floors, it never occured to me to call roomservice, but oh well... I still give it an excellent rating.
Manager Response: Dear Ioserg,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate your business and your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experienced with the ice.  I am aware that we did have two ice machines that required repairs.  I am happy to report that the parts required to fix the machines were delivered and the machines are back in working order.  I hope that you find yourself back in Irvine soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I joined the rewards program at this property and because...
Summary: I joined the rewards program at this property and because of an employee error the points that were suppose to be credited to my account plus the bonus points I was not able to stay using my points
Manager Response: Dear Dana P,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear about the challenge you experienced with the Rewards points.  If this issue has not been resolved, please reach out to me directly so that I can assist in securing the proper resolution.  It is my goal to ensure that all guests receive the points they’ve earned.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Small room, bathroom sink faucet leaked and the restaurant was the worst I have experienced in a hotel in a very long time.
Manager Response: Dear Charlie H,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that you were unimpressed with our hotel.  Obviously, this is not our goal.  I will be sharing your feedback with my team, and specifically with my restaurant manager.  We will use your review as an opportunity to learn and improve.  I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future and that we are able to provide you with the stay you deserve.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the Wyndham in Irvine for my birthday. The staff went ABOVE AND BEYOND to make my day special. Everyone was friendly and helpful... Gary at the front desk was personable and made check in a breeze! Our room was the best in the house!
Manager Response: Dear Melissa S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your birthday with us and that Gary was able to make your stay a great experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Hotel is nice and clean, and service is good. Got charged for parking, but didn't have a car...  One week later, and still not credited after writing and calling.   Check your bill before you leave...
Manager Response: Dear 613brettk,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry to hear about the challenge you had with the parking charges.  I hope this has been resolved.  If it has not, please reach out to me directly and I will be happy to assist you.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I can not say enough good things about this hotel!  Let's start with check-in.  I was greeted by Jon the Front Office Manager.  He was all smiles, checked us into our room in no time, and was just very, very pleasant.  The other front desk employee was pleasant and smiling.    We stayed in their Executive Studio Suite.  The room was gorgeous with great views.  It was immaculately clean, very well appointed, luxury finishes, very quiet, and an overall relaxing feel.  The beds are nothing short of heaven.  I did not use the sofa bed, but did sit on the sofa to read and it was very comfortable.  There was also a comfy chair and ottoman.  The desk area was very spacious.  I was in Irvine for business, so having a really generous work are was perfect.  The desk chair was
Manager Response: Dear Stachia B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your detailed feedback is very much appreciated!  I would also like to thank you for calling out the excellent service you received from Jon.  I will be sure to share your review with him and the rest of my team.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another fantastic stay!        Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Ice machine on 9th floor inop during all 16 days of our visit. Ice available other floors, but slow elevators.
Manager Response: Dear Vernon H,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing your feedback.  I am very sorry for the inconvenience we caused you due to the faulty ice machine.  I am happy to inform you that the machine has finally been fixed. We are also ion the process of replacing our older units in order to improve our guest’s experience.  I realize it is too late for your stay, but I wanted you to know we have addressed the issue.  I hope this provides you with the confidence to return to our hotel in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a wonderful weekend stay over the 4th of the July holiday. The staff was very kind and courteous and made me feel very welcome. Great rooms and great overall hotel condition. I would recommend staying here for business or pleasure as it is a easy location to the airport or a quick ride to Newport Beach or Costa Mesa for good food and shopping. Staff went above and beyond to take care of me and my guests.
Manager Response: Dear Kassie H,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you and your guests enjoyed your holiday with us.  I hope you travels bring you back our way again real soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another wonderful experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We were upgraded to a suite and had a wonderful city view - windows all around.  Very bright and roomy!  Newly remodeled rooms, with a mini fridge and microwave.  Great for families.  Also, conveniently located near shopping, restaurants, and very close to the airport as well.  Staff was very friendly and attentive.  We will definitely be back to visit soon!  :)
Manager Response: Dear Rosanne0406,  Thank you for the wonderful 50-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the amenities are greatly appreciated.  I am excited to hear that you plan to return to our hotel  We look forward to providing you with another great stay.       Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Die Hard Hilton Fan was Pleased
Summary: I always try to find a Hilton wherever I go and was dismayed to find out that I had to stay at the Wyndham - particularly when I found out that the Wyndham is part of the Super 8 chain!  Needless to say, I enjoyed my stay.  I was able to check in very early and enjoy the fitness center during a quiet time.  The room was updated and I loved the large countertop in the bathroom.  The staff were very helpful and the location was ideal for my business trip and the proximity to the airport.  I may pass over the Hilton again when I travel to this location.
Manager Response: Dear CMarvinGallo,  Thank you for the great feedback!  I am so happy to hear that you gave us a shot and that you were pleased with your stay.  I know I’d put our hotel up against Hilton any day of the week and it’s great to hear from a Hilton fan that we give them a run for their money.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you do decide to stay with Wyndham Irvine again.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed as part of a very large baseball tournament and was very impressed with the way they accomodated all of the teams.  They never seemed to be overwhelmed  with all the kids and the craziness. The hotel is very clean with the best staff- everyone was so friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Maryann S,  Thank you for staying with us and for the very kind review.  We really enjoyed working with the tournament and it’s great to hear that, as an attendee of this event, you enjoyed staying with us.  Your kind comments about the hotel and the staff are greatly appreciated and I will be sure to pass them along to my team.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Look and feel outdated. Like high school gym.  Chlorine too strong, my wife and daughter couldn't breathe. When staff was pouring chlorine into the pool he said "that's just how we do it". everything else was nice about your hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Brian S,  Thank you for your review and for bringing the situation with the pool to my attention.  I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  I am looking into this situation as we should not be adding chlorine to the pool since we switched to a saline pool a few months ago.  I hope this will not prevent you from staying with us again in the future as we truly do appreciate your business.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Worst stay ever! From the very beginning with our AC not working to the Ice machine on floor being out for days to having 2 washers and dryers available t for numerous baseball teams that needed to wash their uniforms daily. Not only did the hotel only have 2 washers and dryers, one dryer was broke for 2 days. Asked to speak with GM (Justin Gammon) about issues and was pawned off to some room service manager who said the issues would be looked into and he would get back to me, needless to say, I never heard back from him. This hotel was a partner hotel for USA Premier baseball tournament and they totally failed in making the tournament an enjoyable experience. I would recommend the tournament directors look for other hotel partners. On top of everything else, we were given
Manager Response: Dear Azgolfin,  Thank you for your review.  I would like to apologize for your bad experience with our hotel.  Clearly, we failed to provide you with the stay you deserved and we truly regret that.  I will be sharing your feedback with my entire team and we will use it in an effort to improve our services so that all future guests have a better experience than the one you had.  I appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us so that we have the opportunity to address them.  Again, I apologize for your experience with us.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Stuck 300 miles from home with no money due to your hole
Summary: This hotel held double the fund of the cost of my hotel stay from my bank acct. Other people in our party, who stayed the same amount of days we did, got charged all different amounts. Some in the $300 range and us up to $954.00.  Not a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila W,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience at our hotel.  I trust that the funds were released but I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this caused you.  I have shared your review with my Director of Rooms and by Director of Finance.  They have met with their teams to ensure all employees are correctly posting charges to avoid any further concerns.  Again, I apologize for your experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: We were highly satisfied with our stay.  We enjoyed using...
Summary: We were highly satisfied with our stay.  We enjoyed using the pool and the staff was very helpful and friendly.  The room was clean and meet our needs.  We also liked the close proximity to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Lynne C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide such a nice review.  I am happy to hear that the staff took such great care of you and that you were able to enjoy the hotel’s amenities.  I hope your travels bring you back our way again soon.  We look forward to providing you with another 5-star experience!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing:clean,modern,close to the beach,Newport Beach.The. staff very friendly.The location is just perfect:not busy,clean,quiet.Even if is close to the freeway we didn't hear any noise.The bed was very comfortable!!!We love this hotel and will be back for sure!!!Pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear EmeliaGlavan,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the hotel, the staff, and the location are very much appreciated.  I’m happy to hear that you plan to return.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Horrible way to start a holiday weekend
Summary: This has been a horrible way to start my holiday weekend. We have stayed here when it was known as the Crowne Plaza and it was excellent. So I was surprised that this time I was greeted by the valet man by him waiving a valet ticket in the air signaling if I was going to valet or not. I nodded as I wanted to valet my car. He then began to walk towards my door and stand there. He stood there waiting for me to get out, he not open my door for me. Then I asked a family member to get a luggage cart so we could get the luggage out of the car. The valet man just continued to stand there next to my door. Not offering to retrieve the cart. We got the cart and I began to take our bags out as he continued to stand there and watch me pack this cart with these big heavy bags. At this point
Manager Response: Dear Ashley B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  I am very sorry about the issues you experienced while staying with us.  The situation with the valet staff is unacceptable and we have addressed this with the manager and the entire team.  We have reminded them all of our expectations and I am confident that this issue will not repeat itself.  I am also sorry to hear that we were unable to meet your room type needs.  Though we would love to meet every guest’s requests, we are often limited to what is available at the time the guest is arriving.  Should you decide to stay with us again, please contact me directly and I will ensure that the appropriate room type is set aside for you.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wyndham Irvine is absolutely beautiful! Recently remodeled they didn't leave anything out. The bed was comfy, sheets soft, towels were plush. Room was super clean. Close to the airport and nice restaurants. All staff are professional and polite.
Manager Response: Dear Maria Z,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated hotel so much.  We’re all very excited about the new product and it’s great to hear that our guests are just as excited as we are.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I stayed here for 2 weeks during a work training...
Summary: I stayed here for 2 weeks during a work training facilitated by the hotel.  Overall, my experience was great.  Friendly staff, GREAT food, and good location near many needs the hotel can't meet such as food, shopping, etc.
