Manager Response: Dear Gerrit D,  Thanks for the kind review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your extended stay with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The desk staff were awful, pro customer service, Fire alarm went off and had to leave hotel with no explanation and no one telling us to come back in it was safe. HaD to call down to get room cleaned as they just skipped our room two times
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth C,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am so sorry to hear about your experience with the hotel.  I have shared your review with my team in an effort to learn from our mistakes with you.  We could have certainly handled the fire alarm testing in a better manner.  We have developed new procedures that I believe will prevent guests from going through what you went through on your stay.  I also apologize for the challenge with housekeeping.  I’ve discussed this with my housekeeping department.  We are committed to improving in this area as well.  I hope you will be willing to try us again the next time you’re in town and that you’ll allow us the opportunity to provide you with a much better experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This was my first stay at a Wyndham Hotel. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean and comfortable. The onsite restaurant has a decent selection and the breakfast buffet is quite good.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen B,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback.  I am excited to hear that we were your first Wyndham experience.  I hope we did enough to earn your business the next time you’re in our area and to convince you to try one of our many sister properties when you travel.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, excellent service. I checked into the Wyndham this past weekend and to my surprise I was placed on the 9th floor with an outstanding view of the city. We had a great time and will definitely be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Anna T,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the view.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my team.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Came on business, and would stay again
Summary: This hotel was not booked by me, but came for an overnight trip for business.  We came in late and had to have dinner at the restaurant attached to the hotel.   Wow!  The food was excellent, wasn't expecting that, a true gem hidden inside the hotel.  I think they opened late for our party of 12, because there was no one else eating there.  Everyone agreed that the food was great.  The hotel was quiet, and clean there was a pool that I didn't use but one member in our group did and he said it was nice.  They have a shuttle that will take you anywhere without a certain distance and then pick you up again, wanted to use it to go shopping but didn't.  There is a great mall called South Coast Mall that is about 10 minutes away.  Great Mall!! Here beds were comfortable, super clean
Manager Response: Dear tritzilla,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing such a detailed, kind review!  I am so happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of so many of our hotel amenities.  We strive to ensure that every guest enjoys their stay and that everything they might need is available.  I hope you and your group find your way back to our hotel again soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I was very happy with our room.  The staff was amazing! I felt very welcome and they treated me like family.  Definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Ian W,  Thank you for the great review!  Your comments about the staff are very much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my entire team and encourage them to continue providing this same level of service to every guest.  We look forward to your next visit!   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Room got hot in the middle of the night, A/C was down as low as it could go ;-( Other than that this place is great! Nice beds with plenty of pillows and a big bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear BluesTraveler88,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am sorry to hear about the issue you experienced with the guest room A/C.  Though we just installed all new units across the entire hotel, we do occasionally have a system that fails.  I hope you were able to inform my team about your issue so that it could get resolved.  We truly value feedback like yours as it allows us to correct issues that we may otherwise not be aware of.  Thanks again!     Ps:  I grew up down the road from you in the big city of Porterville.  Please keep us in mind during the summer if you’re looking to escape the valley heat! Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: From arrival to departure, I was treated with hospitality by every staff member I encountered. The location was great, the bedding was comfortable, and the value was exceptional.
Manager Response: Dear Candy W,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that the team treated you the way every guest deserves to be treated.  I will share you kind comments with my team.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great location close to JWA. Easy freeway access. Room is standard, clean. No microwave. Bed is too soft for me. Freeway noise can be heard, even on 11th floor. Shower hot water took a while and its only warm. Due to self closing door, you can hear other rooms door being slammed close. Bathroom is clean and nice. Try to stay away from the freeway side and avoid 3rd floor. Due to pool & fitness ctr sccess on third floor, you will hear constant access door being slammed. Parking is expensive but that seems to be the norm with most hotel now.
Manager Response: Dear Enrico K,  Thank you for the kind review.  I am sorry to hear about the issues you experienced at our hotel but I am happy to hear that the service was great.  I will be sharing your review with my team.  We’ll be looking into the items you brought up and we will do everything we can to make sure your next stay is much better.  Thanks again for the feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good hotel all around. Decent rooms, service. Standard features. Close to the airport. Would stay for business. Nothing special, but it's nice. As expected. Would stay at again. Good features, good service, great rates on weekends via Priceline.
Manager Response: Dear CarlL14,  Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback.  I am happy to hear that you would select our hotel again.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star review from you on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Clean rooms, updated, full amenities, and great service.  Only stayed on night and chose the hotel at the last minute but was impressed particularly by the staff.  Will definitely stay again.   More than i expected for the price.  Very close to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear David D,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that the hotel exceeded your expectations and that you intend to stay with us again.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: My wife and I were really happy and more than satisfied...
Summary: My wife and I were really happy and more than satisfied with this hotel.It was an amazing stay to celebrate my wife's birthday. I didn't know how beautiful of a place it was. I really loved it and I'm planning on booking a stay for my parents' anniversary.
Manager Response: Dear Raul E,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your stay with us.  I would like to wish her a very happy birthday on behalf of the entire Wyndham team.   We look forward to providing your parents with a just as memorable experience!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We arrived a night early, the staff was super accommodating, rearranged stuff to get us 2 rooms at 11pm.  They were just helpful and friendly.  The parking guys were great too, the rooms were clean and they had Starbucks to go in the restaurant. Great vacation traveling with 5 people including 2 young kids.
Manager Response: Dear Topvegas,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that my team took such great care of you and your family.  I’ll be sure to share your feedback with my team so they can all read how appreciated their actions are.  I hope your travels bring you back our way again and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another awesome experience.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: For our first stay, it was good.  A welcoming letter was there which was nice and it says enjoy the sweet and salty snack - there was no snack in the room.  Only saw 2 bottle waters.  Parking is HORRIBLE!  Went to check in on my way to an awards ceremony and was told that if I park inside I had to pay, so my hubby stayed in the car and waited and didn't park the car. They shld have parking spot for hotel registration or guest pick up that is free.  The pool was way too cold.  Disappointed that it wasn't heated.  Over all - it was a good experience staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Catherine G,  Thank you for staying with us and for your detailed feedback.  I am sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction with our parking.  It sounds like my team may not have effectively communicated our parking policy to you.  We provide the first 15 minutes of parking at no charge for guests that are registering, dropping off, or picking up another guest.  I will meet with my parking staff to make sure they better communicate this in the future.  I appreciate you bringing this to my attention.  I am also happy to inform you that we have adjusted our pool temperature based on your feedback as well as the feedback of a couple other guests.  I’m happy to hear the overall stay was good and I hope the changes we make will allow us to earn a 5-star rating from you in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great customer service at the front desk. Good value. Beds felt smaller like double instead of queen size. Needed to pay for $18/ night for parking. Other than that, room was clean and comfortable. And I really enjoyed my stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline N,  Thank you for the very king 5-star review!  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing us with another great experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Thank you Wyndham, for a relaxing stay. Everything was clean, tidy, spacious, and organized. I enjoyed the fitness room, jacuzzi, and pool. Checking out was easy. Great work!
Manager Response: Dear Lani C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your comments about the facilities and the amenities are greatly appreciated.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This is located in the corporate business area of Irvine and conviently by the 405 freeway. Irvine spectrum is about 10min away give or take. Stayed here twice in two weeks and both rooms were remodeled. Everything felt super clean. The towels and bed sheets/comforter/pillow had that fresh smell and was super white. The pool is really nice and clean. Even has a jacuzzi and small gym area. Would def stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Luuzer,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with your feedback.  I am very happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable and that you would choose our hotel again.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The check in was quick.  The room was very nice and very clean. My dog was on this trip with me and everyone - staff and guests - were good about her.
Manager Response: Dear Fern S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m happy to hear that our pet-friendly policy made the stay for you and your little companion an enjoyable stay.  We hope to welcome you both back soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wyndham was an excellent experience. Hotel is spotless, modern, and in a super convenient location. Each and every staff we encountered were friendly, professional and courteous. One of our better experiences out of a dozen hotels in the area. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Vtlaw544,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate both your business and your feedback.  Your kind comments about the staff and the cleanliness will be shared with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Lovely rooms with super comfy beds, great facilities and the location makes it handy for onward travel - only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because of having to pay for parking. I don't believe any hotel should charge for parking unless it's in the centre of a very built up city like London.
Manager Response: Dear Ben C,  Thank you for the great review.  We greatly appreciate the kind comments about the facilities and the beds.  I’m sorry to hear that we weren’t able to earn the fifth star due to the parking.  Though our hotel is consistent with the other area full-service hotels, I understand your frustration.  I hope this will not prevent us from being your hotel of choice the next time you find yourself in our area.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: It was a nice hotel to stay at. Location is not far from beaches and in a quiet area. Rooms have been remodeled since I stayed last time. Comfortable beds. The reason for the four star is the service that I received while staying there. Called for pillows and then never came. There was a handful of things that were not in working order: one phone in the room, ice machine on our floor, elevator.  Was left a letter thanking for being a valued customer and here is a gift bag, and the bag was not left. So, the customer service could use some improvement. But overall a good stay. I would recommend as an option to friends!
Manager Response: Dear Filanna T,  Thank you for staying with us and for the detailed review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay despite the challenges you mentioned.  I apologize for the service concerns you’ve shared.  I will be sharing your email with my entire team and we will use it as an opportunity to improve.  Your feedback is a gift we will definitely take advantage of.  I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon and to earn a 5-star rating on your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I took my husband out for his birthday and wanted a hotel close to home. We ended up being upgraded to a corner studio suite with floor-to-ceiling windows, spacious sleeping area and a great view! Overall the experience was fantastic and we will definitely return soon!
Manager Response: Dear JessicaWelch,  Thank you for selecting our hotel for your birthday celebration.  I am happy that we were able to provide you with an upgrade to make this stay even better.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Pros: The facility was clean, the staff was friendly, the...
Summary: Pros: The facility was clean, the staff was friendly, the registration process was quick and there were no issues with available parking. Cons: The jacuzzi was unfortunately undergoing maintenance, there was no guest validation for parking for those staying at the hotel and finding the entrance to the hotel was not very clear.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa C,  Thank you for your kind review and for your great comments about the staff.  It’s great to hear that the team made your stay enjoyable.  I do apologize for the work being done on the hot tub.  This was an unscheduled maintenance that was delayed by the requirement to order parts for repairs.  I am happy to inform you that the issues have been resolved and the hot tub is up and running.  I hope we have the opportunity to earn a 5-star from you on your next visit.  Thanks again!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed in an executive suite on the 14th floor. The room was beautiful and clean and the mattress was very comfortable. Room service was quick and delicious. We loved the free breakfast in the morning and the free happy hour at night! The highlight of our trip was Ross, the attendant for the breakfast and happy hour. He was absolutely delightful and exhibited top notch customer service! It was an all-around wonderful experience and we will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Misststyles87,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  Thank you as well for your great comments about Ross.  He is an incredible employee that always has a positive impact on the guests he interacts with.  I am happy to hear that he was able to make your stay so enjoyable.  I will be sure to share your feedback with him and the rest of my team.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Needed early check in for meeting. Staff was perfect, and room was perfect. Flawless stay. I'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher006,  Thank you for the great review!  I’m happy to hear that your meeting and your stay went so flawlessly.  It was or pleasure having you at the hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff to a one were so friendly and willing to givine anyone going to Irve assistance at any time.  We would recommend this Wyndam t
Manager Response: Dear Rainee C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  You kind comments about the staff are very much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your review with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Wonderful mattresses. Best sleep I've had in a while. Restaurant and room service were both delicious. Only two negative... Coffee in restaurant and served in meeting room was un drinkable. I think that's a Wyndham thing. Second issue... I was able to get a new room key without so much as asking my name or for ID. Big security risk. But overall.. Very nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kaymarie1983,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review.  I am happy to hear that you had such a good night’s sleep.  Included in our renovation were brand new mattresses, which have been getting rave reviews!  I’m sorry to hear about the coffee.  We proudly serve Starbuck’s coffee in our restaurant and Wolfgang Puck’s in our guest rooms.  We usually get positive reviews about both.  Again, I am sorry to hear you did not enjoy them.  I also apologize for the rom key situation.  We have a very strict policy regarding issuing keys.  I will be sharing your review with my Director of Rooms and we will be meeting with all team members to ensure they fully understand our policy.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff provided superb hospitality and service during my stay at the Wyndham Irvine-Orange County airport for three nights June 6-9, 2014. This was my first visit to California, and so I'd like to say a special thank you to the Wyndham for being such an outstanding ambassador for Irvine-Orange County!  Although the hotel has 235 guest rooms and it was very busy on the day that I arrived, Kailei and the staff were a real credit to excellent customer service - very attentive, polite and everything ran very smoothly.  I particularly remember Kailei, who saw me through the check-in to the check-out processes, and who went above and beyond for her hotel guests.   Kailei guided me every day, and she was always a special delight.  What a great personality, she made me feel most
Manager Response: Dear 814hotelguest,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to write such a detailed review of your stay.  It was our pleasure to have you as our guest.  I would also like to thank you for recognizing one of our newest team members.  Since joining our team, Kailei has truly demonstrated a true hospitality mentality.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your interactions with her.  I hope that you have the opportunity to visit us again in the near future and that you allow us chance to provide you with another great stay.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for a 7 nights and had a pleasant time staying here. I stayed on the Executive level on the 14th floor where for a business professional is ideal. Ross the attendant for Breakfast (free) and Happy Hour (free) was super friendly, and exhibits world class customer service. He made the trip for my team and I. I would stay here again just because of meeting him.  My Grades on the room: Bed: A - Very comfortable lots of plush pillows and soft and comfy sheets and comforter.  Shower/Bathroom: B - Shower was nice and hot, fixtures were kind of beaten up a bit. Sink and vanity was spacious and modern. Toilet is high-powered flush which we all appreciate!   TV: A-   - Nice 45 Inch Samsung, looks brand new. Has plenty of HD channels. The only downside is they lock down the
Manager Response: Dear Steven G,  Thank you for the very detailed review.  We greatly appreciate your stay and the time you took to share your experience with us.  We value feedback like your and look forward to using this review to improve.  Thank you as well for calling out the exceptional job that Ross does for us every day in the Executive Lounge.  He is a great employee and I will be sure to share your feedback with him.    Though it seems we received pretty good marks, I’m sorry to hear we fell short in the room furnishing category.  As you mentioned, we do have refrigerators available for delivery to a guest’s room and we do have microwaves in our vending areas, these services are not standard in our guest rooms.  If you are heading back our way, please let us know and we’ll be happy to deliver a fridge to your room.  I would also like to mention that we have plenty of safety deposit boxes located at the front desk for complimentary use by our guests.  Thanks again.  We look forward to your next visit!     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great hotel.  Every staff member I interacted with was helpful and had a positive attitude.  The location is very convenient.  Had a very busy schedule and it was easy to get in and out of the area and the hotel itself.  With the recent renovation it was like staying at a new hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Pablo S,  Thank you for the great review!  Your feedback and your business are greatly appreciated.  I’ll be sure to share you very kind comments about our staff with my entire team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and to providing you with another 5-star stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Flawless service on a group event
Summary: This hotel did a fantastic job of handling a large group of visitors recently that we were bringing to Irvine for a business meeting. From check-in, to the clean rooms with very comfortable beds, to the dining (excellent restaurant with a top class check) to invoicing, this is one of the most professional, well organized and pleasant hotel staffs to work with that I have ever encountered. They love what they do and are good at it.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and thank you for allowing us to be a part of you group.  We greatly appreciate you allowing us the opportunity to host your program.  I am very proud of the sales, catering, and banquets team that we have at the hotel.  Your review is certainly consistent with the feedback we regularly receive for meetings held here.  We look forward to providing you another great experience in the near future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: excellent stay i was just in the hotel in the evening and the night but it was really pleasant and quiet stay, great to rest after a long day.
Manager Response: Dear Fernando P,  Thank you for the great 5-star review.  It was our pleasure having you stay at our hotel.  I hope your next visit includes more time to enjoy then hotel and all of the amenities we have to offer.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: So booked this several days before going to stay with you and was hesitant but talk to the manager safian and he made me think it was going to be a great stay....well too bad i didn't get to me safian the whole time of stay due to his schedule and our busy one. anyway the reason for the 3 dots is because 1 dot they are really close and convenient to airport, 2 dot is because the shuttle guys are tremendous especially thomas and one other who i forgot the name but tremendous shuttle guys, and 3 dot because super clean hotel which I love (but pool area please redo that area)!  Now the reason i didnt do the other two dots because the service sucks from the front desk (honestly horrible), not all of them but you know who you are when i say service was bad and the other reason is
Manager Response: Dear Angelique G,  Thank you for the detailed review.  I am happy to hear that you found the hotel to be clean and convenient and that you enjoyed the shuttle staff.  I apologize for your experience with the desk staff.  I will be sure to share your review with my team and we will be sure to take advantage of the feedback you’ve provided us by using it to improve our guests experience.  I look forward to having you back at our hotel and to providing you with a better experience than your last.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel was difficult to find.  The hotel itself very...
Summary: The hotel was difficult to find.  The hotel itself very nice and clean.  However, we had a bad experience with the shuttle pick-up at the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Robert N,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing us with your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that you experienced challenges with our shuttle service and with locating the hotel.  This is not a common issue with our complimentary service.  I hope you will provide us with another opportunity to show you the level of service the hotel is known for.  We look forward to providing you with a great 5-star experience.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed over the very busy Memorial weekend with my wife and our daughters (5yrs and 2yrs), arriving on Saturday, staying thru Tuesday.   This is NOT a resort. It's a very simple, very clean, and seemingly well-run hotel. Yes, there is a small indoor pool and a well kept patio area, but they're a bit tricky to get to the first time you visit.  The pool/sun deck areas are accessible only through an elevator on the third floor, half the hotel length away from the main elevators.   This hotels apears to give discounts to large groups, as there were lots of teen-agers running about the hotel, that were competing in a softball tournament. There were no problems other than kids being kids.  Be prepared to pay $15 a night for self parking. This is actually a bargain in this area, as we
Manager Response: Dear Cube44,  Thank you for your detailed feedback.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  It’s great to read that you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Balboa Island and to enjoy so many of our hotel’s amenities at such a great price.  I hope your experience with us this last weekend will have you coming back to us the next time you visit Irvine.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: During the time this hotel was being renovated I asked to be relocated to another room due noise from the construction. It was no problem and I was presented with a box of chocs for the inconvenience. All the rooms have been completed now and it's nice and fresh. The staff are always attentive and it's easy to get back and forwards to the airport using the hotel shuttle which leaves every half hour or so. I always sleep like a log in this hotel. Have been back 8 or 9 times, probably best overall balance between price, convenience and a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Dear David B,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for staying with us again after the renovation.  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much.  We love being your hotel of choice in Irvine and we look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel itself is great.  The only negative to this hotel is that it is not accessible via the road it's address is on & you have to access it via an industrial area where it is possible to miss the hotel if arriving at night.
Manager Response: Dear Chelle715,  Thank you for the kind review.  I apologize for any challenges you may have experienced when accessing the hotel.  Though we are clearly visible from Von Karman, we do understand that access to the hotel can be a little confusing.  I hope this small issue is not something that will keep you from staying with us again as we would love to have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and very good services and cooperative...
Summary: Excellent hotel and very good services and cooperative staff and wonderful location.   ...............
Manager Response: Dear Ayman Y,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  It’s great to read that you had an excellent stay with us.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I frequently stay @ this Wyndham for work as I commute between LA & Irvine.   The staff is super friendly, the rooms are at a consistent quality. I couldn't be happier and will always stay here when I need a room in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Taylor K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate being your hotel of choice in the Irvine area.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay!    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Since being purchased by Wyndham this property has undergone some improvements that were badly needed. Rooms are more nicely appointed than they were before and just seem cleaner. Location will always be an issue for this hotel as it's at the edge of a banking and business complex, and when five o'clock rolls around everything shuts down. Not much in the way of restaurants or shopping venues within walking distance. Add to that the tricky part of actually getting to the hotel itself. The address is correct, however there isn't an entrance to the property from Von Karmen Avenue. It takes a couple of turns off the main drag to get in here. Not an issue once it's been figured out. It's that first time that can be a challenge.
Manager Response: Dear William C,  Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback.  We greatly appreciate the comments recognizing the improvements we’ve made since converting to Wyndham.  We are very excited to be able to offer a newly renovated, newly branded product to all of our guests.  I would also like to take a minute to make a couple restaurant recommendations for the next time you’re in town.  All of the following locations are in our business complex and are open for dinner – McCormick & Schmick’s, The Pilsner Room (located at the back of McCormick and Schmick’s), Micks Karma Bar (one of the top rate restaurants on Yelp in Irvine!), El Torito Grill, Tuscany Grill, and Oliver Café & Lounge (located in the Equinox building).  Feel free to stop by our desk for directions to any of these great restaurants.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I get there to find I have to pay for parking, after booking the trip on priceline and seeing free. Then told "You have to go through them to fix it. You would think it would be in wyndham best to fix it. Then I found out by check review that others had the same problem. So you guys did know it was happening. No frig in room. A soda machine that only worked the first day. And to think I'm a member with a time share...... a ice machine that never worked.
Manager Response: Dear James R,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear you were surprised by the parking fees.  Though these fees are disclosed on our website and Priceline is aware the fees exist, we often hear from guests that they did not see the notification on Priceline that the additional fees would be applied.  We have requested from Priceline that they more prominently display the parking fees; however, we are unable to modify the content on their site.  I would also like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the vending areas.  I have passed your review along to my engineering department with a request that we conduct more frequent inspections in these areas.  Thank you again for your feedback    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great surprise.  Not expecting this nice for such a low price.  Bed was soooo comfy,  room super clean, bar was great as was breakfast.  Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Mary P,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  It’s great to read that the hotel was such a pleasant surprise for you.  I hope your experience with us has you coming back again and again in the future!      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This hotel is absolutely great! Great customer service, great staff and great rooms at a good decent price. Only down fall is that they have cops strolling in an out of the parking lots and around the location constantly pulling random people over for no reason. That's a little odd seeing that this hotel is very nice and mainly business people come here. Right near the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Lina L,  Thank you so much for the great review.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  I apologize for any inconvenience the Irvine police may have caused you.  One of the benefits of living in one of the safest cities in the U.S. is the police tend to have a lot of free time.  They use much of that free time patrolling the area hotels.  We have contacted them in an effort to lessen their presence at the hotel.  Thanks again for your feedback.  We look forward to your next visit.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel is nice and modern and is located near the...
Summary: The hotel is nice and modern and is located near the airport, with a shuttle service available to the airport and other nearby local attractions.  The renovated room was nice for the most part but a few slight damaged elements to the room.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer M,  Thank you for the very nice review.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  If you find a minute to send me a message, I would love to hear more about the damaged elements of the room so that we can make sure they are addressed.  We look forward to your next visit and hope to provide you with the perfect stay.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, gracious accommodations with lovely amenities: iPod station, down-type comforter, plenty of cushy towels, beautiful view -- outstanding!
Manager Response: Dear Joanne S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed all of our amenities during your stay.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another superb stay.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Just checked in this evening and Ray at the front desk was courteous and accommodating. This is probably the 6-7th time I have stayed at the Wyndam. Each visit has been perfect. Clean room and bathroon, good bed, pillows and linen.  I travel to OC at least two times/month. This has become my favorite hotel.
Manager Response: Dear EGB55,  Thanks you for the 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate all of your stays with us and take pride in being your hotel of choice in the Irvine area.  I’ll be sure to share your kind comments with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a meeting in Irvine CA. which brought travelers from many parts of the country.  All of my guests travel each week for business so I needed a hotel which met their complete needs. I worked with Yalda the sales- meeting planner for the hotel.  She was great to work with as I had changes up to a few days before my meeting.  All of our needs were met with food, drinks, and the newly remodeled hotel. My guests loved the rooms and talked about the pillows each morning. I will always stay at the Wyndham while in Irvine and look forward to my next stay.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas D,  Thank you for bringing your business to us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  Your comments about the Yalda, your successful meeting, and the comfortable accommodations are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to working with you on many more meetings in the future and to being your personal hotel of choice in Irvine.       Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My family stayed here a few time and this time we had the worse customer service and experience.  Our neighbor was so noisy we did not have a pleasant stay for both nights we were here.  On top of that, the phone in our room did not work, so I had to call the Front desk using my own mobile phone. The front desk than said they will take care of it and have my phone fix that day. The next day at 6am our neighbor was making lots of noise and woke my family up. Again, I tried calling the front desk and the telephone wasn't working. I thought they had it fix!. So, i use my mobile device again. What's even worse is they did not replace the shampoo and conditioner for the 2nd night stay. Luckily we brought our own just in case. This was very inconvenience stay for my family which
Manager Response: Dear Mylien T,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share you experience.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay went so poorly.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a great stay and we clearly failed to do that with you.  I will be sharing your feedback with my entire team and we will use your review as a learning tool in an effort to provide better customer service on a consistent basis.  Again, I apologize for your experience and hope that you’ll be willing to try us again in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed for a wedding and accommodations were great clean beautiful with friendly staff expecially your parking attendants only problem was getting question answered from sales staff
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn L,  Thank you for the kind review.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with.  I apologize for any challenges you experienced with the sales team.  I will be sure to share your feedback with them and we’ll use your review as an opportunity to improve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The staff was very curtious, the room was very nice and met...
Summary: The staff was very curtious, the room was very nice and met all of my needs.  The breakfast buffet is excellent and includes an omelet bar.  This hotel is also in a great location making it convenient to get around the city.  The parking is convenient and is offered at a reasonable price when compared to surrounding hotels.  The workout facility and pool are sufficient for squeezing in a quick workout, but is located just down the road from a 24 hour fitness if you desired a bigger facility.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory Alan D,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing such a detailed review.  It’s great to hear that you were able to take advantage of all the amenities the hotel has to offer.  I’ll be sure to share your comments with my entire team.  We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Great hotel with very central location in Orange County.  Staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Free parking for guests and shuttle service to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear James G,  Thank you for the kind feedback.  We appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to share your experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we expect you allow us the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed 2 nights at this hotel and had a great experience. The desk staff is very “hospitable”, something you don’t get at a lot of hotels these days. My room had been recently renovated. The bed and bathroom, for me the most important part of the room, were great. The wifi was great I got a lot of work done while I was there. This will be the place I stay when I am in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Terrence G,  Thank you for the very kind review.  It’s great to hear that you enjoyed all of the amenities the hotel offers.  We recognize the importance of a dependable internet connection and we recently completed an upgrade of our complimentary wifi network.  It’s great to hear that it worked so well for you.  We are excited to be your hotel of choice and look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I found the facilities to be well maintained and the room in which I stayed was a a good value.  I would only suggest that you service the treadmills since the belts seemed to stick a little.
Manager Response: Dear Lee N,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  We really appreciate your feedback.  I apologize for any inconvenience the issues with the treadmill may have caused you.  I am happy to inform you that we are scheduled for installation of brand new fitness equipment nest week.  We’ll be replacing all of the existing equipment and even increasing the number of machines we currently have.  I hope you’ll have the opportunity to visit us again in the near future and experience the new machines for yourself.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Newly remodeled with a modern clean look.  I thoroughly enjoyed a week long stay using the restaurant, conference room and fitness center.  Outstanding restaurant with no need to look for another in the area.  All staff was amazing.  Greetings in the halls from every employee from the manager to maintenance.  Would not hesitate to return.
Manager Response: Dear Michael A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We appreciate you staying with us and that you took the time to share your experience.  It’s great to hear that the entire team was living up to our hospitality commitment by providing you with such a great experience.  I hope your travels bring you back our way again and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another peaceful stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had stayed at this property a few years before when it was the Crown Plaza and it was ok but it has a whole new look now.  The look and feel of the lobby is more upscale and modern.  We had a corner room that was spacious.  The bed was very comfortable and the rooms/halls were very quiet.  The hotel bar was a nice place to chill.  The staff is very cordial and helpful.  The only ding I can give is the Parking service, which I found was contracted out, was a bit rude and apparently thought the lot wasn't something they needed to care about as I noticed the same coffee cups laying in one of the front stalls 2 days in a row.  We can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Dennis C,  Thanks for the great feedback!  It’s great to get reviews from guests that stayed with us before the transition and to be able to hear how far we’ve come.  We’re very excited about the new brand and product and we truly enjoy hearing from guests that like the changes as well.  I’ll be sharing your feedback with my entire team – including the feedback about the parking lot.  Thanks for bringing the issue to my attention.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel. Staff was friendly and experienced. Great room, executive floor. Good continental breakfast
Manager Response: Dear A N,  Thank you for the 5-star review!  I am pleased to hear that you had such a great stay.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another excellent experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had an enjoyable 3 night stay recently for a work trip. The hotel, though close to John Wayne Airport and a major expressway, is very quiet and I slept well. The room is comfortable, and the king size bed was great. I enjoyed the included Wifi at the hotel, which was a great amenity that almost all other area hotels charge extra for. Had breakfast twice at the hotel (one $18 buffet, the other off the menu) and it was fine...on par with other hotel breakfasts, but nothing special. There's complimentary USA Today papers throughout the hotel as well.  The only minor complaint was housekeeping. There's 2 bottled waters in the room when you check in, but they were never replaced. I did leave a cash tip in the room after the first night, but it wasn't taken. Also, left the room mid
Manager Response: Dear Richard S,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our brand new beds.  The feedback we’ve been getting on the new mattresses has been great!  In fact, we’ve had a number of guests that have ordered mattresses for their home after sleeping at the hotel.  I’m also happy to see you were able to take advantage of so many of the hotels amenities.  I do apologize for the concerns you shared regarding housekeeping.  I’ll be sure to share your feedback with my team.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Was supposed to be at the Marriot with the remainder of my work team.  Hotel was full so selected the Wyndham.  I was pleasantly surprised.  Staff was outstanding.  Rooms were clean and well kept.  Room service food was excellent. Made the trip enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia Ann F,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  I am pleased to hear that we were able to provide you with such a great stay.  I hope that we’ll be your first choice if travels bring you back our way in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in a business park. Newly renovated. Great...
Summary: Very nice hotel in a business park. Newly renovated. Great staff. Great bathroom. Nice rooms.  Just a bit noisy.When someone lets a door slam, you feel the whole building shake.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the staff and the room are greatly appreciated.  I do apologize for any noise issues you experienced but I happy to hear that the rest of your experience was enjoyable.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: great location , great service and great value. Front desk very accommodating and pleasant during check in and check out.
Manager Response: Dear Ata K,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  Your kind comments about the service and the desk staff are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another excellent stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We stayed for a night. This is just an okay hotel to stay. The parking is congested and signs are not clearly marked from where to enter and exit. Room was clean, bed was not very comfortable. Also the painting put up in the room was hurting the eyes. Paintings and accessories if kept in the room should be such that they create a pleasant environment which was not the case here. Given the location, there are many other options to stay which can be explored. Overall didn't meet the expectations.
Manager Response: Dear MannG,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I’m sorry to hear that we did not meet or exceed your expectations.  We do appreciate your very honest feedback and will take your comments into consideration as we look for ways to improve our overall guest experience.  I hope you will consider us again in the future so that we can provide you with a better perception of our hotel.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Clean and updated with a good restaurant on...
Summary: Nice hotel. Clean and updated with a good restaurant on property and a helpful staff. Everything is close by as well. My only issue was that the fitness center had a time lock on it and would not open until 5am. Traveling from the East Coast, I was up very early and looking to take advantage of the time to exercise but could not. Otherwise a very nice property.
Manager Response: Dear M A,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I would like to apologize for the inconvenience our fitness center hours may have caused you.  We’ll definitely take your feedback into consideration.  I’m happy to hear that the rest of your stay went well.  We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I had a pleasant stay.  the bed was comfortable...would have preferred different choice of pillows.  Staff was very friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Pam F,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  Your kind comments about the bed and the staff are greatly appreciated.  I’m sorry you didn’t find the pillows to your liking but I’m happy to read that your overall stay was pleasant.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: The staff was very friendly.  Accommodations were nice.  I...
Summary: The staff was very friendly.  Accommodations were nice.  I loved the shuttle services!!!  I loved the mattresses too, very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Robin M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am happy to read that your enjoyed the services and the great new mattresses.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had a great experience even though we checked in late they were welcoming and the bar service was awesome too. The best was that I was so unbelievable hungry but they had nothing close by but the concierge made aureus was taken care of and found the closest Dominos.. Thanks you again for that!!
Manager Response: Dear Brandy G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that the staff in the bar took such great care of you.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Most comfortable hotel bed ever!! Ease of check-in: Outstanding Friendliness of staff: Outstanding   Thank you, Ray at the front desk and Ross for the 14th floor hospitality!!!  I will most definitely staff here on my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear JayLJohnson,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I’m happy to hear you enjoyed our brand new bed.  The feedback we’ve been getting on them has been fantastic.  Thank you as well for the kind comments about our staff.  I will be sure to share your feedback with Ray, Ross, and the entire team.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Make sure no GROUPS are there!!
Summary: The hotel itself was ok.  Nice rooms, remodeled..   The outside noise is why we won't stay there again. The walls are thin so you can hear everything going on.  Our floor had a bunch of kids there for some kind of retreat so the whole floor was loud and they were slamming doors and running up and down the halls.  Normally, it wouldn't matter if the walls were a little more noise-proof.  If you don't care about sleep and you're there to party, have a blast.  But if you're there to rest and you have an early morning, either request a corner room on a quiet floor or try another hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher G,  Thank you for your review.  I apologize for the noise concerns you’ve shared with us.  The hotel makes every effort to minimize these issues but we recognize that some groups need to be monitored more closely.  I apologize that this was not done during your stay.  I hope you will reconsider staying with us again as these types of issues are not common at the hotel  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Wyndham is a high end hotel.  As a high end hotel, I was quite disappointed.  My son, the groom, travels frequently for work.  He usually stays at Marriott residents inns.  Marriott has a free breakfast buffet, and Wyndham's was 17.95.  My husband and I have even had free breakfast at less expensive motels.  When setting up plans for the weekend stay, arrangements got really mixed up.  The event planner lost information numerous times.  The bride and I were to have dinner one evening to checkout the possibility of having the rehearsal dinner there in the restaurant.  A time was set.  Upon our arrival, she had left, the restaurant was closed, and NO ONE was expecting us.  It took several days for her to respond to the bride's emails.  We made plans with El Torrito Grill, and had
Manager Response: Dear Gloria W,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I would like to apologize for any inconveniences your group experienced with us during your stay.  It is our goal to provide every guest and group with a great stay and we clearly fell short with you and your group.  Again, I apologize for any challenges you experienced.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will use it to find better ways to operate in an effort to prevent future guests from experiencing the same challenges you did.  Thanks again for your feedback.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I would have thought a hotel like the Wyndham would have been better.  The rooms are small, they only have double beds, the pillows were either too soft or very lumpy from washing.  They obviously spend lots of money making the hotel look nice, but don't spend it on making sure you get a good nights rest.  Then to make matters worse, you are already paying to stay in one of their rooms, but you have to pay to park your car there too.  They don't make enough on the room but have to charge for parking?  Guests staying at the hotel should not have to pay for parking. There was nothing special about this hotel at all.  I have had better experiences at cheaper hotels. This is not a hotel I will return to.
Manager Response: Dear Randall V,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I’m sorry to hear that you didn’t enjoy your stay with us.  We’ve received such high praise on the new bedding, but I do understand that each individual has different expectations when it comes to comfort.  Again, I am sorry to hear that you were found the beds to be uncomfortable.  I hope you’ll reconsider using the hotel again in the future.  If you do, please reach out to me and I’ll assist you with securing a room with a king bed.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed here overnight for a medical presentation. This was my first time at a Wyndham property (I'm a HHonors man.) I couldn't get a room at the Hilton, so I booked here.  I was thoroughly impressed by the decor and welcoming elegance of the lobby. Sofiane at the Front Desk was very courteous and helpful with getting me checked in. He also provided me with an upgrade to their Executive Floor, which provided complimentary hors d'oeuvres, cocktails, and soft drinks.   I was considering going off-property to have dinner. However, after a tiring flight, I decided to try the restaurant inside the hotel. The Paradise Restaurant was great! Ricardo was a friendly server. I ordered chicken strips and a salad. The food tasted really good and the price was about the same as what I would
Manager Response: Dear Tygar,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am thrilled to hear you were willing to give us a try and that enjoyed your stay.  I hope you took the opportunity to enroll in our loyalty program, Wyndham Rewards.  This is a great program that allows you to start redeeming for rewards even after just one stay.  When set side-by-side with other programs, you will see the real value of the Wyndham Rewards program.  Thank you for your kind comments about Sofiane, the restaurant, and the guest rooms.  I will be sure to share your feedback with my team.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everything was  wonderful!  Loved  the  needs and  sheets.  Service was great! I  will  definitely  stay  again.
Manager Response: Dear Monti C,  Thank you for the great 5-star review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and even happier to hear you plan to return.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Updated design and furniture. super clean! great place to stay at, close to beach. Staff is attentive and polite.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda T,  Thank you for the kind 5-star review!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your great experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean, friendly employees and recently remodel rooms
Summary: We enjoy this hotel very much, is very well located and closed by restaurants. There is a daily fee for parking, internet access is free and they also give you two bottle of waters. we will go back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Mecxicana,  Thank you for staying with us and for the very kind review.  I was happy to read about your visit to our hotel.  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the stay, the staff, and the newly renovated accommodations.  We look forward to your next visit and to the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Unfortunaly my experience at this hotel was not as pleasant...
Summary: Unfortunaly my experience at this hotel was not as pleasant as I expected in the room next to mine it was a dog who barked through the night an noisy people in the other side. The personnel was really nice and customer oriented
Manager Response: Dear Leticia E,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I want to apologize for the issue you experienced with the noise.  We understand how difficult it is to sleep in a noisy environment and regret that we were not able to provide you with the stay you deserved.  I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future so we can provide you with a better experience with our hotel.       Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: First time we stayed here and loved it. It started a bit bumpy because the reservation was not showing in the system but they were very professional and still respected the nightly rate at witch we booked it originally. The room was great and the view as well.
Manager Response: Dear JaimeHA84,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I do apologize for the mix-up with the reservation but I’m very happy to hear my staff was able to make things right for you in a quick and efficient manner.  I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that we have another opportunity to provide you with a great experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed 2 nights this week.  Your front desk staff, Nicole & Kailei. were  the best.  They were friendly, professional & helpful.  You are lucky to have two young ladies like them.  If fact I would try to hire them if I needed someone at this time.  I enjoyed my stay.  Thanks, Jim Stuart
Manager Response: Dear 302Jim,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and for calling out two wonderful members of our team!  Like you said, we are fortunate to have staff members like them and I am very happy to hear that they provided you with such a positive experience at our hotel.  We look forward to your next visit!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I stayed 4/4-7. The night of the 5th there was a dog barking around midnight that woke me up.  The night of the 6th the couple next door was having a flight - lots of profanity and throwing of items. I called the desk around 7:30 and it took 45 minutes for them to address the situation. They quieted down for a while, but it continued until after midnight.  Room service was sloppy.  They forgot silverware, napkin, and pot of water for tea. Internet was very slow.
Manager Response: Dear Louise P,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I want to apologize for the noise issues you mentioned.  I know how important a good night’s sleep is and I truly regret that we were not able to provide you with the sleep you needed.  I apologize as well for the issue with room service.  I have shared your review with my team and we will use this as an opportunity to improve our services moving forward.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We recently held a retreat for three days at this lovely hotel. The people could not have been nicer, the service was excellent. Loved the beds and bedding! The hotel staff made sure all our needs were met. Plus the restaurant has the best clam chowder!
Manager Response: Dear Jan A,  Thank you so much for the great 5-star review.  I was pleased to read that you enjoyed the staff, the bed, and the food.  We look forward to your next visit and to providing you with another 5-star experience!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed Monday this week And last week Thursday.  New decor nice..ate dinner in the bar, exceptional food variety, very excellent tasting food..nice staff.  Had breakfast, the buffet quite bountiful..everything anyone would want.
Manager Response: Dear Dave L,  Thank you for the very kind 5-star review!  Your feedback and your business is very much appreciated.  I will be sure to share your comments about our restaurant / bar with my food & beverage team.  I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: This Wyndham property has a great location, close to corporate parks and shopping.  Highway access is within 2 minutes.  It looks like the property has undergone recent updates and renovations.  The business center is up-to-date.  In summary it's a nice product with great value.  I think the front desk staff needs to listen more when their guest are speaking to them.  You will often catch them repeating the same questions and misdirecting phone calls.  However, it probably won't bug you that much- and you'll enjoy their rooms.
Manager Response: Dear CBinc,  Thank you for the great 5-star review.  I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly renovated property and I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel Stay from Hell, STAY AWAY!
Summary: Do not be fooled by the 3 1/2 star rating this hotel deserves a 1 star, I booked a two night stay (04/04-04/06) I called all week to see if our special requests could be accommodated, I was turned down on all of my requests because we booked through Priceline, (who would be stupid enough to pay full price for this hotel?) They gave me the run around on the phone all week saying multiple things yet when we checked in on Friday evening, a lovely rude male employee informed us that all 3 of us would be in a 1 king sized bed room! Are you serious? I specifically told them I needed 2 double beds for the 3 of us, I also told them I needed a refrigerator for  medical necessity and it took 4 hours to get, all they could say was, you'll be getting a rollaway bed shortly, this is no roll
Manager Response: Dear Rachel T,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience.  I am very sorry to hear that your stay went so poorly.  We truly value feedback like yours as it allows us the opportunity to learn and improve.  I have shared your review with my entire team and we will be sure to take advantage of your experience by finding better ways to handle the concerns you’ve shared.  Again, thank you for your review.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Good value. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Central location in Irvine and easy access to our visit to Disneyland. The toilet kept running and staff fixed it right away. It kept running the next day. Hopefully it will be fixed. Pool didn't have any towels but a staff person retrieved some promptly. Overall we had a good stay and would recommend the Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Xavier G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and would recommend our hotel.  It’s great to hear that the staff was able to address your concerns quickly and create a positive experience for you.  I do apologize for the situations with the toilet and the towels.  I will share your review with my team so that we can learn from it to provide a better experience for your next stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The room was great. It was comfortable and the price was good. Check in was easy. The swimming pool, sauna, and exercise room were good, with few people using the facilities. The location... not far from John Wayne Airport. Parking was included in the price of the hotel. Fairly close to shopping and eating places, but need to drive.
Manager Response: Dear Graham G,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We greatly appreciate the detailed feedback and are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  I’ll be sure to share your review with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The Hotel was extremley clean and convieniently located to many local hotspots and the staff was very friendly but yet professional !
Manager Response: Dear Robin Z,  Thank you for the great 5-star review.  Your kind comments about the cleanliness and the staff are greatly appreciated.  We look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Our room was clean. Have nothing bad to say except they...
Summary: Our room was clean. Have nothing bad to say except they only offered a king bed or 2 full size beds. The full size beds were just too small for 2 people in each bed. We were somewhat uncomfortable when sleeping. Also self parking is a bit expensive. Coming from Las Vegas I'm not use to paying soo much to park my car at a hotel that i am a guest in.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline E,  Thank you for the kind review.  It was our pleasure serving you and we hope that your travels bring you back our way again in the near future.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Room was stuffy but I did not address it with staff since I...
Summary: Room was stuffy but I did not address it with staff since I was too busy at my conference and was already unpacked/settled in.  The gym equipment needed some upkeep since the safety pins for stacked weights were broken.  Pool/hot tub were relatively clean and available.  The conference rooms were average with climate control being a little unpredictable at times.  The food was actually great and the hotel staff was very attentive.  Location was excellent due to close proximity to airport (2 minutes) and a few good restaurants in this predominantly business/financial district.
Manager Response: Dear Adam S,  Thank you for staying with us and for the detailed review.  I am sorry to hear that your room was not comfortable.  Though I wish you would have provided us the opportunity to correct it, I understand that you were busy.  We certainly would have liked to have addressed the issue immediately.  Thank you for your feedback on the fitness center.  I am pleased to inform you that I have just completed placing an order for brand new fitness equipment.  Everything in the fitness room will be replaced soon.  Thank you as well for the kind comments on the food and the staff.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Using my company declining balance card, Ricoh  USA. I was charged the incorrect rate and then after pointing this out was correctly charged.  The problem is the first charge hit the account and left no balance.  I should not have to be the one who knows the correct rate and I should have been over charged so my card had zero dollars on the card.  I have not even started with the room issues.
Manager Response: Dear John M,  I am very sorry about your experience with our hotel.  I deeply regret any challenges our mistake caused you.  As you said, charging the correct rate is our responsibility and we clearly failed to meet expectations with your stay.  Again, I am very sorry for the inconvenience.  I would love to hear more about your stay as it sounds like you were not happy with your room.  Please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel if you are willing to share your experience with me.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The elevators were dirty.  Need to be wiped down on a consistent basis to remove grime and fingerprints.  It's very strange how you get to the hotel gym.  From the 3rd floor, walk down the hall, take another elevator and then enter gym.
Manager Response: Dear S M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide your feedback.  We appreciate your comments and will be sure to monitor the elevators more closely.  We are committed to providing you and all of our guests a very clear environment and your reminder is helpful to us.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: We had many choices for accomodations but chose Wyndham, just to experience how they were for their hotel side, since we are Wyndham timeshare owners.  They were outstanding! Nice lobby, friendly staff, spacious, convenient to everything we needed for the weekend.  We used the workout room and swimming pool but discovered 24HourFitness Ultra was across the freeway and went there the next day since we are members there as well.  Location is convenient to all the places we needed to go to for the weekend.  They just remodeled and the room was REALLY nice on the 12th floor.  Hallways are wide and very clean! Went to the bar for their happy hour twice and once for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Little_ez,  Thank you for the great 5-star review and thank you for being a loyal Wyndham customer.  It’s wonderful to hear that your experience with Wyndham timeshare motivated you to try our hotel.  Thank you as well for calling out all of the great things about the hotel.  Having just completed an extensive renovation, we love to hear feedback like yours as it indicates we’ve been able to make a real positive impact on our guests’ stays with us.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the near future.       Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value!  The hotel is conveniently located nearby the...
Summary: Great value!  The hotel is conveniently located nearby the airport and offers excellent deals on quality rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very happy to hear that you felt the hotel was a great value.  I hope your travels find you back in our neighborhood soon and that we have the opportunity to provide you with another great stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everyting at the hotel was fantastic, one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in.  Super clean, easy to sleep, friendly staff from the moment I arrived.  Mahalo, hope to stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear John A,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am very happy to read all the great things you had to say about the hotel and even happier to read that you hope to visit us again.  We look forward to your return and to providing you with another awesome experience.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Everything met my satisfaction. Clean nicely appointed accommodations with a friendly staff. Parking  a little cumbersome...with ticket each time.
Manager Response: Dear Donald E,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide such a kind review.  I am very happy to hear that everything met with your approval and that you found the staff to be friendly.  As we come out of an extensive renovation, our goal is to provide every guest with a great experience.  It is great to read that we’ve been able to do that with you.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: house cleaning knocked on door on Sunday at 8:45 AM while the bill was still sticking out from the bottom of the door.  Why knock on the day people are checking out?  No breakfast pastries available in the restaurant at 10:30 AM.
Manager Response: Dear Kirklaz,  Thanks you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I want to apologize for any inconvenience my staff may have caused by the early attempt to clean your room.  I would also like to apologize for the shortage of breakfast pastries.  I will discuss this with my restaurant manager to ensure we are better prepared for the high demand we experienced that morning.   Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: the staff was the worst part of the stay.  not helpfull...
Summary: the staff was the worst part of the stay.  not helpfull unless I knew what to ask for exactly they would not offer any help.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremy O,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience with our staff.  Our goal is to provide every guest with a great experience and it is clear from your review that we failed to achieve that goal.  Again, I apologize.  I will be sharing your review with my staff and we will use it as an opportunity to learn and improve.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: I normally stay only at Hilton's when I travel for business.  The location is what brought me to the Wyndham.  The staff will have me coming back.  They were attentive and friendly.  The room was spotless.  The on-site restaurant had great food.  All that being said, what really made my stay was the front desk upon leaving the hotel.  I had an early flight and their shuttle driver had already left for the airport.  Instead of making me wait for his return, they located another driver and had him take me to the airport.  That is the kind of thing that makes a difference when you are a frequent traveler.
Manager Response: Dear Allyson S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I am so happy to hear that we’ve won you over as a Wyndham Irvine guest.  It’s great to know that the team is providing the level of service that would convince you to change your buying habits.  Thank you as well for the kind comments about the staff, cleanliness, restaurant, and shuttle service.  I will be sure to share your review with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff are amazingly helpful and kind. No stern and unkind faces at the front desk. Wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Abel S,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Your kind comments about our staff will be shared with my entire team.  We look forward to your next visit.      Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The stay at the Wyndham was great. The gentleman that operates the 14th floor lounge, Ross, was very hospitable and took care of all his patrons. The renovations to the Wyndham are top notch and the restaurant has good food at a fair price. I would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Shane I,  Thank you for the great review and for the kind comments about Ross!  He is a true asset to our guests and to the hotel.  Thank you as well for the feedback on our renovation.  We’re very excited about our new product and it’s great to hear that our guests are also excited.  I hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Room was excellent; check in an out good.  Beautiful...
Summary: Room was excellent; check in an out good.  Beautiful location and friendly service.  Breakfast was excellent nd atmoshere and staff were great.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy E,  Thank you for the great 5-star review!  I was happy to read about your excellent experience with the room, staff, and food. I hope your travels bring you back our way soon and that you allow us to provide you with another great stay!  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: I spent three nights at the hotel.  The first night the...
Summary: I spent three nights at the hotel.  The first night the room I was in 1025 had a very loud vibration in the wall.  There must be a duct for a large air handler or some sort of equipment.  I could not sleep.  The next morning I insisted that I change rooms.   I told the staff that I would be gone all day in meetings.  When I returned my new room was not ready and I had to wait around 45 minutes to change rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Eric O,  Thanks you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am sorry to hear about your issue with the noise and for the wait you experienced when you returned to the hotel.  I hope your additional nights with us were better and that you were able to sleep well in your new room.  I will be sharing your feedback with my team.
