We will take this as an opportunity to learn and figure out how to avoid the wait you experienced during your stay.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay. I've come to the Wyndham for a...
Summary: Very nice place to stay. I've come to the Wyndham for a getaway with my daughters and also for a getaway with my fiancé. Bed is super comfy and room service is always on time. Grapefruit juice is pretty horrible and watered down.
Manager Response: Dear Portia M,  Thank you for your very kind review.  I was happy to hear that you’ve stayed with us a couple times and that you’ve enjoyed each of your stays.  Thank you as well for the feedback on the grapefruit juice.  I’ll share this with my restaurant manager and make sure we address this concern.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Price was fair, service was friendly and location was okay, however I had one small problem. I'll call this problem "in room dining".  When I arrived to my room I looked around, curious about an odd smell, and to my surprise I found a pizza box in the dresser drawer! Well at first I was very excited, I love pizza! However upon further inspection. I found the box to be empty. Next time, please, either remove the box prior to my stay or leave me some pizza!
Manager Response: Dear Jose M,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I am very sorry to hear about the pizza box in your room.  That is an unacceptable oversight on our part and I discussed this with my Executive Housekeeper to ensure we are more thorough when cleaning our rooms.  I appreciate your levity in this situation, but please note that we take it seriously and will make sure it does not happen again.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary Heading: My girlfriend and I stayed here between 2/15-2/17 because...
Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here between 2/15-2/17 because we were going to Disneyland but didn't want to stay at the pricey hotels next to it.  I was set on another hotel right down the block but priceline.com had an "Express Deal" for $60/night.  Took a shot and it was the Wyndham.  It's easy to find but you do pay $15 for parking. When I was checking in they told me that if I wasn't a Rewards Member she could get me $5.00 a night off of parking.  I wasn't so $10.00 for parking wasn't too bad.  The room was great, really nice and clean.  There is a iPod hook up (not for the iPhone 5s but what hotel does) and there is a cool iPhone app you can download to control the TV for those who seem to loose the remote.  For the deal I got it was amazing, but would pay just a little more
Manager Response: Dear Jason S,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  I am very happy that you and your girlfriend were able to take advantage of the great savings to be had in Irvine.  Being in close proximity to Disneyland and Orange County’s best beaches while offering very reasonable weekend pricing makes Wyndham Irvine the perfect choice for people visiting these local attractions.  I’m thrilled to hear that you felt you got an amazing deal and I hope we can look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.     Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for the Surf City Marathon.   Booking under the group rate was a bit of a hassle but the race weekend services were awesome.  Goodie bag when we checked in, shuttle was on time and dropped us off very close to the start.  Hotel itself was clean, quiet, and updated.  I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca H,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide us with your feedback.  I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you would stay at our hotel again.  We look forward to working with the Surf City Marathon again next year so we hope to see you then, if not sooner.    Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: The staff made us feel like we were to blame for the smoke filled rooms and the barking dog in the room next to us. We were given keys to rooms that were already occupied. Not a safe place. My husband came late and asked for a room key and they just gave it to him. No notice from me that I had someone coming. Canceled for next week and went someplace else.
Manager Response: Dear Susie S,  I want to apologize for your experience at our hotel.  I have shared your feedback with my team and we will take advantage of you review by using it as an opportunity to improve.  I hope you will reconsider and try our hotel again in the future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Both Google Maps and my iPhone had trouble getting me directly to the hotel. Thankfully, I could see it from the street, so I just needed to close the travel programs and I was able to get to the hotel. I was a little frustrated that there was a parking fee for parking at this airport hotel that had ample parking and likely serves more guests without cars than with cars. I thought that the lobby lacked a welcoming feeling and needed to be updated. The rooms were updated and very nice - I really loved the bathroom. I also liked the space provided for me to work in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Steve L,  Thank you for staying with us.  I am happy to hear that you were able to locate the hotel despite the challenges that the GPS systems encounter when directing guests to our hotel.  I truly wish we had the ability to address the issue you experienced as this is an issue we hear frequently.  Unfortunately, these sights are not open to our requests for revisions.  I was also happy to hear that you enjoyed the renovated rooms and the workspace provided.  We have just received the new lobby furniture and artwork so I hope you will have the opportunity to stay with us again soon to see the improvements we’ve made that that area as well.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: So same problems as before even with remodeled rooms. Doors are very very loud when closing and huge gap under doors, when I say huge I mean in some 2" most around 1". Remodeled rooms are excellent and very cozy new beds are very comfy. And restaurant is great and good food selection.
Manager Response: Dear Riackywadkins,  Thank you for staying with us again and for taking the time to share your experience.  I appreciate you bringing the concern of the doors up to us again.  I have walked a number of the floors looking for the large gaps that you’ve mentioned.  We have found a couple doors that did require some attention in this area.  We will continue to check every room with the intent to eliminate any excessive gaps below the doors.  Again, thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: Average hotel in a business park in Irvine. Undergoing renovations, so a bit dusty. But the upgrades are nice.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie V,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  I am very happy to inform you that the renovations are complete and the dust has been cleaned up.  I hope that you will take the opportunity to stay with us again to experience the new, improved product.  I am confident that you will leave with a better than average opinion of the property.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager

Summary: My first stay since the renovation and Wyndham takeover.  Rooms were nice and comfortable.  Front desk staff not too familiar about the distance their courtesy bus service can travel.  Resulted in my being half an hour late for a crucial business appointment. (Getting a cab was ridiculous; over half an hour wait, no fault of the hotel)  The $40.00 cab fare was graciously refunded by the "General Manager" along with his apologies.  I would return for another stay.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen K,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review.  I was happy to hear that you would return to stay with us again.  I do apologize for any confusion of inconvenience you experienced regarding our shuttle.  The shuttle is limited to a three-mile distance from the hotel  I will make sure my entire team is aware of the shuttle limitations.  I hope that we get the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Justin Gammon General Manager
